source: Israel has thus far shown restraint in the face of this dangerous provocation, but will not allow its citizens to be the ongoing victims of these attacks.
standard: 以色列面对这种危险的挑衅，迄今保持了克制，但不会坐视其公民继续成为此类攻击的受害者。
answer: 面对这一危险的挑衅,以色列迄今表现出克制,但不允许其公民继续成为这些袭击的受害者。

source: The Israeli Government holds the Syrian Government responsible for this and all other attacks emanating from its territory and for all violations of the 1974 separation of forces agreement.
standard: 以色列政府认为叙利亚政府要对这起事件和由其境内发动的其他一切袭击事件以及所有违反1974年部队隔离协定的情形负责。
answer: 以色列政府认为,叙利亚政府应对这次袭击和来自其领土的所有其他袭击以及所有违反1974年《部队隔离协定》的行为负责。

source: Public policy should be refocused to tackle discrimination against girls and women in the education system and gender-based discrimination in relation to access to education, economic opportunities and employment, in order to ensure the increased participation of women in economic and productive activities and to involve them in decision-making at all levels of society.
standard: 公共政策应重新聚焦于解决教育体系中对女童和妇女的歧视，以及在入学、获得经济和工作机会过程中基于性别的歧视，从而确保妇女更多地参与到经济和生产活动中去，参与到社会各级的决策中去。
answer: 公共政策的重点应重新转向解决教育系统中对女孩和妇女的歧视以及在获得教育、经济机会和就业方面基于性别的歧视,以确保妇女更多地参与经济和生产活动,并让她们参与社会各级的决策。

source: In order to foster progress, it is vital to initiate a cultural transformation that will reverse negative attitudes towards gender equality and women's empowerment in certain societies, particularly in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
standard: 为支持这些进步，有必要开展一次文化转型，以转变某些社会，尤其是在刚果民主共和国，对性别平等和妇女权能的消极态度。
answer: 为促进进步,必须启动文化变革,扭转某些社会,特别是刚果民主共和国社会对两性平等和赋予妇女权力的消极态度。

source: Recalling the importance attached by the international community to all parties engaging fully, flexibly and constructively in the negotiations and noting that the negotiations have not yet resulted in an enduring, comprehensive and just settlement based on a bicommunal, bizonal federation with political equality, as set out in the relevant Security Council resolutions, encouraging the sides to intensify the substantive negotiations on the unresolved core issues interdependently, and stressing that the status quo is unsustainable,

source: Please clarify how those contradictory provisions are enforced in practice and indicate whether measures have been taken to remove discriminatory provisions in order to ensure that women have equal rights to transmit their nationality.
standard: 请澄清在实践中如何执行这些相互矛盾的规定，并说明是否已采取措施消除歧视性规定，以确保妇女有传递其国籍的平等权利。
answer: 请说明这些自相矛盾的规定在实践中是如何执行的,并说明是否已采取措施取消歧视性规定,以确保妇女有平等的传承国籍的权利。

source: 25. Stresses the importance of other positive measures and initiatives aimed at bringing communities together and providing them with space for genuine dialogue, such as round tables, working groups and seminars, including training seminars for State agents and media professionals, as well as awareness-raising activities, especially those initiated by civil society representatives, which require continued State support;
standard: 25. 强调指出必须采取其他积极措施和举措，促进社区融合并为社区提供真正对话空间，例如圆桌会议、工作组和研讨会，包括面向国家官员和媒体专业人员的培训研讨会，以及提高认识活动，特别是由民间社会代表发起、需要国家持续支持的活动；
answer: 25. 强调必须采取其他积极措施和举措,使社区汇聚一堂,为社区提供真正对话的空间,例如圆桌会议、工作组和研讨会,包括为国家工作人员和媒体专业人员举办的培训研讨会,以及提高认识活动,特别是民间社会代表发起的需要国家持续支持的提高认识活动;

source: in particular paragraph 2 of the Declaration and paragraph 86 of the Programme of Action, as well as the relevant provisions of the outcome document of the Durban Review Conference of 24 April 2009,
standard: 的相关规定，特别是《宣言》第2段和《行动纲领》第86段，以及2009年4月24日德班审查会议成果文件
answer: 特别是《宣言》第2段和《行动纲领》第86段,以及2009年4月24日德班审查会议成果文件的相关规定,

source: Adopt promptly, by no later than 30 days after the date of signing of this document a Resolution of the Parliament of Ukraine specifying the area enjoying a special regime, under the Law of Ukraine "On interim self-government order in certain areas of the Donetsk and Luhansk regions", based on the line of the Minsk Memorandum of September 19, 2014.
standard: 乌克兰议会迅速并至迟在本文件签署后30天内通过一项决议，说明根据2014年9月19日《明斯克备忘录》规定的界限，"关于顿涅茨克州和卢甘斯克州某些地区临时实行地方自治令"的乌克兰法律建立的特别制度涵盖哪一地区。
answer: 根据2014年9月19日明斯克备忘录,乌克兰议会根据乌克兰“顿涅茨克和卢甘斯克地区某些地区临时自治令”法,在签署本文件之日起30天内迅速通过一项决议,具体规定享有特别制度的地区。

source: To this end, Ukraine shall reinstate control of the segment of its banking system in the conflict-affected areas and possibly an international mechanism to facilitate such transfers shall be established.
standard: 为此，乌克兰应重新控制冲突地区的银行系统，并在可能时建立一个国际机制，以便于进行这种转移。
answer: 为此,乌克兰将恢复对其银行系统在受冲突影响地区的部分的控制,并可能建立一个国际机制,便利此类转账。

source: 68. In December 2014, as part of its efforts to provide continued support to reduce conflicts between farmers and pastoralists emanating from limited water resources, UNAMID commenced the implementation of the Darfur Capacity and Peacebuilding project, funded by the Government of Japan and implemented by the Nomadic Development Council.

source: In many countries, women spent a disproportionate amount of time on childcare and household responsibilities.

answer: 在许多国家,妇女花费过多的时间照顾子女和承担家庭责任。

source: The topics of developing and implementing national strategies and action plans for gender equality, and of agreeing on lines of responsibility for those actions were also discussed.
standard: 与会者还讨论了拟订和执行促进性别平等的国家战略和行动计划以及商定这些行动的责任分工等专题。
answer: 还讨论了制定和实施国家两性平等战略和行动计划以及商定这些行动的责任分工等议题。

source: Accordingly, the Philippine Development Plan (PDP) 2011-2016 integrated gender equality as a cross-cutting concern such that all but one of its chapters included specific provisions along this end.
standard: 2011-2016菲律宾发展计划将性别平等作为贯穿各领域的问题，因此，该计划除了一章以外，每一章都纳入关于这方面的具体规定。
answer: 因此,《2011-2016年菲律宾发展计划》(PDP)将性别平等作为一个贯穿各领域的关切问题纳入其中,因此,除一章外,所有章节都包含这方面的具体规定。

source: One activity conducted along this end was the Search for Outstanding VAW-Responsive LGUs which enabled competing local government units to clearly examine their policies, programs, and services on VAW and identify ways by which they can improve them, to better address VAW in their localities.
standard: 按照这个目标进行的一项活动是搜寻积极对暴力侵害妇女行为作出回应的杰出地方政府单位，这项活动使相互竞争的地方政府单位明确审视自己关于暴力侵害妇女行为的的政策、方案和服务，找出改善的方法，从而更好地应对当地发生的暴力侵害妇女行为。
answer: 围绕这一目的开展了一项活动,即 " 寻找杰出的暴力侵害妇女问题响应性地方政府单位 ",使相互竞争的地方政府单位能够明确审查其有关暴力侵害妇女问题的政策、方案和服务,并找出可以改进这些政策、方案和服务的方法,以便更好地解决其所在地区的暴力侵害妇女问题。

source: The Child Justice Act 75 of 2008 envisages that one-stop Child Justice Centres will be established to streamline the entire justice process, from arrest to the formal court process.

source: 3. Demands that all political parties in the countries concerned work together in unity and harmony to facilitate, without delay, free and safe access for humanitarian organizations and their staff to areas where the population needs them;

source: Also recalling that, on 19 August 2014, the African Union Peace and Security Council invoked article 6 (f), on humanitarian action and disaster management, of the Protocol Relating to the Establishment of the Peace and Security Council of the African Union, and authorized the immediate deployment of ASEOWA (African Union Support to Ebola Outbreak in West Africa),
standard: 又回顾，2014年8月19日，非洲联盟和平与安全理事会援引《关于成立非洲联盟和平与安全理事会的议定书》关于人道主义行动和灾害管理的第6 (f)条，授权立即部署非洲联盟应对西非埃博拉爆发援助团，

source: The work of the Ministry of Justice has thus been improved since the establishment, in 2012, of the Inter-Agency Council for the Coordination of Legal Outreach and Instruction by Government Agencies.

source: The research results indicate increased understanding of the law and politics and increased civic awareness and social engagement.

answer: 研究结果表明,人们对法律和政治有了更多了解,公民意识和社会参与也有所提高。

source: The Ministry states that this action represents a step towards the annexation of Georgia's integral territory, whereby the Russian Federation violates the internationally undertaken commitments, including those under the 12 August 2008 ceasefire agreement.

answer: 2015年1月23日,俄罗斯下议院国家杜马批准了莫斯科与格鲁吉亚阿布哈兹地区占领政权于2014年11月24日在索契签署的所谓“联盟和战略伙伴关系条约”。

source: The Group of Friends aims at promoting family-oriented policies and prioritizing the needs and priorities of the family at the national and international levels.

answer: 之友小组旨在促进面向家庭的政策,并在国家和国际两级优先考虑家庭的需要和优先事项。

source: The Group of Friends emphasizes that the human rights of all individuals, without discrimination based on race, colour, sex, language or religion, can best be promoted and protected within the family environment.

answer: 之友小组强调,在家庭环境中最能促进和保护所有个人的人权,不分种族、肤色、性别、语言或宗教。

source: 36. Australia is an active participant in international negotiations on the post-2015 development agenda, supporting the continuation of the core elements of the Millennium Development Goals (including the eradication of extreme poverty, making sure every child can attend school and empowering women and girls) and a greater focus on economic growth, as private sector development and jobs creation are the primary drivers of poverty reduction.
standard: 36. 澳大利亚积极参与关于2015年后发展议程的国际谈判，支持继续落实千年发展目标的核心内容(包括消除极端贫穷、确保每一个儿童都能够上学及增强妇女和女童的权能)，并更加注重经济增长，因为私营部门的发展和创造就业机会是减贫的首要推动力。
answer: 36. 澳大利亚积极参与关于2015年后发展议程的国际谈判,支持继续推进千年发展目标的核心要素(包括消除赤贫,确保每个儿童都能上学,增强妇女和女孩权能),并更加重视经济增长,因为私营部门发展和创造就业是减贫的主要驱动力。

standard: 这些知名人士作为委员会荣誉成员，在甄选过程中担任顾问，有特定任期，委员会可决定延长其任期。
answer: 知名人士应为委员会的荣誉成员,每五年在甄选过程中以顾问身份任职一次,具体任期可按委员会可能决定延长。

source: To this end, they agree to establish an oversight mechanism in the "Normandy format" which will convene at regular intervals, in principle at the level of senior officials of the Ministries of Foreign Affairs.
standard: 为此，他们同意设立一个"诺曼底形式"的监督机制，监督机制将定期举行原则上由外交部高级官员参加的会议。
answer: 为此目的,他们同意以“诺曼底模式”建立一个监督机制,该机制将定期开会,原则上在外交部高级官员一级定期开会。

source: Facing an imminent threat from the terrorist organization Deash, the Turkish armed forces conducted a military operation for the relocation of the Süleyman Şah Memorial Outpost, a 10-acre area of land of Turkish territory inside Syria.
standard: 面对恐怖主义组织达伊沙的紧迫威胁，土耳其武装部队为迁移苏莱曼沙阿墓前哨点开展了一次军事行动，该前哨点是叙利亚境内一块面积10英亩的土耳其领土。
answer: 面对恐怖主义组织Deash的迫在眉睫的威胁,土耳其武装部队开展军事行动,迁移叙利亚境内土耳其领土10英亩的Süleyman Şah纪念碑外围。

source: Evaluation policy review
standard: 评价政策审查
answer: 评价政策审查

source: Such vicious attacks, directly aimed at insulting and intimidating Palestinian Muslims and Christians, are inflaming religious sensitivities and tensions and risk instigating the outbreak of a religious war, with all of the grave ramifications in this regard.
standard: 这种邪恶攻击以侮辱和恐吓巴勒斯坦穆斯林和基督徒为直接目的，正在煽动宗教敏感情绪和紧张局势，有可能煽起一场宗教战争，在这方面带来所有各种严重后果。
answer: 直接旨在侮辱和恐吓巴勒斯坦穆斯林和基督教徒的这种恶毒攻击正在激起宗教敏感和紧张,并有引发宗教战争的危险,在这方面产生各种严重后果。

source: It must be reiterated that all such criminal actions are the responsibility of the occupying Power and are part of its illegal, destructive settlement campaign in the Occupied State of Palestine, including East Jerusalem.
standard: 必须重申，所有这类犯罪行为由占领国承担责任，这也是占领国在被占领巴勒斯坦国(包括东耶路撒冷)进行的非法、破坏性定居活动的一部分。
answer: 必须重申,所有这些犯罪行动都是占领国的责任,是占领国在包括东耶路撒冷在内的被占领巴勒斯坦国非法破坏性定居运动的一部分。

source: 1. Back-to-back meetings of the Chemical Review Committee and the Persistent Organic Pollutants Review Committee
standard: 1. 衔接举行化学品审查委员会和持久性有机污染物审查委员会会议
answer: 1. 化学品审查委员会和持久性有机污染物审查委员会前后相衔接的会议

answer: 秘书处的说明

source: A report on domestic violence by the United Nations Population Fund based on survey research published in 2010 found that in practice, the law is poorly implemented, and the national-level mechanism to prevent and respond to domestic violence cases has not been implemented.
standard: 联合国人口基金依据2010年发布的调查研究资料拟定的家庭暴力问题报告认为，这部法律实际上执行不力，国家一级预防和应对家庭暴力案件的机制并未得到执行。
answer: 联合国人口基金根据2010年公布的调查研究编写的一份关于家庭暴力的报告发现,在实践中,法律执行不力,预防和应对家庭暴力案件的国家级机制尚未落实。

source: Sex-selection abortion is a cultural phenomenon and indicates that there is gender imbalance in the country.
standard: 性别选择性堕胎是一种文化现象，这表明格鲁吉亚存在性别失衡。
answer: 性别选择堕胎是一种文化现象,表明该国存在性别不平衡。

source: Please indicate whether incentives are envisaged to encourage political parties to nominate equal numbers of women and men as candidates.
standard: 请说明是否打算采取奖励办法，鼓励政党提出同样人数的男女候选人。
answer: 请说明是否设想奖励措施,鼓励各政党提名人数相等的男女候选人。

source: Following the usual consultations, I should like to inform you of my intention to appoint Major General Purna Chandra Thapa (Nepal) as the Head of Mission and Force Commander of UNDOF.
standard: 经例行协商，谨通知你，我拟任命普尔纳·钱德拉·塔帕少将(尼泊尔)担任特派团团长兼观察员部队的部队指挥官。
answer: 经例行协商,谨通知你,我打算任命普纳·钱德拉·塔帕少将(尼泊尔)为观察员部队特派团团长兼部队指挥官。

source: I should like to take this opportunity to express my gratitude to Lieutenant General Singha for his dedication and effective leadership of UNDOF.
standard: 谨借此机会感谢辛哈中将对观察员部队的奉献精神和有力领导。
answer: 我愿借此机会感谢辛格中将的奉献精神和对观察员部队的有效领导。

source: 2.26 The Office furthermore seeks to consolidate the partnership with the African Union in the planning and management of peace operations and the development of institutional capacities to strengthen the partnership in initiatives geared towards preventing, managing and resolving conflicts.
standard: 2.26 该办事处还力求巩固与非洲联盟在规划和管理和平行动，发展机构能力方面的伙伴关系，以便加强在预防、管理和解决冲突举措方面的伙伴关系。
answer: 2.26 该办公室还力求巩固与非洲联盟的伙伴关系,规划和管理和平行动,并发展机构能力,以加强在预防、管理和解决冲突举措方面的伙伴关系。

answer: 本增编开列了安全理事会在2015年3月7日终了的一周内采取行动的项目。

answer: 第二次缔约国会议注意到委员会及其主席就委员会第一和第二届常会的结论所作的简报。

source: However, support to the establishment of DLDD-specific monitoring system was provided by only one third of the developed country Parties.
standard: 而且只有1/3的发达国家缔约方为建立专门的DLDD监测系统提供了支持。
answer: 然而,只有三分之一的发达国家缔约方为建立专门的DLDD监测系统提供了支助。

source: The Council elected Germany to fill an outstanding vacancy on the Intergovernmental Working Group for a three-year term beginning on 1 January 2015 and expiring on 31 December 2017.
standard: 理事会选举德国填补政府间工作组的一个待填补空缺，任期三年，自2015年1月1日起，至2017年12月31日止。
answer: 理事会选举德国填补政府间工作组一个待补空缺,任期三年,自2015年1月1日起,至2017年12月31日止。

source: In this regard, it was noted that certain Council presidencies have played a crucial role in creating an informal space for the chairs of country configurations and the countries on the agenda to discuss expectations and objectives of the Commission's engagement ahead of the Council's consideration of the situations in question.
standard: 在这方面，有人指出，一些安理会主席发挥了关键作用，帮助为国别组合主席以及列入议程的国家创造非正式空间，以便其在安理会审议所涉局势之前，讨论委员会参与的期望和目标。
answer: 在这方面,有人指出,某些安理会主席在为国别组合主席和议程上的国家创造非正式空间方面发挥了关键作用,以便在安理会审议有关局势之前讨论委员会参与的期望和目标。

answer: 更正 更正

source: Another problem is that the indicators established for the evaluation measure quantitative amounts: number of students per country, number of permanence, average age, etc. but not qualitative results.
standard: 另一个问题是，制订的各项评估指标只衡量数量(各国的学生人数、持续就读的人数、平均年龄等)，但不衡量质量。
answer: 另一个问题是,为评价量量确定的指标:每个国家的学生人数、长期学生人数、平均年龄等,但不包括质量结果。

source: Gender equality was stated as its main goal, ending with all types of discrimination against women.
standard: 会议的主要议题是性别平等和结束对妇女一切形式的歧视。
answer: 两性平等被确定为主要目标,以消除对妇女的各种歧视结束。

source: Through the American Samoa Territorial Office of Fiscal Reform, the American Samoa Power Authority applied to the Federal Emergency Management Agency of the United States for funds to construct and operate a 23.5 MWh power plant to replace the capacity lost when the Satala power plant was severely damaged by the earthquake, tsunami and flood of 29 September 2009.
standard: 美属萨摩亚电力局通过美属萨摩亚领土财政改革办公室向美国联邦紧急事务管理局申请经费，以建造和营运一个23.5兆瓦发电厂来取代在2009年9月29日地震、海啸和水灾中严重受损的Satala发电厂。
answer: 美属萨摩亚电力局通过美属萨摩亚领土财政改革办公室向美国联邦紧急事务管理局申请资金,以建造和运营一座23.5兆瓦的发电厂,取代萨塔拉发电厂因2009年9月29日地震、海啸和洪水严重损坏而损失的能力。

source: The education system is broadly based on that of the United States.

answer: 教育制度基本上以美国教育制度为基础。

source: At the global level, the United Nations could play a critical role in providing a platform for a strong monitoring and accountability mechanism.

answer: 在全球一级,联合国可以发挥关键作用,为强有力的监测和问责机制提供一个平台。

source: These plates interact in such a way that our country comprises young mountain ranges in which earthquakes, volcanic eruptions and mass movements of land occur, the latter caused by heavy rains, steep slopes and fractured and weathered materials.
standard: 这些板块相互作用的方式是，我国国土由年轻山脉组成，其中发生地震、火山喷发和陆地质量运动，陆地质量运动系由大雨、陡坡以及破裂和风化的材料所致。
answer: 这些板块相互影响的方式使我国包括年轻的山脉,地震、火山爆发和土地大规模移动发生,后者是由暴雨、陡坡以及断裂和风化材料造成的。

source: 1. At 0300, the subversive group from the Azerbaijani side, near the village Choporlu, attacked the combat position: soldier Nahapet Asatryan was fatally wounded and soldier Hovanes Gasparyan received a shrapnel wound from the Azerbaijani side.

source: The Beijing Platform stressed the importance of educating families re: the importance of respecting and empowering girls to achieve their full potential and ending harmful practices that affect their health and psycho-social, spiritual, educational and economic well-being and development.

answer: 《北京纲要》强调教育家庭的重要性,即尊重和增强女孩的能力,以充分发挥她们的潜力,并结束影响她们的健康和心理社会、精神、教育和经济福祉与发展的有害做法。

source: We reject all forms of discrimination outlined in the Convention to Eliminate Discrimination against Women, the Beijing Declaration and Platform for Action, and the ongoing work of the Commission on the Status of Women.

answer: 我们反对《消除对妇女一切形式歧视公约》、《北京宣言》和《行动纲要》中概述的一切形式的歧视,反对妇女地位委员会正在进行的工作。

source: Despite this tight export regime, Portugal maintains a firm commitment to the peaceful use of nuclear technology and materials and has imported and exported (mainly to Africa) radioactive isotopes for medical use, both for diagnosis and treatment, assuring at the same time the required technical cooperation and training activities (actions 38 and 39).
standard: 尽管制定了严格的出口制度，葡萄牙仍坚定致力于和平利用核技术和材料，进口和出口了(主要是向非洲)用于诊断和治疗的医用放射性同位素，同时确保开展必要的技术合作和培训活动(行动38和39)。
answer: 尽管这一严格的出口制度,葡萄牙仍然坚决致力于和平利用核技术和核材料,并进口和出口(主要向非洲)用于诊断和治疗的医疗用的放射性同位素,同时确保开展所需的技术合作和培训活动(行动38和39)。

source: It has extended the use of the civilian national seismic detection services in order to benefit from the Provisional Technical Secretariat data regarding tsunami alerts (action 14).

answer: 它已扩大使用国家民用地震探测服务,以便利用临时技术秘书处有关海啸警报的数据(行动14)。

source: The major outcome of the high-level segment, convened under the theme "Biodiversity for sustainable development", was the Gangwon Declaration on Biodiversity for Sustainable Development (see enclosure).
standard: 主题为"以生物多样性促进可持续发展"的高级别部分的主要成果是《关于以生物多样性促进可持续发展的江原宣言》(见附文)。
answer: 以“生物多样性促进可持续发展”为主题的高级别部分的主要成果是《江原生物多样性促进可持续发展宣言》(见附文)。

source: It can accommodate six cascades, and is divided between an area designated by Iran for the production of UF6 enriched up to 20% U-235 (Cascades 1 and 6) and an area designated by Iran for R&D (Cascades 2, 3, 4 and 5).
standard: 该设施能容纳六套级联，并被分隔为一个伊朗指定的铀-235丰度达到20%的六氟化铀生产区(1号和6号级联)和一个伊朗指定的研发区(2号、3号、4号和5号级联)。
answer: 它可以容纳六套级联,分为伊朗指定的生产铀-235丰度达到20%的六氟化铀的区域(1号和6号级联)和伊朗指定的研发区域(2号、3号、4号和5号级联)。

source: 14. Iran has stated that the purpose of enriching UF6 up to 5% U-235 is the production of fuel for its nuclear facilities.
standard: 伊朗已经表示，将六氟化铀浓缩到铀-235丰度达到5%的目的是为了生产其核设施所需的燃料。
answer: 14. 伊朗表示,将六氟化铀浓缩到铀-235丰度达到5%的目的是为其核设施生产燃料。

source: 55. Investigations by the Unit focus on alleged violations of regulations and rules and other established procedures by executive heads, heads of internal oversight bodies, officials of the organizations other than staff members, and, on an exceptional basis, staff of organizations that do not have an in-house investigation capacity, resources permitting.
standard: 55. 联检组重点调查行政首长、内部监督机构负责人以及工作人员以外的各组织官员被控违反规章和其他既定程序的行为，并在资源允许时，作为例外情况，调查不具备内部调查能力的组织的工作人员的此类行为。
answer: 55. 联检组调查的重点是行政首长、内部监督机构负责人、非工作人员组织官员以及在特殊情况下,在资源允许的情况下,没有内部调查能力的组织工作人员被控违反条例和细则及其他既定程序。

answer: 随着非索特派团控制范围的扩大,在距离更近的地方提供支助的要求更大,机会也更多。

source: On behalf of the National Coalition of Syrian Revolution and Opposition Forces, it is with great alarm that I draw your attention to the Assad regime's ongoing use of toxic chemical weapons in civilian-occupied areas of Aleppo and its recent expulsion of United Nations aid workers from Syrian territory, in direct violation of Security Council resolutions 2118 (2013), 2139 (2014), 2165 (2014) and 2191 (2014).
standard: 我代表叙利亚反对派和革命力量全国联盟，很震惊地提请你注意阿萨德政权继续在阿勒颇省平民地区使用有毒化学武器以及最近驱逐联合国援助人员离开叙利亚领土，直接违反联合国安全理事会第2118(2013)、2139(2014)、2165(2014)和2191(2014)号决议。
answer: 我谨代表叙利亚革命和反对派力量全国联盟非常震惊地提请你注意,阿萨德政权直接违反安全理事会第2118(2013)号、第2139(2014)号、第2165(2014)号和第2191(2014)号决议,继续在阿勒颇平民占领区使用有毒化学武器,最近将联合国援助人员从叙利亚领土驱逐。

source: In paragraph 237 of the report, the Committee recommended that the Assembly request the Secretary-General to report to the Committee at its forty-sixth session, and annually thereafter, on the progress, including problems, obstacles and challenges, as well as the goals of the United Nations system, to be achieved in support of NEPAD.

answer: 委员会在报告第237段中建议大会请秘书长向委员会第四十六届会议报告进展情况,包括问题、障碍和挑战,以及联合国系统在支持新伙伴关系方面要实现的目标,并在其后每年提出报告。

source: This means that the basis for the "Human rights resolution" on our country adopted at the sixty-ninth session of the General Assembly has collapsed and proves the utterly unjust nature of the act of the United States and other hostile forces in bringing Sin Tong Hyok and his like into the United Nations arena, organizing the anti-Democratic People's Republic of Korea "hearing" and railroading the "Human rights resolution."
standard: 这意味着联合国大会第六十九届会议针对我国通过"人权决议"的依据不攻自破，并证明美国及其他敌对势力将申东赫及其同类人带到联合国舞台举行反朝鲜民主主义人民共和国"听证会"并草率通过"人权决议"的行为是完全不公正的。

source: Two S-70 Turkish military helicopters infringed international air traffic regulations and violated the national airspace of the Republic of Cyprus by entering the Nicosia FIR and the national airspace of the Republic of Cyprus without diplomatic permit or contacting Nicosia ACC.
standard: 两架S-70型土耳其军用直升机未经外交许可，也未与尼科西亚地区管制中心联系，即进入尼科西亚飞行情报区和塞浦路斯共和国领空，违反了国际空中交通管制条例并侵犯了塞浦路斯共和国领空。
answer: 两架土耳其S-70军用直升机未经外交许可,也未与尼科西亚区域管制中心联系,进入尼科西亚飞行情报区和塞浦路斯共和国领空,违反国际空中交通管制条例,并侵犯塞浦路斯共和国领空。

source: 22 December
Along with contemporary manifestations of discrimination, such as disproportionately high levels of poverty and unemployment, may also contribute to the high rates of suicide.
standard: 加上现代各种歧视，例如贫困和失业程度过高，也是导致高自杀率的原因之一。
answer: 贫困率和失业率高得不成比例,加上当代各种形式的歧视,也可能导致自杀率高。

source: At its twelfth session the Forum reiterated its previous recommendations that address suicide among indigenous youth and requested that WHO conduct a study on the prevalence and causes of suicide among indigenous youth and that the Inter-Agency Support Group and WHO organize an expert group meeting to review policies and best practices on engaging indigenous youth and prevention of suicide.
standard: 论坛第十二届会议重申以前关于解决土著青年自杀问题的建议，再次请世卫组织研究土著青年自杀普遍率和自杀原因，并请土著人民问题机构间支助组和世卫组织举办专家组会议，审查动员土著青年和儿童预防自杀的政策和优秀经验。
answer: 论坛第十二届会议重申其以往关于土著青年自杀问题的建议,并请世卫组织对土著青年自杀的普遍程度和原因进行研究,并请机构间支助小组和世卫组织组织一次专家组会议,审查让土著青年参与和防止自杀的政策和最佳做法。

source: 14. Participants referred to articles 38 and 42 of the United Nations Declaration on the Rights of Indigenous Peoples and paragraphs 20, 21, 28, 30 and 40 of the outcome document of the World Conference on Indigenous Peoples as empowering the creation of a supervisory mechanism or the revision of the mandate of the Expert Mechanism on the Rights of Indigenous Peoples.
standard: 14. 与会者提到《联合国土著人民权利宣言》第38条和第42条，以及世界土著人民大会成果文件第20、21、28、30和40段，其中授权建立一个监督机制或修订土著人民权利专家机制的任务。
answer: 14. 与会者提及《联合国土著人民权利宣言》第38条和第42条以及世界土著人民大会成果文件第20、21、28、30和40段,认为这些条款授权设立监督机制或修订土著人民权利专家机制的任务授权。

source: The question was asked, what will it take for other mechanisms to analyse the indigenous right to self-determination?
standard: 与会者询问，需要怎么做才能让其他机制分析土著人的自决权？
answer: 提出的问题是,其他机制分析土著自决权需要什么?

source: Continued success requires States' political, technical and financial support.
standard: 持续的成功需要各国的政治、技术和财政支持。
answer: 持续的成功需要各国的政治、技术和财政支持。

source: Outreach
standard: 外联
answer: 外联外联

source: Armenia has a legislative basis to exchange, where appropriate, information with other States parties concerning specific means and methods used to commit offences covered by the Convention against Corruption, including the use of false identities, forged, altered or false documents and other means of concealing activities.
standard: 亚美尼亚立法规定，与其他缔约国酌情交换关于为实施《反腐败公约》所涵盖的犯罪而采用的具体手段和方法的资料，包括利用虚假身份、经伪造、变造或者假冒的证件和其他旨在掩饰活动的手段。
answer: 亚美尼亚有一个立法基础,可酌情与其他缔约国交流关于实施《反腐败公约》所涵盖的犯罪所使用的具体手段和方法的信息,包括使用假身份、伪造、变造或假证件和其他隐藏活动的手段。

source: Article 55(1) and (2) CC provide for confiscation of property or a part thereof; the size of property confiscation is to be determined by court.
standard: 《刑法典》第55(1)和(2)条对没收财产或部分没收财产作出了规定；财产的没收数量将由法院决定。
answer: 《刑法》第五十五条第(1)款和第(2)款规定没收财产或其一部分;财产没收的规模由法院决定。

source: 4. Encourages UNICEF to mobilize sufficient resources through its work with partners to meet the needs of all children in both development and humanitarian contexts;
standard: 4. 鼓励儿基会通过与伙伴合作，调集充足的资源，满足所有儿童发展和人道主义两方面的需求；
answer: 4. 鼓励儿童基金会通过与各伙伴合作,调动足够的资源,以满足所有儿童在发展和人道主义方面的需要;

source: Young Professionals Forum calls for governments, the international community and civil society, including the private sector, to remap its strategies, create programs that will benefit women's advancement, poverty alleviation, education, and empowerment.
standard: 青年专业人员论坛呼吁政府、国际社会和民间社会，包括私营部门，重新规划战略，并制定有益于提高妇女地位、减贫、教育和增强权能的方案。
answer: 青年专业人员论坛呼吁各国政府、国际社会和民间社会,包括私营部门,重新制定战略,制定有利于提高妇女地位、减缓贫穷、教育和赋予妇女权力的方案。

source: Population dynamics create a number of political as well as societal challenges, especially in the area of assuring nutrition, universal access to quality health coverage, education and training, as well as for technical and social infrastructure.
standard: 人口发展动态带来了一些政治和社会挑战，特别是在保证营养、普及高质量医疗保险、教育和培训以及技术和社会基础设施等领域。
answer: 人口动态带来了若干政治和社会挑战,特别是在确保营养、普及高质量保健、教育和培训以及技术和社会基础设施等领域。

source: 5. Revision of the UNCITRAL Notes on Organizing Arbitral Proceedings.
standard: 5. 对《贸易法委员会关于安排仲裁程序的说明》的修订。
answer: 5. 修订《贸易法委员会关于安排仲裁程序的说明》。

source: Other States required deposition or registration of the agreement at a court for it to be enforceable.
standard: 其他国家要求由法院对和解协议作出裁定或登记后才能执行协议。
answer: 另一些国家要求协议在法院进行宣誓或登记,这样协议才能具有可执行性。

source: 24. Stresses that South-South cooperation is not a substitute for, but rather a complement to, North-South cooperation;
standard: 24. 强调指出南南合作补充而非替代北南合作；
answer: 24. 着重指出南南合作不是取代,而是补充南北合作;

source: Bearing in mind the provisions of Chapter VIII of the Charter of the United Nations on the existence of regional arrangements or agencies for dealing with such matters relating to the maintenance of international peace and security as are appropriate for regional action and other activities consistent with the purposes and principles of the United Nations,
standard: 铭记《联合国宪章》第八章的规定，其中指出有各种符合联合国宗旨与原则的区域办法或区域机构，可用以应对关于维护国际和平及安全而宜于区域行动和其他活动之事件，
answer: 铭记《联合国宪章》第八章的规定,其中指出有区域办法或区域机关可用以应付适合区域行动和其他符合联合国宗旨和原则的活动的有关维持国际和平与安全的事项,

source: The Commission shall consider any such representations made by the Contractor in preparing its report and recommendation to the Council.
standard: 委员会在拟定提交理事会的报告和建议时应考虑承包者提出的任何这类交涉意见。
answer: 委员会在拟定提交理事会的报告和建议时,应考虑到承包者所作的任何此种陈述。

source: According to some statistical data and studies such as the Catalonia Health Survey 2012, the Caritas Survey 2013 and a perceptions study carried out by the National Women's Council of Catalonia in 2013, there has been an increase in psychological problems that affect mental health and lead to musculoskeletal pain and excessive medicalization.
standard: 一些统计数据和研究显示，例如《2012年加泰罗尼亚健康状况调查》、《2013年明爱会调查》和加泰罗尼亚全国妇女理事会于2013年进行的一次认知调查显示，心理问题有所增加，心理问题影响心理健康、引发肌肉骨骼疼痛和过度医疗化。
answer: 根据一些统计数据和研究,如2012年加泰罗尼亚健康调查、2013年国际慈善社调查和加泰罗尼亚全国妇女理事会2013年开展的一项认识研究,影响心理健康、导致肌肉骨骼疼痛和过度医疗的心理问题有所增加。

source: 8. The Committee remains of the view that Israel must release, immediately and unconditionally, all remaining Palestinian political prisoners, particularly children, women, the sick and legislators, including Marwan Barghouti.
standard: 8. 委员会依然认为，以色列必须立即和无条件地释放所有其余的政治犯，特别是儿童、妇女、病号和立法者，包括马尔万·巴尔古提。
answer: 8. 委员会仍然认为,以色列必须立即无条件释放所有剩余的巴勒斯坦政治犯,特别是儿童、妇女、病人和立法者,包括Marwan Barghouti。

source: The Committee requests the Division to obtain information and report periodically on civil society initiatives in order to enhance interaction between civil society and the Committee.
standard: 委员会请巴勒斯坦人民权利司收集信息，并定期报告民间社会的活动，以便加强民间社会与委员会之间的互动。
answer: 委员会请该司获得关于民间社会倡议的资料并定期提出报告,以便加强民间社会与委员会之间的互动。

source: The actual structural arrangement of the Service is based on the functional management dimension, and the security and service management dimension provides a critical cross-cutting process oriented management capacity.

answer: 该处的实际结构安排是以职能管理层面为基础的,安保和服务管理层面提供了贯穿各领域的关键流程管理能力。

source: In the European region, the Economic Commission for Europe (ECE) hosted the Ministerial Meeting on Housing and Land Management in October 2013, at which the ministers adopted the Strategy for Sustainable Housing and Land Management in the ECE region for the period 2014 - 2020.
standard: 在欧洲区域，欧洲经济委员会于2013年10月举办了住房和土地管理问题部长级会议，各国部长在会上通过了2014至2020年期间欧洲经委会区域可持续住房和土地管理战略。
answer: 在欧洲区域,欧洲经济委员会(欧洲经委会)于2013年10月主办了住房和土地管理部长级会议,会上部长们通过了欧洲经委会区域2014-2020年可持续住房和土地管理战略。

source: Furthermore, the Group calls upon all States to avoid any pressure or interference in the Agency's activities, especially its verification process, that could jeopardize its efficiency and credibility.
standard: 此外，本集团呼吁所有国家避免对该机构活动，特别是其核查进程施加任何可能危及其效率和公信力的压力或干扰。
answer: 此外,集团呼吁所有国家避免对原子能机构的活动,特别是核查进程施加任何压力或干涉,以免危及其效率和信誉。

source: On the other hand, by referring and disclosing the operational data of the armed forces of the Republic of Armenia, the representative of Armenia honestly admitted his country's direct involvement and responsibility for the continued aggression against the territorial integrity and sovereignty of the Republic of Azerbaijan.
standard: 另一方面，亚美尼亚代表在引用和披露亚美尼亚共和国武装部队的业务数据时，坦率地承认他的国家直接参与继续侵犯阿塞拜疆共和国的主权与领土完整并对此承担责任。
answer: 另一方面,亚美尼亚代表提及并披露了亚美尼亚共和国武装部队的行动数据,坦率地承认,亚美尼亚直接参与并继续侵犯阿塞拜疆共和国的领土完整和主权,并对此负有责任。

source: The World Organization of Prenatal Education Associations and the 24 associations comprising it consider that preventive measures can really change humanity or human beings at a basic level - the first preventive action is to focus on the roots of life.
standard: 世界产前教育协会组织和组成该组织的24个协会认为，预防措施可以在基本层面真正地改变人性或人类 -- -- 首个预防措施是关注生活的根源。
answer: 世界产前教育协会组织及其24个协会认为,预防措施可以真正在基本水平上改变人或人,第一个预防行动是注重生命的根源。

source: Following the usual consultations, I would like to inform you of my intention to appoint Mr. Haile Tilahun Gebremariam (Ethiopia) as my Head of Mission for the United Nations Interim Security Force for Abyei.
standard: 经例行协商，谨通知你，我拟任命海尔·提拉洪·吉布利玛利亚姆先生(埃塞俄比亚)担任联合国阿卜耶伊临时安全部队特派团团长。
answer: 经例行协商,谨通知你,我打算任命海尔·蒂拉洪·格布雷马里亚姆先生(埃塞俄比亚)担任我的联合国阿卜耶伊临时安全部队特派团团长。

source: As you will see in the decision, the Executive Council notes my statement that I will include the reports of the fact-finding mission, along with information on any discussions within the Executive Council on the work of the mission, as part of my monthly reports that I forward to the Security Council.
standard: 如你将在决定中所见的，执行理事会注意到我表示将把实况调查团的报告连同执行理事会内部对调查团工作的讨论信息包括在我每月提交安全理事会的报告中。
answer: 阁下在该决定中将看到,执行理事会注意到我的发言,即我将把实况调查团的报告以及执行理事会内部有关特派团工作的任何讨论的资料,作为我提交安全理事会的每月报告的一部分。

source: The Committee considered that the evidence of its abuse warranted its placement under international control and recommended that 25C-NBOMe be placed in Schedule I of the 1971 Convention.
standard: 委员会认为，既然有证据表明存在滥用这种物质的现象，就应对其实施国际管制，建议将25C-NBOMe列入《1971年公约》附表一。
answer: 委员会认为,滥用证据证明有理由将其置于国际管制之下,并建议将25C-NBOMe列入1971年公约附表一。

source: The substances were similar to cocaine, heroin and lysergic acid diethylamide (LSD) and were not licensed for use in Nigeria.
standard: 这些物质与可卡因、海洛因和麦角酰二乙胺（迷幻剂）类似，在尼日利亚未获准使用。
answer: 这些物质类似于可卡因、海洛因和甘蓝酸二乙酰胺(LSD),尼日利亚没有使用许可证。

source: 84. Despite achievements on gender equity in the education domain, and the undeniable progress made in the labour market and in female participation in economic ventures, Argentine women generally continue to face vertical and horizontal segregation in employment.
standard: 84. 尽管在教育领域实现男女平等方面有所收获，并且在劳动市场以及女性参与创业方面取得实实在在的进展，但总体来说，阿根廷妇女仍然在劳务领域面临格格不入的窘境。
answer: 84. 尽管在教育领域的两性平等方面取得了成就,尽管在劳动力市场和妇女参与经济事业方面取得了不可否认的进展,阿根廷妇女总体上仍然面临着就业方面的纵向和横向隔离。

source: The information compiled as of 2013 shows that 47% of all family farmers are women, and that 44% of organized family farmers are women.
standard: 2013年调查结果显示，妇女占到全部家庭农业人口的47%和家庭农业组织者的44%。
answer: 截至2013年汇编的资料表明,47%的家庭农民是妇女,44%有组织的家庭农民是妇女。

source: The Governing Council also agreed to the request of Iraq that deposits made by Iraq into the Compensation Fund since 1 October 2014 be returned to the Government of Iraq.
standard: 理事会还同意伊拉克关于将该国自2014年10月1日以来存入赔偿基金的存款返还给伊拉克政府的请求。
answer: 理事会还同意伊拉克的请求,即伊拉克自2014年10月1日以来向赔偿基金提供的存款应退还伊拉克政府。

source: Therefore, quarterly payments towards the outstanding awards will resume in 2016, in accordance with Governing Council decision 267 (2009).
standard: 因此，将在2016年恢复按照理事会第267(2009)号决定的规定，按季度支付未清偿的裁定赔偿款。
answer: 因此,根据理事会第267(2009)号决定,对未付赔偿金的季度付款将在2016年恢复。

source: Please provide information on the outcome of the survey, the problems identified and the measures taken to resolve them.
standard: 请提供关于调查结果、发现的问题，以及解决问题的措施的信息。
answer: 请提供资料,说明调查结果、查明的问题和解决问题的措施。

source: 17. Please provide information on measures taken to reinforce and support the participation of women in formal and informal conflict prevention efforts and indicate the steps taken to adopt a national action plan for the implementation of Security Council resolution 1325 (2000).
standard: 17. 请提供信息说明，为加强和支持妇女参与正式和非正式的预防冲突努力所采取的措施，并说明为通过一项执行安全理事会第1325(2000)号决议的国家行动计划所采取的步骤。
answer: 17. 请提供资料,说明为加强和支持妇女参与正式和非正式的预防冲突努力而采取的措施,并说明为通过执行安全理事会第1325(2000)号决议的国家行动计划而采取的步骤。

source: 7365th meeting, held on 21 January 2015.
standard: 第7365次会议，2015年1月21日举行。
answer: 第7365次会议,2015年1月21日举行。

source: According to information received by the Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR), at least 92 civilians, including 7 women and 26 children, were killed and dozens injured in opposition-controlled areas of Aleppo in January.
standard: 联合国人权事务高级专员办事处（人权高专办）收到的资料显示，1月份在阿勒颇的反对派控制区，至少有92名平民，其中包括7名妇女和26名儿童，被打死，另有数十人受伤。
answer: 根据联合国人权事务高级专员办事处(人权高专办)收到的资料,1月份在反对派控制的阿勒颇地区,至少有92名平民丧生,其中包括7名妇女和26名儿童,数十人受伤。

source: Fighting also took place in the Zabadani area of Rif Dimashq, where local sources reported aerial attacks by Government forces, including with barrel bombs, after armed opposition groups took control of key checkpoints.
standard: 当地消息来源称，在反对派团体控制了关键检查站之后，政府军对当地实施了空袭，包括使用桶装炸弹。
answer: 大马士革农村省扎巴达尼地区也发生了战斗,当地消息来源报告说,在反对派武装团体控制了关键检查站之后,政府部队进行了空袭,包括使用桶装炸弹。

source: The forceful seizure of Syrian territory, namely, the border village of Ashmah, and the raising of the Turkish flag over that village, in preparation for the future transfer of the shrine to that location, amounts to the occupation of Syrian territory.
standard: 武力夺取叙利亚领土(即边境村庄Ashmah)，并在该村庄升起土耳其国旗，以便准备日后将祠墓迁往这一地点，形同对叙利亚领土的占领。
answer: 强行夺取叙利亚领土,即边界村庄阿什马赫,并在该村上空举起土耳其国旗,为今后将圣迹转移到该地作准备,等于占领叙利亚领土。

source: Location of launch:
standard: 发射地点：
answer: 发射地点:

source: Vice-Presidents:
standard: 副主席：
answer: 副主席:

source: Although a parallel process of partner consultation for Habitat III is currently ongoing, the absence of a strong partnership strategy could compromise preparations for Habitat III itself.
standard: 虽然一个人居三伙伴协商平行进程在进行中， 但缺乏一项强有力的伙伴关系战略可能会损害人居三筹备工作本身。
answer: 人居三伙伴协商进程虽然目前正在平行进行,但缺乏强有力的伙伴关系战略可能会影响人居三本身的筹备工作。

source: I have the honour to inform you that the Security Council is scheduled to hold an open debate on "Maintenance of international peace and security: reflect on history, reaffirm the strong commitment to the purposes and principles of the Charter of the United Nations" on Monday, 23 February 2015.
standard: 我谨通知阁下，安全理事会定于2015年2月23日星期一举行部长级公开辩论会，主题为"维护国际和平与安全：以史为鉴，重申对《联合国宪章》宗旨和原则的坚定承诺"。
answer: 谨通知你,安全理事会定于2015年2月23日星期一举行一次关于“维护国际和平与安全:反思历史,重申对《联合国宪章》宗旨和原则的坚定承诺”的公开辩论。

source: Before exercising its right to make a recommendation under Chapter VI of the Charter, the Security Council should fully consider whether that is helpful to the ongoing efforts for the peaceful settlement of disputes.
standard: 在安理会根据《宪章》第六章行使建议权前，应充分考虑此举是否有助于正在开展的和平解决争端努力。
answer: 在行使根据《宪章》第六章提出建议的权利之前,安全理事会应充分审议这是否有助于正在进行的和平解决争端的努力。

source: Article 20
standard: 第20条
answer: 第 20 条

source: 3. It is the decision of the army and people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea that they have no further need or willingness to sit at the negotiating table with the United States, since the latter seeks to stamp out the ideology of the former and to "bring down" its social system.
standard: 3. 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国军民已经作出决定，既不需要也不愿意与美国坐下来继续谈判，因为美国企图要消灭朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的意识形态，要使朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的社会制度"崩溃"。
answer: 3. 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国军队和人民决定,他们不再需要或愿意坐到与美国谈判桌前,因为后者试图推翻前者的意识形态,并“击垮”其社会制度。

source: 2. Now that the gangster-like military strategy of the United States imperialists towards the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is inching close to the stage of igniting a war of aggression, the just counteraction of the army and people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will be focused on inflicting the bitterest disasters upon the United States of America.
standard: 2. 美帝国主义匪徒对朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的军事战略不断接近发动侵略战争的边缘，对此朝鲜民主主义人民共和国军民将采取正义行动进行反击，给美利坚合众国以最为深重的灾难。
answer: 2. 现在,美国帝国主义分子对朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的类似黑帮的军事战略接近引发侵略战争的阶段,朝鲜民主主义人民共和国军队和人民的正义反击将集中于对美利坚合众国造成最惨痛的灾难。

source: It was pointed out that an advisory opinion would contribute to clarifying the provisions of the Charter regarding the use of force and strengthening the rule of law in international relations.
standard: 有代表团指出，咨询意见将有助于澄清《宪章》关于使用武力和加强国际关系中法治的条款。
answer: 有人指出,发表咨询意见将有助于澄清《宪章》关于在国际关系中使用武力和加强法治的规定。

source: Lastly, for the first time in the history of the International Code of Conduct and in fulfilment of one of its provisions, France in 2011 hosted an inspection by international observers at the Guiana Space Centre in Kourou.
standard: 此外，作为提高透明度措施之一，法国于2011年接待了国际观察员到访位于库鲁的圭亚那航天中心，这在《行为守则》的历史上尚属首次；
answer: 最后,法国在2011年首次接受了国际观察员在库鲁圭亚那航天中心进行的视察,这是《国际行为守则》历史上第一次,也是为履行其中一项规定。

source: France will ensure that it remains so throughout the implementation process.
standard: 法国将继续确保该协议的整个执行过程都能如此令人满意。
answer: 法国将确保在整个执行过程中始终如此。

source: 1. In 1998, when the New Agenda Coalition was launched, the Foreign Ministers of the Coalition were motivated by the continued threat to humanity represented by the perspective of the indefinite possession of nuclear weapons by the nuclear-weapon States, as well as by those three nuclear-weapons-capable States that have not acceded to the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons, and the attendant possibility of use or threat of use of nuclear weapons.
standard: 1. 1998年，新议程联盟创立时，新议程联盟成员国外交部长的动机是，应对核武器国家以及尚未加入《不扩散核武器条约》的三个具备核武器生产能力的国家无限期拥有核武器这一前景给人类带来的持续威胁，和随之而来的使用或威胁使用核武器的可能性。
answer: 1. 1998年,新议程联盟成立时,新议程联盟各国外交部长的动机是,核武器国家以及三个具有核武器能力、但尚未加入《不扩散核武器条约》的国家无限期拥有核武器,以及随之而来的使用或威胁使用核武器的可能性,对人类构成持续威胁。

source: The New Agenda Coalition calls for a serious discussion on the Treaty provision requiring all States parties to pursue and elaborate "effective measures" relating to nuclear disarmament.
standard: 新议程联盟呼吁就不扩散条约的各项规定进行严肃讨论，要求所有缔约国均应探索和制定有关核裁军的"有效措施"。
answer: 新议程联盟呼吁认真讨论《条约》中要求所有缔约国采取和拟订与核裁军有关的“有效措施”的规定。

source: 8. The New Agenda Coalition has undertaken further analysis, including from an international legal perspective, of the four options for achieving and maintaining a world without nuclear weapons outlined in the above-mentioned working paper.
standard: 8. 新议程联盟还从国际法的观点对上述工作文件列出的这四项实现和维持无核武器世界的备选方案进行了进一步分析。
answer: 8. 新议程联盟进一步分析,包括从国际法律角度分析上述工作文件中概述的实现和维持一个无核武器世界的四个备选方案。

source: 3. No study could comprehensively capture the full extent of indigenous cross-border issues, which include collective identity, public health and management of natural resources and languages.
standard: 3. 任何研究都不能全面涵盖土著跨界问题的总体范围，其中包括集体认同感、公众健康和自然资源管理以及语言。
answer: 3. 任何一项研究都无法全面掌握土著跨界问题的全部情况,这些问题包括集体特征、公共卫生以及自然资源和语言的管理。

source: The Government of Peru indicated that mephedrone was a new psychotropic substance with physical effects similar to those of other stimulant drugs, especially methylenedioxymethamphetamine (MDMA), commonly known as "ecstasy", and with high potential of abuse, creating risks for health.
standard: 11. 秘鲁政府指出，甲氧麻黄酮是一种新型精神药物，其物理效应与其他兴奋剂药物相类似，特别是与亚甲二氧基甲基苯丙胺（MDMA）相类似，后者俗称"摇头丸"，具有高度的滥用潜在可能，对健康造成风险。
answer: 秘鲁政府指出,甲基麻黄碱是一种新型精神药物,其物理影响类似于其他兴奋剂药物,特别是亚甲二氧基甲基苯丙胺(俗称“摇头丸”)的物理影响,滥用的可能性非常大,对健康造成风险。

source: They are aimed at enlarging civic participation in criminal justice reform processes, including civil oversight and monitoring of the efficiency, fairness and respect for human rights of justice systems.
standard: 这些战略旨在扩大公民对刑事司法改革进程的参与，包括公民监督和监测司法系统的效率、公平性和尊重人权的情况。
answer: 其目的是扩大公民对刑事司法改革进程的参与,包括公民监督和监测司法系统的效率、公平和对人权的尊重。

source: Recalling its previous resolutions and statements on South Sudan, in particular resolutions 2057 (2012), 2109 (2013), 2132 (2013), 2155 (2014) and 2187 (2014),

Taking note of Economic Commission for Latin America and the Caribbean resolution 683 (XXXV) of 9 May 2014, in which the Commission welcomed the request made by the Embassy of the Netherlands in Santiago on behalf of the Government of Sint Maarten that the latter be granted associate membership in the Commission and decided that Sint Maarten should be granted associate membership in the Commission,
standard: 表示注意到拉丁美洲和加勒比经济委员会2014年5月9日第683(XXXV)号决议，委员会在该决议中欢迎荷兰驻圣地亚哥大使馆代表圣马丁政府请求给予后者委员会准成员资格，决定给予圣马丁委员会准成员资格，
answer: 表示注意到拉丁美洲和加勒比经济委员会2014年5月9日第683(XXXV)号决议,其中委员会欢迎荷兰驻圣地亚哥大使馆代表圣马丁政府提出的给予圣马丁委员会准成员资格的请求,并决定给予圣马丁委员会准成员资格,

source: Some emphasized that there was a need to establish the right balance of functions and powers among each principal organ of the United Nations.
standard: 一些代表团强调，有必要在联合国每个主要机关之间建立适当的职权平衡。
answer: 一些人强调,有必要在联合国各主要机关的职能和权力之间建立适当的平衡。

source: 2. In their general comments, several delegations reiterated their concern that the Security Council had encroached on the functions and powers of the General Assembly and the Economic and Social Council by addressing issues that fell within the competence of those organs.
standard: 2. 一些代表团在其一般性评论中，再次对安全理事会处理大会和经济及社会理事会管辖范围内的问题、从而蚕食这些机构的职权表示担心。
answer: 2. 几个代表团在一般性评论中重申其关切,即安全理事会处理属于大会和经济及社会理事会职权范围的问题,侵犯了大会和经济及社会理事会的职能和权力。

source: Press release
standard: 新闻稿
answer: 新闻稿

source: I strongly request that the United Nations take an impartial and fair stand, being well aware that the anti-DPRK "human rights campaigns" pursued by the United States and others are utterly irrelevant to the protection of genuine human rights, and are rather dangerous moves to tarnish the image of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and to find a pretext to invade it.
standard: 我强烈要求联合国采取公正、公平的立场，清楚地意识到美国和其他国家开展的反朝鲜的"人权运动"同保护真正的人权完全不相干，是为了玷污朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的形象以及为了寻找借口入侵朝鲜而采取的相当危险的举动。
answer: 我强烈要求联合国采取公正和公平的立场,充分认识到美国和其他国家开展的反朝鲜“人权运动”与保护真正的人权完全无关,是玷污朝鲜民主主义人民共和国形象和寻找借口入侵朝鲜的相当危险的举动。

source: Recognizes that it is the responsibility of the respective conferences of the parties to keep under continuous review and evaluation the implementation of the Basel, Rotterdam and Stockholm conventions;
standard: 认识到 持续审查和评估《巴塞尔公约》、《鹿特丹公约》和《斯德哥尔摩公约》的执行情况是相应缔约方大会的责任；
answer: 承认 不断审查和评价《巴塞尔公约》、《鹿特丹公约》和《斯德哥尔摩公约》的执行情况是各缔约方大会的责任;

source: The Secretariat has performed its facilitating role under the Basel and Rotterdam conventions in the context of its interactions with the Global Environment Facility on matters related to the financial mechanism of the Stockholm Convention.
standard: 在与全球环境基金就《斯德哥尔摩公约》财务机制有关事项展开互动交流的过程中，秘书处发挥了其在《巴塞尔公约》和《鹿特丹公约》下的促进作用。
answer: 秘书处在与全球环境基金就与《斯德哥尔摩公约》财务机制有关的事项进行互动方面,在《巴塞尔公约》和《鹿特丹公约》下发挥了促进作用。

source: Assessing public activities from a gender perspective - gender mainstreaming - is promoted by Switzerland in its external policies but is still not being applied in Switzerland itself, except in a handful of towns and one federal department.
standard: 瑞士在对外政策中倡导从性别角度，即性别主流化的角度评估公共活动，但在本国，却仅在一些小镇和一个联邦部门得到落实。
answer: 瑞士在其对外政策中提倡从性别角度评估公共活动 -- -- 将性别观点纳入主流,但除了少数城镇和一个联邦部门外,瑞士本身仍然没有应用。

source: Attempts to promote female role models and capable figures of authority must compete with the hypersexualization of women and girls.
standard: 在试图增进妇女的作用，宣传有能力的妇女形象时，总会遇到极度强调妇女和女童的性别的情形。
answer: 提倡女性榜样和有能力的权威人物的尝试必须与妇女和女童的超性性行为竞争。

source: Furthermore in 2014, HMS Argyll and HMS Severn were on patrol in the Caribbean and the North Atlantic to provide disaster relief and humanitarian assistance as needed.
standard: 此外，2014年，"HMS Argyll"号舰和"HMS Severn"号舰在加勒比和北大西洋巡逻，在需要时提供救灾和人道主义援助。
answer: 此外,2014年,HMS Argyll和HMS Severn在加勒比和北大西洋巡逻,在需要时提供救灾和人道主义援助。

source: The report covered, inter alia, activities in Anguilla, Bermuda, the British Virgin Islands, the Cayman Islands, the Falkland Islands (Malvinas), Gibraltar, Montserrat, Pitcairn, Saint Helena and the Turks and Caicos Islands.
standard: 该报告除其他外涵盖了在安圭拉、百慕大、英属维尔京群岛、开曼群岛、福克兰群岛(马尔维纳斯群岛)、 直布罗陀、蒙特塞拉特、皮特凯恩、圣赫勒拿以及特克斯和凯科斯群岛的活动。
answer: 报告除其他外,介绍了在安圭拉、百慕大、英属维尔京群岛、开曼群岛、福克兰群岛(马尔维纳斯)、直布罗陀、蒙特塞拉特、皮特凯恩、圣赫勒拿和特克斯和凯科斯群岛的活动。

source: The socioeconomic development of any State depends on maintaining a balance between security and protection of the rights of all citizens in society, without exception.
standard: 每个国家的社会经济发展取决于社会全体公民的安全与权利保护之间的平衡。
answer: 任何国家的社会经济发展都有赖于在安全和保护社会中所有公民的权利之间保持平衡,无一例外。

source: The Security Council recalls the obligations in operative paragraph 2 (e) of resolution 1373 (2001).
standard: 安全理事会回顾第1373(2001)号决议执行部分第2(e)段规定的义务。
answer: 安全理事会回顾第1373(2001)号决议执行部分第2(e)段中的各项义务。

source: It has proved to be a unique opportunity for forest-related stakeholders to contribute meaningfully to the discussions on the Forum's main themes, thereby enriching the international arrangement on forests through a diversity of views on issues relating to sustainable forest management and the implementation of the non-legally binding instrument on forests and its four global objectives on forests.
standard: 对话进程已被证明是一个独特的机会，使与森林有关的利益攸关方能为关于论坛主要专题的讨论作出有意义的贡献，从而通过对与可持续森林管理和落实关于森林问题的无法律约束力文书及其四项全球森林目标有关的问题发表各种观点，丰富国际森林安排。
answer: 事实证明,这是一个独特的机会,使与森林有关的利益攸关方能够对论坛主要专题的讨论作出有意义的贡献,从而通过在有关可持续森林管理和执行无法律约束力森林问题文书及其四项全球森林目标等问题上的各种观点丰富国际森林安排。

source: In addition, it requested the Forum secretariat to continue and strengthen its activities to effectively engage all major groups.
standard: 此外，论坛要求论坛秘书处继续开展和加强其与所有主要群体有效互动协作的活动。
answer: 此外,大会还请论坛秘书处继续并加强其各项活动,使所有主要群体有效参与。

source: Funding from the eleventh European Development Fund has allowed for the resurfacing of eight kilometres of main roads.
standard: 在第十一批欧洲开发基金的供资下，重铺了8公里主要道路。
answer: 第十一届欧洲开发基金提供的资金使八公里主要道路得以重新铺设。

source: The contractual completion date of the project is February 2016.
standard: 合同规定，项目完成日期是2016年2月。
answer: 项目的合同完成日期为2016年2月。

source: The recent climate of austerity reinforces the idea that women's rights are "the icing on the cake".
standard: 近期的凝重气氛进一步强化了这种理念，即妇女的权利就是"蛋糕上的糖衣"，只是锦上添花。
answer: 最近的紧缩气氛强化了一种观念,即妇女权利是“在蛋糕上钉钉钉子”。

source: Taking note of the work of the Open-ended Working Group on Ageing and its contribution to the implementation and follow-up of the Madrid Plan of Action,
standard: 注意到老龄问题不限成员名额工作组的工作及其对执行和贯彻《马德里行动计划》的贡献，
answer: 注意到老龄问题不限成员名额工作组的工作及其对《马德里行动计划》的执行和后续行动的贡献,

source: The Security Council emphasizes that the combined presence of terrorism, violent extremism, and transnational organized crime may exacerbate conflicts in affected regions and notes that terrorist groups benefiting from transnational organized crime can, in some cases and in some regions, complicate conflict prevention and resolution efforts.
standard: 安全理事会强调，恐怖主义、暴力极端主义和跨国有组织犯罪的同时存在加剧了有关区域的冲突，指出通过跨国有组织犯罪获益的恐怖团体在有些情况下和在有些区域，可增加防止和解决冲突工作的复杂性。
answer: 安全理事会强调,恐怖主义、暴力极端主义和跨国有组织犯罪交织在一起,可能会加剧受影响地区的冲突,并指出,受益于跨国有组织犯罪的恐怖主义集团在某些情况下和在某些区域可能使预防和解决冲突的努力复杂化。

source: 2. The Government of the Republic of Korea has nominated Seongmee Yoon to fill the vacancy arising from the resignation of Mr. Yoo.
standard: 2. 大韩民国政府提名Seongmee Yoon填补柳先生辞职留下的空缺。
answer: 2. 大韩民国政府已提名Yoo先生辞职产生的空缺填补Yoo先生辞职后产生的空缺。

answer: 2002年至2004年任大韩民国常驻联合国代表团职务。

source: Member of the editorial advisory group of several journals, including Feminist Africa, Journal of Peasant Studies, Feminist Economics, Canadian Journal of Development Studies and Ghana Studies.

answer: 几个期刊的编辑咨询小组成员,包括女权主义非洲杂志、农民研究杂志、女权经济学杂志、加拿大发展研究杂志和加纳研究杂志。

source: Holds a doctorate degree in Social Science from Leiden University, the Netherlands.

answer: 拥有荷兰莱顿大学社会科学博士学位。

source: The right logic requires that you understand the nature and essence of what they are frightening you about and want you to keep away from.
standard: 正确的逻辑要求你了解他们使你们对之害怕并希望你们远之的事务的性质和本质。
answer: 正确的逻辑要求你了解他们吓唬你的本质和本质,并希望你远离他们。

source: I don't want to deal herein with the different phobias with which the Western nations have thus far been indoctrinated.

answer: 我不想在这里谈论西方国家迄今所灌输的各种恐惧症。

source: Femmes solidaires notes that poverty fosters the development of conservative, reactionary forces, be they religious or political.

answer: 4. 方案问题和其他事项。

source: We will continue our work with communities and informing policies and programmes to address these problems for all women to attain good physical and mental health to live a productive and fulfilling life.

answer: 我们将继续与社区合作,为解决这些问题的政策和方案提供信息,使所有妇女都能获得良好的身心健康,过上富有成果和充实的生活。

answer: 我们致力于推动努力,在妇女和女孩中推广安全孕产经验。

source: The proposal respects the unity and territorial integrity of the Syrian Arab Republic and relevant Security Council resolutions.

answer: 该提案尊重阿拉伯叙利亚共和国的统一和领土完整以及安全理事会相关决议。

source: 32. During the reporting period, two besieged communities were reached with food distributed to 2,544 people (1.2 per cent of the 212,000 people in besieged areas); non-food items distributed to 2,540 people (1.2 per cent); and medical assistance distributed to 1,280 people (0.6 per cent), in addition to vaccines.
standard: 32. 在报告所述期间，向两个被围困社区的2 544人分发了粮食(在被围困地区的212 000人中占1.2%)；向2 540人分发了非粮食物品(1.2%)；向1 280人(0.6%)提供了疫苗及其他医疗救助。
answer: 32. 在本报告所述期间,向两个被围困社区发放了粮食,向2 544人发放了粮食(占被围困地区212 000人的1.2%);向2 540人发放了非粮食物品(1.2%);除疫苗外,还向1 280人发放了医疗援助(0.6%)。

source: Contribute to ensuring continuity in the long-term objectives of urban and territorial plans, even in times of political change or short-term impediments.
standard: 促进确保城市和土地计划长期目标的持续性，即使在政治变革或出现短期障碍时也不例外。
answer: 即使在政治变革或短期障碍时期,也有助于确保城市和地区计划长期目标的连续性。

source: Design and organize training sessions for policymakers and local leaders to sensitize them to urban and territorial planning issues, particularly the need for continuous and long-term implementation and accountability;
standard: 为政策制定者和地方领导人设计和组织培训班，提高他们对城市和土地规划问题的认识，尤其是使其认识到这些规划需要持续、长期的实施和问责制；
answer: 设计并组织决策者和地方领导人培训班,使他们了解城市和领土规划问题,特别是持续和长期实施和问责制的必要性;

source: An Israeli enemy Merkava tank positioned along the technical fence, 200 metres west of point TP16, pointed its cannon towards Lebanese territory.

source: UNODC participated in several activities related to the implementation of Council resolution 1540 (2004), including a regional workshop for Central Asian States on its contribution to regional and global disarmament and non-proliferation, held in Astana on 11 and 12 March, and a regional workshop on implementation of Council resolution 1540 (2004) for Member States of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), held in Seoul on 27 and 28 October.

answer: 毒品和犯罪问题办公室参加了与执行安理会第1540(2004)号决议有关的若干活动,包括3月11日和12日在阿斯塔纳为中亚国家举办的关于其对区域和全球裁军和不扩散的贡献的区域讲习班,10月27日和28日在首尔为东南亚国家联盟(东盟)成员国举办的关于执行安理会第1540(2004)号决议的区域讲习班。

source: The income to Tokelau from fisheries licensing in its exclusive economic zone continued to improve and was currently the largest single source of self-generated revenue in the Territory.

standard: 然而，据管理国称，尚未发生重大变化。
answer: 然而,据管理国称,尚未产生重大变化。

source: Limiting access to comprehensive information on sexual and reproductive health combined with obstacles in accessing healthcare services hinder adolescents' and young people's safe and healthy transition into adulthood.

answer: 限制获得关于性健康和生殖健康的全面信息,加上在获得保健服务方面的障碍,妨碍青少年和年轻人安全、健康地过渡到成年。

source: Young girls face particular risks of stigma and social exclusion as unintended pregnancies may lead to school dropout and block the way to complete education and entering the labour market.
standard: 意外怀孕可能导致辍学，阻塞了完成学业和进入劳动力市场的道路，因而年轻女孩尤其面临着羞辱和社会排斥的风险。
answer: 年轻女孩面临耻辱和社会排斥的特殊风险,因为意外怀孕可能导致辍学,阻碍完成教育和进入劳动力市场的道路。

answer: 说明摘要指出,咨询小组感谢紧急救济协调员和应急基金秘书处管理应急基金。

source: 45. With the deactivation of the last four remaining humanitarian cluster mechanisms on 31 December 2014, inter-agency support continued to reinforce State control over sustainable solutions in the key social sectors of health, water, sanitation, education and protection.
standard: 45. 在于2014年12月31日撤销最后四个剩余的人道主义群组机制后，机构间的支持继续增强保健、水、卫生、教育和保护等主要社会部门中国家对可持续解决办法的控制。
answer: 45. 随着2014年12月31日最后四个人道主义群组机制开始运作,机构间支助继续加强国家对卫生、水、卫生、教育和保护等关键社会部门的可持续解决方案的控制。

source: 29. The reporting period witnessed significant engagement by Haitian stakeholders on human rights reporting.

answer: 29. 在本报告所述期间,海地利益攸关方大量参与人权报告工作。

source: Women suffer the most in war and armed conflict, as they are subject to both systemic violence based on religious fundamentalism and ethnic discrimination and violence based on the outdated concept of women as the property of men, leading to rape and murder of women and girls as a means to humiliate the enemy.
standard: 妇女在战争和武装冲突中遭受的损失最重，因为她们既要受到基于宗教原教旨主义和种族歧视的系统性暴力的侵害，还要受到基于妇女是男子的财产这样的过时观念而实施的暴力的侵害，这造成把强奸和杀害妇女和女童作为羞辱敌人的一种途径。
answer: 妇女在战争和武装冲突中受害最深,因为她们既遭受基于宗教原教旨主义的系统性暴力,也遭受基于过时的妇女作为男子财产的概念的种族歧视和暴力,导致强奸和谋杀妇女和女孩,以此作为羞辱敌人的手段。

source: It is estimated that an amount of $4,000 in 2015 shall be required for the production of the two plaques and for print materials, such as the biographies of the laureates, invitations and special event programmes in the six official languages of the United Nations, and for translation of the dedicated webpage.
standard: 估计2015年需要4 000美元制作两块牌匾和六种正式语文的获奖人简介、邀请函和特别活动节目单等印刷材料，以及翻译专用网页。
answer: 2015年估计需要4 000美元,用于制作两个徽章和印刷材料,如获奖者简历、邀请函和以联合国六种正式语文制作的特别活动方案,以及翻译专用网页。

source: The amount of $4,000 has been identified for absorption within the approved appropriation for the Department of Public Information under the programme budget for 2014-2015.
standard: 这笔4 000美元的数额已确定在2014-2015年方案预算下新闻部的核定批款中匀支。
answer: 4 000美元已确定在2014-2015两年期方案预算新闻部核定批款中匀支。

source: We respectfully urge the Commission to consider the issue soon, preferably as a main focus during its 60th session, because violence against indigenous women and girls is a worldwide human rights crisis that cannot wait to be addressed.
standard: "我们恳请委员会尽快审议这个问题，最好是在第六十届会议期间作为一个重点关注内容，因为暴力侵害土著妇女和女孩是一个世界性的人权危机，必须尽快加以解决。
answer: 我们谨敦促委员会尽快审议这一问题,最好是作为第六十届会议期间的主要重点,因为暴力侵害土著妇女和女孩行为是一个世界性的人权危机,迫不及待地加以解决。

source: Violence against women is a pervasive human rights violation across the globe, and the situation is particularly dire for indigenous women and girls.
standard: 暴力侵害妇女是全球普遍存在的一种人权侵犯形式，而且对于土著妇女和女孩来说，她们的处境尤为悲惨。
answer: 暴力侵害妇女行为是全球普遍存在的侵犯人权行为,对土著妇女和女孩而言,情况尤为严峻。

source: The General Assembly,
standard: 大会，
answer: 大会,

source: I am encouraged that the budget reflects the Government's political commitments to restore security, alleviate poverty, promote national reconciliation, provide humanitarian relief to displaced persons and rebuild areas in Iraq affected by the ongoing conflict and military operations.
standard: 我感到鼓舞的是，预算反映了政府的政治承诺，即恢复安全，缓解贫困，促进民族和解、向流离失所者提供人道主义救济，并重建伊拉克境内受持续冲突和军事行动影响的地区。
answer: 令我感到鼓舞的是,预算反映了伊拉克政府的政治承诺,即恢复安全,减轻贫困,促进民族和解,向流离失所者提供人道主义救济,以及在伊拉克重建受当前冲突和军事行动影响的地区。

source: However, when reviewing progress made on improving women's health in general and maternal health in particular, the data paints a grim picture.
standard: 然而，当审议在改善女性总体健康特别是孕产妇健康方面取得的进步时，数据显示的情况并不乐观。
answer: 然而,在审查改善妇女总体健康状况,特别是产妇保健方面取得的进展时,数据描绘了严峻的画面。

source: Factors that distinguished the global HDRs which were used more and contributed to public policy processes included distinctive human development concepts, tools for analysing development issues, perspectives that differed from mainstream thinking and boldness in communicating difficult, often controversial messages.
standard: 一些全球人类发展报告使用较多并推动了公共政策进程，其特点体现在独到的人类发展概念、分析发展问题的工具、有别于主流思维的观点以及敢于传播困难并经常引起争议的信息。
answer: 区分全球人类发展报告的各种因素,更多地利用了这些指数,并且有助于公共政策进程,这些因素包括独特的人类发展概念、分析发展问题的工具、不同于主流思维的观点,以及在传播困难、往往有争议的信息方面的大胆。

source: Sentinel Asia promotes cooperation among the space community, the disaster management community (the Asian Disaster Reduction Center and its members) and the international community (the Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific, the Office for Outer Space Affairs of the Secretariat, the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), the Asian Institute of Technology, etc.).

source: In the area of finance, recommendations were made to: (a) ensure effective management of locally managed direct costs; (b) ensure independent verification of completeness and accuracy of benefits, entitlements and payroll charges; and (c) provide documentation to support the increase in costs for benefits and entitlements services despite a reduction in the number of UNOPS staff.
standard: 28. 在财务领域，为以下目的提出了建议：(a) 确保有效管理当地管理的直接费用；(b) 确保独立核查福利、应享待遇和薪工单费用的完整性和准确性；(c) 提供文件，以证明尽管项目厅工作人员数目减少而福利和应享待遇服务费用的增加。
answer: 在财务领域,建议:(a) 确保有效管理当地管理的直接费用;(b) 确保独立核实福利、应享待遇和薪金收费的完整性和准确性;(c) 提供文件,支持尽管项目厅工作人员减少,但福利和应享待遇服务费用增加。

standard: 卢森堡可在被指控罪犯处于其领域内而其仅因该人为本国国民而不予引渡时，确立其对根据《公约》确立的犯罪的管辖权（《刑事诉讼法》第5-1 条）。
answer: 卢森堡可以在被指控罪犯在其领域内时确立其对根据《公约》确立的犯罪的管辖权,而且卢森堡仅以该人是其国民为由不引渡该人(《刑法典》第5-1条)。

answer: 以色列不会袖手旁观,因为真主党的目标是以色列人。

answer: 她们可能被迫乞讨和卖淫,以支持母亲。

source: Moreover, in many developed countries, widows, especially elderly widows, live in poverty, isolation and without dignity or respect.
standard: 此外，在许多发达国家，寡妇，特别是年老寡妇，生活贫困、受到孤立并且没有尊严或是得不到尊重。
answer: 此外,在许多发达国家,寡妇,特别是老年寡妇生活在贫穷、孤立和没有尊严或尊重的环境中。

source: The absence of such an education contributes to the high pregnancy rate among adolescents and perpetuates attitudes based on interpretations of biology or religion that are removed from scientific fact.
standard: 缺少这种教育导致少女高怀孕率，延续了基于远离科学事实的生物或宗教解释的态度。
answer: 缺乏这种教育导致青少年怀孕率高,并使基于从科学事实中排除出来的生物学或宗教解释的态度长期存在。

source: It has directed the world's attention to forestry issues by marking the International Year of Forests and the International Day of Forests.
standard: 它通过庆祝国际森林年和国际森林日引导了全世界对林业问题的关注。
answer: 它通过纪念国际森林年和国际森林日,使全世界关注林业问题。

source: While the arrangement can be credited with having increased awareness and understanding of a number of forest-related issues and with having developed valuable tools to strengthen sustainable forest management, there is an urgent need to make significant progress on the four global objectives on forests.
standard: 虽然这一安排在一系列与森立有关问题上增强认识及理解和在开发宝贵工具加强可持续森林管理方面可以说功不可没，但现在亟需在四个全球森林目标方面取得显著进展。
answer: 虽然这一安排提高了人们对若干森林问题的认识和了解,开发了宝贵的工具以加强可持续森林管理,但迫切需要在四项全球森林目标方面取得显著进展。

source: Some parties have argued that since it would inevitably take several years for any new amendment to the Montreal Protocol to be negotiated and ratified it might be better to focus on providing financial assistance aimed at reducing HFC use immediately without establishing any new legal requirements.
standard: 一些缔约方认为，鉴于任何针对《蒙特利尔协定书》新修正的磋商和批准程序都无可避免地需要耗时数年，因此可能更应该侧重为尽快减少氢氟碳化合物的使用、且不会引起任何新的法律需求的活动提供财政援助。
answer: 一些缔约方认为,由于谈判和批准对《蒙特利尔议定书》的任何新的修正不可避免地需要几年时间,因此,最好把重点放在提供财政援助,旨在立即减少氢氟碳化合物的使用,而无需制定任何新的法律要求。

source: The Federated States of Micronesia proposal aims at phasing down the consumption and production of 21 HFCs with GWPs ranging from 4 to 9,810.
standard: 密克罗尼西亚联邦提案旨在逐步削减全球升温潜能值介于4到9810之间的21种氢氟碳化合物的消费和生产。
answer: 密克罗尼西亚联邦提案旨在逐步减少21种氢氟碳化合物的消费和生产,全球升温潜能值介于4至9 810之间。

source: One P-336 Turkish missile boat violated the territorial waters of the Republic of Cyprus and illegally used the closed port of Ammochostos while participating in naval exercises of the occupation forces.

answer: 一艘土耳其P-336导弹艇在参加占领军的海上演习时侵犯塞浦路斯共和国领水,并非法使用Ammochostos非开放港口。

source: Some extrabudgetary resources were received for the implementation of this resolution in 2014; implementation is foreseen for 2015, with preparations already under way.

answer: 已收到一些预算外资源,用于在2014年执行该决议;预计在2015年执行,筹备工作已经开始。

source: The ever expanding role of private sector actors in the business of development both alone and in concert with governments has shifted power relationships.
standard: 私营部门主体在自身发展中以及在与政府部门的合作中不断壮大自身的作用，已促使权力关系发生转变。
answer: 私营部门行为者单独地和与政府一道在发展业务中日益扩大的作用改变了权力关系。

source: We believe in the indivisibility of human rights -- economic, social, cultural, civil and political rights -- and their critical relevance for 2015 and beyond for individuals and groups as part of an interconnected humanity.

source: As reported to the Conference of the Parties at its eleventh meeting, the Secretariat cooperated with the ISO working group developing standard 16304 for port waste reception facilities, and in particular provided written comments on the draft standard.

source: Welcomes the assessment, prepared by the Public Waste Agency of Flanders, on how far the current Basel Convention technical guidelines address wastes covered by the International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships, 1973, as modified by the Protocol of 1978 relating thereto and as further amended by the Protocol of 1997, and encourages parties and others to use it;
standard: 欢迎 佛兰德斯公共废物管理局编写的关于现行《巴塞尔公约》技术准则在多大程度上涵盖经1978年相关议定书修订并经1997年议定书进一步修正的1973年《国际防止船舶造成污染公约》所涵盖的废物的评估，并鼓励各缔约方和其他各方使用该评估；
answer: 1. 欢迎 佛兰德公共废物局就《巴塞尔公约》现行技术准则在多大程度上涉及1973年《国际防止船舶造成污染公约》所涉、经1978年相关议定书修正并经1997年议定书进一步修正的废物问题进行了评估,并鼓励各缔约方和其他方面使用该技术准则;

source: Budgets provide for the participation of indigenous peoples in all relevant meetings.

answer: 预算为土著人民参加所有相关会议提供了经费。

source: Any hostile act against United Nations personnel, including threatening their physical safety, restricting their movement and direct and indirect firing at United Nations personnel and facilities by anyone, is unacceptable.
standard: 任何人对联合国人员的任何敌对行为，包括威胁其人身安全、限制其行动及直接和间接向联合国人员和设施射击，都是不可接受的。
answer: 任何针对联合国人员的敌对行为,包括威胁其人身安全,限制其行动,以及任何人直接或间接向联合国人员和设施开火,都是不可接受的。

source: The responses suggested mixed value in terms of programme coherence, indicating that the countries surveyed did not consider that the documents had contributed to the coherence, efficiency and effectiveness of the United Nations country team at the implementation, reporting and evaluation stages.
standard: 调查答复表明方案的一致性有利有弊，因为调查结果表明，接受调查的国家并不认为共同国家方案文件提高了联合国国家工作队(国家工作队)在执行、报告和评价阶段的一致性、效率和效力。
answer: 答复表明,在方案一致性方面,有好有坏,表明接受调查的国家并不认为这些文件有助于联合国国家工作队在执行、报告和评价阶段的一致性、效率和效力。

source: The actual uptake of scorecards by country teams, however, could be higher (37 per cent of the country teams that responded had completed it, with 50 per cent planning to complete it in the coming 12 months).
standard: 然而，实际采用记分卡的国家工作队的数字可能更高(做出答复的国家工作队中的37%已完成，50%计划在今后12个月内完成)。
answer: 但是,国家工作队实际采用计分卡的比例可能更高(37%的作出答复的国家工作队已完成计分卡,50%计划在今后12个月中完成计分卡)。

source: 40. Encourages Governments, international organizations, other relevant institutions and stakeholders, as appropriate, to provide relevant skills training for youth, high-quality health-care services and dynamic labour markets to employ a growing population;
standard: 40. 鼓励各国政府、国际组织、其他相关机构和利益攸关方酌情为青年提供相关技能培训、优质保健服务和活跃的劳动力市场，以使日益增长的人口得到就业；
answer: 40. 鼓励各国政府、国际组织、其他有关机构和利益有关者酌情为青年提供相关技能培训,提供高质量的保健服务,并有活力地进入劳动力市场,以雇用不断增长的人口;

source: This partnership has committed itself to making voluntary commitments, at the third World Conference on Disaster Risk Reduction, to be held in Sendai, Japan, from 14 to 18 March 2015, to support nations in reaching the goals and targets that they have agreed on in the post-2015 disaster risk reduction framework.

answer: 这一伙伴关系承诺在2015年3月14日至18日在日本仙台举行的第三次世界减少灾害风险大会上作出自愿承诺,支持各国实现它们在2015年后减少灾害风险框架中商定的目标和指标。

source: Articles appeared in several important international newspapers and magazines, including the Financial Times (United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland), La Presse (Canada), El País (Spain), Vanity Fair (United States of America), The Guardian (United Kingdom) and The Economist (United Kingdom); in broadcasts by Deutsche Welle (Germany) and Al-Jazeera (Qatar); and in almost all of the most widely read newspapers in the Latin American region and, in particular, Colombia.
standard: 多份重要的国际报纸和杂志刊发了相关文章，其中包括《金融时报》（大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国）、《La Presse》（加拿大）、《El País》（西班牙）、《名利场》（美利坚合众国）、《卫报》（联合王国）以及《经济学人》（联合王国）；德国之声（德国）和半岛电视台（卡塔尔）；以及拉丁美洲区域（尤其是哥伦比亚）几乎所有的主流报纸都对论坛进行了报道。
answer: 几家重要的国际报纸和杂志刊登了文章,包括《金融时报》(大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国)、La Presse(加拿大)、El País(西班牙)、Vanity Fair(美利坚合众国)、The Guardian(联合王国)和The Economist(联合王国);德意志韦勒(德国)和半岛电视台(卡塔尔)的广播;拉丁美洲区域,特别是哥伦比亚几乎所有阅读最广泛的报纸。

source: The inclusive nature of the Forum, combined with high-level participation, makes it a unique United Nations conference and the premier international gathering on urban issues.

answer: 论坛具有包容性,加上高级别参与,使之成为一次独特的联合国会议和关于城市问题的主要国际会议。

source: In particular, the Israeli Government continues its insidious colonization of the Palestinian land that it has belligerently, illegitimately occupied since June 1967, in grave breach of international law, including humanitarian and human rights law, as well as international criminal law as articulated in the Rome Statute of the International Criminal Court.
standard: 特别是，以色列政府继续严重违反国际法，包括人道主义法和人权法，以及国际刑事法院《罗马规约》规定的国际刑事法，对其1967年6月以来粗蛮、非法占领的巴勒斯坦土地阴险地实施殖民化。
answer: 特别是,以色列政府继续对巴勒斯坦土地进行阴险的殖民化。 1967年6月以来,以色列政府严重违反国际法,包括人道主义法和人权法,以及《国际刑事法院罗马规约》所阐述的国际刑法,好战地非法占领了巴勒斯坦领土。

source: Cumulatively, this illegal and destructive campaign has not only cast serious doubts on the prospects for the two-State solution, but also given greater viability to the inevitability of a one-State outcome.
standard: 久而久之，这种非法和破坏性的活动不仅令人对两个国家的解决方案前景产生严重怀疑，同时也给一个国家的结果增添了可能。
answer: 累积起来,这一非法和破坏性的运动不仅使人们严重怀疑两国解决方案的前景,而且使一国结果不可避免的可行性提高。

The Group of Non-Aligned States Parties to the Treaty underlines the necessity of reporting of IAEA on the implementation of safeguards being factual, technically based and reflecting appropriate reference to the relevant provisions of safeguards agreements, while ensuring the protection of confidential information.
standard: 条约不结盟缔约国集团强调，原子能机构关于保障监督执行情况的报告必须以事实和技术为基础，适当提及保障监督协定的有关规定，同时确保机密信息得到保护。

source: The Security Council has repeatedly emphasized, including most recently in resolution 2167 (2014), the need to enhance the predictability, sustainability and flexibility of financing for regional organizations when they undertake peacekeeping operations under a United Nations mandate.
standard: 安全理事会一再强调，包括最近在第2167(2014)号决议中强调，有必要在区域组织根据安全理事会授权开展维和行动时加强它们筹供经费的可预测性、可持续性和灵活性。
answer: 安全理事会一再强调,包括最近在第2167(2014)号决议中强调,区域组织在联合国授权下开展维持和平行动时,需要加强为区域组织供资的可预测性、可持续性和灵活性。

source: The subsequent assessment missions led by my Assistant Secretary-General for Peacekeeping Operations in November 2013 and February 2014, with the participation of African Union and ECCAS representatives, contributed to the provision of harmonized recommendations and informed the mandate formulation process that led to the transfer of authority from MISCA to MINUSCA.
standard: 2013年11月和 2014年2月，主管维持和平行动助理秘书长牵头进行的，由非洲联盟和中非经共体代表参加的后续评估团，促进了提供协调一致的建议，并向制订任务进程提供了信息，该任务进程促成中非支助团向中非稳定团进行权力移交。
answer: 2013年11月和2014年2月,由我的主管维持和平行动助理秘书长率领、非洲联盟和中非经共体代表参加的评估团随后在2013年11月和2014年2月派出了评估团,为提出统一建议作出了贡献,并为制订任务进程提供了信息,导致中非支助团向中非稳定团移交了权力。

source: To that end, it has already raised the issue within the ASEAN Regional Forum.
standard: 为此，蒙古国已经在东盟区域论坛上提出了这个问题。
answer: 为此,它已在东盟区域论坛上提出这一问题。

source: Despite demonstrating general support for the initiative, however, those States were reluctant to consider Mongolia a nuclear-weapon-free zone because it was only a single State.
standard: 然而，虽然它们普遍支持这项倡议，但不愿意将蒙古国视为无核武器区，因为仅涉及一个国家。
answer: 这些国家尽管普遍支持该倡议,但不愿将蒙古视为无核武器区,因为蒙古只有一个国家。

source: 6. France encourages States to make use of the various services and activities offered by IAEA to improve preparedness and response to nuclear emergencies.
standard: 6. 法国鼓励各国利用国际原子能机构推荐的各项服务和活动来改善本国针对核紧急情况的准备与应对工作。
answer: 6. 法国鼓励各国利用原子能机构提供的各种服务和活动,改进核紧急情况的防备和应对。

source: The granting of scholarships and the placement of students into student residences created the preconditions for an increase in the number of Roma students of both genders who successfully complete secondary school.
standard: 授予奖学金并将学生安置到学生宿舍为成功完成中学学业的男女罗姆族学生数量增加创造了前提条件。
answer: 发放奖学金和将学生安置在学生宿舍为增加成功完成中学学业的罗姆男女学生人数创造了先决条件。

source: The share of gender-sensitive radio shows has increased compared to other shows, from 6.15% to 7% in 2012 and 9.59% in 2013.
standard: 对性别问题有敏感认识的无线电节目比例与其他节目相比也有所增加，从6.15%增加到2012年的7%和2013年的9.59%。
answer: 与其它节目相比,对性别问题有敏感认识的广播节目所占份额有所增加,从2012年的6.15%增至7%,2013年为9.59%。

source: 7. Scale of assessments for apportionment of the regular budget expenses for the biennium 2016-2017.
standard: 7. 2016-2017两年期经常预算经费分摊比额表。
answer: 7. 2016-2017两年期经常预算经费分摊比额表。

source: With the help of their development partners, Governments are making a commitment to support populations throughout their territories and to accelerate mechanisms that will enable universal access to drinking water.
standard: 政府在其发展合作伙伴的帮助下，正在作出承诺，即为其领土范围内的人群提供支持并加快建立能够确保人们普遍获得饮用水的机制。
answer: 在其发展伙伴的帮助下,各国政府正在作出承诺,支持全国各地的人口,加速建立机制,普及饮用水。

source: 10. The Group of Non-Aligned States Parties to the Treaty recalls the undertaking by the nuclear-weapon States at the time of the negotiation of the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty to ensure that it would halt both vertical and horizontal proliferation, thereby preventing the appearance of new types of nuclear devices, as well as nuclear weapons based on new physical principles.
standard: 不扩散核武器条约不结盟缔约国集团回顾，核武器国家在有关《全面禁止核试验条约》的谈判中作出承诺，要确保该《条约》能停止核武器的纵向和横向扩散，从而防止出现新型核装置以及基于新的物理原理的核武器。
answer: 10. 条约不结盟缔约国集团回顾,核武器国家在谈判《全面禁止核试验条约》时承诺,确保该条约将制止纵向和横向扩散,从而防止出现新型核装置以及基于新的物理原则的核武器。

source: In that regard, while the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty is a practical step for systematic and progressive efforts towards nuclear disarmament as well as non-proliferation in all its aspects, it cannot substitute for the objective of the complete elimination of nuclear weapons.
standard: 在这方面，虽然《全面禁止核试验条约》是为有系统地努力逐步实现核裁军以及在其所有方面实现不扩散而采取的切实步骤，但它不能替代彻底消除核武器这一目标。
answer: 在这方面,虽然《全面禁止核试验条约》是系统和逐步努力实现核裁军以及不扩散各方面问题的一个实际步骤,但它不能取代彻底消除核武器的目标。

source: Girls who continue to go to school in unsafe conditions are at constant risk of sexual harassment, rape, coercion and numerous forms of exploitation, owing to a lack of supervision and protection, both within the school environment, at the hands of their teachers or peers, and outside it, through child molestation and drug distribution networks that operate on a large scale in a number of poor and developing countries;
standard: 由于缺乏监管和保护，在不安全状况中继续上学的女孩经常面临性骚扰、强奸、胁迫和众多剥削形式的风险，在校内，她们可能被教师或同学侵犯，在校外，她们会受到在许多贫穷和发展中国家大规模运作的猥亵儿童和药品分销网络的影响；
answer: 继续在不安全条件下上学的女孩经常面临性骚扰、强奸、胁迫和多种剥削形式的风险,原因是在学校环境中、教师或同龄人手中以及校外缺乏监督和保护,原因是儿童骚扰和毒品分销网络在许多穷国和发展中国家大规模运作;

source: That the United Nations act urgently to protect all women and girls in conflict zones - particularly areas of armed conflict - whose rights are being seriously violated, whether they be living in occupied territories or under the rule of a dictatorship;
standard: * 联合国紧急行动以保护冲突地区，特别是武装冲突地区内的全部妇女和儿童，无论她们生活在被占领土或是独裁统治下，她们的权利正受到严重侵犯；
answer: 要求联合国采取紧急行动,保护冲突地区,特别是武装冲突地区的所有妇女和女孩,她们的权利正受到严重侵犯,无论她们生活在被占领土还是在独裁统治下;

source: The Security Council has and already played a role in this area and should continue to do so.
standard: 安全理事会已经而且必须继续在此领域发挥作用。
answer: 安全理事会已经而且已经在这方面发挥了作用,应该继续发挥这种作用。

source: Antigua and Barbuda (2016), Colombia (2017), Cuba (2017), Guyana* (2015), Panama (2016)

source: On 23 December, regime helicopters dropped a barrel bomb on Safouhan Preparatory School in Safouhan, Idlib, killing 5 people and damaging the school.
standard: o 12月23日，叙利亚政权直升机向伊德利卜省Safouhan的Safouhan预科学校投掷一枚桶式炸弹，造成5人死亡，并使学校受到破坏。
answer: 12月23日,叙利亚政权直升机在伊德利布的萨富汉预备学校投掷了一枚桶装炸弹,炸死5人,炸毁了学校。

source: Many members in the education and health offices no longer go to their offices for fear of arrest and prosecution.
standard: 在教育和医疗卫生机构的许多人员不敢再去办公室，害怕被逮捕和遭起诉。
answer: 教育和卫生办公室的许多成员由于害怕被逮捕和起诉,不再去其办公室。

source: No one should have any doubts that those responsible for that and other massacres of civilians shall be held accountable.
standard: 应当追究那些对这次屠杀和其他屠杀平民的行为负责的人的责任，这是毋庸置疑的。
answer: 任何人都不应怀疑,应该追究那些要对此和其他屠杀平民行为负责的人的责任。

source: It is telling that the provocation took place already traditionally in a moment when a fragile hope emerged to achieve agreement to regulate the situation and establish sustainable peace in Donbas.
standard: 显而易见的是，挑衅历来是在有一丝希望为在顿巴斯控制局势和建立可持续和平而达成一致的时刻发生。
answer: 令人感动的是,挑衅行动历来是在出现脆弱希望的时刻发生的,希望达成在顿巴斯管理局势和建立可持续和平的协议。

answer: 1. 社会发展委员会第五十三届会议于2014年2月21日和2015年2月4日至13日在联合国总部举行。

source: However to many underprivileged populations and societies, Article 25 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights: "Everyone has the right to a standard of living adequate for the health and well-being of himself and of his family, including food, clothing, housing and medical care and necessary social services, and the right to security in the event of unemployment, sickness, disability, widowhood, old age or other lack of livelihood in circumstances beyond his control" remains a farfetched target.
standard: 但是，对于许多贫困人口和社会来说，《世界人权宣言》第二十五条所述内容(人人有权享受为维持他本人和家属的健康和福利所需的生活水准，包括食物、衣着、住房、医疗和必要的社会服务；在遭到失业、疾病、残疾、守寡、衰老或在其他不能控制的情况下丧失谋生能力时，有权享受保障)仍然是遥不可及的目标。
answer: 然而,对于许多贫困人口和社会来说,《世界人权宣言》第二十五条:“人人有权享受为维持他本人和家属的健康和福利所需的生活水准,包括食物、衣着、住房、医疗和必要的社会服务,在失业、疾病、残疾、鳏寡、老年或在无法控制的情况下丧失谋生能力时享有保障”依然是一项极为艰巨的目标。

source: National, regional and international efforts are being invested in expanding the scope of women's health beyond reproductive and sexual health because there is more to women's health than the maternal facet of it.
standard: 正在做出国家、区域和国际性的努力，将妇女健康的范围拓展到生殖健康和性健康以外，因为妇女健康除孕产方面外还包括更为广泛的内容。
answer: 国家、区域和国际正在努力扩大妇女保健的范围,超越生殖健康和性健康,因为妇女保健多于孕产妇保健。

source: The deployment of additional information management officers and the training of data managers to support this system will result in progressively more accurate data.

answer: 部署更多的信息管理干事和培训数据管理员以支助这一系统,将逐步提高数据的准确性。

source: For the more developed regions, the main reason was the decline in the number of adult deaths due to non-communicable diseases.

answer: 就较发达区域而言,主要原因是成人死于非传染性疾病的人数减少。

source: The discussion focused on the structure and content of the final report on progress on the Millennium Development Goals achieved in 2015, as well as common challenges and opportunities for monitoring progress within the United Nations system and at the global, regional and country levels.
standard: 会议重点讨论了千年发展目标2015年进展情况最后报告的结构和内容，以及在联合国系统内与在全球、区域和国家各级监测千年发展目标进展情况的共同挑战和机遇。
answer: 讨论的重点是2015年实现千年发展目标进展情况最后报告的结构和内容,以及监测联合国系统内和全球、区域和国家各级进展的共同挑战和机遇。

source: Taking advantage of misinformation published in a major newspaper, Prime Minister, Cabinet members and many other political figures are now trying to deny the legitimacy of the "Kono Statement", in which the Government admitted the Japanese military's involvement, and the Government even requested Radhika Coomaraswamy, former United Nations Deputy Secretary General, to partially revise the 1996 United Nations Commission on Human Rights report on Japan's wartime sexual slavery system, which is totally unacceptable.
standard: 首相、内阁官员和其他许多政治人物利用一份大报报道的错误消息，正试图否认使政府承认日军参与其中的"河野谈话"的合法性，政府甚至要求联合国前副秘书长拉迪卡·库马拉斯瓦米女士修改1996年联合国人权委员会关于日本战时性奴役制度的报告的部分内容，这是完全不能令人接受的行为。
answer: 总理、内阁成员和许多其他政治人物利用一家主要报纸上发表的错误信息,现在正试图否认“科诺声明”的合法性,日本政府在声明中承认日本军方的参与,政府甚至要求前联合国常务副秘书长拉迪卡·库马拉斯瓦米部分修改1996年联合国人权委员会关于日本战时性奴役制度的报告,这是完全不能接受的。

source: It is also proof that Japan squarely faces its war responsibility, committing itself to addressing human rights violation and never to repeat the same mistake.

answer: 这还证明,日本正视战争责任,致力于解决侵犯人权问题,决不再重犯同样的错误。

source: 13. source: The funding was earmarked to cover integrated missions in three sub-Saharan African countries, which would assess existing national capacity and future needs in terms of cancer control.

source: In 2014, the Ethics Office implemented its eighth annual financial disclosure exercise, regarding the 2013 transaction year.

answer: 2014年,道德操守办公室实施了2013交易年第八次年度财务披露活动。

source: The Group expresses its dissatisfaction over the lack of required political will and efforts by the nuclear-weapon States to fully address this legitimate interest.
standard: 本集团对核武器国家缺乏充分讨论这一正当利益所需的政治意愿和努力表示不满。
answer: 集团对核武器国家缺乏必要的政治意愿和努力,以充分满足这一正当利益表示不满。

source: The Group further believes that the mere possession of nuclear weapons is inconsistent with the principles of international humanitarian law.
standard: 本集团还认为，拥有核武器本身即违背了国际人道主义法的原则。
answer: 集团还认为,仅仅拥有核武器不符合国际人道主义法的原则。

source: That's also the case of Arba Minch (Ethiopia), target city of our recent Project WATSAM, a European-funded initiative to support the local water and sanitation sector.
standard: 阿尔巴明契(埃塞俄比亚)的情况就是这样，这里是我们最近实施的WATSAM项目的目标城市，此项目是一项由欧洲资助的支助地方水和卫生部门的举措。
answer: 这也是Arba Minch(埃塞俄比亚)的例子,这是我们最近的WATASAM项目的目标城市,这是一个由欧洲资助的倡议,旨在支持当地的水和卫生部门。

source: Through the Global Firearms Programme, assessments of firearms storage capacity were conducted and refurbishment plans were initiated for four West African countries.

answer: 通过全球枪支方案,对四个西非国家的枪支储存能力进行了评估,并启动了翻新计划。

source: Some 90.9 per cent could not ascribe a monetary value to the impact, while some estimated it to range from $55,000 to $2 million.
standard: 约90.9%的代表团指出，工作人员所受影响的货币价值未知；一些代表团估计影响在55 000美元至200万美元之间。
answer: 约90.9%无法给影响带来货币价值,而一些人估计影响从55 000美元到200万美元不等。

source: Thus, for example, the Act does not limit a bank's ability to share aggregated demographic information about its customer base with other institutions, or even information pertaining to individuals so long as that information has been stripped of all personal identifiers such as name, address and identification numbers.
standard: 因此，例如，《格雷姆-里奇-比利雷法》并不限制银行与其他机构分享其汇总的关于其客户群的人口学统计信息，乃至属于个人但已经被剥夺了所有个人标识符(如姓名、地址和身份证号码)的信息。
answer: 举例来说,该法并不限制银行与其他机构合作分享有关其客户基础的汇总人口信息,甚至个人信息的能力,只要这些信息已经从姓名、地址和识别号码等所有个人识别资料中除名。

source: Nevertheless, when it comes to senior secondary and tertiary levels, school-age populations, especially for females by region, face some difficulties in attaining education.
standard: 不过，说到高中和高等教育，学龄人口，特别是女性人口，根据地区不同，在获得教育方面面临一些困难。
answer: 然而,在高中和高等教育方面,按地区划分的学龄人口,尤其是女性,在获得教育方面面临一些困难。

source: In this sense, empowerment means that people are able to maintain the capacity to develop their talent and ability to reach a better life.
standard: 在这个意义上，增强权能意味着人们能够保持他们发展自身才能的能力以及实现更美好生活的能力。
answer: 从这个意义上说,赋予权力意味着人们能够保持发展其才能和能力的维持能力,以便过上更好的生活。

source: The Conference of the Parties may wish to take note of the information provided in the note and consider the possible action proposed therein.

answer: 缔约方大会或愿注意到该说明中提供的资料,并审议其中建议可能采取的行动。

answer: 缔约方大会或愿决定于上午10时至下午1时和下午3时至6时举行会议,但可视需要作出调整。

answer: 洛列斯加尔德少将接替让·博斯科·卡祖拉少将(卢旺达),后者的任期于2014年12月14日结束。
