The New Agenda Coalition believes that the time is long past for all States parties to deliver upon their repeated expressions of political commitment to implement article VI and eliminate nuclear weapons, and to take substantial action to safeguard future generations from the catastrophic effects of a nuclear weapon detonation, whether by accident, miscalculation or design.
standard: 11. 新议程联盟认为，所有缔约国早就应该对它们一再就落实第六条和消除核武器的政治承诺有所作为，并采取实质行动，使未来世代免遭核武器爆炸产生的灾难性影响，不论这种爆炸是意外、误算或蓄意发生的。
answer: 11. 新议程联盟认为,所有缔约国早就应该兑现其一再表示的政治承诺,执行第六条和消除核武器,并采取实质性行动,保护后代免遭核武器爆炸的灾难性后果,无论是意外、误判还是设计。

source: The difference between the two agreements lies not in their architecture -- they are indeed points on the same legal spectrum -- but in their location along that spectrum in terms of scope and level of detail.
standard: 这两种协议之间的差异不在于它们的结构 - 实际上它们具有相同的法律内涵 - 而在于它们在法律范围和细节的位置。
answer: 两项协议之间的区别不在于其结构 -- -- 实际上是相同法律范围的要点 -- --,而在于其在范围和详细程度方面所处的位置。

source: 1. Indigenous peoples, in particular those divided by international borders, have the right to maintain and develop contacts, relations and cooperation, including activities for spiritual, cultural, political, economic and social purposes, with their own members as well as other peoples across borders.
standard: 1. 土著人民，特别是被国际边界分隔开的土著人民，有权与边界另一边的同民族人和其他民族的人保持和发展接触、关系与合作，包括为精神、文化、政治、经济和社会目的开展活动。
answer: 1. 土著人民,特别是被国际边界分隔的土著人民,有权与自己的成员以及其他跨国界人民保持和发展接触、关系与合作,包括为精神、文化、政治、经济和社会目的开展的活动。

source: 1. Everyone lawfully within the territory of a State shall, within that territory, have the right to liberty of movement and freedom to choose his residence.
standard: 1. 合法处在一国领土内的每一个人在该领土内有权享受迁徙自由和选择住所的自由。
answer: 1. 合法处在一国领土内的每一个人,均有权在该领土内自由迁徙和自由选择住所。

source: The Government of Australia reported that there was no legitimate use of mephedrone other than for research purposes.
standard: 5. 澳大利亚政府报告说，甲氧麻黄酮除作科研之用外，没有合法用途。
answer: 澳大利亚政府报告说,除用于研究目的外,没有合法使用甲麻黄碱。

source: Employing women on the front line of law enforcement can help to prevent violence against women and increase women's access to justice.
standard: 雇用妇女从事一线执法活动有助于防止暴力侵害妇女行为，让妇女获得更多司法救助。
answer: 妇女在执法前线就业,有助于防止暴力侵害妇女行为,增加妇女获得司法救助的机会。

source: In Belgium, for example, restorative mediation services have been included in national legislation since 2005, with the aims of facilitating communication between the victim and the offender and reaching an agreement on how the damage done to the victim could be repaired.
standard: 例如，自2005年以来，比利时就已将恢复性调解服务列入国内立法，目的是促进受害人与加害人之间的沟通，并就受害人遭受的损害达成补救协议。
answer: 例如,在比利时,自2005年以来,在国家立法中纳入了恢复性调解服务,目的是便利受害者和罪犯之间的沟通,并就如何修复受害者所受损害达成协议。

source: 19. Urges all parties and all Member States, as well as international, regional and subregional organizations to ensure cooperation with the Panel of Experts and further urges all Member States involved to ensure the safety of the members of the Panel of Experts and unhindered access, in particular to persons, documents and sites in order for the Panel of Experts to execute its mandate;
standard: 19. 敦促所有各方和所有会员国以及国际、区域和次区域组织确保与专家小组合作，还敦促所有有关会员国确保专家小组成员的安全和不受阻碍的进出，尤其是确保他们为执行专家小组的任务不受阻碍地接触有关的人、文件和地点；
answer: 19. 敦促所有各方和所有会员国以及国际、区域和次区域组织确保与专家小组合作,还敦促所有有关会员国确保专家小组成员的安全,确保他们能够畅通无阻地进出,特别是进出人员、文件和地点,以便专家小组执行任务;

source: 1. Approves the granting to Sint Maarten of associate membership in the Economic Commission for Latin America and the Caribbean;
standard: 1. 核准给予圣马丁拉丁美洲和加勒比经济委员会准成员资格；
answer: 1. 核准准许圣马丁成为拉丁美洲和加勒比经济委员会的联系成员;

source: C. Consideration of the further revised working paper submitted by the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela entitled "Open-ended working group to study the proper implementation of the Charter of the United Nations with respect to the functional relationship of its organs"
standard: C. 审议委内瑞拉玻利瓦尔共和国提交的题为"研究在联合国各机构职能关系方面适当执行《联合国宪章》问题不限成员名额工作组"的进一步订正工作文件
answer: C. 审议委内瑞拉玻利瓦尔共和国提交的题为“研究在联合国各机关职能关系方面适当 执行《联合国宪章》的不限成员名额工作组”的进一步订正工作文件

source: On instructions from my Government, I have the honour to transmit herewith the press release issued today by the Government of the Argentine Republic on the anniversary of the illegitimate occupation of the Malvinas Islands by the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (see annex).
standard: 奉我国政府指示，谨随函转递阿根廷共和国政府今天在大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国非法占领马尔维纳斯群岛周年之际发表的新闻公报(见附件)。
answer: 奉我国政府指示,谨随函附上阿根廷共和国政府今天就大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国非法占领马尔维纳斯群岛周年纪念发表的新闻稿(见附件)。

source: 6. The agreement for a political settlement, as an outcome of negotiations conducted under the auspices of the United Nations, shall include a declaration of an interim constitution, which shall be the foundation for the process of implementing all matters relating to the transitional phase, steps and stages, including the work of the transitional governing body, the conference for national consensus and the constituent assembly.
standard: 6. 政治解决协定应作为在联合国主持下进行谈判的一个结果，其中应包括一项临时宪法宣言，作为落实过渡时期、各个步骤和阶段所有相关事项进程的基础，其中包括过渡理事机构、全国共识会议和制宪大会的工作。
answer: 6. 作为联合国主持进行的谈判的一项成果,政治解决协议应包括一项临时宪法宣言。 临时宪法宣言将成为执行与过渡阶段、步骤和阶段有关的所有事项,包括过渡理事机构、全国共识会议和制宪大会的工作的进程的基础。

source: Since the report of the commission of inquiry on human rights in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was proven to be a fraudulent document fabricated on the basis of false testimonies of liars like Sin Tong Hyok, it is needless to say that all the "resolutions" on the situation of human rights in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea forcibly adopted by the General Assembly on the basis of such false documents are invalid.
standard: 由于朝鲜民主主义人民共和国人权状况调查委员会的报告证明是根据申东赫之流的骗子的虚假证言编造的一份骗人文件，无需多言，大会根据此类虚假文件强行通过的所有关于朝鲜民主主义人民共和国人权状况的"决议"都是无效的。
answer: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国人权问题调查委员会的报告被证明是伪造文件,其依据是申东赫这样的骗子的虚假证词,因此,不必说,大会根据这些虚假文件强行通过的关于朝鲜民主主义人民共和国人权状况的所有“决议”都是无效的。

source: 7. The establishment of the Coordination and Liaison Cell, based in N'Djamena, will continue with the support of the P3 member countries.
standard: 7. 在P3成员国的支持下，将继续在恩贾梅纳设立协调和联络小组。
answer: 7. 设在恩贾梅纳的协调和联络小组将继续在P3成员国的支持下设立。

source: All activities support the implementation of the chemicals and wastes agenda and contribute to mainstreaming chemicals and waste issues at the regional and national levels.
standard: 所有活动都支持化学品和废物议程的实施，并有助于在区域一级和国家一级将化学品和废物问题主流化。
answer: 支持执行化学品和废物议程的所有活动,并推动在区域和国家两级将化学品和废物问题纳入主流。

source: Too often they are encouraged by the media, both through traditional media and through new media, such as social networks.
standard: 无论是传统媒体还是新媒体都时常鼓吹这种观念，例如社交网络。
answer: 媒体往往通过传统媒体和社交网络等新媒体鼓励她们。

source: However, following a number of budgetary cuts, these offices and departments were merged with other offices, or even shut down.
standard: 然而，在多次削减预算之后，这些机构被合并甚至被取消。
answer: 然而,在削减了一些预算之后,这些办事处和部门与其他办事处合并,甚至关闭。

source: The Deputy Governor, a Montserratian appointed by the Governor, may attend meetings, but does not have the right to vote.
standard: 副总督为总督任命的蒙特塞拉特人，可出席会议，但无表决权。
answer: 副总督,蒙特塞拉特人,由总督任命,可出席会议,但无表决权。

source: While companies pay tax of 30 per cent on profits, there is no capital gains tax.
standard: 公司要缴纳30%利润税，但不征收资本所得税。
answer: 公司缴纳30%的利润税,但没有资本收益税。

source: Social justice for the population is manifested by protecting the interests of vulnerable groups, particularly women and adolescent girls.
standard: 社会公正体现在保护弱势群体的利益，特别是妇女和青春期少女。
answer: 保护弱势群体的利益,特别是妇女和少女的利益,体现了民众的社会正义。

source: The Security Council therefore demands that all parties, including those who are not signatories to the Ouagadougou Preliminary Agreement, cease immediately all hostilities and reject violence.
standard: 因此，安全理事会要求所有各方，包括未签署《瓦加杜古临时协议》的各方，都立即停止一切敌对行动，摈弃暴力。
answer: 因此,安全理事会要求所有各方,包括未签署《瓦加杜古初步协议》的各方,立即停止一切敌对行动,摒弃暴力。

source: In this regard, the Security Council further calls on the Malian parties to make the necessary concessions, while respecting the sovereignty, unity and territorial integrity of the Malian State.
standard: 为此，安全理事会还促请马里各方在尊重马里国家的主权、统一和领土完整的情况下做出必要的让步。
answer: 在这方面,安全理事会还呼吁马里各方作出必要让步,同时尊重马里国家的主权、统一和领土完整。

source: The present note provides an account of developments since the tenth session of the Forum and information on the arrangements for the dialogue at the eleventh session.
standard: 本说明介绍了自论坛第十届会议以来的发展动态，并提供信息说明了第十一届会议上的对话安排。
answer: 本说明介绍论坛第十届会议以来的事态发展,并介绍第十一届会议对话的安排。

source: 5. The present note has been prepared to facilitate the dialogue.

answer: 5. 编写本说明是为了便利对话。

source: The report covered, inter alia, activities in Anguilla, Bermuda, British Virgin Islands, Cayman Islands, Falkland Islands (Malvinas), Gibraltar, Montserrat, Pitcairn, Saint Helena and Turks and Caicos Islands.

answer: 我们呼吁所有会员国现在就执行《北京行动纲要》,并在其妇女地位委员会和2015年后承诺中纳入妇女组织的下列要求:

source: A new generation of young feminists is mobilising widely, using new communication technologies, dynamically tackling new and old forms of violations of their rights, and building global solidarity.
standard: 新一代年轻的女权主义者也正在广泛活动，利用新的通讯技术，积极应对新旧侵犯其权利的行为，并建立全球团结。
answer: 新一代年轻女权主义者正在广泛动员,利用新的通信技术,积极应对新旧形式的侵犯其权利行为,并建立全球团结。

source: 10. Invites Member States and the United Nations system, including the agencies, funds and programmes of the system, to take concrete measures to mainstream ageing issues, including the views of older persons, into their own programming and existing United Nations mandates;
standard: 10. 邀请会员国和联合国系统，包括联合国系统各机构、基金和方案采取具体措施，将老龄问题，包括老年人的意见，纳入它们自身的方案拟订工作和联合国的现有任务；
answer: 10. 邀请会员国和联合国系统,包括联合国系统各机构、基金和方案,采取具体措施,将老龄问题,包括老年人的意见,纳入各自方案拟订和联合国现有任务的主流;

source: Holds a Ph.D. in Economics from the Hanoi National Economy University, Viet Nam.
standard: 拥有越南河内国立经济大学经济学博士学位。
answer: 拥有越南河内国民经济大学经济学博士学位。

source: Previous positions include: lead author and Director, UNDP Human Development Reports 1995-2004.
standard: 曾任职务包括：开发署1995-2004年《人类发展报告》主撰稿人和主任。
answer: 曾任职务包括:1995-2004年开发署人类发展报告主要作者和主任。

source: Considering the institutional capabilities of the United Nations, and as a career multilateral diplomat who still believes in the substantial potentials of the Organization, I tend to remain hopeful that the United Nations and its capacity and mechanisms can be brought to bear on an issue of immense international impact and reverberation.
standard: 考虑到联合国的机构能力，并作为依然相信本组织巨大潜力的职业多边外交官，我倾向于仍然报以希望，即联合国及其能力和机制能够用于解决一个具有巨大国际影响和反响的问题。
answer: 考虑到联合国的机构能力,作为一个仍然相信联合国巨大潜力的职业多边外交职业外交官,我倾向于仍然希望联合国及其能力和机制能够在具有巨大国际影响和反响的问题上发挥作用。

source: No such approach or resolve has yet been seen in the case of frequent frivolous caricatures defaming Islam and desecrating Islamic values, which appeared in that magazine and other similar publications in Europe, leading to exacerbated tension with the Muslim community in France and the Islamic world.
standard: 这种做法或决定尚未出现在该杂志和欧洲其他类似出版物上所频繁刊登的诋毁伊斯兰教和亵渎伊斯兰价值观的轻率漫画的情况中，导致与法国的穆斯林社区和伊斯兰世界之间的紧张关系加剧。
answer: 在欧洲的该杂志和其他类似出版物中经常出现轻率的漫画诽谤伊斯兰教和亵渎伊斯兰价值观,导致与法国穆斯林社区和伊斯兰世界的紧张关系加剧。

source: Femmes solidaires considers poverty to be a form of violence against women.
standard: 妇女团结运动将贫穷视为一种暴力侵害妇女行为。
answer: 妇女团结会认为贫穷是对妇女的暴力行为的一种形式。

source: From the confiscation of birth control to the use of rape as a weapon of war, from female circumcision to the criminalization of homosexuality, women must battle constantly to secure or retain that right.
standard: 从对生育控制权的剥夺到以强奸作为战争武器，从女性割礼到将同性恋进行刑事定罪，妇女要不停地抗争才能获得或维护这一权利。
answer: 从没收生育控制到将强奸作为一种战争武器,从女性割礼到将同性恋定为犯罪,妇女必须不断争取获得或保留这一权利。

source: 18. The Force will continue to exercise responsibility for the maintenance of the ceasefire between Israel and the Syrian Arab Republic by means of fixed positions to ascertain that military forces of either party do not breach the area of separation.
standard: 18. 观察员部队将继续负责维持以色列和阿拉伯叙利亚共和国之间的停火状态，通过固定据点确保任何一方的军事部队不闯入隔离区。
answer: 18. 观察员部队将继续通过固定据点,负责维持以色列和阿拉伯叙利亚共和国之间的停火,确定任何一方的军事部队均不进入隔离区。

source: The Officer is essential in view of security developments on the Bravo side, which have the potential to escalate the situation across the ceasefire line.
standard: 此外，布拉沃一侧的安全形势可能使停火线另一侧的局势升级，因此，该干事的作用至关重要。
answer: 鉴于布拉沃一侧的安全事态发展有可能使停火线两侧的局势升级,该干事至关重要。

source: Sexual and property-related violence are the least frequent.
standard: 强奸和经济暴力较为少见。
answer: 性暴力和财产相关暴力的发生率最低。

source: The opportunities and choices for meaningful engagement like vocational training within schools or out of schools are scarce.
standard: 切实参与校内或校外职业培训等活动的机会和选择不多。
answer: 在学校或校外开展职业培训等有意义参与的机会和选择很少。

source: We strongly believe for all women, especially those young and vulnerable, to have equitable access to information, education and services in a friendly manner (with respect, privacy and confidentiality) to deal with their sexuality in a positive and responsible way protects and promotes their sexual and reproductive health.
standard: 我们坚信，所有妇女，尤其是年青和处境脆弱的妇女，有权通过妥善友好的方式(尊重个人、顾及隐私和资料保密)公平地获得信息、教育和服务，以积极和负责任的方式处理自己的性生活，保护和促进自己的性与生殖健康。
answer: 我们坚信,所有妇女,特别是那些年轻和易受伤害的妇女,都应有公平的机会,以友好的方式(在尊重、隐私和保密的情况下)获得信息、教育和服务,以积极和负责任的方式处理她们的性问题,保护和促进她们的性健康和生殖健康。

source: Syrian authorities authorized the distribution of medical supplies, including antibiotics and medicines for chronic and non-communicable diseases for the fifth consecutive month.
standard: 叙利亚当局连续第五个月授权分发医疗用品，包括慢性病和非传染病用抗生素和药品。
answer: 叙利亚当局授权连续五个月分发医疗用品,包括抗生素和慢性和非传染性疾病药品。

source: Humanitarian organizations must receive the resources required to enable them to save more lives and support the Syrian people.
standard: 只有得到所需资金，人道主义组织才能拯救更多生命，才能向叙利亚人民提供援助。
answer: 人道主义组织必须获得必要的资源,使它们能够拯救更多的生命,支持叙利亚人民。

source: Contribute to the elaboration and implementation of poverty reduction strategies, support job creation, promote decent work for all and address the specific needs of vulnerable groups, including migrants and displaced people;
standard: 促进减贫战略的拟定和执行，支持创造就业岗位，促进所有人体面工作，解决流动人口和流离失所者等脆弱群体的特殊需求；
answer: 协助拟订和执行减贫战略,支持创造就业,促进人人有体面工作,并满足包括移民和流离失所者在内的弱势群体的具体需要;

source: Acknowledges the different regional, urban and local situations and the need for spatially coherent territories and balanced regional development;
standard: 认识到区域、城市和地方的不同情况，以及地域空间凝聚力和区域均衡发展的必要性；
answer: 承认不同的区域、城市和地方情况,需要空间上协调一致的领土和均衡的区域发展;

source: In response to the increasingly complex nature of terrorism, the Branch continued to further develop and specialize its capacity-building training for criminal justice officials on a broad range of terrorism-related offences, taking into account emerging challenges.
standard: 12. 为应对日益复杂的恐怖主义，该处继续进一步开展针对刑事司法官员的能力建设和专门培训，培训涉及一系列广泛的恐怖主义相关犯罪，并顾及新出现的挑战。
answer: 为应对恐怖主义日益复杂的性质,预防恐怖主义处继续进一步发展和专门为刑事司法官员提供能力建设培训,培训内容涉及广泛的恐怖主义相关犯罪,同时考虑到新出现的挑战。

source: Three of the positions are held by women, who each represent the Fatupaepae (Women's Committee) on each atoll.

answer: 三个职位由妇女担任,各代表每个环礁的Fatupaepae(妇女委员会)。

source: The question of decolonization is linked to issues related to the quality of life, the threat of climate change and sea-level rise, and the sustainability of the small population sizes of the Non-Self-Governing Territories.
standard: 非殖民化问题与生活质量、气候变化和海平面上升的威胁和非自治领土稀少人口的可持续性问题的讨论密不可分。
answer: 非殖民化问题与生活质量、气候变化和海平面上升的威胁以及非自治领土人口规模小的可持续性等相关问题有关。

source: The Government of the Syrian Arab Republic once again calls on the Secretary-General of the United Nations, the Security Council, the High Commissioner for Human Rights and all human rights organizations to insist that Israel immediately and unconditionally release the abducted captive Sidqi al-Maqt and free all citizens of the Syrian Arab Republic who are being held in the jails of the occupation.

answer: 阿拉伯叙利亚共和国政府再次呼吁联合国秘书长、安全理事会、人权事务高级专员和所有人权组织坚持要求以色列立即无条件释放被绑架的Sidqi al-Maqt,释放关押在占领监狱的阿拉伯叙利亚共和国所有公民。

source: In addition to resulting in a tragic loss of human life, the epidemic had posed a threat to the considerable progress Guinea had made, with the support of the Commission, in the areas of economic growth, social cohesion, political democratization and security.

answer: 几内亚在该委员会的支持下,在经济增长、社会融合、政治民主化和安全等领域取得了长足进步,这一流行病除了造成悲惨的生命损失之外,还对几内亚在经济增长、社会融合、政治民主化和安全等领域取得的长足进步构成威胁。

source: An inclusive approach must also be taken towards gender-related issues, which should be at the heart of all peacebuilding efforts.

source: 58. My Special Representative in Haiti, together with the international community, has continued to underscore the need for national actors to define a modus operandi, inclusive of the remaining senators and notable personalities from civil society, that enhances confidence in the political process and mitigates the risks associated with the absence of a functioning legislature.

source: 37. In considering this suggestion, it was underscored that the objective was to ensure that any arbitral award would be capable of being enforced through the judicial process, which itself required compliance with due process requirements, including that the parties select the neutral and that the neutral be independent.
standard: 37. 在审议该建议时，强调目标是确保任何仲裁裁决都能够通过司法程序得到执行，而司法程序本身需要遵守正当程序要求，包括当事人选择中立人以及中立人具有独立性。
answer: 37. 在审议这一建议时,与会者强调,目的是确保任何仲裁裁决都能通过司法程序执行,司法程序本身要求遵守正当程序要求,包括当事各方选择中立人和中立人独立。

source: 5. Also at same meeting, the Preparatory Committee was informed that the Deputy Permanent Representative of the Russian Federation to the United Nations Office and other international organizations in Geneva, Andrey Nikiforov, could no longer perform the duties of Rapporteur of the Preparatory Committee.
standard: 5. 另在同次会议上，筹备委员会获悉，俄罗斯联邦派驻联合国日内瓦办事处和日内瓦其他国际组织副常驻代表安德烈·尼基弗罗夫无法继续履行筹备委员会报告员职责。
answer: 5. 在同次会议上,筹备委员会还获悉,俄罗斯联邦常驻联合国日内瓦办事处和其他国际组织副代表安德烈·尼基福罗夫不能再履行筹备委员会报告员的职责。

answer: 筹备委员会 筹备委员会

source: Identical letters dated 28 January 2015 from the Permanent Representative of Israel to the United Nations addressed to the Secretary-General and the President of the Security Council
standard: 2015年1月28日以色列常驻联合国代表给秘书长和安全理事会主席的同文信
answer: 2015年1月28日以色列常驻联合国代表给秘书长和安全理事会主席的同文信

source: For years, Hezbollah has been stockpiling weapons in southern Lebanon in violation of Security Council resolution 1701 (2006).
standard: 多年来，真主党违反安全理事会第1701(2006)号决议在黎巴嫩南部地区囤积武器。
answer: 多年来,真主党违反安全理事会第1701(2006)号决议,在黎巴嫩南部储存武器。

source: In the Middle East region the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria has created thousands of new widows and orphans dependent on them.
standard: 在中东地区，伊拉克和叙利亚境内的"伊斯兰国"催生了数千名新的寡妇和依赖她们生活的孤儿。
answer: 在中东区域,伊拉克和叙利亚伊斯兰国创造了数千名新的寡妇和孤儿。

source: Intimidation, physical assault and femicide have all been among the forms of abuse inflicted.
standard: 恐吓、殴打和杀戮女性都是施加虐待的形式。
answer: 恐吓、人身攻击和杀害妇女都是各种虐待形式。

source: With regard to violence against women, 20 years on from the adoption of the Convention of Belém do Pará, which 34 countries have ratified, only nine countries have established violence against women as a specific offence under their domestic legislation, within the framework of provisions on domestic violence.
standard: 关于暴力侵害妇女行为，自通过《贝伦杜帕拉公约》20年以来，34个国家批准了这项公约，但仅有9个国家在家庭暴力条款框架内将暴力侵害妇女行为确定为其国内立法的一项具体罪行。
answer: 在暴力侵害妇女问题方面,自通过《贝伦杜帕拉公约》(已有34个国家批准)20年后,只有9个国家在有关家庭暴力的条款框架内,在其国内立法中将暴力侵害妇女行为定为一项具体罪行。

source: Poverty continues to persist in many forest areas among forest dwellers and workers.
standard: 在许多森林地区的森林住民和工人中，贫穷依然顽固地存在。
answer: 在许多林区,森林居民和工人的贫穷现象持续存在。

source: A critical constraint has been the lack of a financing mechanism.
standard: 一个关键的制约因素是一直缺乏融资机制。
answer: 一个重要的制约因素是缺乏筹资机制。

source: As mentioned earlier, reported data are reviewed by specialized expert review teams to establish their reliability.
standard: 如前所述，上报数据由专门的专家审评组审查，以便确保其可靠性。
answer: 如前所述,报告的数据由专门专家审评组审查,以确定其可靠性。

source: HFCs are man-made fluorinated chemicals that do not deplete the ozone layer but are potent greenhouse gases.
standard: 氢氟碳化合物是人造氟化化学品，不会消耗臭氧层，但属于强效温室气体。
answer: 氢氟碳化合物是人造氟化化学品,不消耗臭氧层,但具有很强的温室气体。

source: The Kingdom of Morocco stresses that all States are free to explore and use space for peaceful purposes in compliance with international law and Security Council resolutions.
standard: 摩洛哥王国强调，所有国家可依照国际法，在充分遵守安全理事会各项决议的条件下，自由地为和平目的探索和利用空间。
answer: 摩洛哥王国强调,所有国家都可遵照国际法和安全理事会决议,为和平目的自由探索和利用空间。

answer: 6. 审议和通过向大会第六十九届会议提出的建议草案。

answer: 总督(兼总司令)由英国王室任命,负责国防、对外事务、内部安全和警察。

answer: 一份关于开展评估的现状和方法的报告已提交不限成员名额工作组第九次会议。

source: 31. In 2014, OHCHR organized a number of training programmes and briefing sessions on indigenous peoples' issues for staff at its country and regional offices in Asia, Africa and Latin America.
standard: 31. 2014年，人权高专办为其亚洲、非洲和拉丁美洲的国家和区域办事处的工作人员组织了一系列有关土著人民问题的培训班和情况介绍会。
answer: 31. 2014年,人权高专办为其亚洲、非洲和拉丁美洲国家办事处和区域办事处工作人员举办了若干关于土著人民问题的培训方案和简报会。

answer: 格林纳达、牙买加

standard: 叙利亚当局向观察员部队确认，叙利亚武装部队的行动是与"叙利亚的盟友"一道开展的。
answer: 叙利亚当局向观察员部队承认,叙利亚武装部队的行动是与“叙利亚盟友”共同进行的。

source: 3. Several major restructuring exercises were conducted or initiated during the period under review, including by the World Health Organization (WHO) and the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP).

answer: 3. 在本报告所述期间,包括世界卫生组织(卫生组织)和联合国开发计划署(开发计划署)在内,进行了或启动了几项重大的改组工作。

Notes the growing collaboration among the entities of the United Nations system in support of the New Partnership, and requests the Secretary-General to promote greater coherence in the work of the United Nations system in support of the New Partnership, on the basis of the agreed clusters of the Regional Coordination Mechanism for Africa;

answer: c 将2013年利息收入与2013年期初余额之比计入2014年和2015年项目利息收入。

source: Statements were also made by the representatives of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, the World Bank, the Global Environment Fund, the Global Water Partnership, the Women's Major Group, the indigenous peoples major group and civil society from Peru and Indonesia.
standard: 发言的还有红十字会和红新月会国际联合会、世界银行、全球环境基金和全球水事伙伴关系以及秘鲁和印度尼西亚妇女主要团体、土著人民主要团体和民间社会的代表。

source: 39. At the 9th plenary meeting, on 18 March 2015, the Chairs of the three high-level multi-stakeholder partnership dialogues presented their reports.
standard: 39. 在2015年3月18日第9次全体会议上，三个高级别多利益攸关方伙伴关系对话的主席介绍了各自的报告。
answer: 39. 在2015年3月18日第9次全体会议上,三个高级别多方利益攸关方伙伴关系对话的主席提交了报告。

source: There is also evidence that certain criminal groups treat identity documents and information as an illicit commodity.
standard: 还有证据显示，某些犯罪集团把身份证件和资料作为非法商品。
answer: 还有证据表明,某些犯罪集团将身份证件和信息视为非法商品。

source: They could remedy this in part by cooperating with specialized service providers, in particular civil society organizations, immigration lawyers and lawyers specialized in counselling crime victims, and allowing them to assist in the identification of particularly vulnerable groups and their referral to appropriate assistance.
standard: 它们可在这方面进行补救，办法是与专业的服务提供者，尤其是民间社会组织、移徙律师、专门为犯罪受害者提供咨询的律师合作，使他们能够协助确认尤其脆弱的群体的身份，并将其转介寻求适当援助。
answer: 他们可以通过与专业服务提供者,特别是民间社会组织、移民律师和专门为犯罪受害人提供咨询的律师合作,并允许他们协助确定特别易受伤害的群体,并将他们转介到适当的援助机构,来弥补这部分问题。

source: In Sierra Leone, UNFPA, together with the Government and the World Bank, has designed and is implementing a project to revitalize reproductive, maternal, adolescent and newborn health services in the context of Ebola.
standard: 在塞拉利昂，人口基金与政府和世界银行一起，已制订并正在实施一个项目，以便在发生埃博拉疫情的背景下重振生殖、孕产妇、青少年和新生儿保健服务。
answer: 在塞拉利昂,人口基金与政府和世界银行一道,设计并正在执行一个在埃博拉背景下振兴生殖、孕产妇、青少年和新生儿保健服务的项目。

source: I assure you that the United Nations system will remain committed to supporting the affected countries in this regard.
standard: 我向你们保证联合国系统将继续致力于在这方面支持受影响的国家。
answer: 我向你保证,联合国系统将继续致力于在这方面支持受影响国家。

answer: 审议古巴提交的关于加强联合国作用和提高其 效力:通过建议的工作文件

source: The impact of the Beijing Conference has been felt beyond the capital Kinshasa, albeit less dramatically.
standard: 首都金沙萨也感受到了北京会议的影响，尽管不是那么激烈。
answer: 北京会议的影响超越了首都金沙萨,尽管不太显著。

source: 140. The regional coordinator of the network against terrorism and the proliferation of weapons in Central Africa reminded the Committee that the first regional counter-terrorism workshop had been held as a side event of the Committee's thirty-fifth ministerial meeting, held in Brazzaville, in December 2012.
standard: 140. 打击中部非洲恐怖主义和武器扩散网络区域协调员提醒委员会，第一次区域反恐讲习班是作为委员会第三十五次部长级会议的会外活动，于2012年12月在布拉柴维尔举行的。
answer: 140. 中部非洲打击恐怖主义和武器扩散网络区域协调员提醒委员会,2012年12月在布拉柴维尔举行了委员会第三十五次部长级会议,作为附带活动,举办了第一次区域反恐讲习班。

source: 57. The concern previously articulated by the Central African Early Warning Mechanism that the conflict would become religious in nature has become a reality, with clashes between Christians and Muslims resulting in the death of hundreds of people in the city of Bangui over the past few days.
standard: 57. 中部非洲预警机制先前担心冲突将变成宗教性质，这一关切已成为现实，过去几天来班吉市基督徒和穆斯林之间的冲突已导致数百人死亡。
answer: 57. 中非预警机制以前曾表示,人们关切这场冲突将变成宗教性质的冲突,这一关切已成为现实,在过去几天里,基督徒和穆斯林之间的冲突导致班吉市数百人死亡。

source: b Includes $400,000 for travel of staff from various departments at Headquarters to the tenth session of the Forum, held in Istanbul, Turkey, and for travel related to planning missions to Turkey.
standard: b 包括400 000美元用于总部各部厅工作人员前往参加在土耳其伊斯坦布尔举行论坛第十届会议的差旅费和规划团前往土耳其的差旅费。
answer: b 包括400 000美元,用于总部各部门工作人员参加在土耳其伊斯坦布尔举行的论坛第十届会议的旅费和前往土耳其规划团的旅费。

source: The meeting produced several recommendations that helped the Forum, at its tenth session, to reach a meaningful decision on forest financing solutions;
standard: 会上产生的若干建议对论坛在第十届会议期间就森林筹资办法做出有意义的决定发挥了作用；
answer: 这次会议提出了几项建议,帮助论坛第十届会议就森林筹资解决办法作出有意义的决定;

source: The programme will also take advantage of social media tools such as Google+, Facebook and Twitter to share information on activities conducted by UN-SPIDER and partners, and will intensify its communication through social networks in 2016-2017, including by seeking more synergies with the communication activities of the Office for Outer Space Affairs on related themes of interest.
standard: 该方案还将利用Google+、Facebook和Twitter等社交媒体工具分享天基信息平台和合作伙伴所开展活动的信息，并且将在2016-2017年通过社交网络加强沟通，包括通过寻求与外层空间事务厅就其关心的相关主题开展的沟通活动实现更大的协同增效。
answer: 方案还将利用Google+、Facebook和Twitter等社交媒体工具,共享天基信息平台及其合作伙伴所开展活动的信息,并将通过2016-2017年社交网络加强沟通,包括寻求与外层空间事务厅在相关相关主题方面的宣传活动产生更多协同作用。

source: Nuclear applications have made a considerable contribution to achieving the Millennium Development Goals, and the IAEA Technical Cooperation Programme plays an important role in that regard.
standard: 核应用已为实现千年发展目标做出了重大贡献，且原子能机构的技术合作方案在这方面发挥了重要作用。
answer: 核应用为实现千年发展目标作出了巨大贡献,原子能机构技术合作方案在这方面发挥了重要作用。

source: Many States rely on the Committee's estimates as the scientific basis for evaluating radiation risk and for establishing protective measures.
standard: 很多国家依赖该委员会的估计，将其作为评价辐射风险和制订保护措施的科学依据。
answer: 许多国家依靠委员会的估计数作为评估辐射风险和制定保护措施的科学依据。

source: The background paper and concept notes for all the main sessions of the programme were made available online in English, French and Spanish as the main substantive pre-session documents, beginning six months before the conference was held.
standard: 为日程上各次主要会议编制的背景文件和概念文件作为主要的实质性会前文件，于大会召开前六个月开始以英语、法语和西班牙语在网上发布。
answer: 方案所有主要会议的背景文件和概念说明作为主要实质性会前文件,从会议召开前六个月开始,以英文、法文和西班牙文在线提供。

source: The proportion of women aged 1564 employed in non-agricultural paid jobs remains low (24.3 per cent in 2001, 24.5 per cent in 2007 and 27.3 per cent in 2010) (Cameroon, Millennium Development Goals Report 2012).
standard: 15至64岁妇女从事非农带薪工作的比例依然很低(2001年为24.3%，2007年为24.5%，2010年为27.3%)(喀麦隆，2012年《千年发展目标报告》)。
answer: 1564岁从事非农业有偿工作的妇女比例仍然很低(2001年为24.3%,2007年为24.5%,2010年为27.3%)(喀麦隆,《2012年千年发展目标报告》)。

source: However, further efforts are required in order to achieve gender parity in secondary and higher education.
standard: 然而，还需继续努力实现中学教育和高等教育中的性别均等。
answer: 然而,还需要进一步努力,在中等和高等教育中实现两性均等。

standard: 俄罗斯联邦
answer: 俄罗斯联邦 俄罗斯联邦

answer: 法国、联合王国和美国于1996年3月25日签署了第1、2和3号议定书。

answer: 法国随后于同年批准了这两项议定书,联合王国于1997年批准了这两项议定书。

source: It will require a particular focus on the restoration of State authority and basic services, the strengthening of institutional capacity and inclusive governance, the acceleration of socioeconomic revitalization and the building of community resilience and social cohesion.

answer: 需要特别注重恢复国家权威和基本服务,加强机构能力和包容性治理,加快社会经济振兴,建设社区复原力和社会凝聚力。

source: The Secretariat is working towards the implementation of all 2014 - 2015 activities pertaining to the joint clearing-house mechanism by the end of 2015.

source: Israel, the occupying Power, must be held to the same standards as all other States and cannot continue to be absolved of its legal obligations.
standard: 占领国以色列必须与所有其他国家一样，遵守同样的标准，不得无视其法律责任。
answer: 占领国以色列必须与所有其他国家一样坚持同样的标准,不能继续免除其法律义务。

source: Actions must be taken to uphold the provisions of the Fourth Geneva Convention and the relevant Security Council and General Assembly resolutions, as well as the advisory opinion rendered on 9 July 2004 by the International Court of Justice.

answer: 必须采取行动,维护《日内瓦第四公约》的各项规定、安全理事会和大会有关决议以及国际法院2004年7月9日发表的咨询意见。

source: Since the Agency is the only organization that receives highly confidential and sensitive information on the nuclear facilities of member States, and given the undesirable incidents of leaks of such information, the Group emphasizes that the confidentiality of such information shall be fully respected and its relevant regime pertaining to the protection of confidential information needs to be further strengthened.
standard: 鉴于原子能机构是接收关于成员国核设施的高度机密和敏感资料的唯一组织，并鉴于泄露此类资料的令人不快的事件，本集团强调，此类资料的保密性应得到充分尊重，此类资料的保护制度应得到大大加强。
answer: 原子能机构是唯一获得关于成员国核设施的高度机密和敏感信息的组织,鉴于此类信息泄漏的不良事件,本集团强调,此类信息的保密性应得到充分尊重,其有关保护机密信息的相关制度需要进一步加强。

source: Therefore, States parties to the Treaty are called upon to refrain from imposing or maintaining any restrictions or limitations on the transfer of nuclear equipment, materials and technology to States parties with comprehensive safeguards agreements.
standard: 因此，呼吁《条约》缔约国在向签署了全面保障监督协定的缔约国转让核装备、材料和技术时不要施加或保持任何限制或制约。
answer: 因此,呼吁《条约》缔约国不要对向订有全面保障监督协定的缔约国转让核设备、材料和技术施加或维持任何限制。

source: In addition, as was done in the Central African Republic, the Council could consider authorizing "soft" logistical support packages or technical support teams, as appropriate.

answer: 此外,如同在中非共和国所做的那样,安理会可考虑酌情批准“软”一揽子后勤支助计划或技术支持小组。

answer: 17. 2014年11月,在乌兰巴托举行了创建东北亚无核武器区国际会议。

source: Introducing adequate regulations, framing a national organization plan in case of crisis, preparing potential intervention measures and devising public information mechanisms are among the measures that States wishing to develop an electro-nuclear programme should put in place as soon as possible.
standard: 希望发展核电的国家应尽快采取相应措施，如颁布适当的规章条例，制定国家危机应对工作组织计划，准备可能涉及的干预措施，建立公共信息机制等。
answer: 实行适当规章、制定国家危机组织计划、制定可能的干预措施和制定新闻机制,是希望制定电核方案的国家应当尽快采取的措施。

source: 2. Despite all the precautions taken during the design, construction, commissioning and operation of nuclear facilities, States must not fail to prepare for any emergency that may occur.
standard: 2. 尽管各国在核设施的设计、建造、投入使用以及运营阶段采取了一切预防措施，仍不应忽视应对可能发生的核紧急情况的准备工作。
answer: 2. 尽管在设计、建造、启用和运营核设施期间采取了各种预防措施,但各国绝不能不对可能出现的任何紧急情况做好准备。

source: According to the Ombudsperson's report, the number of judicial proceedings initiated for gender-based discrimination increased -- from four proceedings in 2010 to over 22 in 2011 and 43 in 2012, reaching 62 proceedings in 2013.
standard: 根据监察员的报告，因为性别歧视启动司法诉讼程序的数量有所增加 -- -- 从2010年的4起诉讼增加到2011年的超过22起和2012年的43起，2013年达到62起诉讼。
answer: 监察员报告称,针对性别歧视启动的司法程序数量有所增加,从2010年的4个增加到2011年的22个和2012年的43个,2013年达到62个。

source: At a time when the United Nations is working with Governments, civil society and various other partners to use the momentum generated by the MDG to plan ambitious post-2015 programmes, the majority of developing countries continue to face huge difficulties and still have many shortfalls to tackle.
standard: 联合国正与政府、民间团体和许多其他合作伙伴合作，以借助千年发展目标带来的势头来规划宏大的2015年后方案，而与此同时，大多数发展中国家继续面临着巨大的困难并仍有许多不足之处需要弥补。
answer: 值此联合国正与各国政府、民间社会和各种其他伙伴合作,利用千年发展目标所产生的势头规划雄心勃勃的2015年后方案之际,大多数发展中国家继续面临巨大困难,仍有许多不足之处有待解决。

source: It is vital to invest in the water and sanitation sectors if we want to build fairer and more equal societies where men and women, boys and girls, can legitimately aspire to greater comfort and well-being.
standard: 如果我们想要建立更加公平且平等的社会，使男子和妇女、男童和女童能够合理追求更加舒适幸福的生活，在水和卫生部门的投资就至关重要。
answer: 如果我们要建设更加公平和平等的社会,使男子和妇女、男孩和女孩能够合法地追求更大的舒适和福祉,就必须投资于水和卫生部门。

source: 8. The Group of Non-Aligned States Parties to the Treaty expresses its serious concern over the delay in the early entry into force of the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty.
standard: 不扩散核武器条约不结盟缔约国集团感到严重关切的是，《全面禁止核试验条约》未能尽早生效。
answer: 8. 条约不结盟缔约国集团对《全面禁止核试验条约》迟迟不能早日生效表示严重关切。

source: 6. The Group of Non-Aligned States Parties to the Treaty stresses the significance of achieving universal adherence to the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty, including by all the nuclear-weapon States, which, inter alia, should contribute to the process of nuclear disarmament.
standard: 不扩散核武器条约不结盟缔约国集团强调，实现普遍遵守《全面禁止核试验条约》，包括实现所有核武器国家遵守该条约具有重要意义，除其他外，普遍遵守该条约将推动核裁军进程。
answer: 6. 条约不结盟缔约国集团强调,实现普遍加入《全面禁止核试验条约》,包括所有核武器国家普遍加入《条约》,具有重要意义,除其他外,这应有助于核裁军进程。

source: Time and again, modern conflict -- particularly intra-State and asymmetric conflicts -- have shown that, for any prevention policy to be effective, it must address appropriately the underlying causes of the conflict, which may include socioeconomic, gender-based, ethnic, tribal, religious and ideological tensions that undermine the legitimacy of States and disrupt the governance of their societies.
standard: 当今冲突、特别是国内冲突和不对称冲突一再表明，有效的预防政策要求及时处理冲突根源，可包括破坏民族国家合法性并削弱其社会治理的社会经济、性别、族裔、部落、宗教和意识形态上的紧张状况。
answer: 现代冲突 -- -- 特别是国内冲突和不对称冲突 -- -- 表明,任何预防政策若要有效,就必须适当解决冲突的根本原因,其中可能包括社会经济、基于性别的、族裔、部落、宗教和意识形态上的紧张关系,破坏国家的合法性,破坏社会治理。

source: An inclusive society is one that overcomes differences based on geography, race, gender, class and generation in order to create equal opportunities, regardless of the origin of national, ethnic and cultural groups, and in which political and military power comes under civilian authority.
standard: 在包容性社会，地理位置、种族、性别、阶级和时代分歧得以克服，人人机会平等，不论民族、族裔和文化，而且军事和政治权力从属于民政当局。
answer: 包容性社会是一个克服基于地理、种族、性别、阶级和代际差异的社会,目的是创造平等机会,而不论其民族、族裔和文化群体的出身如何,在这样一个社会中,政治和军事权力由文职当局管辖。

source: As we work to redress the humanitarian situation in Syria, we must not forget that the only way to stop the suffering of the Syrian people in the long term is to end the conflict in Syria.

answer: 在我们努力解决叙利亚人道主义局势时,我们决不能忘记,从长远来看,结束叙利亚人民痛苦的唯一途径是结束叙利亚冲突。

source: Much to our regret, the terrorists' actions demonstrate their attempts to expand the territory of military conflict against the background of efforts by Ukraine and the international community to ensure a complete ceasefire and implement the Minsk Accords.

answer: 令我们非常遗憾的是,在乌克兰和国际社会努力确保全面停火和执行《明斯克协定》的背景下,恐怖分子的行动表明他们企图扩大军事冲突领土的企图。

source: UNOPS was keen to use its expertise to play an active role in linking partners to innovative solutions for sustainable development across a wide range of fields.

source: Forty-three per cent of female workers are "working poor", who earn 2 million yen or less a year.

answer: 43%的女工是“在业穷人”,一年收入200万日元或不到200万日元。

source: It intends to revise the Constitution, targeting at repealing Article 9, which declares renunciation of war, no possession of war potential and denial of the right to belligerency.
standard: 它打算修订《宪法》，目的是废除关于放弃战争、不得拥有战争力量和不具有交战权的宪法第9条。
answer: 它打算修订《宪法》,旨在废除第9条,该条宣布放弃战争,不拥有战争潜力,剥夺交战权。

source: 7. Action 9 of the 2010 action plan encourages the establishment of further nuclear-weapon-free zones, where appropriate, on the basis of arrangements freely arrived at among States of the region concerned, and in accordance with the 1999 Guidelines of the United Nations Disarmament Commission.
standard: 7. 2010年行动计划的行动9鼓励有关区域各国根据1999年联合国裁军审议委员会的指导方针和在自由作出的安排基础上，酌情建立更多的无核武器区。

source: 1. Reaffirms the need for the full and timely implementation of the political transition following the comprehensive National Dialogue Conference, in line with the Gulf Cooperation Council Initiative and Implementation Mechanism, the Peace and National Partnership Agreement and in accordance with resolution 2014 (2011), 2051 (2012), and 2140 (2014) and with regard to the expectations of the Yemeni people;
standard: 1. 重申需要在全面的全国对话大会结束后，根据海湾合作委员会倡议和执行机制、和平与全国伙伴关系协议并依照第2014(2011)、第2051(2012)和第2140(2014)号决议，按也门人民的期望，及时全面实现政治过渡；

source: Clear and consistent rules and guidance concerning these arrangements will protect against conflicts of interest and will result in fewer requests for ad hoc advice and guidance and fewer opportunities for inconsistent treatment.
standard: 如果关于这些安排的规则和指导是明确和一致的，就能防范利益冲突，并减少需要请求提供特定咨询和指导意见的情况和减少出现不一致处理方法的机会。
answer: 有关这些安排的明确和一致的规则和指导将防止利益冲突,减少对特别咨询和指导的要求,减少处理不一致的机会。

source: This will serve to better protect UNDP and the public its serves by elevating potentially harmful matters for resolution before damage is done.

answer: 这将有助于更好地保护开发署和公众的服务,在损害发生之前,将潜在的有害事项提升为需要解决的事项。

answer: 在这方面,它欢迎2014年12月8日和9日在维也纳举行的关于核武器的人道主义影响的维也纳会议。

source: Arba Minch, like several similar areas, is likely to face strong environmental stress and a degradation of living conditions if a good governance and a preventive planning approach are not set in motion since now.

answer: 与几个类似地区一样,如果从现在开始没有启动善政和预防性规划办法,Arba Minch很可能面临严重的环境压力和生活条件恶化。

source: 27. Under the Act, a bank's obligation to protect its customers' privacy manifests principally in a requirement to provide customers with clear and conspicuous notice describing its information-sharing policies and procedures upon initiation of the relationship, and annually thereafter, and also to provide its customers with an opportunity to opt out of the information-sharing before sharing any non-public personal information with third parties.
standard: 27. 根据《格雷姆-里奇-比利雷法》，银行保护其客户隐私的义务主要表现在要求其在关系最初开始时，并在之后每年向客户提供明确和突出的通知，说明其分享信息的政策和程序，并且在与第三方分享任何个人非公开信息之前为客户提供选择退出的机会。
answer: 27. 根据该法,银行保护客户隐私的义务主要表现在要求客户在建立关系时和此后每年向客户提供明确和显著的通知,说明其信息共享政策和程序,并向客户提供在与第三方分享任何非公开个人信息之前选择不分享信息的机会。

source: For the last ten years, Indonesia has achieved much progress in reducing gender disparity in education and literacy, and has also increased the participation of women in public sectors, especially in the world of the country's politics related to the legislative body.
standard: 过去十年来，印度尼西亚在减少教育和识字率领域的性别差异方面取得了巨大进步，并且还增加了公共部门的妇女参与，特别是在国家与立法机构相关的政治领域。
answer: 过去十年来,印度尼西亚在缩小教育和识字方面的性别差距方面取得了长足进展,并增加了妇女在公共部门的参与,特别是在与立法机构有关的印度尼西亚政治世界中。

source: Education is very important to empower people so that they can reach great achievements for the betterment of the nation.
standard: 教育对增强人的权能而言非常重要，它使人们能够取得巨大的成就，从而让国家变得更好。
answer: 教育非常重要,可以赋予人民权力,使他们能够取得巨大成就,改善国家。

source: As part of its coordination role, the United Nations has been asked by the Government to help mobilize international attention and support and convey the message that the Government is credible and willing to carry out key reforms.
standard: 作为其协调工作的一项内容，政府要求联合国帮助促使国际社会予以关注和支持，并传递这样的信息，即：政府是可信的，它愿意开展重大改革。
answer: 作为其协调作用的一部分,政府要求联合国帮助动员国际关注和支持,并传达政府可信和愿意进行关键改革的信息。

source: The Government, which deplores this situation, extends its deepest condolences to the families of the victims and wishes the injured a speedy recovery.

answer: 该国政府对这一局势表示痛惜,向受害者家属表示最深切的慰问,并祝愿受伤者迅速康复。

source: The elimination of malnutrition during the first 1,000 days of life for a child, and the provision of nutrition for all women of child-bearing age, will not only save the lives of women and children and contribute to their well-being, but will improve the economies of countries.
standard: 在儿童最初的1 000天里消除营养不良、为所有育龄妇女提供营养，不仅可以挽救妇女和儿童的生命、提高她们的幸福，还将促进国家的经济。
answer: 消除儿童生命头1 000天的营养不良现象,为所有育龄妇女提供营养,不仅将挽救妇女和儿童的生命,促进她们的福祉,而且将改善各国的经济。

standard: 此外，人力厅将于2015年4月1日颁布经修订的业绩管理政策，并随后推出根据政策变革作出更新的电子绩效工具。
answer: 此外,人力厅将于2015年4月1日颁布经修订的业绩管理政策,然后根据政策变化推出最新的电子绩效工具。

source: Article I(c) provides that a device is considered to be "placed in outer space" when "it orbits the Earth at least once, or follows a section of such an orbit before leaving that orbit, or is permanently located in outer space or on any celestial bodies other than the Earth."
standard: 第一条(三)项规定，一个装置如果至少绕地球一圈，或在离开绕地轨道之前沿该轨道运行一段，或被置于外空当中的任何位置或地球外任何天体上，则视为被"放置在外空"。
answer: 第一条(c)款规定,如果“一个装置在离开地球轨道之前至少绕地球运行一次,或沿着轨道的某一部分运行,或永久位于外层空间或除地球以外的任何天体上”,该装置即被视为“放置在外层空间”。

source: At the provisional measures phase, the Court determined that the undertaking in article I imposes "a clear obligation" on the two parties "to do all in their power to prevent the commission of any such acts in the future".
standard: 在临时措施阶段，法院裁定，第一条中的承诺规定双方拥有"尽一切所能防止在今后实施任何此类行为"的"明确义务" 在案情实质阶段，法院将这一承诺称为"正式的许诺.而不是仅仅是劝告性的或有目的的。
answer: 在临时措施阶段,法院裁定,第一条中的保证要求双方“尽其所能防止今后发生任何此类行为”的“明确义务”。

While welcoming the adoption of the national strategy for achieving gender equality by 2020, the Committee notes with concern that the restructuring and relocating of the national machinery and its fragmentation have affected its ability to ensure the effective development and implementation of gender policies.
standard: 11. 虽然委员会欢迎通过《到2020年实现性别平等的国家战略》，但它关切地注意到，国家机制多次重组和搬迁及其支离破碎，影响了其确保有效制定和执行性别平等政策的能力。
answer: 11. 委员会欢迎通过2020年前实现两性平等国家战略,但关切地注意到,国家机构的改组和搬迁及其支离破碎影响到其确保有效制定和执行两性平等政策的能力。

source: The Board also observed that no evaluation of the cost of change had been undertaken in the process of either bringing in new technologies or migrating to them as standards (ibid., paras. 375-377) and that significant amendments had been made in some contracts without the specific recommendations of the Headquarters Committee on Contracts (ibid., paras. 378-387).
standard: 审计委员会还指出，无论在引进新技术还是在过渡到作为标准的新技术时，都没有评价变革的成本(同上，第375至377段)，而且有些合同在未得到总部合同委员会具体建议的情况下便经过了重大修订(同上，第378至387段)。
answer: 审计委员会还注意到,在引进新技术或转而采用新技术作为标准的过程中,没有对变革费用进行评价(同上,第375-377段),一些合同在没有总部合同委员会具体建议的情况下作了重大修改(同上,第378-387段)。

answer: 俄罗斯、印度和中国决心根据《联合国宪章》的宗旨和原则、和平共处五项原则和其他国际法基本准则,建立一个更加公正、公平和稳定的国际政治和经济秩序。

answer: 商业评价表明,选定的建筑和工程顾问的投标也符合通行的市场条件。

source: In an effort to reduce the amount of specified funds, organizations are asking for so-called softly or broadly specified funds, which are provided for a theme, country or region, thus still allowing a certain flexibility in their use.
standard: 为努力减少指定用途捐款的数量，各组织正在寻求所谓软性或宽泛指定用途的资金，这种资金针对某一专题、国家或区域，因而在用途上仍保有一定的灵活性。
answer: 为了减少特定资金的数额,各组织要求获得所谓的软性或广义的专用资金,这些资金是为某个主题、国家或区域提供的,因此在使用方面仍然允许有一定的灵活性。

source: Lessons learned and good practices are offered in chapter VI.
standard: 本报告第六章介绍了经验教训和良好做法。
answer: 第六章介绍了经验教训和良好做法。

source: UN-Habitat has designed guidelines for establishing community groups empowered to design, manage and implement participatory slum upgrading projects, supported by the United Nations country teams and with the technical support of UN-Habitat.
standard: 人居署已设计了社区团体成立准则，增强其在联合国国家团队的支持及在人居署的技术支持下，设计、管理和实施参与式贫民窟改造项目的权能。
answer: 人居署设计了建立社区团体的指导方针,授权其设计、管理和实施参与性贫民窟改造项目,得到联合国国家工作队的支持,并得到人居署的技术支持。

source: Two reports recognised population ageing as a challenge.
standard: 有两份报告承认人口老龄化是个挑战。
answer: 两份报告确认人口老龄化是一项挑战。

source: Armenia's unconstructiveness in the negotiations, its interest in maintaining the status quo, its refusal to comply with the relevant resolutions of the United Nations Security Council, its policy of ruthless ethnic cleansing and its latest provocative actions aimed at undermining the peace process -- all these provide the strongest grounds to impose substantial sanctions against Armenia by the international community.
standard: 亚美尼亚在谈判中毫无建设性可言，只想维持现状，拒绝遵守联合国安全理事会的相关决议，执行残酷的族裔清洗政策，最近为破坏和平进程而采取挑衅性行动；凡此种种使国际社会有最充分理由对亚美尼亚实施实质性制裁。
answer: 亚美尼亚在谈判中毫无建设性,关心维持现状,拒绝遵守联合国安全理事会相关决议,奉行残酷无情的种族清洗政策,以及最近采取旨在破坏和平进程的挑衅行动 -- -- 所有这些都是国际社会对亚美尼亚实施实质性制裁的最有力理由。

source: A plan of work for exploration for cobalt-rich ferromanganese crusts on the Rio Grande Rise by Companhia de Pesquisa de Recursos Minerais S.A., sponsored by Brazil, was approved by the Council in July 2014.
standard: 2014年7月理事会核准了由巴西担保的海洋资源研究公司在里奥格兰德海隆勘探富钴铁锰结壳的工作计划。
answer: 在巴西赞助下,理事会于2014年7月核准了巴西采矿公司在里约格兰德海隆勘探富钴铁锰结壳的工作计划。

source: These hateful, violent actions continue to be committed by Israeli settlers with impunity and threaten to ignite a dangerous religious confrontation.
standard: 以色列定居者继续进行这些仇恨、暴力行为，但却不受惩罚，这可能会引发危险的宗教对抗。
answer: 以色列定居者继续采取这些可憎的暴力行动,不受惩罚,并有可能引发危险的宗教对抗。

source: Measures must be undertaken, in accordance with international law, including humanitarian and human rights law, and the relevant United Nations resolutions, to compel Israel to cease its violations and to respect its legal obligations.
standard: 必须采取措施，按照国际法，包括人道主义法和人权法以及联合国相关决议，迫使以色列停止其侵犯行为，遵守其法律义务。
answer: 根据国际法,包括人道主义法和人权法,以及联合国相关决议,必须采取措施,迫使以色列停止其侵犯行为,并遵守其法律义务。

source: Inclusion under the health goal would ensure the prioritisation of sexual and reproductive health services in the context of the right to health.
standard: 纳入到健康目标之下将确保性和生殖的健康服务在获得健康权方面处于优先位置。
answer: 将性健康和生殖健康服务纳入健康目标将确保在健康权方面优先考虑性健康和生殖健康服务。

source: Building on ICPD into the Post-2015 agenda
standard: 将人发会议成果纳入2015年后议程
answer: 以人发会议为基础,将人发会议成果纳入2015年后议程

source: In a word, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are an undisguised encroachment upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and an unpardonable war hysteria of dishonest hostile forces.
standard: 总之，"关键决断"和"鹞鹰"军演是对朝鲜主权和尊严明目张胆的侵犯，是不可饶恕的失信敌军不可饶恕的战争歇斯底里的爆发。
answer: 简言之,“关键决心”和“秃鹰”是对朝鲜主权和尊严的公然侵犯,是不诚实敌对势力不可饶恕的战争歇斯底里。

source: The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will further bolster their weapons to annihilate the enemies as the US imperialists become evermore ferocious in their aggressive nature, the south Korean puppet forces escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north to prolong their remaining days and dishonest hostile forces blindly follow them.
standard: 尽管美帝的侵略行径日益嚣张，尽管南朝鲜傀儡军正在加紧与北方同胞的对峙试图阻止末日的来临，失去诚信的敌军正在盲目地追随美帝，朝鲜革命军将一如既往，拿起武器消灭敌人。
answer: 朝鲜革命武装部队将进一步壮大其武器,消灭敌人,因为美帝国主义的侵略性质越来越凶猛,南朝鲜傀儡部队升级与北方同胞的对抗,延长余下的日子,不诚实的敌对势力盲目跟随。

source: 6. The Security Council, in its resolution 2024 (2011), expanded the mandate of UNISFA in support of the Joint Border Verification and Monitoring Mechanism and extended its area of operations to include the Safe Demilitarized Border Zone.
standard: 6. 安全理事会第2024(2011)号决议扩大了联阿安全部队支持联合边界核查和监测机制的任务范围，并扩大了联阿安全部队的行动区，以便将非军事化边境安全区包括在内。
answer: 6. 安全理事会第2024(2011)号决议扩大了联阿安全部队的任务,以支持联合边界核查和监测机制,并扩大了行动区,包括非军事化边境安全区。

source: 61. Mandate holders appreciated the emphasis on the structural problems of care responsibilities and the need to redistribute them between women and men, the family and the State.
standard: 61. 任务负责人赞赏的是，讨论强调了照料责任的结构性问题，以及有必要在男女之间，以及家庭和国家之间重新分配这种责任。
answer: 61. 任务负责人赞赏重视护理责任的结构性问题,以及在妇女和男子、家庭和国家之间重新分配照料责任的必要性。

source: Other significant progress was the inclusion by the Ministry of Education of a subject on the Holocaust in history lessons in several grades.
standard: 另一项重大进展是教育部将关于大屠杀的主题纳入了多个年级的历史课。
answer: 取得的其他重大进展是教育部在几个年级的历史课中列入了一个有关大屠杀的科目。

source: 1. Ensure the immediate bilateral cessation of the use of weapons.
standard: 1. 确保双方立即停止使用武器。
answer: 1. 确保立即双边停止使用武器。

source: 6. Enact a law prohibiting the prosecution and punishment of persons in connection with the events that took place in certain areas of the Donetsk and Luhansk regions of Ukraine.
standard: 6. 颁布法律禁止起诉和惩处与乌克兰顿涅茨克州和卢甘斯克州某些地区发生事件有关联的人员。
answer: 6. 颁布一项法律,禁止起诉和惩处与乌克兰顿涅茨克和卢甘斯克地区某些地区发生的事件有关的人员。

source: On 5 March 2015, the Russian Army began simultaneous field exercises on 12 firing ranges in the Russian Federation's southern military district and in the Russian-occupied Georgian regions of Tskhinvali and Abkhazia.
standard: 2015年3月5日，俄罗斯军队在俄罗斯联邦南部军区和格鲁吉亚被俄罗斯占领的茨欣瓦利及阿布哈兹地区的12个靶场同时开始进行野战演习。
answer: 2015年3月5日,俄罗斯军队在俄罗斯联邦南部军区和俄罗斯占领的格鲁吉亚茨欣瓦利和阿布哈兹地区同时开始12个射击场的实地演习。

source: The methodological guide for the development of inventories of hazardous wastes and other wastes under the Basel Convention with the understanding that the Committee will reflect therein, as appropriate, the relevant elements of the revised format for reporting adopted by the Conference of the Parties at its twelfth meeting;
standard: 《巴塞尔公约》下危险废物和其他废物清单编制工作方法指南，但有一项谅解，即委员会将在该指南中酌情反映缔约方大会第十二次会议通过的订正报告格式的相关内容；
answer: 制定《巴塞尔公约》下危险废物和其他废物清单的方法指南,但有一项谅解,即委员会将酌情在其中反映缔约方大会第十二次会议通过的订正报告格式的相关内容;

source: We have to start strengthening the understanding in all the countries of the world that population is a choice not an inexorable force of nature.
standard: 我们必须开始加强世界各国的认识，即人口是可以选择的，不是不可抗拒的自然力量。
answer: 我们必须开始加强世界各国的理解,即人口是一种选择,而不是自然的不可阻挡的力量。

source: Total employment in 2013 was estimated at 36,070, 0.9 per cent lower than the previous year.
standard: 2013年的总就业人数约为36 070人，比上一年低0.9%。
answer: 2013年就业总人数估计为36 070人,比上一年减少0.9%。

source: 1. Express their strongest opposition to the coercive economic measures not supported by international law, including all those unilateral actions imposed on sovereign countries for political reasons, that impair the well-being of their peoples and are designed to prevent these countries from exercising their right to decide, by their own free will, their political, economic and social systems;
standard: 1. 表示最强烈反对出于政治原因对主权国家实施不受国际法支持的胁迫性经济措施，包括一切单方面行动，这些措施损害了这些国家人民的福祉，目的是阻止这些国家行使按照自己的自由意志决定其政治、经济和社会制度的权利；
answer: 1. 表示最强烈反对国际法不支持的胁迫性经济措施,包括出于政治原因对主权国家采取的所有单方面行动,这些措施有损这些国家的人民的福祉,并旨在阻止这些国家行使根据自己的自由意愿决定其政治、经济和社会制度的权利;

source: They also highlighted the importance of differentiating between "gender" and "women" and of engaging more men and boys as champions of gender equality.
standard: 他们还强调，必须区分"性别"和"妇女"，并使更多男子和男童成为性别平等的倡导者。
answer: 他们还强调了区分“性别”和“妇女”的重要性,以及让更多男子和男孩成为两性平等倡导者的重要性。

source: In addition, it allows special provisions to be made by the State in favour of women and children (Article 15(3)), renounces practices derogatory to the dignity of women (Article 51(A) (e)), and also allows for provisions to be made by the State for securing just and humane conditions of work and for maternity relief (Article 42).
standard: 此外，宪法允许国家作出有利于妇女和儿童的特殊规定(第15条(3))、抛弃有损妇女尊严的习俗(第51条(A)(e))，并允许国家制定保障公正和人性化的工作条件和产假的规定(第42条)。
answer: 此外,它允许国家作出有利于妇女和儿童的特别规定(第15条第3款),放弃损害妇女尊严的做法(第51条(A)款(e)项),并允许国家作出确保公正和人道工作条件和产妇救济的规定(第42条)。

source: Some Bhakti sects and Guru Nanak preached the message of equality between men and women.
standard: 一些巴克蒂教派和拿那克宗师宣扬男女平等的思想。
answer: 一些巴克蒂教派和Guru Nanak领袖宣扬男女平等的信息。

source: Where possible, we should seek new disarmament commitments and measures, in order to guarantee continued progress to achieve the goals of the Treaty.
standard: 如果可能的话，我们应该寻求新的裁军承诺和措施，以保证在实现《不扩散条约》目标方面持续取得进展。
answer: 在可能的情况下,我们应当寻求新的裁军承诺和措施,以保证在实现《条约》目标方面取得持续进展。

source: 1. The provisional agenda for the forty-ninth session of the Commission on Population and Development set out below has been prepared on the basis of existing legislative authority, in accordance with Economic and Social Council resolution 1894 (LVII).
standard: 1. 根据经济及社会理事会第1894(LVII)号决议，按照现行立法授权，拟订人口与发展委员会第四十九届会议临时议程如下。
answer: 1. 人口与发展委员会第四十九届会议临时议程如下,是根据经济及社会理事会第1894(LVII)号决议在现有立法授权基础上拟订的。

source: Report of the Bureau of the Commission on Population and Development on its intersessional meetings
standard: 人口与发展委员会主席团关于闭会期间会议的报告
answer: 人口与发展委员会主席团关于其闭会期间会议的报告

source: During the reporting period, some progress was made in the technical-level dialogue, including establishing more consistent arrangements for the travel of Serbian and Kosovo officials, which came into force on 1 December.
standard: 本报告所述期间，技术级别对话已经取得一些进展，包括12月1日生效的为塞尔维亚和科索沃官员旅行制定的更加一致的安排。
answer: 在本报告所述期间,技术对话取得一些进展,包括为塞尔维亚和科索沃官员的旅行作出更加一致的安排,对话于12月1日生效。

source: In terms of monitoring, mentoring and advising activities, the Mission continued to advise Kosovo authorities on irregular migration.
standard: 在监测、指导和咨询活动方面，法治团继续向科索沃当局就非正常移徙问题提供咨询。
answer: 在监测、辅导和咨询活动方面,特派团继续就非正常移徙问题向科索沃当局提供咨询。

source: It also decided that on Wednesday, 15 April, the time slot between 11 a.m. and 1 p.m. would be used for an expert panel.
standard: 主席团还决定4月15日星期三上午11时至下午1时的时段用于举行一次专家小组会议。
answer: 会议还决定,4月15日星期三上午11时至下午1时的时段将用于专家小组。

source: It was agreed that, should one or more of the preferred speakers be unavailable, the Secretariat would proceed through the list until an available speaker was identified and confirmed.
standard: 主席团同意，假如一名或几名优选发言者不克与会，秘书处将依名单排名顺序选择并确认可以与会的发言者。
answer: 一致认为,如果一名或多名优先发言者不能发言,秘书处将通过该发言名单进行,直到确定并确认一名发言者。

source: 8. With regard to the Repertoire, it was pointed out that, in the past year, the Security Council Practices and Charter Research Branch of the Security Council Affairs Division had worked on Supplements 17 and 18, covering the period from 2010 to 2013.
standard: 8. 关于《汇辑》，秘书处代表指出，在过去一年里，安全理事会事务司安全理事会惯例和宪章研究处开展关于第17和18号补编(涵盖2010至2013年期间)的工作。
answer: 8. 关于《汇辑》,有人指出,过去一年,安全理事会事务司安全理事会惯例和宪章研究处编制第17和18号补编,涵盖2010年至2013年。

source: The Executive Director will comply with, and ensure that the Executive Secretary will comply with, the specific decisions adopted at each meeting of the Conference of the Parties, including with respect to matters related to the financing and budgeting of the Secretariat, taking into account the availability of resources and in accordance with the Financial Regulations and Rules of the United Nations, UNEP and FAO respectively.
standard: 执行主任应遵守并确保执行秘书遵守缔约方大会在各次会议上通过的具体决定，包括涉及秘书处财政和预算事项的各项决定，同时应考虑资源的可得性，并符合联合国、环境署和粮农组织的各项财务条例和细则。
answer: 执行主任将遵守并确保执行秘书遵守缔约方大会每次会议通过的各项具体决定,包括关于秘书处筹资和预算编制事项的决定,同时考虑到可用资源,并分别依照《联合国财务条例和细则》、环境署和粮农组织。

source: The Secretariat has been working on a draft memorandum of understanding, together with the Division of Environmental Law and Conventions and the Office for Operations and Corporate Services of UNEP and FAO, for consideration by the Conference of the Parties at its seventh meeting.
standard: 秘书处一直在与环境署环境法和公约司和运营及企业服务办公室以及粮农组织共同制定谅解备忘录草案，以供缔约方大会第七次会议审议。
answer: 秘书处与环境法和公约司以及环境署和粮农组织业务和公司服务办公室一道,一直在拟订一份谅解备忘录草案,供缔约方大会第七次会议审议。

source: The Lebanese Armed Forces continued their reinforcement in the vicinity of Shab'a village and the Arkoub area (Sector East).
standard: 黎巴嫩武装部队继续向沙巴阿村周围及Arkoub一带(东区)增派兵力。
answer: 黎巴嫩武装部队继续在沙巴村和阿尔库布地区(东区)附近增援。

source: In order to curb this activity, the Lebanese Armed Forces issued a public statement on 25 November reminding the local population of the ban against carrying hunting weapons south of the Litani River.
standard: 为制止这种活动，黎巴嫩武装部队11月25日发表了一项公开声明，提醒当地居民利塔尼河以南禁止携带狩猎武器。
answer: 为了遏制这一活动,黎巴嫩武装部队于11月25日发表公开声明,提醒当地居民禁止在利塔尼河以南携带狩猎武器。

source: It provides substantive input regarding specific proposals and facilitates the process, as requested by the secretariat of the Unit.
standard: 首协会秘书处就具体建议提供实务投入，并根据联检组秘书处的要求推动这项工作。
answer: 该股根据联检组秘书处的要求,就具体提议提供实质性投入,并为这一进程提供便利。

source: We thus call upon governments to take advantage of the forty-eighth session of the Commission on Population and Development, to not only reaffirm commitments surrounding the integration of population issues into sustainable development, but also strengthen and advance them as human rights issues, particularly as they relate to sexual and reproductive health and rights, and particularly in terms of their incorporation into the post-2015 development agenda.
standard: 因此，我们呼吁各国政府利用人口与发展委员会第四十八届会议，不仅要重申其关于把人口问题纳入可持续发展的承诺，而且还要把人口问题作为人权问题予以加强和推进，特别是这些问题涉及性和生殖健康及权利，尤其要把这些问题纳入2015年后发展议程。
answer: 因此,我们呼吁各国政府利用人口与发展委员会第四十八届会议的机会,不仅重申围绕将人口问题纳入可持续发展的承诺,而且加强和推动将人口问题作为人权问题,特别是与性健康和生殖健康及权利有关的人权问题,特别是将其纳入2015年后发展议程。

source: It set out the commitment of the Government of Anguilla to a balanced budget, borrowing guidelines and a medium-term fiscal plan for the management of public finances over the coming five years.
standard: 其中规定，安圭拉政府将致力于预算平衡，遵循借款指导原则和在未来5年管理公共财政的中期财政计划。
answer: 其中规定安圭拉政府承诺在今后五年内为公共财政管理制定平衡的预算、借贷准则和中期财政计划。

source: The banks, which account for three quarters of the assets of the Territory's entire banking system, are licensed by the Minister of Finance and are regulated by the Eastern Caribbean Central Bank.
standard: 这二家银行在领土整个银行系统的资产中占四分之三，拥有财政部颁发的许可证，归东加勒比中央银行管理。
answer: 银行占领土整个银行系统资产的四分之三,由财政部长颁发执照,并由东加勒比中央银行管理。

source: While general support was expressed for draft article 7 [6], Humanitarian principles, it was also suggested that it be supplemented by a reference to the principle of non-interference in the domestic affairs of a State by other States and international organizations that participate in the provision of assistance.
standard: 虽然第7[6]条草案(人道主义原则)得到普遍支持，但有代表团建议，还应补充提及参与提供援助的他国和国际组织不干涉国家内政的原则。
answer: 虽然普遍支持第7[6]条草案(人道主义原则),但也有代表建议,补充该条草案的应提及参与提供援助的其他国家和国际组织不干涉一国内政的原则。

source: In addition, the view was expressed that no strict distinction between codification and progressive development of international law could be made.
standard: 此外，有代表团认为，无法严格区分国际法的编纂和逐渐发展。
answer: 此外,有人认为,国际法的编纂和逐渐发展不能严格区分。

source: Additional information on political and constitutional developments in Tokelau is provided by the representative of New Zealand during meetings of the Special Committee on the Situation with regard to the Implementation of the Declaration on the Granting of Independence to Colonial Countries and Peoples.

source: While as cultural women or girls, traditional societal values demand that they play subordinate roles amongst their men, modern education require that such cultural values be adjusted in order to suite the context of equality.
standard: 作为特定文化的妇女和女童，传统社会价值观要求其扮演从属于男性的角色，但现代教育要求改变此种文化价值，以符合平等思维。
answer: 传统社会价值观是文化妇女或女孩,传统社会价值观要求她们在男子中起从属作用,而现代教育则要求调整这种文化价值观,以适应平等环境。

source: As such, adjusting one's culture to suite a rights based norm which, at the same time, may be violating another norm within the same set of rules and principles, (reflected through articles 3, 12, and 18 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights) is very confusing to those directly concerned.
standard: 因此，调整一种文化使其符合基于权利的规范，将可能同时违反同一套规则和原则的另一规范(反映在《世界人权宣言》第3、12和18条），这将使那些直接相关者无所适从。
answer: 因此,调整个人文化以适应一种基于权利的规范,这种规范同时可能违反同一套规则和原则中的另一套规范(反映在《世界人权宣言》第3、第12和第18条中),给直接有关各方非常混乱。

source: 41. answer: 41. 此外,针对秘书长以前关于这一问题的几份报告,理事会请秘书长编写一份反映会员国意见的报告,阐述进一步加强委员会工作和业务能力的备选方案,重点是在改革后更好地将委员会的工作纳入理事会工作方案,并为发展筹资后续进程和2015年后发展议程作出有效贡献。

source: The outcomes for 2014 indicate that the country's gross domestic product (GDP) rose by 8.1 per cent, with an 8.3 per cent increase in industrial production, a 6.9 per cent increase in agricultural production, a 10.9 per cent increase in capital construction and a 14.3 per cent increase in retail trade.
standard: 2014年的成果表明，我国国内生产总值增长了8.1%，工业生产增长8.3%，农业生产增长6.9%，基本建设增长10.9%，零售贸易增长14.3%。
answer: 2014年的结果显示,该国的国内生产总值增长了8.1%,工业生产增长了8.3%,农业生产增长了6.9%,资本建设增长了10.9%,零售贸易增长了14.3%。

source: The implementation of a carefully planned active investment policy on large-scale modernization and the technical and technological upgrading of production as well as social, transportation and communications infrastructure has led to a 10.9 per cent increase (equivalent to $14.6 billion) in investments in the economy.
standard: 由于执行了经过审慎规划的大规模现代化积极投资政策，对生产力及社会、运输和通讯基础设施进行了技能和技术升级，导致对经济投资增加10.9%(等于146亿美元)。
answer: 实施经过仔细规划的大规模现代化和生产技术与技术升级以及社会、运输和通信基础设施方面的积极投资政策,导致对经济的投资增加了10.9%(相当于146亿美元)。

source: The Federation Council of the Federal Assembly of the Russian Federation notes with great concern that repeated attempts are now being made to falsify our common history by placing equal blame for the outbreak of the Second World War on Nazi Germany and the Soviet Union, thereby putting the perpetrators and the victims of Nazism on an equal footing.
standard: 俄罗斯联邦会议联邦委员会关切地注意到，现在有人一再企图把第二次世界大战的爆发一并归咎于纳粹德国和苏联，篡改我们的共同历史，把纳粹主义的执行者和受害者混为一谈。
answer: 俄罗斯联邦联邦会议联邦委员会非常关切地注意到,目前正在反复企图歪曲我们的共同历史,把第二次世界大战爆发的同样责任归咎于纳粹德国和苏联,从而使纳粹主义的肇事者和受害者处于平等地位。

source: Decide that the ad hoc working group of experts will comprise two co-chairs appointed by the intergovernmental negotiating committee at its sixth session as well as experts from each of the five United Nations regional groups, as follows: three from Africa, five from Asia and the Pacific, two from Central and Eastern Europe, three from Latin America and the Caribbean and six from the Western European and other States.

source: Therefore we demand that the national targets set for Pakistan should place a key focus on young people and women's sexual and reproductive health and rights.

answer: 因此,我们要求,为巴基斯坦制定的国家目标应把关键重点放在青年人和妇女的性健康和生殖健康及权利上。

source: Many people continue to live in a context of discrimination and inequality, and human rights are not fully realized for all.
standard: 很多人继续生活在歧视和不平等的环境中，并未实现所有人的人权。
answer: 许多人继续生活在歧视和不平等的环境中,所有人的人权没有得到充分实现。

source: The Agreement on the cessation of hostilities signed in Brazzaville in July 2014 included a provision on the protection of children and, more specifically, on the release of children associated with the signatories.

source: 3.2.1 Progress is made, including through confidence-building measures, towards the implementation of key reforms targeting the security and defence forces, in order to enable them to carry out their tasks in an efficient and professional manner throughout the country
standard: 3.2.1 取得了进展，包括通过建立信任措施，开展治安部队和国防军的关键改革，使其能在全国以有效、专业的方式执行任务

source: The work will be organized in a manner that enables all delegations, regardless of size, to participate fully in all the activities of the working groups.
standard: 这项工作的组织方式将确保所有代表团，无论其规模大小，都能充分参与各工作组的所有活动。
answer: 这项工作的组织方式将使所有代表团,无论大小,都能充分参与工作组的所有活动。

source: The Committee will promote greater transparency by, where relevant, holding open meetings on those working group outcomes approved by the Committee and by communicating those outcomes to national contact points.
standard: 委员会将酌情就其核准的工作组成果举行公开会议并向国家联络人通报这些成果，以此方式提高透明度。
answer: 委员会将酌情就委员会核准的工作组成果举行公开会议,并向国家联络点通报这些成果,从而促进提高透明度。

source: 11. Requests the Independent Audit Advisory Committee to continue to keep under review the practice of the publication of audit and evaluation reports, including those on the relationship of the Office with management, the reputation of the Organization and the effectiveness of the new report format, and to provide relevant comments and observations in the context of its future reports, as appropriate;
standard: 11. 请独立审计咨询委员会继续不断审查公布审计和评价报告、包括关于监督厅与管理层关系的报告、关于本组织声誉的报告和关于新报告格式成效的报告的做法，并酌情在今后报告中提供相关评论和意见；
answer: 11. 请独立审计咨询委员会继续审查公布审计和评价报告的做法,包括关于审计和评价报告与管理层的关系、本组织的声誉和新报告格式的效力的做法,并酌情在今后报告中提出相关评论和意见;

source: When confronted by the Iran-Syria-Hezbollah axis threat, Israel will exercise its right to self-defence and take all necessary measures to protect its population and sovereignty.
standard: 以色列面对伊朗-叙利亚-真主党的轴心威胁，将行使自卫权，并采取一切必要措施，以保护其人民和主权。
answer: 在面临伊朗-叙利亚-真主党轴心威胁时,以色列将行使其自卫权,并采取一切必要措施保护其人民和主权。

source: Harsher penalties for offences relating to sexual harassment, early marriage, the rape of minors and violence against female pupils

answer: 与性骚扰、早婚、强奸未成年人和暴力侵害女学生有关的罪行的Harsher处罚法

source: In line with the joint action plan of the Government of the Democratic Republic of the Congo and the United Nations on ending and preventing child recruitment by armed groups, the Mission screened 154 FARDC troops and no children were identified.
standard: 联刚稳定团按照刚果民主共和国政府与联合国制定的旨在杜绝和防止武装团体招募儿童的联合行动计划，审查了刚果(金)武装部队154个支队，没有发现儿童兵。
answer: 根据刚果民主共和国政府和联合国关于结束和防止武装团体招募儿童的联合行动计划,特派团筛选了154名刚果(金)武装部队士兵,没有发现任何儿童。

source: 23. As reported by the Department of Economic and Social Affairs, in countries where young people between the ages of 10 to 24 represent more than 30 per cent of the population, particularly in sub-Saharan Africa and parts of South Asia, health and education systems are weak, and inadequate for the growing numbers of adolescents and youth expected in the coming 15 years.
standard: 23. 根据经济和社会事务部的报告，在10至24岁的年轻人占人口30%以上的国家中，尤其是在撒哈拉以南非洲和南亚的某些国家中，保健和教育体制薄弱，不足以满足预计今后15年中人数将越来越多的青少年和青年人的需要。
answer: 23. 经济和社会事务部报告说,在10岁至24岁的青年人占人口30%以上的国家,特别是在撒哈拉以南非洲和南亚部分地区,保健和教育系统薄弱,不足以应付未来15年预计越来越多的青少年和青年。

answer: 27. 社会媒体收集的信息对于跟踪个人在冲突地区的活动也非常有益。

source: The Coordinator of the Legal and Criminal Justice Working Group of the Counter-Terrorism Committee Executive Directorate, David Scharia, described the relevant Security Council resolutions, in particular the requirements of resolution 2178 (2014), and outlined the context and aims of the practitioners' series, the challenges and priorities previously addressed and the particularities of the phenomenon of foreign terrorist fighters.
standard: 反恐执行局法律和刑事司法工作组协调人David Scharia介绍了安全理事会有关决议、尤其是第2178(2014)号决议的要求，并概述了执行人员系列研讨会的背景和目标、之前讨论过的挑战和优先事项以及外国恐怖主义战斗人员现象的特殊性。
answer: 反恐怖主义委员会执行局法律和刑事司法工作组协调员David Scharia介绍了安全理事会相关决议,特别是第2178(2014)号决议的要求,并概述了从业者系列的背景和目标、以前讨论过的挑战和优先事项以及外国恐怖主义战斗人员现象的特殊性。

source: Emphasizing that the political transitional process agreed upon by the parties in the Gulf Cooperation Council Initiative and its Implementation Mechanism, the outcomes of the comprehensive National Dialogue conference, and the Peace and National Partnership Agreement has been undermined,
standard: 强调各方在海湾合作委员会倡议及其执行机制、全面的全国对话会议成果以及和平全国伙伴关系协议中商定的政治过渡进程已经受到破坏，
answer: 强调海湾合作委员会倡议及其执行机制各方商定的政治过渡进程、全面全国对话会议的成果以及《和平与国家伙伴关系协定》受到破坏,

source: Emphasizing the need for the return to the implementation of the Gulf Cooperation Council Initiative and its Implementation Mechanism and the outcomes of the comprehensive National Dialogue conference, including drafting a new constitution, electoral reform, the holding of a referendum on the draft constitution and timely general elections, to avoid further deterioration of the humanitarian and security situation in Yemen,
standard: 强调需要恢复海湾合作委员会倡议及其执行机制和全面的全国对话会议成果的执行工作，包括起草新的宪法，进行选举改革，对宪法草案举行公投和及时举行普选，以避免也门的人道主义和安全局势进一步恶化，
answer: 强调需要恢复执行海湾合作委员会倡议及其执行机制以及全面全国对话会议的成果,包括起草新宪法、选举改革、就宪法草案举行全民投票以及及时举行大选,以避免也门的人道主义和安全局势进一步恶化,

source: 23. Acknowledging the complementary roles of the criminal justice system, child protection agencies, health, education and social service sectors and, in some cases, informal justice systems in creating a protective environment and preventing and responding to incidents of violence against children, Member States are urged, as appropriate:
standard: 23. 认识到刑事司法系统、儿童保护机构、保健、教育和社会服务部门以及在某些情况下还包括非正式司法系统在创造一个保护环境以及预防和应对暴力侵害儿童事件的发生方面具有互补作用，促请会员国酌情：
answer: 23. 促请会员国承认刑事司法系统、儿童保护机构、卫生、教育和社会服务部门以及在某些情况下非正规司法系统在创造一个保护环境以及预防和应对暴力侵害儿童行为事件方面的互补作用,并酌情:

source: 39. The Division for Public Administration and Development Management will take stock of the constructive feedback received from Member States and the experience gained in partnering within the Secretariat and with other United Nations entities to continue to enhance its research and analytical capacity with a view to aligning that capacity with its technical cooperation and capacity-building activities, as well as to explore constructive partnerships aimed at delivering as one.
standard: 39. 公共行政和发展管理司将总结会员国提供的建设性反馈意见和在秘书处内以及与联合国其他实体结成伙伴关系方面取得的经验，继续加强其研究和分析能力，使这一能力适应技术合作和能力建设活动，并为达到"一体行动"的目的探索建设性伙伴关系。
answer: 39. 公共行政和发展管理司将评估从会员国收到的建设性反馈,以及在秘书处内建立伙伴关系和与联合国其他实体建立伙伴关系的经验,以继续加强研究和分析能力,使这一能力与其技术合作和能力建设活动相匹配,并探索旨在 " 一体行动 " 的建设性伙伴关系。

source: 19. During the year, the United Nations Project Office on Governance (see www.unpog.org) jointly organized the 2014 United Nations Public Service Day Awards Ceremony and Forum and participated in various events in the region in collaboration with other key development players.

answer: 19. 在这一年里,联合国治理项目办公室(见www.unpog.org)联合组织了2014年联合国公共服务日颁奖仪式和论坛,并与其他主要发展行为体合作,参加了在该区域举办的各种活动。

source: 24. Emphasizes the recommendation of the Special Rapporteur presented at the sixty-fourth session of the General Assembly, in which he emphasized the importance of history classes in teaching the dramatic events and human suffering which arose out of the adoption of ideologies such as Nazism and Fascism;

source: Acknowledging other important initiatives of the General Assembly aimed at raising awareness about the suffering of victims of racism, racial discrimination, xenophobia and related intolerance, including in the historical perspective, in particular regarding commemoration of the victims of slavery and the transatlantic slave trade,
standard: 肯定大会采取的旨在更好地认识，包括从历史角度认识种族主义、种族歧视、仇外心理和相关不容忍行为受害者所受痛苦的其他重要举措，尤其是关于纪念奴隶制和跨大西洋贩卖奴隶行为受害者的举措，

source: Germany and France will provide technical expertise for the restoration of the segment of the banking system in the conflict affected areas, possibly through the establishment of an international mechanism to facilitate social transfers.

source: As a companion document to the PDP and guide to agencies in the implementation of the MCW, the Women's Empowerment, Development and Gender Equality Plan (Women's EDGE Plan) 2013-2016 was formulated, and is now being implemented through the gender and development planning process in national and local government.

source: In particular, ASI operates under the Ministry of Education, Universities and Research and in coordination with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, within the framework of bilateral and multilateral relations and space cooperation agreements, by coordinating the Italian participation in European and international space projects.

source: This has driven the total number of internally displaced persons in Darfur to in excess of 2.5 million, including 1.4 million children, putting further strain on an already underresourced humanitarian response operation.

answer: 这使得达尔富尔境内流离失所者总数超过250万,其中包括140万儿童,使本已资源不足的人道主义应急行动进一步紧张。

source: Furthermore the staff member's girlfriend had been employed by said company, and the staff member had assisted her in regaining her employment after she had been fired and had arranged her unauthorized transport on a United Nations aircraft.
standard: 此外，该名工作人员的女友被该公司雇用，而且在她被开除时，该名工作人员协助她重获雇用，并未经授权安排她搭乘一架联合国飞机。
answer: 此外,该名工作人员的女朋友受雇于上述公司,该工作人员协助她在被解雇后重新找工作,并安排未经许可搭乘联合国飞机。

source: 39. The Committee recommends that the State party adopt a comprehensive strategy, which includes temporary special measures, to adequately address the situation and needs of women and girls living in rural areas.
standard: 39. 委员会建议缔约国制定包括临时特别措施在内的全面战略，以便适当地解决生活在农村地区的妇女和女童的状况和需要。
answer: 39. 委员会建议缔约国通过一项综合战略,其中包括暂行特别措施,以充分解决农村地区妇女和女孩的状况和需要。

source: Some speakers stressed the importance of transparent and results-based and mandate-based management.
standard: 一些发言者强调了透明度和按成果及按任务授权进行管理的重要性。
answer: 一些发言者强调了透明、基于成果和基于任务的管理的重要性。

source: 41. As a result, the Ombudsperson process remains one which is unnecessarily shrouded in mystery.
standard: 41. 因此，监察员程序仍然披着神秘的面纱，这是毫无必要的。
answer: 41. 因此,监察员程序仍然是一个不必要地神秘化的进程。

source: 50. Experience in this reporting period has reinforced the views expressed in the eighth report that responsibility for conveying requests for humanitarian exemptions within the Al-Qaida regime should be assigned to the Ombudsperson.
standard: 50. 本报告所述期间的经验增强了在第八次报告中表达的看法，即应把转递在基地组织制裁制度内提出的人道主义豁免请求的责任交给监察员。
answer: 50. 第八次报告认为,监察员应负责转达基地组织制度内的人道主义豁免请求,本报告所述期间的经验强化了这些意见。

source: 115 shells
standard: 115枚炮弹
answer: 115枚炮弹

source: The present chief executive has talked volumes, regardless of time and place, about "steadily stepping up preparations for unification", "creating conditions for holding dialogue of any form", "conducting trial operation of cross-peninsula railways" and holding dialogue and negotiations for "opening three channels for people's livelihood, environment and culture" and giving "priority" to the reunions of divided families and relatives, while calling for "putting an end to the 70 years of severance and conflicts".
standard: 现任行政长官不分时间和地点，大肆宣扬"稳步加紧统一准备"、"为举行任何形式的对话创造条件"、"试运行穿越半岛的铁路"以及举行对话和谈判，"为民生、环境和文化开放三个通道"、以及"优先"考虑离散家庭和亲人的团聚，同时号召"结束70年的割裂和冲突"。
answer: 现任首席执行官无论时间和地点如何,都谈到“稳步加快统一筹备工作”、“为举行任何形式的对话创造条件”、“开展跨县铁路试验作业”以及进行对话和谈判“为人民生计、环境和文化开辟三个渠道”和“优先考虑”分裂家庭和亲属的团聚,同时呼吁“结束长达70年的分离和冲突”。

source: South Korea has already made it an established fact to conduct Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises from March and Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises from August as planned while creating the impression that they have nothing to do with the removal of the danger of war and the creation of a peaceful climate.
standard: 南朝鲜按计划从3月份起开展的"关键决心"和"秃鹫"联合军事演习以及8月份起开展的"乙支自由卫士"联合军事演习已经成为一个既定的事实，同时又造成了一种印象，即他们同消除战争危险和创造一个和平环境没有什么关系。
answer: 南朝鲜已经将按计划从3月份开始进行关键决心和秃鹰联合军事演习和从8月份开始进行“Uliji Freedom Guardian”联合军事演习定为既定事实,同时给人的印象是,这些演习与消除战争危险和创造和平气氛毫无关系。

source: You have noted that the Commission on Narcotic Drugs is expected to act on the notification of China at its fifty-eighth session, to be held from 9 to 17 March 2015.
standard: 你们指出，麻醉药品委员会应在定于2015年3月9日至17日举行的第五十八届会议上就中国的通知采取行动。
answer: 你已注意到,预期麻醉药品委员会将在2015年3月9日至17日举行的第五十八届会议上就中国的通知采取行动。

source: Controlling an extensive maritime exclusive economic zone (nearly 800,000 km2) is a major challenge facing Cabo Verde that stems from its proximity to the Sahel region.
standard: 因临近萨赫勒地区，控制区域广泛的海洋经济专属区(近800 000平方公里)是佛得角面临的一项重大挑战。
answer: 控制广泛的海洋专属经济区(近80万平方公里)是佛得角面临的一个重大挑战,因为它靠近萨赫勒区域。

source: Transactional or testimonial immunity can be granted with the approval of the Court; Palau commonly uses the latter.
standard: 经法院批准授予罪行豁免或证言使用豁免；帕劳通常采用后者。
answer: 经法院批准,可以给予交易豁免或证词豁免;帕劳通常使用后者。

answer: 法人责任(第二十六条)

source: Further to these efforts, broadcast statements were issued to the Departments of Peacekeeping Operations, Field Support and Political Affairs personnel at Headquarters, as well as by code cable for all civilian and uniformed personnel in field missions, to reiterate the Secretary-General's zero-tolerance policy, as well as the key principles around protection from sexual exploitation and abuse, and a reminder of the highest standards of conduct they are to maintain.
standard: 除这些努力外，向总部的维持和平行动部、外勤支助部和政治事务部人员发布了广播声明，还向各外地特派团发出了编码电报，重申联合国的零容忍政策，以及关于防止性剥削和性虐待的重要原则，并提醒其应该保持最高行为标准。
answer: 除这些努力外,还向总部维持和平行动部、外勤支助部和政治事务部人员以及外地特派团所有文职和军警人员的编码电报发布了广播声明,重申秘书长的零容忍政策以及防止性剥削和性虐待的关键原则,并提醒注意他们将保持的最高行为标准。

source: The Committee intends to review the situation in its next report on the activities of the Ethics Office, within the context of its next report on human resources management.

answer: 委员会打算在下一次关于人力资源管理的报告中,在其关于道德操守办公室活动的下一次报告中审查这一情况。

source: The Advisory Committee welcomes the efforts made thus far to deliver training on the formulation of logical frameworks and programme monitoring and reporting.
standard: 行预咨委会欣见迄今在拟订逻辑框架及方案监测和报告问题上提供培训方面所作的努力。
answer: 行预咨委会欢迎迄今为提供有关制定逻辑框架以及方案监测和报告的培训所作的努力。

source: In addition, Member States should endeavour to address the structural causes that contribute to women's incarceration as well as the root causes and the risk factors related to crime and victimization.
standard: 此外，各会员国还应努力解决导致妇女被监禁的结构性原因以及与犯罪和受害有关的根源和风险因素。
answer: 此外,会员国应努力解决导致妇女被监禁的结构性原因以及与犯罪和受害有关的根源和风险因素。

source: In particular, Member States should make sure that a broad range of alternative and educative measures are available at the pre-arrest, pretrial, trial and post-trial stages, in order to prevent recidivism and promote the social rehabilitation of female juvenile offenders.
standard: 特别是，会员国应确保：在逮捕前、审判前、审判中和审判后的各个阶段，可采用一系列替代性和教育性措施，以防止少年女性罪犯再次犯罪并促进她们的社会改造。
answer: 特别是,会员国应确保在逮捕前、审前、审判和审判后阶段提供广泛的替代和教育措施,以防止重犯并促进女少年犯的社会改造。

source: Bearing in mind that the countries concerned are already suffering shortages of food and drinking water and that their economies are collapsing as a result of disruptions to trade, commercial flights and agricultural activity,

answer: 铭记有关国家已经面临粮食和饮用水短缺,而且由于贸易、商业飞行和农业活动中断,这些国家的经济正在崩溃,

source: 16. Recommends that plans be drawn up to help the countries affected recover quickly from the negative effects of the Ebola crisis based on the lessons currently being learned;

answer: 16. 建议制定计划,根据目前正在吸取的经验教训,帮助受影响的国家迅速从埃博拉危机的负面影响中恢复过来;

source: A particular focus is providing retraining and continuing education for educators in the field, and supplying them with instructional and training materials that meet current requirements and standards.
standard: 特别关注了该领域教学人员的再培训和提高资质问题，以及为他们建立教科书和教学材料的现代要求和标准。
answer: 特别重点是为该领域的教育工作者提供再培训和继续教育,向他们提供符合当前要求和标准的教学和培训材料。

source: He presented the quarterly financial report, highlighting areas in which UN-Habitat was ahead of its financial targets and those for which it lagged behind the 2014 goals.
standard: 他说明了季度财政报告，着重指出人居署领先于财政目标的领域以及滞后于2014年目标的领域。
answer: 他介绍了季度财务报告,重点介绍了人居署在哪些领域比其财务目标领先,哪些领域落后于2014年目标。

source: He expressed appreciation to the Government of Germany for resuming its support to non-earmarked funding of the Programme with a contribution of $1 million and he thanked several countries which had remitted their annual voluntary contributions as well as earmarked funding.
standard: 他赞赏德国政府恢复对人居署无限定用途供资的主持并出资100万美元，还感谢几个国家已汇出其年度自愿出资及无限定用途供资。
answer: 他感谢德国政府以100万美元的捐款恢复对方案非专用资金的支持,并感谢几个国家汇出年度自愿捐款和专用资金。

source: At the 7359th meeting of the Security Council, held on 14 January 2015, in connection with the Council's consideration of the item entitled "Post-conflict peacebuilding", the President of the Security Council made the following statement on behalf of the Council:
standard: 安全理事会主席在2015年1月14日安全理事会第7359次会议上，就安理会审议的题为"冲突后建设和平"的项目，代表安理会发表声明如下：
answer: 安全理事会主席在2015年1月14日安全理事会第7359次会议上,就安理会审议的题为"冲突后建设和平"的项目,代表安理会发表声明如下:

source: 2. Encourages Member States and relevant international organizations to enhance global cooperation in providing technical assistance, especially for capacity development in geodesy for developing countries, with the aim of ensuring the development, sustainability and advancement of a global geodetic reference frame;
standard: 2. 鼓励会员国及相关国际组织在提供技术援助方面加强全球合作，特别是援助发展中国家开展大地测量能力建设，以确保全球大地测量参考框架的建立、可持续性和完善；
answer: 2. 鼓励会员国和相关国际组织加强全球合作,提供技术援助,特别是为发展中国家发展大地测量能力提供技术援助,以确保全球大地测量参考框架的发展、可持续性和推进;

source: Recognizing the importance of international cooperation, as no one country can do this alone, to realize the global geodetic reference frame and services to underpin Global Navigation Satellite Systems technology and provide the framework for all geospatial activity, as a key enabler of spatial data interoperability, disaster mitigation and sustainable development,
standard: 认识到没有一个国家能够单独完成这项工作，因此必须开展国际合作，以便实现全球大地测量参考框架和服务，支持全球导航卫星系统技术和提供所有地理空间活动的框架，作为空间数据的互操作性、减轻灾情和可持续发展的推进手段，
answer: 承认国际合作的重要性,因为没有一个国家能够单独实现这一点,实现全球大地测量参考框架和服务,以支持全球导航卫星系统技术,为所有地理空间活动提供框架,以此作为空间数据互操作性、减灾和可持续发展的关键促进因素,

source: The Group of Friends stresses the ability of the family with regard to the achievement of equality between women and men and the empowerment of women.
standard: 家庭之友小组强调指出家庭在实现男女平等和增强妇女权能方面的能力。
answer: 之友小组强调家庭在实现男女平等和赋予妇女权力方面的能力。

source: The Group of Friends recognizes the pivotal role of the family as an important contributor to the implementation of the post-2015 development agenda and the goals that the States Members of the United Nations would identify as global priorities.
standard: 家庭之友小组认识到家庭作为执行2015年后发展议程和联合国会员国确定为全球优先事项的目标的重要促进者，发挥着关键作用。
answer: 之友小组认识到家庭的关键作用,认为家庭是执行2015年后发展议程和联合国会员国确定为全球优先事项的目标的重要推动者。

source: The Workshop recognized that outer space was a fragile environment where the steps taken by one actor might have an impact on others, including users of space services on Earth.
standard: 35. 讲习班承认，外层空间是一个某一行动体所采取之步骤可能会影响到其他行动体包括地球空间服务用户等的脆弱环境。
answer: 22. 讲习班认识到,外层空间是一个脆弱的环境,一个行动者采取的步骤可能对其他人,包括地球上空间服务的用户产生影响。

answer: 同样,联合国各机构和国际组织已经起草的《若开邦应对计划》从2012年7月起开始实施。

answer: 2007年至2013年,共有412名在国外出生的儿童获得了出生登记。

answer: 属于这些社区的数十万平民被迫逃离。

source: This high-level meeting will give us an opportunity to condemn the widespread and systematic persecution of members of these ethnic or religious groups, to address the impunity of the perpetrators and to reaffirm the undeniable right of these individuals to live in their own country in peace, freedom, equality and dignity.
standard: 这次高级别会议将使我们有机会谴责针对这些族裔和宗教团体所属个人的普遍性和系统性迫害，打击实施迫害者有罪不罚的现象，并重申受迫害者在其本国和平、自由、平等且有尊严生活是一项无可置疑的权利。
answer: 本次高级别会议将使我们有机会谴责广泛和有系统地迫害这些族裔或宗教群体成员的行为,解决肇事者逍遥法外的问题,并重申这些人在自己的国家和平、自由、平等和尊严地生活的不容否认的权利。

source: 17. It is indicated that, by the end of 2012, there were 141,738 women domestic migrant workers in the State party (paras. 90.2 and 250) and that measures are in place aimed at improving the situation of those workers, such as the adoption of a standard employment contract (para. 254.1).
standard: 17. 报告指出，到2012年年底，缔约国境内共有141 738名移徙家庭女佣(第90.2段和第250段)，缔约国也制定了旨在改善这些女佣处境的措施，例如通过了一份标准的就业合同(第254.1段)。
answer: 17. 报告指出,截至2012年底,缔约国共有141 738名女移徙家政工人(第90.2和250段),为改善这些工人的状况制定了措施,如通过标准就业合同(第254.1段)。

answer: 请提供最新资料,说明司法部长2014年1月提出的关于引入和规范任择公证婚姻的法案的现状(第208.1段)。

source: More specifically, the workshop aims to identify promising practices in criminalization, international law enforcement and judicial cooperation, and protection of rights of victims of trafficking and smuggled migrants from both a national and an international perspective.
