source: 36. The Committee calls upon the State party to implement systems of collection, analysis and dissemination of data disaggregated by sex, age, disability, race, ethnicity, geographic location and socioeconomic background and to use measurable indicators to assess trends in the situation of women and the progress achieved in the realization of substantive equality of women in all areas covered by the Convention.
standard: 36. 委员会呼吁该缔约国落实按性别、年龄、种族、族裔、地理位置和社会经济背景分列的数据收集、分析和传播系统，利用可衡量的指标评估妇女状况趋势及妇女在《公约》所涉所有领域实现实质性平等方面取得的进展。
answer: 36. 委员会呼吁缔约国实施收集、分析和传播按性别、年龄、残疾、种族、族裔、地理位置和社会经济背景分列的数据的系统,并使用可衡量的指标评估妇女状况的趋势以及在《公约》涵盖的所有领域实现妇女实质性平等方面取得的进展。

source: We would like to underscore separately that the search of the Crimean Tatar television channel "ATR" in Simferopol on 26 January 2015 and the confiscation of the archives with the materials on the events on 26 February 2014 preceded the arrest of Ahtem Chiygoz.
standard: 我们还要强调指出，在逮捕Ahtem Chiygoz之前，2015年1月26日在辛菲罗波尔搜查了克里米亚鞑靼语电视频道"ATR"，并没收关于2014年2月26日事件的档案材料。
answer: 我们谨分别强调,2015年1月26日,在逮捕Ahtem Chiygoz之前,在Simferopol搜索克里米亚鞑靼电视频道“ATR”以及没收2014年2月26日事件档案和材料。

source: We are indignant in Ukraine at the arrest in Crimea of one of the leaders of the Mejlis of the Crimean Tatar People, Ahtem Chiygoz, on the ground of an absurd accusation in respect of the organization of and participation in the public disorder that took place on 26 February 2014 in Simferopol, Autonomous Republic of Crimea.
standard: 乌克兰感到愤怒的是克里米亚鞑靼族人民理事会领导人之一Ahtem Chiygoz在克里米亚被捕，荒谬地指控他组织和参加2014年2月26日在克里米亚自治共和国辛菲罗波尔发生的公众骚乱。
answer: 乌克兰对克里米亚克里米亚鞑靼人议会领导人之一Ahtem Chiygoz于2014年2月26日在克里米亚自治共和国辛菲罗波尔组织并参与公共骚乱的荒谬指控在克里米亚被捕感到愤慨。

source: 7. At the same meeting, the Commission agreed to the proposal of the Chair to waive the relevant provision of rule 52 of the rules of procedure of the functional commissions of the Council and proceeded to act on the draft resolution.
standard: 7. 在同次会议上，委员会同意主席关于免于适用经济及社会理事会职司委员会议事规则第52条有关规定的提议，着手对该决议草案采取行动。
answer: 7. 在同次会议上,委员会同意主席的提议,不适用理事会各职司委员会议事规则第52条的有关规定,着手就决议草案采取行动。

source: As a global organization of police forces, INTERPOL offers tools for countering the threat posed by Taliban cooperation with organized crime.
standard: 作为一个全球性的警察组织，刑警组织提供了工具，以应对塔利班与有组织犯罪合作所产生的威胁。
answer: 刑警组织作为一个全球警察部队组织,提供了各种工具,用以对付塔利班与有组织犯罪合作构成的威胁。

source: Ra'is Khudaidad was captured by Afghan security forces in September 2014.42
standard: 2014年9月30日，Ra'is Khudaidad被阿富汗安全部队抓获。
answer: 2014年9月,Ra'is Khudidad 被阿富汗安全部队抓获。

source: The Dominican Republic has created a fund for women forest users, helping them to produce food for subsistence and herbs and in the small-scale gathering and sale of forest byproducts, including fuelwood.
standard: 多米尼加共和国创建了森林女使用者基金，帮助她们生产自给的粮食、采集草药和小规模采集和销售森林副产品，包括薪柴。
answer: 多米尼加共和国为妇女森林使用者设立了一个基金,帮助她们生产粮食,以维持生计和种植草药,小规模地收集和销售森林副产品,包括薪柴。

source: At the same time, the Department continued to seek video footage of the effects of sea level rise and climate-induced migration.
standard: 同时，新闻部还继续寻找相关视频，以显示海平面上升和气候变化所致移徙的影响。
answer: 与此同时,新闻部继续寻找关于海平面上升和气候引起的移徙影响的视频录像。

source: Convinced that meaningful and long lasting solutions to the recurrent youth challenges cannot be solved without the meaningful participation of the young people themselves;
standard: 确信没有青年自身的切实参与，就无法切实和一劳永逸地解决青年一再面临的诸多挑战；
answer: 确信没有青年人本身的有意义参与,解决青年反复出现的挑战的有意义和长期的解决方案是无法解决的;

source: Several other seminars would be organized with ECCAS and member States to promote the protection of human rights in the electoral process.
standard: 中非经共体和各成员国还将组织其他一些研讨会，促进在选举进程中保护人权。
answer: 还将与中非经共体和成员国举办若干其他研讨会,以促进在选举进程中保护人权。

source: 58. On the international stage, Equatorial Guinea had been helpful in resolving the conflict in the Central African Republic by contributing 220 men with the necessary equipment to the African-led International Support Mission in the Central African Republic (MISCA).
standard: 58. 在国际层面，赤道几内亚协助解决中非共和国冲突，为由非洲主导的中非共和国国际支助团(中非支助团)提供了220人和重要物资。
answer: 58. 在国际舞台上,赤道几内亚通过向非洲主导的中非共和国国际支助团(中非支助团)派遣220名配备必要装备的男子,帮助解决中非共和国的冲突。

source: The Act gives tribes greater sentencing authority; strengthens defendants' rights; helps at-risk youth; establishes new guidelines and training for law enforcement officers handling domestic violence and sex crimes; improves services to victims; helps combat alcohol and drug abuse and expands recruitment and retention of tribal law enforcement officers at Bureau of Indian Affairs, giving them better access to criminal databases.
standard: 这一法律使部落享有更大的判决权，加强了被告的权利，帮助了问题青年，为处理家庭暴力和性犯罪的执法人员确立了新的导则和培训方法，改善了对受害者的服务，有助于打击酗酒和吸毒行为，以及扩大了印第安事务局招聘和留用部落执法人员的范围并使他们能更好地利用刑事数据库。
answer: 该法案赋予部落更大的判刑权力;加强被告的权利;帮助风险青年;为处理家庭暴力和性犯罪的执法官员制定新的指导方针和培训;改进对受害者的服务;帮助打击酗酒和吸毒,扩大印第安事务局部落执法官员的征聘和留用,使他们更容易进入犯罪数据库。

source: Institutional and legislative framework and access to justice
standard: 体制和立法框架与司法救助
answer: 体制和立法框架以及司法救助

source: 18. Please indicate the measures taken to reduce poverty in urban and rural areas and to enhance the participation of rural women in developing policies in areas that affect them, including access to land, farm inputs and food crops.
standard: 18. 请说明采取了何种措施减少城乡地区的贫困问题，并在对农村妇女构成影响的领域的政策制定中加强她们的参与，包括土地获得、农业投入和粮食作物。
answer: 18. 请说明为减少城市和农村地区的贫穷、加强农村妇女参与制订影响她们领域的政策,包括获得土地、农业投入和粮食作物等而采取的措施。

source: The Republic of Ghana, in fulfilment of its national obligations under the Charter of the United Nations and in aspiring for peaceful coexistence, hereby submits an update of its report on the implementation of Security Council resolution 1540 (2004) of 28 April 2004.
standard: 为履行《联合国宪章》规定的国家义务，加之加纳渴望和平共处，因此，加纳共和国提交其2004年4月28日关于安全理事会第1540(2004)号决议执行情况报告的最新资料。
answer: 加纳共和国在履行《联合国宪章》规定的国家义务和渴望和平共处的同时,谨提交关于安全理事会2004年4月28日第1540(2004)号决议执行情况的报告的更新本。

source: In this regard, it is relevant to note that the Palestinian Government had previously declared its intentions to create a nature reserve and build an airport in this area of Palestine.
standard: 在这方面应指出，巴勒斯坦政府以前曾宣布打算在巴勒斯坦的这个地区建立自然保护区并建造一个机场。
answer: 在这方面,需要指出的是,巴勒斯坦政府以前曾宣布打算在巴勒斯坦这一地区建立自然保护区和机场。

source: Throughout nearly half a century of this belligerent military occupation, all such measures have served one Israeli agenda: to forcibly displace the Palestinian population and colonize and de facto annex massive areas of Palestinian land, in grave breach of international law and in contradiction to the two-State solution on the pre-1967 borders.
standard: 近半个世纪敌对军事占领时期的所有这些措施严重违反国际法并违反了以1967年前边界为基础的两国解决办法，服务于一个以色列议程：即强行驱逐巴勒斯坦居民并对大片巴勒斯坦土地进行殖民和事实上的吞并。
answer: 在整个近半个世纪的交战军事占领中,所有这些措施都服务于以色列的一个议程:强行驱逐巴勒斯坦人口,殖民和事实上吞并大片巴勒斯坦土地,严重违反国际法,违背1967年前两国边界解决办法。

source: The Board will oversee the development of a common information management infrastructure, including one global United Nations digital repository for official documentation, research, studies and statistics.
standard: 委员会将监督开发共同的信息管理基础设施，包括一个收录正式文件、调查研究和统计数据的全球性联合国数字文献库。
answer: 委员会将监督共同信息管理基础设施的发展,包括一个全球联合国数字储存库,用于正式文件、研究、研究和统计。

source: The issue to be published in early 2015 will focus on the sustainable development goals beyond 2015.
standard: 将于2015年初出版的一期将把重点放在2015年后可持续发展目标上。
answer: 将于2015年初出版的问题将侧重于2015年后的可持续发展目标。

source: In this regard, the Council urges progress by Burundi towards development and of ongoing economic reforms to enhance macro-economic stability, including the policy on zero tolerance on corruption, and calls for these efforts to include holding accountable individuals that violate the zero tolerance policy on corruption.
standard: 在这方面，安理会敦促布隆迪在发展和目前为加强宏观经济稳定性进行经济改革方面取得进展，包括对腐败采取零容忍政策，呼吁这些努力要包括追究违反对腐败采取的零容忍政策的人的责任。
answer: 在这方面,安理会敦促布隆迪在发展和正在进行的经济改革方面取得进展,以加强宏观经济稳定,包括实行对腐败零容忍政策,并呼吁这些努力包括追究违反对腐败零容忍政策的个人的责任。

source: The Council notes that the spirit of Arusha helped to sustain almost a decade of peace in Burundi.
standard: 安理会指出，在阿鲁沙精神的帮助下，布隆迪保持和平已有快十年了。
answer: 安理会指出,阿鲁沙精神有助于布隆迪维持近十年的和平。

source: 3. The individuals who are to receive the Prize shall be announced in May of the year in which the Prize is to be awarded.
standard: 3. 获奖者在授奖年度的5月公布。
answer: 3. 获得该奖的个人应在颁发该奖的年份的5月宣布。

source: Decides to adopt the statute of the United Nations Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela Prize, as annexed to the present resolution.
standard: 决定通过附于本决议的联合国纳尔逊·罗利拉拉·曼德拉奖章程。
answer: 决定通过本决议所附联合国纳尔逊·罗利拉拉·曼德拉奖章程。

source: I have the honour to transmit a letter dated 7 January 2015, which I received from Hassan Sheikh Mohamud, President of the Federal Republic of Somalia, in connection with paragraph 15 of Security Council resolution 2182 (2014).
standard: 谨转递我收到的2015年2月7日索马里共和国总统哈桑·谢赫·马哈茂德的来信(见附件)，其内容涉及到安全理事会第2182(2014)号决议第15段。
answer: 谨随函转递2015年1月7日索马里联邦共和国总统哈桑·谢赫·穆罕默德根据安全理事会第2182(2014)号决议第15段给我的信。

source: The leaders will contribute to this process and will use their influence on the relevant parties to facilitate the implementation of the package of measures.
standard: 四国领导人将推进这一进程，并将利用其对有关方面的影响力来促进一揽子措施的执行。
answer: 领导人将推动这一进程,并利用其对有关各方的影响力,促进一揽子措施的执行。

source: Turkey respects the territorial integrity of Syria and is committed to protect its rights and interests emanating from international law and to exercise its right of self-defence stipulated in Article 51 of the Charter of the United Nations.
standard: 土耳其尊重叙利亚的领土完整，致力于保护国际法赋予土耳其的权利和利益，行使《联合国宪章》第五十一条规定的自卫权。
answer: 土耳其尊重叙利亚的领土完整,并致力于保护其源于国际法的权利和利益,行使《联合国宪章》第五十一条所规定的自卫权。

source: The present report is submitted in compliance with those requests and provides information on the payment plan submitted earlier by Sao Tome and Principe and on the status of implementation of that plan as at 31 December 2014.
standard: 本报告系根据上述要求提交，并提供资料说明圣多美和普林西比早些时候提出的付款计划以及截至2014年12月31日的计划执行情况。
answer: 本报告是根据这些请求提交的,其中介绍了圣多美和普林西比早些时候提交的付款计划以及截至2014年12月31日该计划的执行情况。

source: Summary
standard: 摘要
answer: 摘要摘要

source: For those who said they work on monitoring and evaluation part time, they estimated that approximately 10 per cent of their time was spent on evaluation.
standard: 表示非全时从事监测和评价的专家估计，他们约有10%的时间用于评价。
answer: 对于那些说他们从事监测和评价兼职工作的人,他们估计,他们大约10%的时间用于评价。

source: The UNV strategic framework, 2014-2017, reflects a strong commitment to clearly demonstrating the contribution of volunteerism to the achievement of more effective peace and development results.
standard: 49. 2014-2017年志愿人员组织战略框架表明，坚定承诺明确展示志愿服务对更有效地实现和平与发展成果所作的贡献。
answer: 2014-2017年联合国志愿人员组织战略框架体现了对明确展示志愿服务对实现更有效的和平与发展成果所作贡献的坚定承诺。

source: This is a sine quo non for ending the occupation and for salvaging the two-State solution and must be a central pillar of any genuine push for a just and peaceful solution.
standard: 这是结束占领、挽救两国解决方案的必要条件，而且必须作为任何真正推动公正与和平解决行动的核心支柱。
answer: 这是结束占领和挽救两国解决方案的必要条件,必须成为真正推动公正和平解决的核心支柱。

source: It is clear that attacks against Palestinian Christian and Muslim holy sites are intended to terrorize and intimidate the Palestinian people, an objective shamelessly claimed by settlers carrying out this violent campaign, which they have dubbed as "price tag" attacks for years, as well as by settler leaders, some of them members of the Israeli Government.
standard: 显然，对巴勒斯坦基督教和穆斯林圣地进行的袭击的目的是恐吓和恫吓巴勒斯坦人民，实施这一暴力行动的定居者多年来将这一暴力行动称为"价格标签"袭击，厚颜无耻地宣扬这一目的，甚至定居者领导人(其中一些人是以色列政府官员)也作出这种宣称。
answer: 很明显,袭击巴勒斯坦基督教和穆斯林圣地的目的是恐吓和恐吓巴勒斯坦人民,实施这一暴力运动的定居者以及定居者领导人,其中有些是以色列政府成员多年来称之为“价格标签”攻击,他们无耻地客观地声称,这是一次客观的、无耻的行动。

source: Takes note of the holding of an orientation workshop for new members and requests the Secretariat to continue, subject to the availability of resources, to organize such workshops and to report on the results of that activity to the Conference of the Parties at its eighth meeting;
standard: 8. 注意到 为新成员举办了一次概况讲习班，并请秘书处在资源允许的情况下继续组织此类讲习班，并向缔约方大会第八次会议报告此项活动的结果；

source: The Third Conference of States Parties took note of the fact that only 26.04 per cent of the Commission's budget was covered, and thus called on all States parties to honour their financial obligations towards the budget of the Commission, as adopted by the Second Conference of States Parties, in order to enable the Commission to effectively and consistently implement its programme of work in a manner that ensures full ownership by States parties.
standard: 第三次缔约国大会注意到非洲原子能委员会的预算仅有26.04%得到落实，因此呼吁所有缔约国履行对第二次缔约国大会通过的非洲原子能委员会预算的财政义务，以便使该委员会切实有效和始终如一地执行其工作方案，并采取确保缔约国以充分自主权的方式加以执行。
answer: 第三次缔约国会议注意到,委员会预算只有26.04%得到支付,因此呼吁所有缔约国履行第二次缔约国会议通过的对委员会预算的财政义务,使委员会能够有效和一致地执行其工作方案,确保缔约国拥有充分自主权。

source: The special conditions may include payment of grant funds on a reimbursable basis; withholding of approval to proceed from one project phase to another until receipt of acceptable evidence of current performance; additional project monitoring; and requiring grantees to obtain technical or management assistance.

answer: 特殊条件可包括:在可偿还基础上支付赠款;在收到可接受的当前业绩证据之前,暂不批准从一个项目阶段进入另一个项目阶段;补充项目监测;要求受赠方获得技术或管理援助。

source: In summary, it is the understanding of the Secretariat that, upon the completion of the capital master plan, major projects may proceed concurrently if funding arrangements can be put in place that do not require major capital expenditure or a special assessment upon Member States for more than one of those projects.

source: To promote women's economic independence and rights, we need more female participation in the labour market.
standard: 为促进妇女的经济独立和权利，我们必须让更多的妇女进入劳动力市场。
answer: 为促进妇女的经济独立和权利,我们需要更多妇女参与劳动力市场。

source: Gender-responsive budget initiatives seek to create enabling policy frameworks, build capacity and strengthen monitoring mechanisms to support accountability to women.
standard: 促进性别平等的政策举措力求建立有利的政策框架，建立能力和加强监测机制以协助在妇女问题上追究责任。
answer: 促进两性平等的预算倡议力求建立有利的政策框架,建设能力,加强监测机制,以支持对妇女的问责。

source: The failure to hold Israel accountable for these systematic human rights violations and grave breaches of the Fourth Geneva Convention, including the transfer of prisoners outside of the occupied territory, is only fostering greater impunity, which must be brought to an end.
standard: 以色列这些系统性的侵犯人权行为和严重违反《日内瓦第四公约》的行为，包括在被占领土之外转移囚犯，若不加以追究，只会加剧有罪不罚现象，必须得到制止。
answer: 不追究以色列对这些系统侵犯人权和严重违反《日内瓦第四公约》,包括将囚犯转移到被占领土以外的责任,只会助长更大的有罪不罚现象,必须结束这种现象。

source: I write to draw your attention and, through you, the attention of the international community to the extreme hardships and suffering being endured by the Palestinian people under occupation in the State of Palestine, as Israel, the occupying Power, persists with its gross human rights violations, collective punishment and breaches of international humanitarian law.
standard: 谨写信提请你注意，并通过你提请国际社会注意，占领国以色列继续严重侵犯人权，实施集体惩罚和违反国际人道主义法，巴勒斯坦国被占领土上的巴勒斯坦人民因此遭受着极端艰辛和苦难。
answer: 谨致函提请你,并通过你提请国际社会注意巴勒斯坦国被占领下的巴勒斯坦人民正在经历的极端艰难困苦,因为占领国以色列坚持严重侵犯人权、集体惩罚和违反国际人道主义法。

source: The first law was designed to improve the infrastructure of the citizens' self-governing institution, the Makhallya, and make it the focal point for targeted social assistance to the population, and also to expand the functions of the Makhallya in the system of social monitoring of the activity of State authorities.
standard: 制定第一部法律，是改进公民自治机构Makhallya的基础设施，使之成为有针对性地向人民提供社会援助的协调中心，而且也是为了扩大Makhallya自治机构在对国家权力机关活动进行社会监测制度中的职能。
answer: 第一项法律旨在改进公民自治机构Makhallya的基础设施,使其成为有针对性地向民众提供社会援助的协调中心,并扩大Makhallya在国家当局活动社会监测系统中的功能。

source: 3. Adoption of the agenda and organization of work.

answer: 3. 通过议程和工作安排。

source: Those who cooked up the fraudulent document, including the former Chairman of the "commission of inquiry" on the human rights situation in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, are spreading the sophism that the "Report of the commission of inquiry on human rights" against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is based on the "testimonies" of hundreds of "defectors from the north" and Sin Tong Hyok's is only a part of them.
standard: 包括朝鲜民主主义人民共和国人权状况"调查委员会"前主席在内炮制欺诈性文件的人正在散布诡辩之词，即针对朝鲜民主主义人民共和国所编写的"调查委员会人权问题报告"所依据的是数百名"脱北者"提供的"证言"，而申东赫的"证言"只是其中的一部分。
answer: 编造伪造文件的人,包括朝鲜民主主义人民共和国人权状况“调查委员会”前主席,正在散布这样的说法,即针对朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的“人权调查委员会报告”是以数以百计的“北方缺陷者”的“证词”为依据的,申东赫只是其中的一部分。

source: I would like to remind you of the letters already sent by our Permanent Representatives in New York and in Geneva to you, the President of the General Assembly, the President of the Security Council and the President of the Human Rights Committee as regards Sin Tong Hyok's admission of giving false "testimony."
standard: 谨提醒你，我国在纽约和日内瓦的常驻代表已就申东赫承认提供虚假"证言"分别向大会主席、安全理事会主席和人权理事会主席发出信函。
answer: 我愿提醒你,我们在纽约和日内瓦的常驻代表已经就申东玉承认不实“作证”一事写信给你、大会主席、安全理事会主席和人权事务委员会主席。

source: Media exposure of crime and crime-related events can be an effective crime prevention strategy and useful tool for sensitizing and educating the public on underestimated or overlooked social problems.

answer: 媒体曝光犯罪和与犯罪有关的活动可成为有效的预防犯罪战略和有用的工具,使公众了解并教育公众认识低估或被忽视的社会问题。

source: We will continue to work tirelessly for the legitimate right of all peoples to a world without hunger or poverty and with health, education and dignity guaranteed to all; a world free of oppression and discrimination, without war, economic embargoes or exploitation of the weak.
standard: 我们将继续不懈努力，目的是为了全体人类都有合理的权利居住在一个免于饥馑和贫穷，并且所有人都有卫生、教育和尊严保障的世界；一个免于压迫和歧视，并且没有战争、没有经济封锁、弱者不受剥削的世界。
answer: 我们将继续不懈地努力,争取实现各国人民建立一个没有饥饿或贫穷、人人享有健康、教育和尊严保障的世界的合法权利;一个没有压迫和歧视、没有战争、经济禁运或剥削弱者的世界的合法权利。

source: We note that the Greek Cypriot representative attempted to exploit lofty ideals such as decolonization and the joint contribution of Turkish Cypriots and Greek Cypriots to allied forces during the Second World War in order to create a smoke screen for the discriminatory and aggressive policies pursued by the Greek Cypriot side against Turkish Cypriots.
standard: 我们注意到，希族塞人代表企图利用非殖民化等崇高理想以及土族塞人和希族塞人在第二次世界大战期间携手为盟军作出的贡献，为希族塞人方面对土族塞人实施歧视和侵略政策制造烟幕。
answer: 我们注意到,希族塞人代表试图利用非殖民化等崇高理想,以及土族塞人和希族塞人在第二次世界大战期间对盟军的共同贡献,以便为希族塞人方面对土族塞人实行的歧视性侵略政策制造烟幕。

source: The military intervention of Turkey in 1974 was carried out in this context to thwart the Greek junta's attempt, carried out in collaboration with Greek Cypriot armed elements, to annex Cyprus to Greece (Enosis) and stop mass atrocities against Turkish Cypriots.
standard: 在此背景下，土耳其1974年进行了军事干预，以挫败希腊军人政权协同希族塞人武装分子实施的将塞浦路斯并入希腊(希塞统一)的企图，并制止对土族塞人的大规模暴行。
answer: 1974年,土耳其进行了军事干预,以挫败希腊军政府与希族塞人武装分子合作,企图将塞浦路斯并入希腊(希塞),并制止针对土族塞人的大规模暴行。

source: This strategy consists of the establishment of a disengagement area between the two communities supported by constant monitoring and early warning assessments of their respective location and movements; the deployment of troops in potential flashpoint areas; robust day and night deterrence patrols; aerial monitoring; and frequent engagement with local communities and the authorities in the Sudan and South Sudan to address differences and remind them of their responsibilities.
standard: 这一战略包括在两个族群之间建立一个脱离接触区，辅之以对各自所在地点和移动情况的不间断的监测和预警评估；在潜在的热点地区部署部队；进行具威慑力的强势昼夜巡逻；空中监测；频繁接触当地社区及苏丹和南苏丹当局以解决分歧，并提醒它们履行自己的职责。
answer: 该战略包括:在两族之间建立脱离接触区,并不断监测和预警评估各自地点和移动情况;在潜在热点地区部署部队;强有力的昼夜威慑巡逻;空中监测;经常与当地社区和苏丹和南苏丹当局接触,以解决分歧,提醒它们注意各自的责任。

source: One C-160 Turkish military aircraft infringed international air traffic regulations and violated the national airspace of the Republic of Cyprus by entering the Nicosia FIR and the national airspace of the Republic of Cyprus without diplomatic permit or contacting Nicosia ACC, landing at the illegal Tympou airport.
standard: 一架C-160型土耳其军用飞机未经外交许可，也未与尼科西亚地区管制中心联系，即进入尼科西亚飞行情报区和塞浦路斯共和国领空，降落在非法的Tympou机场，违反了国际空中交通管制条例并侵犯了塞浦路斯共和国领空。
answer: 一架土耳其C-160军用飞机未经外交许可,也未与尼科西亚区域管制中心联系,进入尼科西亚飞行情报区和塞浦路斯共和国领空,降落在非法的Tympou机场,违反国际空中交通管制条例,并侵犯塞浦路斯共和国领空。

source: 48. The Permanent Forum has made a number of recommendations relating to the post-2015 development agenda and devoted time within the agenda of its sessions to hold discussions on the post-2015 development agenda.
standard: 48. 常设论坛就2015年后发展议程提出了一系列建议，并在届会议程中专门花时间就2015年后发展议程举行讨论。
answer: 48. 常设论坛就2015年后发展议程提出了若干建议,并在其各届会议议程内专门拨出时间讨论2015年后发展议程。

source: The following paragraph shall be inserted after paragraph 8 ter of Article 5 of the Protocol:
standard: 应在《议定书》第5条第8款之三后插入下款：
answer: 应在《议定书》第5条第8之三款之后插入以下一款:

source: However, this will require innovation in the Permanent Forum's working methods and decision-making processes.
standard: 然而，这将需要对常设论坛的工作方法和决策流程进行革新。
answer: 然而,这需要在常设论坛的工作方法和决策进程方面进行创新。

source: He also thanked the rescue workers, people from Ukraine and the joint team of Malaysian, Australian and Dutch forensic experts and the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe for their contributions.
standard: 他还感谢救援人员、乌克兰人员、马来西亚、澳大利亚和荷兰法医专家联合小组、欧洲安全与合作组织作出贡献。
answer: 他还感谢救援工作者、乌克兰人、马来西亚、澳大利亚和荷兰法医专家联合小组以及欧洲安全与合作组织所作的贡献。

source: I would like to take this opportunity to express my gratitude to Major General Ngondi for his contribution to UNMIL.
standard: 我愿借此机会对恩贡迪少将为联利特派团所作的贡献表示感谢。
answer: 我愿借此机会感谢恩孔迪少将为联利特派团作出的贡献。

source: 6. A State with a safeguards agreement(s) may also conclude a protocol additional to its safeguards agreement.
standard: 签订保障监督协定的国家也可签订其保障监督协定的附加议定书。
answer: 6. 订有保障监督协定的国家也可缔结保障监督协定附加议定书。

source: IAEA places great value on effective cooperation with State and regional authorities responsible for safeguards implementation, and works to enhance understanding and capacity by providing advisory services, training and assistance and publishing guidance documents addressing all aspects of safeguards implementation.
standard: 原子能机构极为重视与负责保障监督执行工作的国家和区域当局之间开展有效合作，并努力通过提供咨询服务、培训和援助以及出版涉及保障监督执行工作所有方面的指导文件的方式，加强理解和提高能力。
answer: 原子能机构高度重视与负责执行保障监督的国家和区域当局进行有效合作,并通过提供咨询服务、培训和援助以及出版涉及保障监督执行工作所有方面的指导文件,努力增进了解和能力。

source: The authorities also indicated that there was no case management system in place that would allow for a proper recording of incoming mutual legal assistance requests.
standard: 当局还表明，目前还没有出台能对收到的司法协助请求进行适当记录的案件管理系统。
answer: 当局还指出,没有能够适当记录收到的司法协助请求的案件管理系统。

source: However, no actual examples of the provision of such assistance exist to date.
standard: 然而，迄今为止，还没有提供此类援助的实例。
answer: 然而,迄今为止还没有提供这种援助的实际例子。

source: This includes providing comprehensive sexuality education to all young people, in and out of school.
standard: 这包括为校内外的所有青年提供全面性教育。
answer: 这包括向所有青年,包括在校和校外青年提供全面的性教育。

source: Commitment to tackling these root causes must not be lost in the reframing of the OWG report around "essential elements" as suggested in the Secretary General's report.
standard: 在围绕秘书长报告中所建议的"基本要素"变革开放工作组报告的过程中，不得丟掉对解决这些根源做出的承诺。
answer: 该工作组报告按照秘书长报告的建议围绕“基本要素”重新组合,绝不应丧失解决这些根源的承诺。

source: It was suggested that a convention on enforcement of settlement agreements could either provide for the enforcement of the agreement itself, or for the enforcement of an instrument that would be issued by a competent authority.
standard: 51. 会上提出，关于执行和解协议的公约既可以就协议本身的执行作出规定，也可以就主管当局所下达文书的执行作出规定。
answer: 有与会者建议,一项关于和解协议强制执行的公约既可以规定协议本身的强制执行,也可以规定由主管当局签发的文书的强制执行。

source: It was generally felt that the new section should not be prescriptive and need not touch upon the various types of interim measures.
standard: 普遍认为，新的一节不应是规范性的，而且无需触及各种类型的临时措施。
answer: 普遍认为,新的一节不应是规范性的,不必触及各类临时措施。

source: 21. Requests the funds and programmes of the United Nations development system, and invites the specialized agencies, to consider the findings and observations related to national capacity gaps repeatedly highlighted by programme countries to be addressed through the work of the operational activities for development of the United Nations system, including through the strengthening and use of national capacities, and to report to their governing bodies in 2016 with recommendations for implementation in this regard;
standard: 21. 请联合国发展系统各基金和方案并邀请各专门机构，审议与方案国一再着重指出的国家能力差距有关的调查结果和意见，以便通过联合国系统发展方面业务活动的工作、包括通过加强和利用国家能力消除这些差距，并于2016年向各自理事机构提交报告，其中提出这方面的执行建议；
answer: 21. 请联合国发展系统各基金和方案并邀请各专门机构,考虑方案国一再强调的国家能力差距相关调查结果和意见,通过联合国系统发展方面业务活动的工作,包括通过加强和利用国家能力,加以解决,并在2016年向其理事机构提出报告,提出这方面的执行建议;

source: South Africa:* draft resolution
standard: 南非：* 决议草案
answer: 南非:* 决议草案

source: 4. Requests the Secretary-General of the United Nations and the Secretary-General of the Caribbean Community to continue to promote and expand cooperation within their respective mandates so as to increase the capacity of the two organizations to attain their objectives and to seek answers to global challenges, including climate change, disaster risk reduction, sustainable development challenges, including poverty, inequality and non-communicable diseases, and transnational organized crime;
standard: 4. 请联合国秘书长和加勒比共同体秘书长在其各自权限内继续促进和扩大合作，以提高两组织实现其目标的能力，寻求办法应对各种全球性挑战，包括气候变化、降低灾害风险在内的全球挑战以及、包括贫穷、不平等、和非传染性疾病在内的可持续发展挑战和以及跨国有组织犯罪等在内的可持续发展挑战；
answer: 4. 请联合国秘书长和加勒比共同体秘书长在各自任务范围内继续促进和扩大合作,以提高两组织实现其目标的能力,并设法应对全球挑战,包括气候变化、减少灾害风险、可持续发展挑战,包括贫穷、不平等和非传染性疾病以及跨国有组织犯罪;

source: 2. Schedule 3 of the Contract shall be replaced by the training programme attached to this agreement as annex II.
standard: 2. 合同附录3应代之以本协议所附培训方案，作为附件二。
answer: 2. 合同附表3应由本协定附件二所附培训方案取代。

source: V. Transitional provision
standard: 五. 过渡条款
answer: 五. 过渡规定

source: In 2010, a decree regulating the activities of the National Commission for Coordinated Action against Gender-based Violence was adopted.
standard: 2010年通过了一项用于规范国家打击性别暴力协调行动委员会各项活动的法令。
answer: 2010年,通过了一项法令,规范全国打击性别暴力协调行动委员会的活动。

source: In 2011, 10.5 per cent of the Catalan population lived in households in which adults between 18 to 59 years of age had worked less than 20 per cent of their work potential during the past year.
standard: 2011年，在10.5%的加泰罗尼亚人口居住的家庭中，18至59岁成年人的工作强度比其去年同期的工作潜能低20%。
answer: 2011年,10.5%的加泰罗尼亚人口生活在18至59岁的成年人在过去一年工作不到工作潜力20%的家庭。

source: It also requested the Committee to continue to keep under review the situation relating to the question of Palestine and to report and make suggestions to the Assembly, the Security Council or the Secretary-General, as appropriate.
standard: 大会还请委员会继续经常审查与巴勒斯坦问题有关的局势，酌情向大会、安全理事会或秘书长提出报告和建议。
answer: 大会还请委员会继续审查与巴勒斯坦问题有关的局势,并酌情向大会、安全理事会或秘书长提出报告和建议。

source: 12. The Committee will mobilize international support to mitigate the difficult financial situation and safeguard the accomplishments of the Palestinian State-building programme.
standard: 12. 委员会还将动员国际社会支持缓解财政困难，捍卫巴勒斯坦建国方案取得的成就。
answer: 12. 委员会将动员国际支持,缓解困难的财政状况,保障巴勒斯坦建国方案的成就。

source: Furthermore, a high-level strategic acquisition review panel is to be established in the Department of Field Support to review complex and high-value acquisitions at an early stage in the acquisition process.
standard: 此外，将在外勤支助部内设立高级别战略采购审查小组，以在采购进程的早期阶段，审查复杂、高价值的采购。
answer: 此外,外勤支助部将设立一个高级别战略购置审查小组,在购置过程的早期阶段审查复杂和高价值购置。

source: Participants highlighted the need to promote a new urban agenda that could overcome the challenge of lack of adequate legal frameworks and planning, which lead to the relentless expansion of cities, intensive energy use, alarming and dangerous impacts of climate change, multiple forms of inequality and exclusion and increased difficulties in providing decent work for all.
standard: 与会者强调，缺乏适当的法律框架和规划的挑战导致城市无休止地扩大、能源密集使用、令人担忧和危险的气候变化影响、多种形式的不平等和排斥以及为所有人提供体面工作更加困难，必须推动一种能够克服这种挑战的新的城市议程。
answer: 与会者强调,需要推动新的城市议程,以克服缺乏适当法律框架和规划的挑战,这些挑战导致城市无休止扩张,能源密集使用,气候变化令人震惊和危险的影响,多种形式的不平等和排斥,以及增加为所有人提供体面工作的困难。

source: The Committee approved the Geneva United Nations Charter on Sustainable Housing to improve the sustainability of housing in the ECE region through effective policies and actions at all levels, supported by international cooperation.
standard: 委员会核准了《日内瓦可持续住房联合国宪章》，以在国际合作的支持下，通过所有各级的有效政策与行动改善欧洲经委会区域的住房可持续性。
answer: 委员会核准了《日内瓦联合国可持续住房宪章》,以便在国际合作的支持下,通过各级的有效政策和行动,提高欧洲经委会区域住房的可持续性。

source: The absence of civil status constitutes a mechanism for social exclusion.
standard: 民事登记程序的缺失是社会排斥的重要组成部分。
answer: 缺乏公民身份构成社会排斥的一个机制。

source: 7. The Group of Non-Aligned States Parties to the Treaty emphasizes the need to achieve worldwide application of the comprehensive safeguards system and calls upon all nuclear-weapon States and all States not parties to the Treaty to place all their nuclear facilities under IAEA full-scope safeguards.
standard: 条约不结盟缔约国集团强调必须在世界范围内适用这一全面保障监督制度，并呼吁所有核武器国家和不是《条约》缔约国的所有国家将其所有核设施置于原子能机构的全面保障监督之下。
answer: 7. 条约不结盟缔约国集团强调,必须在全世界实施全面保障监督制度,并呼吁所有核武器国家和所有尚未加入《条约》的国家将其所有核设施置于原子能机构的全面保障监督之下。

source: It should be recalled that in its resolution 853 (1993), the Security Council condemned "the seizure of the district of Agdam and of all other recently occupied areas of the Azerbaijani Republic" and demanded "immediate, complete and unconditional withdrawal of the occupying forces involved from the district of Agdam and all other recently occupied areas of the Azerbaijani Republic".
standard: 我们应该回顾，安全理事会在其第853(1993)号决议中谴责."夺取阿格达姆地区和所有其他最近被占领的阿塞拜疆共和国地区"，要求"参与行动的占领部队立即、全面和无条件地撤出阿格达姆地区和所有其他最近被占领的阿塞拜疆共和国地区"。
answer: 应该指出,安全理事会第853(1993)号决议谴责“占领阿格达姆地区和阿塞拜疆共和国所有其他最近被占领的地区”,并要求“立即、全部和无条件地从阿格达姆地区和阿塞拜疆共和国所有其他最近占领地区撤出占领部队”。

source: Demonstrate its renewed will to prepare for the future - to promote a world in which every child can flourish freely;
standard: 重新展示其为未来做好准备的意愿 -- -- 促进建立每个孩子都可以自由地茁壮成长的世界；
answer: 展现出为未来作准备的新意愿——促进每个儿童都能自由成长的世界;

source: The Security Council expresses serious concern over the reported violations and abuses of human rights and large-scale displacements of civilian population, including into Nigeria's neighbouring countries.
standard: 安全理事会严重关切有报道称人权受到侵犯和践踏，平民大规模流离失所，包括流入尼日利亚各邻国。
answer: 安全理事会严重关切据报发生的侵犯和践踏人权以及大规模流离失所平民,包括进入尼日利亚邻国等事件。

source: 25. In paragraph 64 of the report, the Board recommended that: (a) the Administration take effective steps to enforce and monitor compliance with the advance purchase policy by staff and missions; and (b) the Regional Service Centre review the reasons for non-compliance with the administrative instruction on official travel and identify areas for improvement, including streamlining and monitoring of the granting of approval for travel claims.
standard: 25. 审计委员会在其报告第64段建议：(a) 行政当局采取有效步骤，执行及监测工作人员和特派团遵守预购政策的情况，(b) 区域服务中心审查违反公务差旅行政指示的原因，并查明有待改进的领域，包括简化和监测差旅费报销的核准。
answer: 25. 在报告第64段中,审计委员会建议:(a) 行政当局采取有效步骤,强制实施和监测工作人员和特派团遵守预先采购政策的情况;(b) 区域服务中心审查不遵守公务差旅行政指示的原因,并确定需要改进的领域,包括简化和监测批准差旅费报销申请的工作。

source: The framework policy of the Regional Procurement Office was revised accordingly on 15 September 2014.
standard: 据此，2014年9月15日对区域采购办公室框架政策进行了修订。
answer: 2014年9月15日相应修订了区域采购办公室的框架政策。

source: As an unincorporated, organized territory of the United States of America, it is administered by the Office of Insular Affairs of the United States Department of the Interior.
standard: 作为美利坚合众国未并入、有组织的领土，由美国内政部岛屿事务办公室负责管理。
answer: 作为美利坚合众国一个未并入、有组织的领土,它由美国内政部岛屿事务办公室管理。

source: Customary international humanitarian law, rules 1 and 6, 2, 7, 10 (protection of civilian objects), 11 and 103 (collective punishments)
standard: 习惯国际人道主义法规则第1和第6、第2、第7、第10条(保护民用物品)、第11条和第103条(集体惩罚)
answer: 习惯国际法、规则1和6、规则2、规则7、规则10(保护民用物体)、规则11和规则103(集体惩罚)

source: 10. Encourages Member States, the United Nations system and all relevant stakeholders to improve disability data collection, analysis and monitoring for development policy planning, implementation and evaluation, fully taking regional contexts into account, and to share, where appropriate, relevant data and statistics with relevant agencies and bodies within the United Nations system, including the Statistical Commission, through appropriate mechanisms, and underlines the need for internationally comparable data and statistics disaggregated by sex and age, including information on disability;
standard: 10. 又鼓励会员国、联合国系统和所有相关的利益攸关方改进残疾数据的收集、分析和监测，用于发展政策的规划、实施和评价，同时要充分考虑到区域具体情况，通过适当机制与联合国系统包括统计委员会在内的相关机构和机关酌情分享有关数据和统计资料，强调有必要按性别和年龄分列国际可比数据和统计资料，包括关于残疾问题的信息；
answer: 10. 鼓励会员国、联合国系统和所有相关利益攸关方改进残疾数据的收集、分析和监测,以进行发展政策规划、执行和评价,同时充分考虑到区域背景,并酌情通过适当机制,与包括统计委员会在内的联合国系统相关机构和机关分享相关数据和统计数据,并强调需要按性别和年龄分列的具有国际可比性的数据和统计数据,包括关于残疾的信息;

source: The paper entitled "Building trust in government in pursuit of the sustainable development goals: the case of Nicaragua" was prepared by Committee member Paul Oquist for the consideration of the Committee of Experts on Public Administration at its fourteenth session.
standard: "为实现可持续发展目标加强对政府的信任：尼加拉瓜案例"一文由公共行政专家委员会成员保罗·奥基斯特编写，供委员会第十四届会议审议。
answer: 题为“在追求可持续发展目标的过程中建立对政府的信任:尼加拉瓜的案例”的文件由委员会成员Paul Oquist编写,供公共行政专家委员会第十四届会议审议。

source: From 2011 to 22 December 2014, some 16,861 Syrian civilians, including 1,810 children, have been killed by bombings and mortar shell attacks carried out by armed terrorist groups against Syrian cities.
standard: 从2011年至2014年12月22日，大约有16 861名包括儿童在内的叙利亚平民，被武装恐怖团体针对叙利亚城市的炸弹和迫击炮弹袭击杀害。
answer: 2011年至2014年12月22日,武装恐怖团伙对叙利亚城市进行轰炸和迫击炮弹袭击,造成约16 861名叙利亚平民死亡,其中包括1 810名儿童。

source: Measures to eliminate international terrorism
standard: 消除国际恐怖主义的措施
answer: 消除国际恐怖主义的措施

source: I should be grateful if you could bring the present letter and its annex to the attention of the members of the Security Council.
standard: 请提请安全理事会成员注意本信及其附件为荷。
answer: 请提请安全理事会成员注意本函及其附件为荷。

source: The drug had already been placed under national control, and the Government considered international scheduling very useful in order to better combat drug crime at the international level.
standard: 这一药物已处于国家管制下，该国政府认为将其列入国际管制名单是非常有用的，以便更好地打击国际一级的毒品犯罪。
answer: 毒品已经置于国家管制之下,政府认为国际日程安排非常有益,以便更好地在国际一级打击毒品犯罪。

source: These numbers are expected to be around 23,000 and 165,000, respectively, for 2014.
standard: 预计2014年这些数字将分别达到约23 000架次和165 000架次。
answer: 预计2014年这些数字将分别约为23 000人和165 000人。

source: As for the false assertion regarding the "illegally issued two notices to airmen", it must be underlined that activities within the Ercan advisory airspace, including issuance of notices to airmen, are carried out by the relevant authorities of the State in accordance with article 3 of the Convention on International Aviation.
standard: 至于有关"非法发布两份航行通告"的错误主张，必须强调指出埃坎咨询空域内的活动，包括发布航行通告，是国家有关当局根据《国际航空公约》第3条进行的。
answer: 关于“非法向飞行员发出两份通知”的虚假主张,必须强调指出,埃坎咨询空域内的活动,包括向飞行员发出通知,由国家有关当局根据《国际航空公约》第3条进行。

source: In terms of new institutions introducing policies on gender and indigenous peoples, for the first time in the agricultural domain, recognition is given to indigenous peoples through the creation of the Indigenous Peoples Directorate, attached to the Family Farming Secretariat in the National Ministry of Agriculture, Livestock and Fishing (MAGYP), the director of which is a woman of Mapuche origin.
standard: 关于执行性别和原住民政策的机构，通过设立原住民事务局，在农牧业领域首次承认了土著人民的地位，原住民事务局隶属于农业部新设立的家庭农业司，担任局长的是一名马普切族妇女。
answer: 在引入性别与土著民族政策的新机构方面,首次在农业领域承认土著民族,设立了土著人民司,隶属于国家农业、畜牧业和渔业部家庭农业秘书处,主任是马普切族妇女。

source: The Executive Committee to Combat Human Trafficking, attached to the Head of the Federal Cabinet of Ministers, launched the National Campaign to Prevent Human Trafficking.

source: Please provide information on the impact of article 6.11 of the Code of Administrative Offences on women involved in prostitution, as well as on measures taken to protect such women from discrimination, violence, unlawful detention, extortion and threats and harassment by the police, and review article 6.11.

source: This can be seen, for example, in cases of domestic violence, where some proceedings are abandoned despite the obligation on the part of the authorities to prosecute ex officio, or in the trafficking in and exploitation of human beings, where victims are sometimes only identified if the official responsible for the case is feeling charitable.

source: While noting the limitations of current information systems, the Committee is disappointed that greater effort was not made to respond, even partially and with the data available, to the repeated requests of the Assembly for reliable information on overall travel expenditures in order to facilitate its consideration of the programme budget, taking into consideration the delays in the implementation of Umoja.

source: Two decades since the adoption of the Beijing Declaration and Platform for Action, gender and the rights of women have undoubtedly acquired prominence and visibility in various national, regional and international arenas and institutions, including the United Nations system itself.
standard: 自通过《北京宣言和行动纲要》后二十年以来，在各个国家、区域和国际舞台及机构，包括联合国系统本身，性别平等和妇女权利无疑获得了突出地位和可见度。
answer: 《北京宣言》和《行动纲要》通过二十年以来,性别和妇女权利在国家、区域和国际舞台和机构,包括联合国系统本身,无疑占据了显著地位和显著地位。

source: There has been increased recognition of how equality can be promoted through institutional mechanisms for gender mainstreaming, which, with varying levels of independence depending on the country and, in the majority of cases, with small budgets, successfully cut across other government bodies.
standard: 日益认识到如何通过将性别问题纳入主流的体制机制来促进平等，其中因国家不同，其独立程度不同，而且在大多数情况下，这些机制的预算少，成功地突破了其他政府机构的界限。
answer: 越来越多的人认识到,如何通过将性别观点纳入主流的体制机制促进平等,这种机制因国家的不同而独立程度不同,在大多数情况下,由于预算少,成功地跨越了其他政府机构。

source: Some parties have expressed views that do not clearly support or oppose the amendment proposals but stress the importance of providing incentives for parties to adopt low-global-warming potential (lowGWP) alternatives to HCFCs; developing cost-effectiveness thresholds to ensure that more lowGWP alternatives are included in projects supported by the Multilateral Fund; providing adequate funding and technology transfer in developing and implementing alternatives as well as increased financial and technical support for pilot projects using low-GWP alternatives.
standard: 一些缔约方的观点并未明确支持或反对修正提案，但强调了以下几点的重要性：向各缔约方提供激励，鼓励采用低全球升温潜能值的氟氯烃替代品；制定成本效率阈值，确保在多边基金资助的项目中纳入更多低全球升温潜能值替代品；为开发和实施替代品提供充足资金和技术转让，并为使用低全球升温潜能值替代品的试点项目提供更多财政和技术支持。
answer: 一些缔约方表达了没有明确支持或反对修正提案的观点,但强调必须提供激励措施,鼓励缔约方采用低全球升温潜能值(低全球升温潜能值)氟氯烃替代品;制定成本效益阈值,以确保多边基金支助的项目包括更低全球升温潜能值替代品;为制定和实施替代品提供充足的资金和技术转让,并为使用低全球升温潜能值替代品的试点项目提供更多的财政和技术支持。

source: One NF-5 Turkish military aircraft infringed international air traffic regulations and violated the national airspace of the Republic of Cyprus by entering the Nicosia flight information region and the national airspace of the Republic of Cyprus without diplomatic permit or contacting Nicosia area control centre.

source: In order to implement the resolution and related mandates, the United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC) joined forces with the United Nations Children's Fund to develop a joint programme to promote and assist in the effective implementation of the United Nations Model Strategies and Practical Measures on the Elimination of Violence against Children in the Field of Crime Prevention and Criminal Justice.

source: The report provides information on the status of implementation of resolutions and decisions relating to crime prevention and criminal justice adopted in the period 2012-2014 by the General Assembly, the Economic and Social Council and the Commission on Crime Prevention and Criminal Justice in which action by the United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime was requested.

source: Despite the widespread condemnation and calls for cessation, Israel continues expropriating Palestinian land and property, constructing and expanding its colonial settlements to which it has transferred hundreds of thousands of Israeli settlers, constructing a massive wall and thereby severely fragmenting the Palestinian land, forcibly transferring thousands of Palestinian civilians and planning and constructing other infrastructure to serve the illegal settlements, including segregated Israeli-only roads.
standard: 尽管普遍给予谴责，并呼吁停止，以色列仍然继续侵占巴勒斯坦土地和财产，兴建和扩展其殖民定居点，让成千上万名以色列定居者定居，建造一堵巨大的隔离墙，从而严重分隔巴勒斯坦土地，强迫数千巴勒斯坦平民搬家，规划和兴建其他基础设施，以服务于非法定居点，包括仅供以色列人使用的隔离道路。
answer: 尽管受到广泛的谴责,并呼吁停止,但以色列继续征用巴勒斯坦土地和财产,建造和扩大殖民定居点,以色列向这些定居点转移了数十万以色列定居者,修建了大规模隔离墙,从而严重分割了巴勒斯坦土地,强行转移了数千名巴勒斯坦平民,规划和建造了其他基础设施,为非法定居点服务,包括隔离的以色列专用道路。

source: In the case of Mali, the United Nations enhanced its support for the planning process of AFISMA in line with resolution 2071 (2012), in which the Security Council requested the Secretariat to deploy military and security planners to assist ECOWAS and the African Union in planning for AFISMA.
standard: 就马里而言，联合国根据安全理事会第2071(2012)号决议加强了其对马里支助团规划进程的支助，该决议请秘书处部署军事和安全规划人员，协助西非经共体和非洲联盟规划马里支助团事宜。
answer: 就马里而言,联合国根据第2071(2012)号决议加强了对马里支助团规划进程的支持。 安全理事会在该决议中请秘书处部署军事和安保规划人员,协助西非经共体和非洲联盟规划马里支助团。

source: In that context, the issue of subsidiarity between the African Union and its subregional organizations needs to be addressed with renewed vigour, within the framework of the African Peace and Security Architecture, as partnerships work best when there are common strategic objectives, political coherence and a clear division of responsibilities.
standard: 在这方面，需要在非洲和平与安全构架内，重新着力解决非洲联盟同其次区域组织之间的辅助性问题，因为，在有共同的战略目标、政治一致性和明确的责任分工时，伙伴关系会发挥最大作用。
answer: 在这方面,需要在非洲和平与安全构架框架内,以新的活力解决非洲联盟及其次区域组织之间的辅助问题,因为只要有共同战略目标、政治一致性和明确的责任分工,伙伴关系就最有效。

source: Steps taken to institutionalize Mongolia's status since the 2010 Review Conference
standard: 自2010年审议大会以来蒙古国为将无核地位制度化而采取的措施
answer: 为使蒙古自2010年审议大会以来的地位制度化而采取的步骤

source: 3. Mongolia's initiative was welcomed by nuclear-weapon and non-nuclear-weapon States alike.

answer: 3. 蒙古的倡议受到核武器国家和无核武器国家的欢迎。

source: The Ministry established a working group to gather information about women in rural areas and is currently working on the Action Plan for Promoting and Improving the Role and Status of Women in Rural Areas.
standard: 农业部成立了一个工作组，收集关于农村地区妇女的信息，目前正在编制《促进和改善农村地区妇女作用和地位的行动计划》。
answer: 该部设立了一个工作组,收集农村地区妇女的信息,目前正在制定《促进和改善农村地区妇女作用和地位行动计划》。

source: In 2013, the measures of the National Employment Promotion Plan for the period 2011-2013 included a total of 757 persons of the Roma national minority, of whom 255 were women, compared to 2012 when there was a total of 664 users, 216 of whom were women, and in 2012 with 542 users, including 151 women.
standard: 2013年，《2011-2013年期间国家促进就业计划》措施包括共计757名罗姆少数民族人士，其中255人为妇女，相比之下，2012年的用户总数为664人，其中216人为妇女，2012年的用户总数为542人，包括151名妇女。
answer: 2013年,《2011-2013年国家就业促进计划》的措施包括罗姆少数民族共计757人,其中255人为妇女,而2012年共有664人,其中216人为妇女,2012年共有542人,其中包括151名妇女。

Bamako is a town of almost two million inhabitants that is suffering from a very serious shortage of drinking water.

answer: 巴马科有近200万居民,饮用水严重短缺。

source: That objective was reached in the majority of the countries comprising our community; unfortunately, however, Africa did not follow suit.
standard: 组成我们这个团体的大多数国家已实现这一目标；然而，不幸的是，非洲并未实现该目标。
answer: 构成我们共同体的大多数国家都实现了这一目标;但不幸的是,非洲却没有这样做。

source: 4. The Group of Non-Aligned States Parties to the Treaty recalls and reaffirms once again the commitment of all States parties, in particular the nuclear-weapon States, to ending all nuclear weapon test explosions or any other nuclear explosions and thereby constraining the development and qualitative improvement of nuclear weapons and ending the development of advanced new types of nuclear weapons.
standard: 不扩散核武器条约不结盟缔约国集团回顾并再次重申，所有缔约国，特别是核武器国家，都承诺结束所有核武器爆炸试验或任何其他核爆炸，并因而限制研制核武器和改进其质量，停止研制新型的先进核武器。
answer: 4. 条约不结盟缔约国集团回顾并再次重申所有缔约国,特别是核武器国家,承诺结束所有核武器试爆或任何其他核爆炸,从而限制核武器的发展和质量改进,并停止发展先进的新型核武器。

source: 7. In that context, the Group of Non-Aligned States Parties to the Treaty welcomes the signature of the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty by 183 States and its ratification by 163 States, including the recent ratification by Brunei Darussalam, Chad, the Congo, Ghana, Guatemala, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Indonesia, Iraq and Niue.
standard: 在这方面，不扩散核武器条约不结盟缔约国集团欢迎183个国家签署、163个国家批准《全面禁止核试验条约》，欢迎文莱达鲁萨兰国、乍得、刚果、加纳、 危地马拉、几内亚、几内亚比绍、印度尼西亚、伊拉克和纽埃最近批准该《条约》。
answer: 7. 在这方面,《条约》不结盟缔约国集团欢迎183个国家签署《全面禁止核试验条约》,163个国家批准该条约,包括文莱达鲁萨兰国、乍得、刚果、加纳、危地马拉、几内亚、几内亚比绍、印度尼西亚、伊拉克和纽埃最近批准该条约。

source: Building on the progress made so far to safeguard women's rights with regard to dignity, equality and fair treatment;

source: As civil, scientific, professional, national and international communities there is a huge necessity to create a central strategy that can promote the issue of Women's Health from an awareness into a call to action, now.

source: Recalling the advisory opinion of the International Court of Justice of 8 July 1996 on the legality of the threat or use of nuclear weapons, the Group believes that, pending the total elimination of nuclear weapons, which is the only absolute guarantee against the threat or use of nuclear weapons, the nuclear-weapon States should seriously refrain, in any circumstances, from the use or threat of use of nuclear weapons against any non-nuclear-weapon States party to the Treaty.
standard: 本集团回顾了国际法院在1996年7月8日发表的关于以核武器进行威胁或使用核武器的合法性的咨询意见，同时认为，在彻底消除核武器之前，核武器国家应郑重表示在任何情形下不对任何无核武器的《条约》缔约国使用或威胁使用核武器，这是不威胁使用或使用核武器的唯一绝对保障。
answer: 21国集团回顾国际法院1996年7月8日关于以核武器进行威胁或使用核武器的合法性的咨询意见, 它认为,彻底消除核武器是防止以核武器进行威胁或使用核武器的唯一绝对保证,在彻底消除核武器之前,核武器国家在任何情况下都应认真避免对任何无核武器的《条约》缔约国使用或威胁使用核武器。

source: From a location near the Israeli enemy Jabal al-Tayyarah position, four enemy soldiers monitored Lebanese territory using scopes mounted on their weapons, which they pointed towards Lebanese Army soldiers on the Lebanese side of the Blue Line.
standard: 四名敌方士兵从以色列敌方Jabal al-Tayyarah阵地附近一处地点，用安装在武器上的望远镜监测黎巴嫩领土，把望远镜对向在蓝线黎巴嫩一侧的黎巴嫩军队士兵。
answer: 四名敌国士兵从以色列敌方Jabal al-Tayyarah阵地附近的一个地点,用挂在他们武器上的瞄准蓝线黎巴嫩一侧黎巴嫩陆军士兵的瞄准镜监视黎巴嫩领土。

source: Since its beginning in 2012, WATSAM strived to establish a hotbed for cooperation encouraging relations among local stakeholders: institutions and utilities have all been engaged to support a gradual process of inclusion of public and private entities sharing the same rules and goals.

answer: 协会自2012年开始以来,努力建立一个合作的温床,鼓励地方利益攸关方发展关系:各机构和公用事业都参与支持逐步纳入具有相同规则和目标的公共和私营实体。

answer: 他还建议联几建和办与几内亚比绍当局接触,争取军方合作,支持弹药销毁方案。

answer: 抗议游行演变为暴力游行,造成伤亡。

source: Access to abortion, whether in the context of "reproductive ealth" or "reproductive rights", or as a component of population control, is opposed and restricted by many countries.
standard: 很多国家反对并限制进行堕胎的可能，不管是"生殖健康"或"生殖权利"还是作为人口控制的组成部分。
answer: 很多国家反对和限制堕胎,无论是在“生殖阴道”或“生殖权”方面,还是作为人口控制的一个组成部分,堕胎机会都受到许多国家的反对和限制。

source: They also noted that neither the General Assembly nor the Economic and Social Council had found it necessary in 2014 to take any action relating to that matter.
standard: 他们还注意到，2014年，大会和经济及社会理事会都不认为有必要就此事项采取任何行动。
answer: 他们还指出,大会和经济及社会理事会在2014年都认为没有必要就此事项采取任何行动。

source: It was said that, while the issue should not be viewed as a matter of priority, the subject should not be removed from the agenda of the Special Committee.
standard: 有意见表示，虽然该问题不应被视为优先事项，但不要将此主题从议程中删除。
answer: 有人说,虽然不应将该问题视为优先事项,但不应从特别委员会议程上删除该议题。

source: I should be grateful if you would bring the present letter and its annex to the attention of the members of the Security Council.
standard: 请将本信及其附件提请安全理事会成员注意为荷。
answer: 请提请安全理事会成员注意本函及其附件为荷。

source: This is even more the case with respect to the work of progressive development of international law in dealing with subjects "which have not yet been regulated by international law or in regard to which the law has not yet been sufficiently developed in the practice of States".
standard: 国际法逐渐发展方面的工作在处理"尚未由国际法进行规范或相关法律在国家实践中尚未得到充分发展"的问题上更是如此。
answer: 国际法逐渐发展工作处理“国际法尚未加以规范或国家实践中法律尚未充分发展的”主题的情况更是如此。

source: Whatever harm may be caused by ozone depletion and climate change, it should be clearly distinguished from the harm caused by transboundary air pollution.
standard: 不管臭氧层消耗和气候变化会造成任何损害，都应将其与越境空气污染造成的损害进行明确区分。
answer: 无论臭氧消耗和气候变化可能造成何种损害,都应明确区分跨界空气污染造成的损害。

source: 106. I pay tribute to my Special Representative, Nicholas Kay, his deputies and the staff of UNSOM, UNSOA and the United Nations agencies, funds and programmes, as well as other international and regional organizations in Somalia, for their continued hard work under hazardous and challenging conditions.
standard: 106. 我要感谢我的特别代表尼古拉斯·凯和他的副手以及联索援助团、非索特派团支助办、联合国各机构、基金和方案及其他国际和区域组织派驻索马里的工作人员，感谢他们在极端困难和危险的条件下继续努力工作。
answer: 106. 我赞扬我的特别代表尼古拉斯·凯及其副手、联索援助团工作人员、非索特派团支助办、联合国各机构、基金和方案以及在索马里的其他国际和区域组织,他们在危险和富有挑战性的条件下继续辛勤工作。

source: At the discretion of the co-chairs or chairs, priority in the order of speakers will be given to those speaking at the level of Head of State or Government or at the ministerial level, followed by highlevel representatives of other stakeholders.
standard: 发言顺序由共同主席或主席斟酌决定，国家元首或政府首脑级或部长级发言者优先，然后是其他利益攸关方的高级别代表发言。
answer: 共同主席或主席酌情决定,发言者的先后次序将优先考虑在国家元首或政府首脑一级或部长级发言的人,然后是其他利益攸关方的高级代表。

source: These findings demonstrate that space could be used significantly more efficiently if the Secretariat were to introduce flexible workplace strategies.
standard: 这些结果表明，如果秘书处采用灵活工作场所战略，空间的利用效率可以大幅度提高。
answer: 这些调查结果表明,如果秘书处采用灵活工作场所战略,空间的使用效率可以大大提高。

source: The sum of 30.4 million balboas has been invested in the restoration of properties that are in disrepair or deemed condemned and a danger to occupants' lives, benefiting 6,987 families;

source: 50. The Committee devised a national plan for the period 2012 - 2017 based on five strategic guidelines which include the monitoring and evaluation of the plan itself, i.e., evaluation of ways to step up action to address shortcomings.
standard: 50. 委员会制定了对应于2012-2017年的国家计划，该计划基于五项战略方针，其中包括对计划的监测和评估，据此对旨在采取进一步行动来改善这方面的薄弱环节的机制进行了评估。
answer: 50. 委员会根据五项战略准则制定了2012-2017年国家计划,其中包括对计划本身的监测和评价,即评估如何加快行动,克服缺陷。

answer: 临时议程说明中提到上述决议的有关段落,而不是全文引用。

standard: 谨此转递2014年12月在墨西哥韦拉克鲁斯市举行的第二十四届伊比利亚-美洲国家元首和政府首脑会议通过的"关于马尔维纳斯群岛问题的特别公报" (见附件)。

answer: 印发情况

source: There are no prohibitions, however, on the research, development, production, and terrestrial storage of space-based weapons, and, thus a Party - consistent with the provisions of the Treaty - could build and have in its inventory a readily deployable space-based ASAT or BMD capability.
standard: 然而，并不禁止研究、发展、生产和在地面储存天基武器，一缔约方因而可在不违反条约规定的情况下建造和储存便于部署的天基反卫星或弹道导弹防御能力。
answer: 然而,在天基武器的研究、开发、生产和地面储存方面没有禁令,因此,一个缔约方----符合《条约》的规定----可以建立并拥有一个随时可部署的天基反卫星或BMD能力。

source: As defined in Article I(b) in the 2014 draft, a "weapon in outer space" is "any outer space object or component thereof which has been produced or converted to destroy, damage or disrupt the normal functioning of objects in outer space, on the Earth's surface or in its atmosphere, or to eliminate human beings or components of the biosphere which are important to human existence, or to inflict damage on them by using any principles of physics."
standard: 按照2014年草案第一条(二)项中的定义，"在外空的武器"系指"制造或改造的、基于任何物理原理用来消除、损害或干扰在外空、地球表面或空气空间中物体的正常功能，以及用来消灭人口和对人类生存至关重要的生物圈组成部分或对其造成损害的任何外空物体或其组成部分"。
answer: 根据2014年草案第一条(b)项的定义,“外层空间武器”系指“任何生成或转换成摧毁、破坏或扰乱外层空间、地球表面或其大气层物体正常运作,或消灭人类或生物圈中对人类生存至关重要的部件,或通过应用任何物理原理对其造成损害的任何外层空间物体或其组成部分。”

source: Owing to that concern, a compromise was developed that involved adding to article 7(2)(a) a definition of "attack" which, as discussed below, contains a policy element.
standard: 由于存在这种担心，做了折中处理，即在第七条第㈡款第1项中对"攻击"的定义做了补充，如下文所述，该定义包含一项政策要素。
answer: 出于这一关切,拟订了一项折衷方案,其中包括在第7(2)(a)条中增加“攻击”的定义,下文将讨论该定义,其中包括一个政策要素。

source: This idea is sought to be reflected in the phrase "directed against any civilian population" in article 5 of the statute of the [International Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia], but it is more explicitly brought out in article [18] of the draft code.
standard: 这种想法本拟在[前南斯拉夫问题国际法庭]规约第5条"针对任何平民百姓"一语中反映出来，但在条款草案[第18条] 中表述得更加明确。
answer: 寻求在[前南斯拉夫问题国际法庭规约]第5条的“针对任何平民人口”一语中反映这一想法,但守则草案第[18]条更明确地提出了这一想法。

source: 17. In this regard, the Group of Non-Aligned States Parties to the Treaty reaffirms the urgent necessity of negotiating and bringing to a conclusion a phased programme for the complete elimination of nuclear weapons with a specified time frame.
standard: 在这方面，《条约》不结盟缔约国集团重申迫切需要开始通过谈判结束在规定时限内彻底消除核武器的分阶段方案。
answer: 17. 在这方面,《条约》不结盟缔约国集团重申,迫切需要谈判并完成一个分阶段的方案,在规定时限内彻底消除核武器。

source: 22. The Group is also concerned about the lack of tangible progress in enhancing transparency, in accordance with action 5 (g).
standard: 集团对在依照行动5(g)增进透明度方面缺乏实质进展感到关切。
answer: 22. 咨询小组还感到关切的是,在根据行动5(g)提高透明度方面没有取得切实进展。

source: Together with its United Kingdom counterparts, his Government had proposed ad hoc talks in parallel to the trilateral Forum.

answer: 联合王国政府与联合王国对应方一道,提议在举行三方论坛的同时举行特设会谈。

11. Calls upon the authorities of Guinea-Bissau to review, adopt and implement national legislations and mechanisms to more effectively combat transnational organized crime, in particular drug trafficking and money-laundering, and in this context, to provide additional support to the Transnational Crime Unit (TCU) established under the West Africa Coast Initiative (WACI) and the Intergovernmental Action Group against Money Laundering in West Africa (GIABA); and urges the authorities of Guinea-Bissau to demonstrate full commitment to combating drug trafficking;
standard: 11. 促请几内亚比绍当局审查、通过和采用国家立法和机制，更有效地打击跨国有组织犯罪，特别是毒品贩运和洗钱，并在这方面进一步支持西非海岸倡议设立的过渡期罪行股和西非反洗钱政府间行动小组；敦促几内亚比绍当局表明它全面致力于打击毒品贩运；
answer: 11. 吁请几内亚比绍当局审查、通过和执行国家立法和机制,更有效地打击跨国有组织犯罪,特别是贩毒和洗钱,并在这方面向西非海岸倡议设立的跨国犯罪股和西非反洗钱政府间行动小组提供额外支助,并敦促几内亚比绍当局充分承诺打击贩毒;

source: UNICRI is undertaking a related study into the feasibility of establishing a mechanism for the traceability and certification of origin of coloured gemstones, and to address the involvement of organized criminal groups in the supply chain.
standard: 犯罪司法所正在就建立关于追踪和认证彩色宝石来源的机制的可行性以及处理有组织犯罪集团涉足供应链的问题开展相关研究。
answer: 犯罪司法所正在开展一项相关研究,探讨建立一个有色宝石来源追踪和认证机制的可行性,并探讨有组织犯罪集团参与供应链的问题。

source: Significant progress has been made in the area of access to education especially for the girl child.

answer: 在获得教育,特别是女童接受教育方面,已经取得重大进展。

source: The Executive Director will comply with, and ensure that the Executive Secretary complies with, the specific decisions adopted at each meeting of the Conference of the Parties, including with respect to matters related to the financing and budgeting of the Secretariat, taking into account the availability of resources and in accordance with the Financial Regulations and Rules of the United Nations and UNEP.
standard: 执行主任应遵守并确保执行秘书遵守缔约方大会在各次会议上通过的具体决定，包括涉及秘书处财政和预算事项的各项决定，同时应考虑资源的可得性并符合联合国和环境署的各项财务条例和细则。
answer: 执行主任将遵守并确保执行秘书遵守缔约方大会每次会议通过的具体决定,包括关于秘书处筹资和预算编制事项的决定,同时考虑到可用资源,并符合《联合国财务条例和细则》和《环境署财务条例和细则》。

source: All budget expenditures that are made pursuant to rule 3, paragraph 4, shall be charged to the General Trust Fund.

answer: 依照第3条第4款作出的所有预算支出均应从普通信托基金中支付。

source: 29. Notes with concern the recurring underutilization of the conference centre of the Economic Commission for Africa, specifically given the ongoing renovation of its facilities, recognizes the continuing promotional efforts and initiatives of the Commission, and requests the Secretary-General to report thereon to the General Assembly at its seventieth session through the Committee on Conferences;

answer: 29. 关切地注意到非洲经济委员会会议中心利用率一再不足,特别是鉴于其设施正在翻新,确认该委员会继续开展宣传工作和采取举措,并请秘书长通过会议委员会向大会第七十届会议报告有关情况;

source: 87. Also reiterates its request that all documents submitted to legislative organs, including the Committee on Conferences, by the Secretariat and intergovernmental and expert bodies for consideration and action have conclusions and recommendations in bold print;

answer: 将男子视为两性平等方面的利益攸关方,并设计机会和惠益的积极信息,有助于吸引更多的男子参与。

source: Broadening the discussion to how gender norms affect men and women in all their (sexual) diversity, can help us to better understand the complex ways that rigid gender norms and power relations burden our societies, and to more effectively engage men and boys in reflections about inequalities and change.
standard: 扩大有关性别规范在所有（性别）差异中如何影响男子和妇女的讨论的范围，有助于我们更好地理解固有性别规范和权力关系对我们社会造成负担的复杂方式，以及更加有效地让男子和男孩参与有关不平等和改革的思考。
answer: 扩大讨论范围,使人们了解性别规范如何影响男女所有(性)多样性,有助于我们更好地了解僵硬的性别规范和权力关系给我们社会带来的复杂负担,并更有效地让男子和男孩参与对不平等和变化的思考。

source: Now is the time for the international community to act with one voice and impress upon the leaders of South Sudan that they can no longer hold the fate of the country hostage to their personal ambitions and that there are consequences for those who continue to undermine the peace effort.
standard: 在此关头，国际社会必须用一个声音说话，让南苏丹领导人明白：他们再也不能使国家的命运受制于其个人野心，那些继续破坏和平努力的人将承担后果。
answer: 现在是国际社会以一个声音采取行动的时候了,让南苏丹领导人认识到,他们不能再将国家的命运作为个人野心的抵押品,继续破坏和平努力的人将面临后果。

source: It was my hope that those initiatives would have generated the momentum and created the political space for the leadership of South Sudan to conclude a peace agreement during the IGAD Summit, which was to be held in the margins of the African Union Summit.
standard: 我曾希望这些举措会产生势头和创造政治空间，使南苏丹领导人能在定于非洲联盟首脑会议期间举行的伊加特首脑会议上达成和平协议。
answer: 我希望,这些举措将产生势头,为南苏丹领导人在伊加特首脑会议期间缔结一项和平协定创造政治空间,该首脑会议将在非洲联盟首脑会议的间隙举行。

source: Working on the basis of an agreed methodology, the Committee allocates a coefficient corresponding to the extent to which the funds are considered ODA relevant.

source: In that regard, the Committee draws the attention of the State party to its general recommendation No. 9 on statistical data concerning the situation of women and encourages the State party to seek technical assistance from the relevant United Nations agencies and enhance its collaboration with women's associations that could assist in the collection of accurate data.

answer: 在这方面,委员会提请缔约国注意其关于妇女状况统计数据的第9号一般性建议,并鼓励缔约国向相关联合国机构寻求技术援助,加强与妇女协会的协作,协助收集准确数据。

source: 11. In a statement on 28 January, Hizbullah claimed responsibility for the attack on the Israeli military convoy that it attributed to its "Quneitra martyrs group" in reference to the 18 January alleged Israeli airstrike against Hizbullah elements and a high-ranking Iranian military officer in the Golan.
standard: 11. 真主党在1月28日的声明中声称对袭击以色列军事车队负责，并提及是为1月18日以色列涉嫌空袭戈兰的真主党分子和一名伊朗高级军官造成的"库奈特拉烈士组"报仇。
answer: 11. 真主党在1月28日的一份声明中,声称对以色列军事车队遭到袭击负责。 真主党的“Quuneitra烈士小组”负责。 真主党提到1月18日以色列据称对真主党分子和一名伊朗高级军官在戈兰进行空袭。

source: It is thus high time that national laws, policies and programmes embody and reaffirm sexual and reproductive health and rights for what they are: human rights requiring respect, protection, and fulfilment, in order to attain holistic wellbeing.
standard: 因此，现在该是国家法律、政策和方案体现并确认性和生殖健康及权利的本来面目的时候了，为了实现全面幸福，它们是需要尊重、保护和实现的人权。
answer: 因此,国家法律、政策和方案必须体现和重申性健康和生殖健康及权利:需要尊重、保护和实现的人权,以实现整体福祉。

source: Often stemming from narrowly conceptualized programming and planning related to population and development, issues such as unsafe abortion, stigmatizing laws that target marginalized groups, and the absence or denial of comprehensive sexual and reproductive health information and services, continue to contribute to negative development outcomes.
standard: 往往因有关人口与发展方面的狭隘概念化方案编制与规划而引起的不安全堕胎、针对边缘化群体的污名化法律以及缺乏或拒绝提供全面性和生殖健康信息与服务等问题仍在继续带来消极的发展结果。
answer: 往往产生于与人口与发展有关的狭隘概念化方案规划和规划,不安全堕胎、污辱针对边缘化群体的法律以及缺乏或拒绝全面的性健康和生殖健康信息和服务等问题,继续造成不利的发展成果。

source: In so doing, the application resulting from a unilateral declaration could only lead to obligations incumbent upon the declaring State.
standard: 这样，通过单方面声明适用条约只能导致声明国承担义务。
answer: 这样做,单方声明产生的适用只能导致声明国承担义务。

source: This change in presentation helped to reduce the silo effect and to promote coherence and synergy between programmes and offices working towards the same or similar programme objectives.

answer: 列报方式的这一变化有助于减少孤立效应,促进为实现相同或类似方案目标的各方案和办事处之间的一致性和协同作用。

source: In addition, the nature and direction of the relationship between trust, accountability and government performance changes depending on the degree of the overall development of a country.

source: As well, the man would be made to understand several other gender equity reasons that apportion other sociocultural responsibilities for the woman, thus, granting the status of equality and mutual support which is not mistaken for the type of favours that demand appreciative returns in subordination.
standard: 同时应使男子了解，其他一些性别平等的理由使女人具有其他的社会文化责任，从而使其获得平等和相互支持的地位，但不应将获得此种地位视为提供了某种恩惠，从而要求对方处于从属地位作为回报。
answer: 男子还要了解其他一些两性公平的原因,这些原因分配了妇女的其他社会文化责任,从而给予平等地位和相互支持,这种地位和相互支持并不被错误地误认为是何种优惠,要求从属者得到赞赏的回报。

source: The Platform imagines a world where each woman and girl can exercise her freedoms and choices, and realize all her rights, such as to live free from violence, to go to school, to participate in decisions and to earn equal pay for equal work.
standard: 《行动纲要》设想的世界是每名妇女和女童都能享有她们的自由，自行选择，并实现她们的权利，例如有权过着没有暴力的生活、有权上学、有权参与决策和享有同工同酬。
answer: 《纲要》设想了一个每个妇女和女孩都能行使其自由和选择,并实现其所有权利的世界,如免于暴力生活、上学、参与决策和同工同酬。

source: To provide women with access to productive resources has a direct and positive impact on economic growth and on reducing poverty, while increasing women's economic opportunities and empowerment.
standard: 使妇女获得生产资源对经济增长和减少贫穷有着直接和积极的影响，同时能增加妇女的经济机会和权能。
answer: 为妇女提供获得生产资源的机会对经济增长和减贫具有直接和积极的影响,同时增加妇女的经济机会和赋予妇女权力。

answer: 在这次会议上,南方共同市场成员国和联系国总统商定了一项特别公报及其联合公报中关于马尔维纳斯群岛问题的一段。

source: In this regard, it is proposed that three new posts of Disarmament, Demobilization and Reintegration Officer (P-3) be established to carry out the mandate in the newly constructed integrated sector headquarters in Kaga Bandoro, Bouar and Bria.

source: Consistent and universal implementation of the State-level concept will further strengthen the efficiency and effectiveness of the IAEA safeguards system and will thus contribute to global non-proliferation efforts.

answer: 一致和普遍实施国家一级概念将进一步加强原子能机构保障监督制度的效率和成效,从而有助于全球不扩散努力。

source: Please also indicate what measures have been taken to tackle child labour, bearing in mind that considerably more girls than boys have fallen victim to the practice.
standard: 还请说明采取了哪些措施来解决童工问题，谨记沦为童工的女童远多于男童。
answer: 另请说明已采取哪些措施解决童工问题,铭记沦为童工的女童比男童多得多。

source: Please indicate whether measures have been taken to strengthen gender-sensitive screening and referral processes at border points to prevent women and girls from being subjected to torture, rape and sexual and gender-based exploitation by traffickers upon arrival in the State party.
standard: 请说明是否在边防点采取措施加强对性别问题有敏感认识的筛查和转介流程，以防止妇女和女童在到达缔约国后受贩运者的折磨、强奸以及基于性和性别的剥削。
answer: 请说明是否已采取措施,加强边境点对性别问题有敏感认识的甄别和转介程序,以防止贩运者在抵达缔约国时对妇女和女孩实施酷刑、强奸以及性剥削和基于性别的剥削。

source: While participants welcomed the significant progress in improving women's access to education, those gains had not translated into sufficient economic empowerment for women.
standard: 与会者欢迎在改善妇女获得教育方面取得的重大进展，但这些成果并没有充分转化为妇女的经济权能。
answer: 与会者欢迎在增加妇女受教育的机会方面取得的重大进展,但这些成就并没有转化为赋予妇女足够的经济权力。

source: 47. In addition, during its sessions, if held in New York, the Committee would be able to organize briefings for delegations, presenting its main recommendations and outputs in a non-technical way and thus ensuring that its messages would be reflected in the intergovernmental processes.
standard: 47. 此外，如果届会在纽约举行，委员会在此期间能够为各代表团举办情况通报会，以非技术方式介绍主要建议和产出，从而确保其信息反映在政府间进程中。
answer: 47. 此外,在届会期间,如果在纽约举行,委员会将能够为代表团组织简报会,以非技术性方式提出其主要建议和产出,从而确保其信息在政府间进程中得到反映。

source: Given that the Committee is the only United Nations body dealing exclusively with tax matters, there are strong synergies and linkages between its work and the financing for development follow-up process.
standard: 鉴于委员会是专门处理税务问题的唯一联合国机构，其工作与发展筹资后续进程之间有很大的协同效应和联系。
answer: 鉴于委员会是联合国唯一专门处理税务问题的机构,委员会的工作与发展筹资后续进程之间有很强的协同作用和联系。

source: Furthermore, in order to ensure comparability with the contractor's financial statements of previous years, as well as with the financial statements of other contractors, all financial statements, including the financial statement to be included in the annual report required under section 10 of annex 4 to the Regulations, should be provided in a format consistent with international accounting standard 1.
standard: 此外，为确保同往年的承包者财务报表以及其他承包者财务报表具有可比性，所有财务报表，包括《规章》附件4第10节规定的年度报告中应列入的财务报表，均应采纳符合国际会计标准第1号的格式。
answer: 此外,为了确保与承包者往年财务报表以及其他承包者财务报表的可比性,所有财务报表,包括将列入《规章》附件4第10节所要求的年度报告的财务报表,均应以符合国际会计标准1的格式提供。

source: The overall objective of the events, which are held alongside meetings of the Conference of the Parties to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change, is to provide a platform for cross-sectoral collaboration and coordination by bringing together and connecting stakeholders from different land-use sectors such as forestry, agriculture, mountains, water and planning, as well as funding organizations and the media.
standard: 在联合国气候变化框架公约缔约方大会会议期间举办的这些活动的总体目标是为跨部门协作和协调提供一个平台，以把来自不同土地使用部门(例如林业、农业、山区、水和规划及筹资组织和媒体)的利益攸关方汇集和联系起来。
answer: 这些活动与联合国气候变化框架公约缔约方会议同时举行,其总体目标是通过汇集和联系林业、农业、山区、水和规划等不同土地利用部门的利益攸关方以及供资组织和媒体,为跨部门合作与协调提供一个平台。

source: Among high-technology services, the fastest development has been seen in communications and information technology services, which have grown 3.3-fold over the past five years, with growth of 24.5 per cent last year.
standard: 在高科技服务业中，通讯和信息技术服务业发展最快，过去五年来增长了3.3倍，去年增长率为24.5%。
answer: 在高技术服务中,通信和信息技术服务的发展最快,在过去五年中增长了3.3倍,去年增长了24.5%。

source: As a result, the share of GDP attributable to small business has grown from 31 to 56 per cent since 2000, while its share of industrial production has increased from 12.9 to 31.1 per cent.
standard: 结果，自2000年以来，国内生产总值中小企业所占份额已由31%增加到56%，而小企业占工业生产的份额也由12.9%增至31.1%。
answer: 因此,2000年以来,小企业在国内生产总值中所占份额从31%增加到56%,工业生产所占份额从12.9%增加到31.1%。

source: It is not only our duty but also a duty owed by the international community to those who sacrificed their lives in the battle against Nazism for the sake of peace and the triumph of human ideals.
standard: 这不仅是我们的义务，也是国际社会对在反纳粹战争中为和平与人类理想献身的人们应尽的义务。
answer: 这不仅是我们的责任,也是国际社会对那些为了和平和人类理想的胜利而在反对纳粹主义的斗争中献出生命的人所应承担的责任。

source: The General Assembly resolution on combating glorification of Nazism, neoNazism and other practices that contribute to fuelling contemporary forms of racism, racial discrimination, xenophobia and related intolerance, adopted on the initiative of the Russian Federation on 18 December 2014 at the sixty-ninth session of the General Assembly, was also aimed at preserving historical memory and forestalling any attempt to distort or falsify the outcome of the Second World War in the interests of political expediency.
standard: 2014年12月18日，大会第六十九届会议通过了俄罗斯联邦提出的关于打击美化纳粹主义、新纳粹主义及其他助长当代形式种族主义、种族歧视、仇外心理和相关不容忍行为的做法的决议，其目的同样是要保存历史记忆，并制止任何为政治上的权宜之计而歪曲或篡改第二次世界大战结果的企图。
answer: 大会第六十九届会议2014年12月18日经俄罗斯联邦倡议通过的大会关于打击美化纳粹主义、新纳粹主义和其他助长当代形式种族主义、种族歧视、仇外心理和相关不容忍行为的做法的决议,也旨在保存历史记忆,防止为政治权宜之计歪曲或伪造第二次世界大战成果的任何企图。

standard: 7. 还决定委员会作为联合国系统处理毒品相关事项的核心决策机构，应通过以开放参与的方式处理所有组织事项和实质性事项来领导这一进程，并在这方面请大会主席在此进程中提供支持和指导并持续参与；
answer: 7. 还决定麻委会作为联合国系统内处理毒品相关事项的中央决策机构,应领导这一进程,以不限成员名额的方式处理所有组织和实质性事项,并在这方面邀请大会主席支持、指导和继续参与这一进程;

source: Barriers to accessing justice should be addressed, including the absence of justice services owing to financial constraints and infrastructure gaps or damage; weak institutional capacity; the costs associated with accessing justice systems; lack of awareness, legal aid, assistance and information; lack of legal recognition; and the absence of confidence in judicial integrity and court procedures.
standard: 应当解决妨碍司法救济的障碍，包括因财政困难和基础设施欠缺或破损而造成的司法服务缺失；机构能力薄弱；求助于司法系统所涉及的费用；缺乏意识、法律援助、协助和信息；缺乏法律承认；以及对司法廉正和法院程序缺乏信心。

standard: 我们敦促联合国会员国加倍努力，按照其对国际法(包括人道主义法和人权法)承担的义务，并依照联合国有关决议，各自并共同追究占领国以色列对其所有违法行为的责任，并迫使其遵守法律。

source: When illegally obtained or diverted goods are (re)introduced into licit markets through counterfeit documentation or corruption, the tracing of criminal activity can be extremely challenging.

answer: 非法获得或转移的货物通过伪造证件或腐败进入合法市场时,追查犯罪活动可能非常困难。

source: The licit market effectively conceals the illicit origin of the trafficked product.

answer: 合法市场有效地掩盖了被贩运产品的非法来源。

source: Because special attention must be paid to the especially vulnerable situation of these children, the Model Strategies and Practical Measures are aimed at not only improving the effectiveness of the criminal justice system in preventing and responding to violence against children, but also at protecting children against any violence that may result from their contact with the justice system.

The Committee calls upon the State party to institute comprehensive mechanisms to ensure that all children born in the State party, in particular in rural areas, are registered at birth, as a means of preventing statelessness and to ensure their access to citizenship and education, health and other basic services.
standard: 27. 委员会呼吁缔约国制定全面机制，务使所有在缔约国出生的婴儿特别是在农村地区出生的婴儿都在出生时能够得到登记，以此防止儿童失去国籍并确保他们能够拥有国籍和教育、保健及其他各项基本服务。
answer: 27. 委员会吁请缔约国建立全面机制,确保所有在缔约国出生的儿童,特别是在农村地区出生的儿童在出生时得到登记,以此防止无国籍状态,并确保他们获得公民身份、教育、保健和其他基本服务。

source: As the listing is maintained on the basis of the recommendation of the Ombudsperson, which in turn arises from the analysis in the comprehensive report, it is crucial for the fairness of the process that the reasons provided be consistent with the observations, analysis and findings of the Ombudsperson.
standard: 由于保留列名依据的是监察员的建议，而监察员的建议出自综合报告中的分析，提供的理由与监察员的意见、分析和调查结果一致对程序的公正性至关重要。
answer: 列名是根据监察员的建议维持的,而建议又来自综合报告的分析,因此,为使程序公平,提供的理由与监察员的意见、分析和调查结果保持一致至关重要。

source: What matters is that such moves are being pushed forward in an undisguised manner as part of preparations for a pre-emptive attack on the DPRK in the run-up to the sixty-fifth anniversary of the conclusion of the shackling and sycophantic south Korea-U.S. "mutual defence pact".
standard: 重要的是，这类举动正在以赤裸裸的方式向前推进，这是在既相互束缚、又谄媚讨好的南朝鲜-美国"共同防御条约"签订六十五周年之前对朝鲜民主主义人民共和国发动先发制人攻击的准备工作的一部分。

source: It is nonsensical to allow another long period of the tragedy to last, although the nation has spent 70 years in misfortune and pain.

source: Constitution of the Republic, art. 12 (4): The rules and principles of general or common international law or of conventional international law, validly approved or ratified, take precedence, after their entry into force in international and domestic legal systems, over all domestic legislative and regulatory acts of infra-constitutional value
standard: 共和国《宪法》第12条第4款规定：获得有效批准或核准，在国际和国内生效的一般或普通国际或公约国际法的规则和原则优于所有具有准宪法地位的国内立法和规范性法规。
answer: 共和国《宪法》第12条第(4)款:经有效批准或批准的一般国际法或习惯国际法或常规国际法的规则和原则,在其对国际和国内法律制度生效后,优先于所有符合宪法价值的国内立法和法规;

source: Expressing concern at the unprecedented Ebola outbreak that has affected West Africa in the past months, and alarmed at the numerous deaths that have resulted, especially of multiple members of the same family and in the most vulnerable groups, such as health-care workers and women,
standard: 表示关切在过去几个月中影响西非的埃博拉的空前爆发，对所造成的大量死亡感到震惊，特别是同一家庭出现多人死亡，且在最脆弱群体(如医务工作者和妇女)中也造成大量死亡，
answer: 表示关切在过去几个月里影响西非的前所未有的埃博拉疫情爆发,并震惊地看到造成众多死亡,特别是同一家庭的多个成员以及保健工作者和妇女等最弱势群体死亡,

source: Producing trained legal personnel with the knowledge required in today's world is one of the aims of judicial reform, which will ensure the protection of citizens' rights and legal interests.
standard: 根据现代标准培训法律人员是司法改革的任务之一，其成功落实将确保公民的权力和合法利益得到保护。
answer: 培养具有当今世界所需知识的训练有素的法律人员是司法改革的目标之一,司法改革将确保保护公民权利和法律利益。

source: Non-governmental organizations and national human rights institutions are working to inform the public about international law, provide instruction for the public on the protection of human rights, and carrying out national plans of action to implement the recommendations of United Nations treaty bodies, all of which is creating conditions conducive to further improvement of Uzbeks' legal culture.
standard: 非政府组织与国家人权机构共同开展工作，提高人口对国际法规范的认识，提供人权保护领域的教育，为执行联合国条约机构的建议实施国家行动计划，这为建立并进一步加强人口的法律文化创造了条件。
answer: 非政府组织和国家人权机构正在努力向公众宣传国际法,向公众提供有关保护人权的指导,并执行国家行动计划,落实联合国条约机构的建议,所有这些都为进一步改善乌兹别克的法律文化创造了有利条件。

source: Any attempt to sign the so-called "treaty" with the so-called "republic of Abkhazia" is therefore a flagrant violation of international law and constitutes an illegal action devoid of legal consequences, in full breach of the fundamental norms and principles of international law, namely, sovereignty, the inviolability of borders, territorial integrity and the good-faith fulfilment of international commitments.
standard: 因此，与所谓的"阿布哈兹共和国"签订所谓"条约"的任何企图都是公然违反国际法的行为，是不具任何法律后果的非法行动，完全违反了国际法的基本准则和原则，即主权、边界不可侵犯性、领土完整和对国际承诺的真诚遵守。
answer: 签署所谓“阿布哈兹共和条约”的任何企图都公然违反国际法,构成没有法律后果的非法行动,完全违反国际法的基本准则和原则,即主权、边界不可侵犯、领土完整和真诚履行国际承诺。

source: As they had done at the second Summit, States adopted, at the third Summit, a special declaration on nuclear disarmament, this one specifically on the urgent need for a nuclear-weapon-free world, in which it was reiterated that OPANAL was the specialized body of CELAC for nuclear disarmament.
standard: 各国如同在第二次首脑会议上那样，在第三届首脑会议上通过一项关于核裁军的特别宣言，其中特别提到迫切需要建立无核武器的世界，并重申拉加禁核组织是拉加共同体关于核裁军的专门机构。
answer: 与第二次首脑会议一样,各国在第三次首脑会议上通过了一项关于核裁军的特别宣言,该宣言具体涉及建立一个无核武器世界的迫切需要,其中重申拉加禁核组织是拉加共同体核裁军的专门机构。

source: In 2011, the former OPANAL Secretary-General, Gioconda Ubeda Rivera, participated in the IAEA event entitled "Forum on experience of possible relevance to the creation of a nuclear-weapon-free zone in the Middle East", held in Vienna on 21 and 22 November.

answer: 2011年,前拉加禁核组织秘书长Gioconda Ubeda Rivera参加了原子能机构11月21日和22日在维也纳举行的题为“与建立中东无核武器区可能相关的经验论坛”的活动。

source: To minimize the discrimination against women, the Government Organizations and Non-Governmental Organizations are working together by conducting awareness-raising programmes and implementing development tasks.

answer: 为了最大限度地减少对妇女的歧视,政府组织和非政府组织正在共同努力,实施提高认识方案,执行发展任务。

source: In this context, it is crucial that the Security Council and the international community fully mobilize to address the widespread and systematic persecution by Daesh of individuals belonging to ethnic and religious groups and other minorities and show their joint commitment to an inclusive Middle East rich in diversity and history in its various cultures and religions.
standard: 在这一背景下，安全理事会和国际社会必须积极行动起来，打击伊黎伊斯兰国针对族裔和宗教团体及其他少数群体所属个人进行的普遍性和系统性迫害，并表达对一个具有包容性、而且拥有各种悠久文化和宗教的中东的共同承诺。
answer: 在这方面,至关重要的是,安全理事会和国际社会必须充分动员起来,处理泽西族个人对属于族裔和宗教群体和其他少数群体的个人的广泛和有系统的迫害,并表明他们共同致力于建立一个包容性的中东,中东具有各种文化和宗教的多样性和历史。

source: Reaffirming that the Charter, in Article 33, paragraph 1, stipulates that the parties to any dispute, the continuance of which is likely to endanger the maintenance of international peace and security, shall, first of all, seek a solution by negotiation, enquiry, mediation, conciliation, arbitration, judicial settlement, resort to regional agencies or arrangements, or other peaceful means of their own choice,
standard: 重申《宪章》第三十三条第一项的规定，即任何争端之当事国，于争端之继续存在足以危及国际和平与安全之维持时，应尽先以谈判、调查、调停、和解、公断、司法解决、区域机关或区域办法之利用，或各该国自行选择之其他和平方法，求得解决，
answer: 重申《宪章》第三十三条第一项规定,任何争端的继续有可能危及维持国际和平与安全的维持,争端的当事方首先应通过谈判、调查、调停、和解、仲裁、司法解决、诉诸区域机构或安排或自行选择的其他和平手段寻求解决办法,

source: In line with program-based budgeting, there should also be deliberate efforts to allocate 15 per cent of the health budget to family planning and address all demand and supply oriented barriers of access to, a use of family planning as per the Maputo Plan of Action.
standard: 按照基于方案的预算编制办法，还应付出专门努力，将卫生预算的15%划拨给计划生育，并解决以供需为导向获取和根据《马普托行动计划》利用计划生育的所有障碍。
answer: 还应根据以方案为基础的预算编制,认真努力将保健预算的15%用于计划生育,并解决所有供求障碍,以便按照《马普托行动计划》,利用计划生育。

source: Planned Parenthood Federation of America (PPFA) is pleased to submit the below statement on behalf of the National Youth Consortium on the post-2015 development agenda for the forty-eighth Session of the Commission on Population and Development on the priority theme of "Realizing the future we want: integrating population issues into sustainable development, including in the post-2015 development agenda".

answer: 美洲计划生育联合会谨代表全国青年联合会提交以下声明,内容涉及人口与发展委员会第四十八届会议2015年后发展议程,优先主题是“实现我们希望的未来:将人口问题纳入可持续发展,包括2015年后发展议程”。

source: At the same time, Israel continues unabated with settlement activities in Occupied East Jerusalem, aggressively targeting the city with this illegal campaign.

source: At the same time, the Division has continued to deepen its relationship with core constituencies through state-of-the-art innovative technologies, deepening the possibilities offered by enhanced interaction with such audiences, while continuing to serve the public on the other side of the digital divide through more traditional mediums such as publications in print.
standard: 与此同时，该司继续通过先进的创新技术，深化与核心受众的关系，深化与这些受众加强互动带来的可能性，同时继续通过印刷出版物等较传统的媒体为数字鸿沟另一侧的公众服务。
answer: 与此同时,该司继续通过最先进的创新技术深化与核心赞助者的关系,深化与这些受众加强互动提供的各种可能性,同时继续通过印刷出版物等较传统的媒介为数字鸿沟的另一侧的公众服务。

source: We thus reiterate our call on the Security Council to unequivocally reiterate its demand to Israel, the occupying Power, to cease all settlement activities throughout the Occupied Palestinian Territory, including East Jerusalem, in accordance with international law and the relevant Security Council resolutions.
standard: 因此，我们再次呼吁安全理事会再次明确要求占领国以色列遵守国际法和有关安全理事会决议，停止在包括东耶路撒冷在内的整个巴勒斯坦被占领土上的一切定居活动。

source: As such, Israel bears ultimate responsibility for the presence of the settlers on our land and for all of their crimes, including all acts of terror.
