source: The net increase of $2,281,500, primarily under contractual services and furniture and equipment, reflects the proposed inward redeployment of centralized operational resources for the Office of Human Resources Management that were reflected under the Human Resources Information Systems Section (component 5) for the biennium 2014-2015.

answer: 净增加2 281 500美元,主要是订约承办事务以及家具和设备项下增加2 281 500美元,原因是2014-2015两年期人力资源信息系统科(构成部分5)项下所列人力资源管理厅集中业务资源拟议调入。

source: Dear brother King Hamad bin Issa Al Khalifa, King of Bahrain;

source: 9. The Peace and Security Council and the members of the Security Council commended the contribution of MONUSCO, including its Force Intervention Brigade, in furthering peace and stability in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and welcomed the commitment of troop-contributing countries to MONUSCO in the fulfilment of its mandate for the protection of civilians.
standard: 9. 和平与安全理事会和安全理事会成员赞扬联刚稳定团及其干预旅对促进刚果民主共和国和平与稳定的贡献，并欢迎联刚稳定团的部队派遣国承诺履行其保护平民的任务。
answer: 9. 和平与安全理事会和安全理事会成员赞扬联刚稳定团,包括其部队干预旅在促进刚果民主共和国和平与稳定方面作出的贡献,并欢迎部队派遣国承诺支持联刚稳定团履行其保护平民的任务。

source: The session will provide a unique opportunity for Member States to convey their vision of how to integrate the full spectrum of forests' contributions within the broader development agenda, as well as demonstrate their solid commitment to a strong arrangement beyond 2015.
standard: 这届会议将提供一次独特机会，会员国可借此表达他们对如何将各类森林的贡献纳入发展议程大框架的看法，并表达他们对2015年后强有力安排的坚定承诺。
answer: 本届会议将为会员国提供一个独特的机会,以表达其愿景,即如何将森林的全部贡献纳入更广泛的发展议程,并表明其对2015年后强有力安排的坚定承诺。

answer: 临时议程临时议程临时议程临时议程

source: Reaffirming that parties to an armed conflict bear the primary responsibility to take all feasible steps to ensure the protection of affected civilians, including those who exercise their right to freedom of expression by seeking, receiving and disseminating information by different means, online as well as offline, in accordance with Article 19 of the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights,
standard: 重申武装冲突各方负有首要责任，采取一切可行步骤来确保受影响平民，包括根据《公民权利和政治权利国际公约》第十九条以不同方式在网上和网下寻找、收取和分发信息以行使表达自由权利的人，都得到保护，
answer: 重申武装冲突各方负有根据《公民权利和政治权利国际公约》第十九条采取一切可行步骤确保受影响的平民,包括那些通过在线和离线不同手段寻求、接收和传播信息以行使其言论自由权的平民得到保护的首要责任,

source: Following an OIOS audit, a policy on human rights methodology and training and a policy on OHCHR publications were adopted by the SMT and disseminated to staff in 2013.
standard: 2013年，在监督厅审计之后，一项关于人权方法和培训的政策以及一项关于人权高专办出版物的政策由高级管理团队通过，并分发至工作人员手中。
answer: 在监督厅进行审计后,高级管理小组通过了一项人权方法和培训政策以及关于人权高专办出版物的政策,并于2013年分发给工作人员。

source: Interviewees indicated that bringing together all information gathered in context of the universal periodic review, special procedures, the Human Rights Council, the treaty body system and work done by the Research and Right to Development Division remains a challenge.
standard: 受访者表示，将在普遍定期审议、特别程序、人权理事会、条约机构体系以及研究和发展权利处所开展工作的范围内采集到的所有资料汇编在一起，仍是一大挑战。
answer: 受访者指出,汇集在普遍定期审议、特别程序、人权理事会、条约机构系统范围内收集的所有信息以及研究和发展权利司所做的工作仍然是一项挑战。

source: 5. In coordination with the Decolonization Unit, the Department of Public Information arranged for the deployment of a press officer from the United Nations Information Centre in Canberra to cover the seminar.

answer: 5. 新闻部与非殖民化股协调,安排从联合国堪培拉新闻中心调派一名新闻干事报道讨论会。

source: The Committee of Experts is invited to take note of the report and to express its views on the operation and achievements of the regional committees and thematic groups.

answer: 请专家委员会注意该报告,并就各区域委员会和专题小组的运作和成就发表意见。

source: With high unemployment and depleted savings, vulnerable households in Liberia are hard-pressed to pay the costs for reopened schools.

answer: 高失业率和储蓄耗竭,利比里亚弱势家庭难以支付重新开放的学校的费用。

source: The Deputy Speaker has yet to appear before the Commission and the matter remains pending.
standard: 副议长尚未在委员会露面，该问题仍悬而未决。
answer: 副议长尚未到委员会出庭,此事尚待解决。

source: The present note contains information on the extensions of the country programmes for the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Ethiopia, Kyrgyzstan, Mozambique, United Republic of Tanzania, and Yemen.

answer: 本说明载有关于延长朝鲜民主主义人民共和国、埃塞俄比亚、吉尔吉斯斯坦、莫桑比克、坦桑尼亚联合共和国和也门国家方案的资料。

source: Subsidiary Body 2 of Main Committee II held five meetings between 7 and 18 May.
standard: 5月7日和18日，第二主要委员会第2附属机构举行了5次会议。
answer: 5月7日至18日,第二主要委员会第二附属机构举行了五次会议。

source: 1. The Secretary-General has received notification by a letter dated 19 May 2015 from the Permanent Representative of Georgia that, according to the agreement among the members of the Group of Eastern European States to rotate their membership in the United Nations Commission on International Trade Law among themselves, Georgia is relinquishing its seat in favour of the Czech Republic.
standard: 1. 秘书长接到2015年5月19日格鲁吉亚常驻代表来信通知说，根据东欧国家集团成员国间关于在联合国国际贸易法委员会中轮任的协议，格鲁吉亚现放弃其在委员会中的席位，拟由捷克共和国接任。
answer: 1. 秘书长收到格鲁吉亚常驻代表2015年5月19日的信,其中通知说,根据东欧国家集团成员之间关于轮流担任联合国国际贸易法委员会成员的协议,格鲁吉亚放弃其席位,让给捷克共和国。

source: He also proposed several times specific dates and alternative venues and meeting formats, all with a view to encouraging all states to participate in a further round of consultations to try and narrow differences on arrangements.
standard: 他还提出了几个具体日期、可选择的会议地点和会议形式，目的是鼓励所有国家参与新一轮协商，努力缩小关于会议安排的分歧。
answer: 他还数次提议具体日期、替代地点和会议形式,所有目的是鼓励所有国家参加另一轮磋商,尝试缩小在安排方面的分歧。

source: 3. It is the understanding of the secretariat of the Permanent Forum that those proposals, objectives, recommendations and areas of possible future action to be carried out by the United Nations, as set out below, will be implemented to the extent that resources from the regular budget and extrabudgetary resources are available.
standard: 3. 常设论坛秘书处的理解是，对于下列各项提案、目标、建议和联合国今后可能采取行动的领域，将在可用的经常预算资源和预算外资源范围内予以执行。
answer: 3. 常设论坛秘书处的理解是,联合国今后可能采取行动的下列提议、目标、建议和领域,将在可以得到经常预算和预算外资源的情况下予以执行。

source: Improving operating conditions in the productive sector and reaching those in the most vulnerable socioeconomic situations will be fundamental to the creation of quality jobs.
standard: 改善生产部门的工作条件和帮助社会经济状况最脆弱者对创造高质量的就业机会至关重要。
answer: 改善生产部门的经营条件,帮助最脆弱的社会经济处境中的那些人,对于创造高质量的就业机会至关重要。

source: Please indicate whether the implementation of a gender-sensitive sanitation policy in schools has been considered and whether other steps have been taken to ensure adequate sanitary facilities in schools, especially for girls.
standard: 请说明，是否已考虑在学校执行一项对性别问题有敏感认识的卫生政策，是否采取其他步骤确保学校拥有适足的卫生设施，尤其是为女孩提供的卫生设施。
answer: 请说明是否考虑在学校实施对性别问题有敏感认识的环境卫生政策,以及是否采取了其他步骤,确保学校,特别是女孩的卫生设施充足。

source: 1. Please provide information on measures taken to adopt anti-discrimination standards, in both legislative and policy frameworks, which define and protect against direct and indirect discrimination against women.
standard: 1. 请提供相关信息，说明在立法和政策框架内通过反歧视标准采取了哪些措施，该标准界定并保护针对妇女的直接和间接歧视行为。
answer: 1. 请提供资料,说明采取了哪些措施,在立法和政策框架中采用反歧视标准,界定并保护妇女免遭直接和间接歧视。

source: 7. Affirms that the costs of the remaining activities will be met from the resources of the capital master plan project;

answer: 如上文第7段所述,危险津贴应享待遇费用增加,部分抵消了国际工作人员总体较低费用。

source: Faced with the obligation that is equally binding on both sides to find a solution to the dispute, the United Kingdom has confirmed with this announcement that it is determined to engage in an arms build-up and warmongering.
standard: 上述宣布证实，面对寻求解决争端这一对双方有同等约束力的义务，联合王国却坚持增加军备和煽动战争。
answer: 面对双方同样具有约束力的寻求解决争端办法的义务,联合王国通过这项宣布确认,它决心进行军备集结和战争。

source: 1. Algeria considers that the creation of nuclear weapon-free zones (NWFZs), pursuant to Article VIII of the treaty on the non-proliferation of nuclear weapons (the NPT), effectively contributes to the consolidation of regional and international peace and security, and to the strengthening of the non-proliferation regime and achievement of the goals of nuclear disarmament.
standard: 1. 阿尔及利亚认为，实施《不扩散核武器条约》第八条之规定，建立无核武器区，可以有效巩固和平和地区及国际安全，强化核不扩散机制，实现消除核武器的目标。
answer: 1. 阿尔及利亚认为,根据《不扩散核武器条约》(《不扩散条约》)第八条建立无核武器区,切实有助于巩固区域和国际和平与安全,加强不扩散制度,实现核裁军目标。

source: 7. Algeria also notes that the final document of the Eighth Treaty Review Conference reaffirmed the continuing importance and validity of that resolution until its aims and objectives are attained.
standard: 7. 此外，阿尔及利亚提醒，第八次条约审议大会的最后文件重申了在目标达成之前该决议的重要性和有效性。
answer: 7. 阿尔及利亚还注意到,第八次条约审议大会最后文件重申,在该决议的宗旨和目标实现之前,该决议仍然具有重要性和有效性。

source: In order for an international commercial settlement agreement to be considered valid, it must fulfil the same validity requirements as those that apply to contracts (capacity, consent free of defect, lawful purpose, legitimate cause and the formalities required).
standard: 为了使一项国际商事和解协议被认为是有效的，该协议必须符合与适用于合同的那些要求（行为能力，无瑕疵同意、合法目的、正当理由和规定的手续）同样的效力要求。
answer: 一项国际商事和解协议若要被视为有效,就必须满足适用于合同的同样有效要求(能力、无缺陷的同意、合法目的、合法理由和所需手续)。

source: They also registered the largest gain (10 percentage points) in meeting and exceeding requirements ratings since 2013.
standard: 他们还是自2013年以来达到或超过要求两类评级中涨幅最高(10个百分点)的类别。
answer: 自2013年以来,它们在达到和超过需求评级方面也取得了最大的增长(10个百分点)。

source: 77. Resource mobilization remains a significant challenge.
standard: 77. 调集资源依然是一项重大挑战。
answer: 77. 资源调动仍然是一个重大挑战。

source: Although there are binding and non-binding regulations, the fact of the matter is that there are no sanctions in the case of a disaster caused by a space object carrying a nuclear load, other than what we might understand by "reparation in respect of the damage", in the words of the Convention on International Liability for Damage Caused by Space Objects.
standard: 虽然章程有约束性的，也有非约束性的，但事实上，除了我们可以用《空间物体所造成损害的国际责任公约》的措辞理解为"对损害的赔偿"之外，对某一载有核动力源的空间物体造成了灾害的情况，并不存在任何制裁。
answer: 虽有具有约束力和不具约束力的条例,但事实是,在空间物体造成灾难时,除了用《空间物体所造成损害的国际责任公约》中的“赔偿损害”一词来理解,我们没有制裁。

source: In the section below, major advances are presented in the following space debris-related activities conducted by JAXA during 2014:

source: Such an approach will need an institutional framework and structures that will enable it.

answer: 这样一种方法需要有一个体制框架和结构,使其能够发挥作用。

source: 62. Institutions at all levels, including Governments, the United Nations and civil society organizations, will need to learn how to remain effective and relevant in this context.
standard: 62. 各级机构，包括政府、联合国和民间社会组织都需要学习如何在这样的背景下继续有效和切合实际地开展工作。

source: In this context, one of the most significant contributions of the workshop has been the development of fact sheets, undertaken by the Ozone Secretariat according to a rigorous peer review process, distributed among participants in the workshop even before its opening.
standard: 在这一背景下，本次研讨会最重大的贡献之一是臭氧秘书处编制的概况介绍，其经过了同行的严格审查，在研讨会开始前就已分发给研讨会与会代表。
answer: 在这方面,讲习班最重要的贡献之一是编制了概况介绍,由臭氧秘书处根据严格的同行审议程序编制,甚至在讲习班开幕前就分发给讲习班参加者。

answer: 碳氢化合物在自成一体的冷藏柜和较小的商用冷藏设备中广泛使用。

source: 29F.35 The regular budget resources are complemented by extrabudgetary resources estimated at $19,067,200, which would provide for the continuation of 60 temporary posts (1 P-5, 3 P-4, 6 P-3, 1 General Service (Principal level) and 49 General Service (Other level)) in support of the extrabudgetary activities carried out in the Financial Management Resources Service to deliver the programme of work and outputs described in paragraph 29F.31 above.
standard: 29F.35 经常预算资源得到约为19 067 200美元的预算外资源的补充，将用于续设60个临时员额(1个P-5、3个P-4、6个P-3、1个一般事务(特等)和49个一般事务(其他职等))，为财务资源管理处开展预算外活动提供支助,以交付上文第29F.31段载列的工作方案和产出。
answer: 29F.35 经常预算资源得到预算外资源的补充,预算外资源估计数为19 067 200美元,将用于续设60个临时员额(1个P-5、3个P-4、6个P-3、1个一般事务(特等)和49个一般事务(其他职等)),以支持财务管理资源处为执行上文第29F.31段所述的工作方案和产出而开展的预算外活动。

source: The Establishments Code (section 31:1:3 and 4) provides that public officers who have been prosecuted on bribery or corruption charges may be suspended.

answer: 《机构法》(第311:3和4节)规定,因受贿赂或腐败指控而被起诉的公职人员可以停职。

source: The delivery of assistance related to the contribution of $3 billion from Saudi Arabia, announced in March 2014, is expected to begin imminently in cooperation with France.

answer: 此外,几个巴勒斯坦武装团体继续在难民营内外在该国活动。

source: Its ultimate objective is to extinguish the nuclear threat on the basis of mutual responsibilities and rights.
standard: 《条约》的最终目标是在各国相互的责任与权利的基础上对核危害进行遏制：
answer: 其最终目标是在相互责任和权利的基础上消除核威胁。

source: Since then, the vast majority of the international community has been convinced of the overriding need to eliminate nuclear weapons for humanitarian reasons.
standard: 从此，国际社会中的大多数确信，从人道主义需要的角度来看，消除核武器迫在眉睫。
answer: 自那时以来,国际社会绝大多数人都深信,出于人道主义原因消除核武器是压倒一切的需要。

source: Since Ukrainian independence in 1991, the Government of Ukraine has assumed full responsibility for the fate of all its citizens, including those returning to its territory after deportation.
standard: 自乌克兰1991年独立以来，乌克兰政府负起了对其所有公民包括被驱逐后回到乌克兰境内的公民命运的全部责任。
answer: 自1991年乌克兰独立以来,乌克兰政府对其所有公民的命运承担全部责任,包括那些被驱逐后返回其领土的公民。

source: As of now, 21 representatives of the Crimean Tatar community have been kidnapped, 3 of whom were found dead, and more than 130 criminal cases against Crimean Tatars have been filed.
standard: 到目前为止，有21名克里米亚鞑靼族群代表遭到绑架，其中3人被发现已死亡，还提出了130多个针对克里米亚鞑靼人的刑事案件。
answer: 至今,克里米亚鞑靼社区的21名代表被绑架,其中3人被发现死亡,起诉克里米亚鞑靼人的刑事案件有130多起。

source: 39. Several challenges remain in fully realizing the benefits of sustainable development and balancing the three dimensions of sustainable development in the context of fisheries.
standard: 39. 在充分实现可持续发展的效益以及平衡渔业可持续发展的三个层面方面仍然存在一些挑战。
answer: 39. 在充分实现可持续发展的惠益和在渔业方面平衡可持续发展的三个层面方面仍然存在若干挑战。

source: In addition, the provisions of the Convention related to the conservation and management of marine living resources require taking into account the economic needs of coastal fishing communities, as well as nutritional needs.
standard: 此外，《公约》与养护和管理海洋生物资源有关的条款规定，须考虑沿海捕鱼社区的经济需要以及营养需要。
answer: 此外,《公约》有关养护和管理海洋生物资源的规定要求考虑到沿海捕鱼社区的经济需要和营养需要。

source: He reveals the premeditated nature of the attacks on civilians in Lebanon and Gaza, defends these attacks and speaks in a cold-blooded manner about his regime's readiness to go on repeated killing sprees, massacring thousands of civilians.
standard: 他揭示了对黎巴嫩和加沙地带平民的攻击有预谋的性质，维护这些袭击，并以冷血的方式谈论其政权随时准备重复杀人狂欢，屠杀成千上万的平民。
answer: 他揭露了在黎巴嫩和加沙袭击平民的预谋性质,为这些袭击辩护,并以冷酷无情的方式谈到黎巴嫩政权准备进行多次杀戮,屠杀数以千计的平民。

source: Referring to the decision taken by President Truman "to launch bombs against Hiroshima and Nagasaki, causing at the end the fatalities of 200,000", he added, "we are not there yet".
standard: "在提及杜鲁门总统决定"轰炸广岛和长崎，最后造成20万人死亡"时，他补充说："我们还没到这一步。
answer: 杜鲁门总统决定“向广岛和长崎发射炸弹,最后造成20万人死亡”,他补充说,“我们还没有到”。

source: We reiterate the call on the international community to uphold its responsibilities, especially the Security Council, to put an end to Israel's settlement colonization, destructive measures and collective punishment of the Palestinian people.
standard: 我们再次呼吁国际社会，特别是安全理事会履行其责任，制止以色列的定居点殖民做法、破坏性措施和对巴勒斯坦人民的集体惩罚。
answer: 我们再次呼吁国际社会,特别是安全理事会,履行其责任,结束以色列的定居殖民、破坏性措施和对巴勒斯坦人民的集体惩罚。

source: They submit that, without equal inheritance rights, the inability to benefit from land ownership has denied them access to mortgages and other forms of financial credit.
standard: 她们认为，没有平等的继承权，无法从土地所有权中受益，剥夺了她们获得抵押贷款和其他形式金融信贷的机会。
answer: 他们认为,没有平等的继承权,无法从土地所有权中受益,使他们无法获得抵押贷款和其他形式的金融信贷。

source: Furthermore, they request that the Committee recommend that the discriminatory provisions of the Local Customary Law (Declaration) (No 4.) Order be abolished and the provisions of the Indian Succession Act regarding inheritance and of the Probate and Administration of Estates Act regarding administration rights be applied to women who are still subject to customary inheritance rules.
standard: 此外，提交人还请委员会建议废除《地方习惯法》(公告)(第4号)法令中的歧视性条款，以及将《印巴人继承法》有关继承的条款以及《遗嘱认证和遗产管理法案》关于管理权的条款，适用于仍受制于继承习惯法规则的妇女。
answer: 此外,他们要求委员会建议废除《地方习惯法(宣言)(第4号)令》中的歧视性规定,《印第安人继承法》和《遗嘱和遗产管理法》中关于管理权的规定适用于仍然受习惯继承规则管辖的妇女。

source: We are committed to the pursuit of an international treaty that would put an end to the future production of fissile material for such purposes.
standard: 我们致力于达成一项禁止今后生产用于这些目的裂变材料国际条约。
answer: 我们致力于寻求达成一项国际条约,结束今后生产用于此类目的的裂变材料。

source: It makes clear that we will maintain only the minimum credible nuclear deterrent, under full political control, in the form of continuous-at-sea patrols by Vanguard-class submarines carrying Trident ballistic missiles with the fewest warheads since the introduction of our fleet of ballistic missile submarines capability in the 1960s.
standard: 该白皮书明确指出，自1960年代具备核动力弹道导弹潜艇能力以来，我们只用"前卫"级携带弹头最少的三叉戟弹道导弹潜艇在海上持续巡逻的方式，维持最低限度的可靠核威慑，并且完全处于政治控制之下。
answer: 它表明,我们将只保持最低限度的可信的核威慑,并在充分的政治控制下,采取由载有三叉戟弹道导弹的先锋级潜艇进行连续海上巡逻的形式,自1960年代我国建立弹道导弹潜艇舰队能力以来,弹头数量最少。

source: Welcome the efforts made by the facilitator to reconcile views among the States of the region in order to arrive at an agenda that enjoys consensus;
standard: 欢迎主持人为统一本区域各国意见以便就得到大家同意的议程达成一致所做出的努力。
answer: 欢迎调解人为在该区域各国之间调和各种观点所作的努力,以便达成一项协商一致的议程;

source: f. To encourage all Member States to report on their efforts to implement the 1995 Middle East Resolution.
standard: 鼓励所有会员国报告其为执行1995年中东决议做出的努力。
answer: f. 鼓励所有会员国报告它们为执行1995年中东决议所作的努力。

source: 3. Encourages Member States, based on the information on patterns of use and risks to the public, to continue to adopt appropriate measures aimed at reducing the supply of and demand for new psychoactive substances and amphetamine-type stimulants, including methamphetamine, in accordance with national legislation;
standard: 3. 鼓励会员国在使用状况信息和对公众风险的基础上，根据本国立法，继续采取适当的措施，旨在减少新型精神活性物质和苯丙胺类兴奋剂（包括甲基苯丙胺）的供应和需求；
answer: 3. 鼓励会员国根据关于使用模式和公众面临的风险的信息,继续采取适当措施,根据国家立法减少新的精神活性物质和苯丙胺类兴奋剂,包括甲基苯丙胺的供求;

source: According to article 76 of the Constitution, the Parliament may determine the privileges and immunities of its members, who enjoy immunities from arrest and attendance in any civil cause or matter (section 7, Privileges, Immunities and Powers of the Maneaba ni Maungatabu Act 1986).

source: This has made it evident that the humanitarian imperative must be put at the centre of all deliberations, obligations and commitments with regard to nuclear disarmament and non-proliferation, including in the context of the Non-Proliferation Treaty.
standard: 这足以表明，人道主义必要性必须是与核裁军和不扩散有关的所有审议、义务和承诺的核心，包括在《不扩散条约》框架内。
answer: 这表明,在核裁军和核不扩散的所有审议、义务和承诺中,包括在《不扩散条约》的范围内,必须把人道主义当务之急置于中心位置。

source: In turn, this awareness underscores the urgency with which States parties must implement the obligations and commitments made in the Treaty and through its review process for the achievement of a world without nuclear weapons.
standard: 这种认识反过来凸显了缔约国必须履行《条约》规定的义务及所做承诺以及通过其审议进程实现没有核武器的世界的紧迫性。
answer: 反过来,这种认识又突出表明,缔约国迫切需要履行在《条约》中和通过《条约》审议进程承担的义务和作出的承诺,以实现一个没有核武器的世界。

source: 12.63 The net decrease is due mainly to the freezing of recruitment against an established post ($187,800) and the proposed reduction under travel of staff, as reflected in paragraph 12.20 of the present report.

source: Since 2006, the response of the United Kingdom has been that it will not initiate talks with Spain on sovereignty issues without the consent of the local Gibraltar authorities.

answer: 自2006年以来,联合王国的答复是,未经直布罗陀地方当局同意,联合王国不会开始与西班牙就主权问题进行谈判。

source: The remaining relate to (a) more clearly defining the ownership of the contract management process, and enhancing the policies and procedures manual and the internal control framework thereon; (b) introducing an integrated contract management system; (c) designing and implementing preventive controls to enforce contract award approval requirements; (d) implementing stronger accounts payable controls; and (e) enhancing the vendor performance assessment process.
standard: 其余建议涉及：(a) 更明确地界定合同管理流程归谁负责，强化政策和程序手册及其内部控制框架；(b) 采用综合合同管理系统；(c) 设计和实施预防性控制，以加强合同奖励审批要求；(d) 实施更有力的应付款控制；(e) 加强供应商业绩评估流程。
answer: 其余部分涉及:(a) 更明确地界定合同管理流程的所有权,并加强这方面的政策和程序手册及内部控制框架;(b) 采用综合合同管理制度;(c) 设计和执行预防性控制措施,以执行授标核准要求;(d) 实行更有力的应付账款控制;(e) 改进供应商履约情况评估程序。

source: The Prime Minister expressed fear that support for radical groups or a return to military hostilities would grow if the refugee population lost hope that a political solution could be found.

answer: 外交部长们考虑到这些国家在运输,包括过境运输领域的巨大潜力,表示高度重视发展运输和通讯领域的合作。

source: Discussing international foreign policy issues, the parties noted the importance of their efforts aimed at ensuring peace, security and stability as well as establishing a climate of trust and mutual understanding at the international and regional levels, in particular in Central Asia, the Caspian region, the South Caucasus and the Middle East.
standard: 三方讨论国际外交政策问题时指出，必须作出努力，在国际和区域两级，特别是在中亚、里海区域、南高加索和中东确保和平、安全和稳定以及建立信任和相互谅解的气氛。
answer: 双方在讨论国际外交政策问题时指出,必须努力确保和平、安全与稳定,并在国际和区域各级,特别是在中亚、里海区域、南高加索和中东,营造信任和相互理解的气氛。

source: It is undeniable that fostering future generations of South Sudanese who are well nourished, healthy and educated is a precondition for sustainable development and for the effective rule of law, whereby all are equal before the law and are able to demand that their rights be upheld.
standard: 不可否认，可持续发展和有效法治的前提是南苏丹人的后代要营养丰富、健康而且受过教育；在这样的环境下，人人在法律面前平等，能要求维护权利。
answer: 不可否认,培养营养丰富、健康和受过教育的南苏丹后代,是可持续发展和有效的法治的先决条件,根据法治,人人在法律面前平等,能够要求维护其权利。

source: The central bank maintains a dual exchange rate system, with the official exchange rate at 3 South Sudanese pounds to the United States dollar, while the market rate is rapidly depreciating, having reached around 9 pounds to the dollar.
standard: 中央银行保持双重汇率制，官方汇率为3南苏丹镑兑1美元，但市场汇率迅速贬值，达到大约9镑兑1美元。
answer: 中央银行维持双重汇率制度,官方汇率为3南苏丹镑兑1美元,市场汇率迅速贬值,达到9英镑兑1美元左右。

source: The Commission heard a statement by the Vice-President of the Economic and Social Council on the contribution of population and development issues to the theme of the annual ministerial review in 2015.

answer: 委员会听取了经济及社会理事会副主席关于人口与发展问题对2015年度部长级审查主题的贡献的发言。

source: As the international community charts a course for the post-2015 era, population dynamics and reproductive health are central to sustainable development and must be an integral part of development planning and poverty reduction strategies.
standard: 随着国际社会拟订2015年后发展道路，人口动态和生殖健康对可持续发展具有核心重要性，必须将其作为发展规划和减贫战略的有机组成部分。
answer: 国际社会在为2015年后时代指明方向时,人口动态和生殖健康是可持续发展的核心,必须成为发展规划和减贫战略的组成部分。

source: The framework for the implementation of international sanctions in the Republic of Lithuania is established by the Law on the Implementation of Economic and Other International Sanctions (2004).
standard: 在立陶宛共和国境内执行国际制裁的框架是《执行经济制裁和其他国际制裁法》(2004年)确立的。
answer: 立陶宛共和国执行国际制裁的框架由《执行经济制裁和其他国际制裁法》(2004年)确立。

source: Underscoring that any use or threat of use of nuclear weapons would seriously undermine the very foundations, integrity, credibility and thus sustainability of the Treaty and would be contrary to its object and purpose,
standard: 强调任何使用或威胁使用核武器的行为都会严重破坏《条约》赖以维系的基础、其完整性、可信性，并进而破坏其可持续性，并将违背其目标和宗旨，
answer: 强调使用或威胁使用核武器的任何行为都将严重损害《条约》的根本基础、完整性、可信性和可持续性,违背《条约》的目标和宗旨,

source: Therefore, as any use or threat of use of nuclear weapons would be contrary to Article 2 (4) of the Charter of the United Nations, the general principles of international law and the rules and regulations of international humanitarian law and would constitute a crime against humanity, there should be an assurance against the use or threat of use of these illegal, inhumane and illegitimate weapons.
standard: 因此，鉴于任何使用或威胁使用核武器的行为都将违反《联合国宪章》第二条第四项、国际法的一般原则和国际人道主义法的规则和条例，并将构成危害人类罪，应该就不使用或威胁使用这类非法、不人道和不正当的武器作出保证。
answer: 因此,由于使用或威胁使用核武器违反《联合国宪章》第二条第四项、国际法一般原则以及国际人道主义法规则和条例,构成危害人类罪,因此,应当保证不使用或威胁使用这些非法、不人道和非法武器。

source: The Chamber's initiatives contributed indirectly to the achievement of the Millennium Development Goals.
standard: 本商会的各项倡议对千年发展目标的实现做出间接贡献。
answer: 会议厅的倡议间接促进了千年发展目标的实现。

standard: 政府还应为私营部门成为增长的主要引擎创造有利条件，包括制订强有力的法律和法规框架，促进相关机构的协调和问责，以及通过审慎的政策确保宏观经济和金融的稳定。
answer: 各国政府还应创造有利的环境,使私营部门成为增长的主要动力,包括强有力的法律和监管框架、更好的机构协调和问责以及通过审慎政策实现宏观经济和金融稳定。

source: Such practices have created a fertile environment for terrorism, and they are fanning the flames of extremism and sectarianism.

answer: 这种做法为恐怖主义创造了一个肥沃的环境,正在煽动极端主义和宗派主义的火焰。

source: 13. The Ministers further called upon the African Union Commission, the Economic Commission for Africa and the African Development Bank to organize a multi-stakeholder consultation on the first 10-year implementation plan of Agenda 2063 by 30 September 2015 and to employ South-South cooperation and triangular cooperation in support of the implementation of Agenda 2063.
standard: 13. 部长们还促请非洲联盟委员会、非洲经济委员会和非洲开发银行在2015年9月30日之前就2063年议程第一个10年执行计划组织一次多利益攸关方协商，并利用南南合作和三角合作支持执行2063年议程。

source: Additionally, they requested the African Union Commission and the Economic Commission for Africa to establish, by 31 March 2016, an economic development observatory, mandated with setting in place an early warning system for risks to African economies and proposing measures to mitigate their possible consequences.

standard: 2016-2017两年期，执行办公室将根据人力资源管理厅向其下放的权力，负责下列工作：征聘短期工作人员和处理若干行政事务，包括征聘短期语文工作人员、甄别应征语文职位的申请人、发放特别职位津贴、处理合同延期事宜以及安排工作人员为提供会议服务、接受培训和离职而进行的旅行。

source: While national war crimes strategies determine the goals of post-conflict accountability initiatives, prosecutorial strategies should identify how the work of investigators and prosecutors will be organized and directed to achieve those goals.

answer: 国家战争罪战略确定冲突后问责举措的目标,而检察战略应确定如何安排和引导调查人员和检察官的工作,以实现这些目标。

source: In addition, as part of its closure planning, the Office has undertaken a needs assessment for regional war crimes prosecutions and will develop proposals for the sustainable and effective provision of support to national authorities.

answer: 此外,作为其关闭计划的一部分,检察官办公室对区域战争罪起诉进行了需求评估,并将拟订可持续和有效支助国家当局的建议。

source: Stresses that peaceful uses of nuclear science and technology can make unique and significant contributions in addressing various global challenges for sustainable development and the environment, including the implementation of the upcoming post-2015 development agenda, and emphasizes the importance of securing both financial and human resources to effectively address such global challenges.

answer: 此外,沿马里稳定团使用的道路放置的简易爆炸装置和反车辆地雷严重阻碍了稳定团的行动自由,对稳定团在马里北部的供应链和行动产生了负面影响。

source: 21. The Conference also notes the fulfilment as declared by the United Kingdom of its commitment made in 2010 to further reduce its stockpile of nuclear weapons, as well as the completion of its planned reductions in the number of operationally available nuclear warheads.
standard: 21. 审议大会还注意到联合王国宣布已履行其在2010年作出的进一步削减核武器库存的承诺，并完成了减少作战核弹头数目的计划。
answer: 21. 审议大会还注意到,联合王国履行了其2010年宣布的承诺,即进一步削减其核武器储存,并完成了计划削减可投入运行的核弹头数量。

source: 5. Encourages Governments, the United Nations system, civil society, local communities, families, the private sector and other partners to scale up efforts on an urgent basis to achieve the goals and targets contained in the 2011 Political Declaration on HIV and AIDS and to fulfil the unmet Millennium Development Goals that are relevant to HIV and AIDS, in particular Goal 6, including through sharing best practices and strengthening the capacities of developing countries;
standard: 5. 鼓励各国政府、联合国系统、民间社会、地方社区、家庭、私营部门和其他伙伴紧急加大行动力度，通过交流最佳做法和加强发展中国家能力等办法，争取实现2011年《关于艾滋病毒/艾滋病问题的政治宣言》所载目标和指标，并实现与艾滋病毒/艾滋病有关的未竟千年发展目标，特别是目标6；
answer: 5. 鼓励各国政府、联合国系统、民间社会、地方社区、家庭、私营部门和其他伙伴紧急加紧努力,实现2011年《关于艾滋病毒/艾滋病问题的政治宣言》 所载目标和指标,实现与艾滋病毒和艾滋病有关的未实现的千年发展目标,特别是目标6,包括通过分享最佳做法和加强发展中国家的能力;

source: Expressing particular concern that more than 50 per cent of people living with HIV do not know their HIV status, and stressing that progress in this area is critical to the achievement of the targets of 90 per cent of all people living with HIV knowing their HIV status, 90 per cent of all people with diagnosed HIV infection receiving sustained antiretroviral therapy and 90 per cent of all people receiving antiretroviral therapy having viral suppression by 2020,
standard: 表示特别关注50%以上艾滋病毒感染者不了解自身艾滋病毒状况，并强调指出，该领域取得的进展对于到2020年实现90%艾滋病毒感染者了解自身艾滋病毒状况、90%确诊感染艾滋病毒者接受持续抗逆转录病毒疗法以及90%接受抗逆转录病毒疗法者的体内病毒得到抑制的目标至关重要，
answer: 特别关注50%以上的艾滋病毒感染者不知道自己的艾滋病毒状况,强调这一领域的进展对于实现以下目标至关重要:到2020年,90%的艾滋病毒感染者知道自己的艾滋病毒状况,90%被确诊感染艾滋病毒的人得到持续的抗逆转录病毒疗法,90%接受抗逆转录病毒疗法,90%接受病毒抑制的抗逆转录病毒疗法,

source: The Security Council further notes the important contributions that public-private partnerships and civil society actors can make in efforts to prevent and combat terrorism.

answer: 安全理事会还注意到公私伙伴关系和民间社会行为体在努力防止和打击恐怖主义方面可以作出重要贡献。

source: Its objective is to generate a collective impact through multi-stakeholder programmes and partnerships, support the development and scaling up of successful sustainable consumption and production policies and initiatives at all levels, foster knowledge and the sharing of experience, and facilitate access to technical and financial resources for developing countries for the shift to sustainable consumption and production patterns.

source: a. Compilation of the bibliography portion of the United Nations Juridical Yearbook, which is issued in both print and e-formats (1);
standard: a. 编制《法律年鉴》的书目部分，以印刷版和电子版发行(1)；
answer: a. 汇编《联合国法律年鉴》书目部分,以印刷和电子形式出版(1);

source: Growth remains robust in East Africa owing to continued investment and growth in services.
standard: 由于持续投资和服务业增长，东部非洲仍然呈现强劲增长态势。
answer: 由于持续投资和服务业增长,东非的增长仍然强劲。

source: If the prices of oil and other commodities remain low over the longer term, commodity-dependent emerging economies, particularly in Africa, South America, Western Asia and the Commonwealth of Independent States, could face increasing pressures on budgets and external balances.
standard: 假如石油及其他商品的价格长期低迷，依赖商品的新兴经济体，特别是非洲、南美洲、西亚和独立国家联合体国家，就会面临越来越大的预算和国外收支压力。
answer: 如果石油和其他商品价格长期保持在较低水平,依赖商品的新兴经济体,特别是非洲、南美洲、西亚和独立国家联合体,可能会面临预算和外部平衡压力越来越大的问题。

source: As for the safeguards laboratory, determination of uranium isotopic composition by mass spectrometer is under implementation, and future environmental analysis capabilities are foreseen.
standard: 至于保障监督实验室，正在利用质谱仪鉴定铀同位素成分，并且预见到未来的环境分析能力。
answer: 至于保障实验室,正在按质量光谱仪确定铀同位素组成,并预见到今后的环境分析能力。

source: This is all part of a systematic campaign to oppress and dehumanize the Palestinian people and make their lives unbearable and their presence on their land untenable.
standard: 这都是蓄意开展的运动，旨在压迫巴勒斯坦人民并剥夺他们的人性，使其民不聊生，无法继续留在自己的土地上。
answer: 所有这些都是一项系统性运动的一部分,其目的是压迫和剥夺巴勒斯坦人民的人格,使他们的生活无法忍受,他们在其土地上的存在也难以维持。

source: 40. At the regional level, the transition from the Millennium Development Goals to the sustainable development goals signals a much stronger role for regional entities, as reiterated in the outcome document of the United Nations Conference on Sustainable Development, entitled "The future we want".
standard: 40. 在区域一级，从千年发展目标过渡到可持续发展目标，意味着区域实体可像题为"我们希望的未来"的联合国可持续发展大会的成果文件中所重申的那样，发挥更强大的作用。
answer: 40. 在区域一级,从千年发展目标向可持续发展目标的过渡表明,正如联合国可持续发展大会题为“我们希望的未来”的成果文件所重申的那样,区域实体的作用要大得多。

source: Members of civil society create awareness and encourage individuals, communities, Governments and businesses to improve their disposition, performance and action.
standard: 民间社会成员提高了意识并鼓励个人、社区、政府和企业改进其工作方式、业绩和行动。
answer: 民间社会成员提高认识,鼓励个人、社区、政府和企业改进其处理方式、业绩和行动。

source: 2. Unimpeded urgent humanitarian and medical assistance to the people of Yemen;
standard: 2. 不受阻碍地向也门人民提供紧急人道主义援助和医疗援助；
answer: 2. 向也门人民提供不间断的紧急人道主义和医疗援助;

source: Analytics and business intelligence
standard: 分析和业务情报
answer: 分析和商业情报

source: 15. Also recalls paragraph 25 of the report of the Advisory Committee, and requests the Secretary-General to intensify his efforts to promote procurement from developing countries and countries with economies in transition, so as to develop a vendor roster that is more representative of the membership of the Organization, and to report thereon in his next progress report on United Nations procurement activities;
standard: 15. 又回顾行预咨委会报告第25段，请秘书长加紧努力，促进从发展中国家和经济转型国家采购，从而建立一个更能代表本组织成员情况的供应商名册，并在其下一次关于联合国采购活动的进展报告中报告有关情况；
answer: 15. 又回顾咨询委员会报告第25段,请秘书长加紧努力,促进从发展中国家和经济转型国家采购,以建立一个更能代表本组织会员国的供应商名册,并在其下一次关于联合国采购活动的进度报告中报告有关情况;

source: Increased number and types of new strategic and technical partnerships in support of the knowledge production, dissemination and policy advocacy work of ECA
standard: 增加新战略和技术伙伴关系的数量和类型，以支持非洲经委会的知识创造、传播和政策宣传工作
answer: 支持非洲经委会知识生成、传播和政策倡导工作的新战略和技术伙伴关系的数目和种类增加

source: Provisional agenda for the 7442nd meeting of the Security Council
standard: 安全理事会第7442次会议临时议程
answer: 安全理事会第7442次会议临时议程

source: To be held on Wednesday, 13 May 2015, at 10 a.m.
standard: 定于2015年5月13日星期三上午10时举行
answer: 定于2015年5月13日星期三上午10时举行

source: The principles of good governance can be applied in systems of government that range from highly centralized to highly decentralized.
standard: 善治原则可适用于从高度集中到高度分散的政府体制。
answer: 善政原则可以适用于从高度集中到高度分散的政府制度。

source: The new legislation established barriers to improper political influence in operational policing by ensuring legal and budgetary independence for police.
standard: 新立法确保警方的法律和预算独立性，为警务行动受到不当政治影响设置了障碍。
answer: 新的立法通过确保警察在法律和预算上的独立性,为在维持治安业务方面发挥不当的政治影响设置了障碍。

source: a Estimates as at 31 January 2015.
standard: a 截至2015年1月31日的估计数。
answer: a 2015年1月31日估计数。

source: 16. The reporting period was marked by the conduct of the general elections in the Sudan from 13 to 16 April.
standard: 16. 在本报告所述期间，苏丹于4月13日至16日举行了大选。
answer: 16. 在本报告所述期间,苏丹于4月13日至16日举行了大选。

source: The bodies of the four militiamen killed were handed over to the Government of the Sudan Police Commissioner and Sudanese Armed Forces Military Commander, who visited the team site later in the evening.
standard: 四名被击毙民兵的遗体已移交当晚造访队部的苏丹政府警务专员和苏丹武装部队军事指挥官。
answer: 四名被打死的民兵的尸体交给了苏丹政府警务专员和苏丹武装部队军事指挥官,后者在晚上晚些时候访问了队部。

source: 22. Takes note of the Ministerial Meeting on Social Development, Labour and Employment held in Addis Ababa on 23 April 2015;
standard: 22. 表示注意到2015年4月23日在亚的斯亚贝巴举行的社会发展、劳工和就业问题部长级会议；
answer: 22. 注意到2015年4月23日在亚的斯亚贝巴举行的社会发展、劳工和就业问题部长级会议;

source: 51. Expresses deep concern at the fact that the commitment to double aid to Africa by 2010, as articulated at the Summit of the Group of Eight held at Gleneagles from 6 to 8 July 2005, was not entirely reached, and in this regard stresses the need to make rapid progress in order to fulfil the Gleneagles and other donors' substantial commitments to increase aid through a variety of means;
standard: 51. 表示深为关切2005年7月6日至8日在格伦伊格尔斯举行的八国集团首脑会议所作的关于到2010年把给非洲的援助增加一倍的承诺没有完全兑现，为此强调指出务必迅速取得进展，兑现格伦伊格尔斯首脑会议和其他捐助方作出的实质性承诺，以多种手段增加援助；
answer: 51. 表示深为关切2005年7月6日至8日在格伦伊格尔斯举行的八国集团首脑会议阐明的到2010年将对非洲的援助增加一倍的承诺没有完全兑现,并在这方面强调需要迅速取得进展,以履行格伦伊格尔斯首脑会议和其他捐助者作出的通过各种手段增加援助的实质性承诺;

source: 70. Overall, an internal review on United Nations sanctions considered the Integrated Embargo Monitoring Unit in UNOCI useful as an expert technical interlocutor with the host country and observed that it enjoyed a mutually beneficial relationship with the Group of Experts.
standard: 70. 总体而言，有关制裁的内部审查得出的结论是，联科行动综合禁运监察股作为与东道国的专家技术对话者发挥了作用，审查并指出，该股与专家组保持了互惠的关系。
answer: 70. 总的来说,对联合国制裁的内部审查认为,联科行动综合禁运监测股作为与东道国的专家技术对话者很有用,并指出,该股与专家组有着互利关系。

source: In 2014, at the most recent meeting under this process, States agreed to further strengthen stockpile management and to focus on the impact of new technologies on the tracing of weapons.
standard: 2014年，在这一进程下的最近一次会议上，各国商定进一步加强库存管理，并侧关注新技术对武器追查的影响。
answer: 2014年,在这一进程中举行的最近一次会议上,各国商定进一步加强库存管理,并重点关注新技术对追踪武器的影响。

source: The Marshall Islands has only adopted a few measures to address consequences of corruption.
standard: 马绍尔群岛仅采取了几项应对腐败行为后果的措施。
answer: 马绍尔群岛只采取了一些措施,处理腐败的后果。

source: There has been one successful prosecution of a money-laundering case in the Marshall Islands in 2003.
standard: 2003年，马绍尔群岛已有一例洗钱起诉案件结案。
answer: 2003年马绍尔群岛成功起诉了一起洗钱案件。

source: 7432nd meeting, held on 23 April 2015.
standard: 第7432次会议，2015年4月23日举行。
answer: 第7432次会议,2015年4月23日举行。

source: 1. Following the election of Mr. Kirill Gevorgian to the International Court of Justice on 6 November 2014 and his subsequent resignation from the International Law Commission, one seat on the Commission has become vacant.
standard: 1. 2014年11月6日，基里尔·格沃尔吉安先生入选国际法院，并随后从国际法委员会辞职，因此国际法委员会空缺一席。
answer: 1. 在基里尔·格沃吉安先生2014年11月6日当选为国际法院法官并随后辞去国际法委员会的职务后,委员会有一个空缺。

source: Filling of casual vacancies in the Commission
standard: 填补委员会的意外空缺
answer: 填补委员会临时空缺

source: Disasters, many of which are exacerbated by climate change and which are increasing in frequency and intensity, significantly impede progress towards sustainable development.
standard: 灾害严重阻碍了实现可持续发展的进程，其中许多灾害都因气候变化而变得更为严重，其频率和强度越来越高。
answer: 其中许多灾害因气候变化而加剧,频率和强度都在增加,大大阻碍了实现可持续发展的进展。

source: During its consideration of the report, the Committee met with representatives of the Secretary-General, who provided additional information and clarification, concluding with written responses received on 9 February 2015.
standard: 行预咨委会在审议该报告期间会晤了秘书长的代表，他们提供了补充资料和说明，最后还于2015年2月9日提供了书面答复。
answer: 在审议该报告期间,行预咨委会会晤了秘书长的代表,他们提供了补充资料和说明,最后提出了2015年2月9日收到的书面答复。

source: 5. Workload of the Commission.
standard: 5. 委员会的工作量。
answer: 5. 委员会的工作量。

source: Mr. Lucas van de Vondervoort, arms (Netherlands)
standard: 卢卡斯·范德沃尔特先生(荷兰)，军火
answer: Lucas van de Vondervoort先生,武器(荷兰)

source: A brief look at the recent history and societal mosaic of Yemen, as well as the composition of the parties, clearly demonstrate the nature of what is going on there.
standard: 对也门近代史和社会架构及其党派构成的简单分析明确表明了该国当前局势的性质。
answer: 简要回顾一下也门的近期历史和社会组合,以及各方的组成,可以清楚地看出那里正在发生的事情的性质。

source: The joint letter should fix a deadline for the submission of nominations (for example, by the end of 2015).
standard: 联名信应定出提名期限(如2015年底)。
answer: 联合信函应确定提交提名的最后期限(例如,在2015年底前)。

source: Therefore, no lifting of bank secrecy is needed to hear testimony of a bank employee on a specific transaction.
standard: 因此，听取银行雇员关于特定交易的证词无需取消银行保密。
answer: 因此,不必取消银行保密,以听取银行雇员关于具体交易的证词。

source: Consider criminalizing passive bribery in the private sector; consider fully criminalizing active bribery in the private sector.
standard: 考虑将私营部门内的受贿定为犯罪；充分考虑将私营部门内的行贿定为犯罪。
answer: 考虑将私营部门的受贿行为定为刑事犯罪;考虑将私营部门的受贿行为充分定为刑事犯罪。

source: 13. The subregion of GCC countries is estimated to have had GDP growth of 4.0 per cent in 2014, compared with 3.7 per cent in the previous year.
standard: 13. 海合会国家次区域2014年国内总产值增长率估计为4.0％，而2013年为3.7％。
answer: 13. 海湾合作委员会国家次区域2014年国内生产总值增长率估计为4.0%,而上一年为3.7%。

source: UNCTAD products are of variable, but generally good, quality
standard: 贸发会议的产品各有不同，但总的来说质量良好
answer: 贸发会议的产品可变,但质量一般良好,质量优良

source: 18. Beyond the overall favourable ratings of quality for research and analysis products, in its desk review and interviews, OIOS determined UNCTAD quality assurance mechanisms to be uneven and unclear.
standard: 18. 除了对研究和分析产品的质量总体上作出积极评价之外，监督厅在案头审查和访谈中确定贸发会议的质量保证机制不一致和不明确。
answer: 18. 在其案头审查和访谈中,除了对研究和分析产品的质量给予总体有利的评分外,监督厅还确定贸发会议的质量保证机制参差不齐和不明确。

source: 6. Stresses the importance of holding accountable perpetrators of attacks intentionally directed against buildings dedicated to religion, education, art, science or charitable purposes, or historic monuments, provided they are not military objectives, and of other violations of international legal instruments on the protection of cultural heritage, and calls upon all States to take appropriate action to this end within their jurisdiction in accordance with applicable international law;
standard: 6. 强调必须追究蓄意攻击非为军事目标的宗教、教育、艺术、科学或慈善专用建筑物或历史古迹者以及其他违反关于保护文化遗产的国际法律文书行为者的责任，并吁请所有国家按照可适用的国际法在其管辖范围内对此采取适当行动；
answer: 6. 强调必须追究蓄意攻击宗教、教育、艺术、科学或慈善专用建筑物或历史古迹,但并非军事目标的行为人的责任,并追究其他违反关于保护文化遗产的国际法律文书的行为人的责任,吁请所有国家按照适用的国际法,在其管辖范围内为此目的采取适当行动;

source: Agenda item 14
standard: 议程项目14
answer: 议程项目14

source: The present addendum lists the items on which the Security Council took action during the week ending 23 May 2015.

source: The deterioration of the situation as a result of the military provocations of Azerbaijan during the month of March resulted in the death of soldiers Arsen Karapetyan, Arshak Harutyunyan, Hakob Khachatryan, Eduard Hayrapetyan, Samvel Hakobyan and Hovsep Andreasyan, while soldiers Narek Mkrtchyan, Gurgen Mkrtchyan, Taron Khudabakhshyan, Artavazd Karapetyan, Sargis Gabrielyan, Gor Darmanyan, Jirayr Nalbandyan, Jora Grigoryan, Onik Miqayelyan, Edgar Martirosyan, Rafayel Nazarjan and Gevork Manvelyan were wounded.
standard: 3月，阿塞拜疆的军事挑衅导致局势恶化，造成Arsen Karapetyan、Arshak Harutyunyan、Hakob Khachatryan、Eduard Hayrapetyan、Samvel Hakobyan和Hovsep Andreasyan等士兵死亡，Narek Mkrtchyan、Gurgen Mkrtchyan、Taron Khudabakhshyan、Artavazd Karapetyan、Sargis Gabrielyan、Gor Darmanyan、Jirayr Nalbandyan、Jora Grigoryan、Onik Miqayelyan、Edgar Martirosyan、Rafayel Nazarjan和Gevork Manvelyan等士兵受伤。
answer: 3月份阿塞拜疆军事挑衅导致局势恶化,导致以下士兵死亡:Arsen Karapetyan、Arshak Harutyunyan、Hakob Khachatryan、Eduard Hayrapetyan、Samvel Hakobyan和Hovsep Andreasyan,而士兵Narek Mkrtchyan、Gurgen Mkrtchyan、Taron Khudabakhshyan、Artavazd Karapetyan、Sargis Gabriyan、Gor Darmanyan、Jirayr Nalbandyan、Jora Grigoriyan、Onik Miqayalyan、Edg Martirosyan、Rafayel Nazarjan和Gevork Manvelyan。

source: The Netherlands also chaired the NSG's Dedicated Meeting of Technical Experts (DMTE), the group that performed a fundamental review of the control lists and hosted several informal intersessionals.
standard: 荷兰还担任了核供应国集团技术专家专门会议主席，这个小组对管制清单进行了根本审查并主办了若干次休会期间会议。
answer: 荷兰还主持了核供应国集团专门技术专家会议(技术专家会议),该小组对管制清单进行了基本审查,并主办了几次非正式闭会期间会议。

source: The efforts made by Mexico in this field are founded primarily on international law, as well as the foreign policy principles enshrined in the Mexican Constitution and the principles of the Charter of the United Nations.
standard: 墨西哥在这一领域所采取的行动主要基于国际法，以及墨西哥《宪法》的外交政策和《联合国宪章》的原则。
answer: 墨西哥在这一领域所作的努力主要基于国际法,以及《墨西哥宪法》和《联合国宪章》原则所载的外交政策原则。

source: 2. In that regard, Mexico has been a regular, active and committed advocate of disarmament and has stressed the urgent need to totally eliminate weapons of mass destruction, especially nuclear weapons, in accordance with the principles of verification, irreversibility and transparency.
standard: 2. 在这方面，墨西哥坚持积极、一贯和以身作则的立场支持裁军，强调按照可核查、不可逆和透明的原则，彻底消除大规模毁灭性武器，主要是核武器的迫切需要。
answer: 2. 在这方面,墨西哥是裁军的经常、积极和坚定倡导者,并强调迫切需要根据核查、不可逆转和透明度原则,彻底消除大规模毁灭性武器,特别是核武器。

answer: 实施情况审议组

source: 7. An even bigger gap exists when comparing obligations undertaken by nonnuclear weapon States with obligations undertaken by States that are not party to the Treaty.
standard: 7. 在比较无核武器国家承担的义务与非该条约缔约国的国家承担的义务时，会发现存在甚至更大的差距。
answer: 7. 将无核武器国家承担的义务与非《条约》缔约国承担的义务相比,差距更大。

source: The Conference should review the implementation of Treaty obligations in the field of peaceful use of nuclear energy, taking into account relevant obligations adopted at the 1995, 2000 and 2010 Review Conferences, and decide on necessary measures for the full implementation of the Treaty.
standard: 大会应当全方位地审查该条约在和平利用核能领域的义务的执行情况，同时考虑到1995年、2000年和2010年审议大会通过的相关义务，并就充分执行该条约的必要措施作出决定。
answer: 审议大会应考虑到1995年、2000年和2010年审议大会通过的有关义务,审查《条约》在和平利用核能领域义务的履行情况,并决定充分执行《条约》的必要措施。

source: The Committee is of the view that the Assembly should be provided with the necessary assurances by the Secretary-General that any endorsement of the proposed staffing levels contained in the budget report will not have a detrimental effect on the provision of essential maintenance support services to the different mission components.
standard: 行预咨委会认为，大会应获得秘书长必要的保证，即保证若赞同拟议人员配置，将不对向特派团不同构成部分提供的基本维护支助服务产生不利影响。
answer: 行预咨委会认为,秘书长应向大会提供必要的保证,即对预算报告所载拟议人员编制的任何认可都不会对向特派团不同构成部分提供基本维修支助服务产生不利影响。

source: We do not agree that the language on technology transfer in this framework can serve as a precedent for future negotiated documents, including any documents relating to the sustainable development goals or the Conference of the Parties to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change, or any other negotiation in or outside of the United Nations system.
standard: 我们不同意该框架中关于技术转让的语言可成为今后商定文件的先例，包括与可持续发展目标或联合国气候变化框架公约（气候公约）缔约方大会有关的任何文件或联合国系统内外任何其他谈判的先例。
answer: 我们不同意这一框架中有关技术转让的措辞可以成为今后谈判文件的先例,包括有关可持续发展目标或联合国气候变化框架公约缔约方会议的任何文件,或联合国系统内外的任何其他谈判。

source: 16. In order to avoid confusion in the application of these requirements, where the contractor is a State or State-owned enterprise, the contractor should indicate in the annual report which entity of the sponsoring State is entitled to certify the financial statements.
standard: 16. 为避免在适用这些规定方面出现混乱，在承包者为国家或国有企业的情形下，承包者应在年度报告中说明，担保国的哪一个实体有资格对财务报表进行核证。
answer: 16. 为了避免在实施这些要求时出现混乱,如果承包者是国家或国有企业,承包者应在年度报告中说明担保国哪个实体有权核证财务报表。

source: 17. The date of receipt of the certification should be the same as for other elements of the annual reports, that is, no later than 31 March of each year.
standard: 17. 收到核证的日期应与收到年度报告其他内容的日期相同，即不迟于每年3月31日。
answer: 17. 收到核证的日期应与年度报告其他部分相同,即不迟于每年3月31日。

source: On the destruction of the remaining 12 chemical weapons production facilities in the Syrian Arab Republic, I am pleased to note that the export licence for the explosives required to destroy the five hangars has now been issued and that the delivery of these explosives is expected to take place by mid-June.

answer: 关于销毁阿拉伯叙利亚共和国其余12个化学武器生产设施的问题,我高兴地指出,销毁5个机库所需的爆炸物的出口许可证现已发放,这些爆炸物预计将在6月中旬交货。

source: 10. Expresses concern that ISIL and other individuals, groups, undertakings and entities associated with AlQaida are generating income from engaging directly or indirectly in the looting of and trafficking in Iraqi cultural heritage items, which is being used to support their recruitment efforts and strengthen their operational capability to organize and carry out terrorist attacks;
standard: 10. 表示关切伊黎伊斯兰国以及其他与基地组织有关联的个人、团体、企业和实体正通过直接或间接掠夺和贩运文化遗产物品获取收入，用以支持其招募并加强其组织和进行恐怖袭击的行动能力；
answer: 10. 表示关切伊黎伊斯兰国和其他与基地组织有关联的个人、团体、企业和实体直接或间接参与抢劫和贩运伊拉克文化遗产物品,从而获得收入,这些物品正被用来支持招募工作,并加强组织和实施恐怖袭击的业务能力;

source: Alarmed by the increasing number of intentional attacks against and threats to the cultural heritage of countries affected by armed conflict as well as the organized looting of and trafficking in cultural objects, which occurs on an unprecedented scale today,
standard: 感到震惊的是，对受武装冲突影响国家文化遗产的蓄意攻击和威胁越来越多，而当今发生的有组织掠夺和贩运文物的规模前所未有，
answer: 震惊地注意到对受武装冲突影响国家的文化遗产的蓄意攻击和威胁日益增多,对文物的有组织掠夺和贩运今天规模空前,

source: The continued replenishment of the Working Capital Fund is a priority of the Organization to ensure that prudent minimum levels of cash reserves are maintained.

answer: 继续补充周转基金是本组织的一个优先事项,以确保保持稳健的最低现金储备水平。

source: The Evaluation Office provides quarterly updates to the UNFPA Executive Committee, with a view to feeding evaluation results into corporate decision-making.

source: 12. Our country draws on support mechanisms (IAEA and other entities), such as the international missions of physical protection advisory services, for reviewing its systems for the physical protection of civil nuclear materials and facilities.

source: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation notes that there remains some confusion regarding articles 96 and 302 of the Constitution and that this has led to a variety of interpretations and even speculations.
standard: 外交与国际合作部注意到，《宪法》第96条和第302条仍然含糊，导致出现各种各样的解释，甚至投机。
answer: 外交和国际合作部指出,《宪法》第96条和第302条仍有一些混乱,这导致各种解释,甚至猜测。

source: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation welcomes the fact that the Government resulting from the general elections of 2005 and 2010 has shown the will to implement the spirit of the Arusha Agreement by recognizing that it was enhanced by the Global Ceasefire Agreement signed in 2003 between the Transitional Government and the National Council for the Defence of Democracy-Forces for the Defence of Democracy, which at the time was an armed movement.
standard: 外交与国际合作部对2005年和2010年大选产生的政府展现出落实《阿鲁沙协定》精神的意愿感到庆幸，并也确认2003年过渡政府与当时武装运动保卫民主全国委员会-保卫民主力量签署的《全面停火协定》对上述协定作了改进。
answer: 外交和国际合作部欢迎2005年和2010年大选产生的政府表现出执行《阿鲁沙协定》精神的意愿,承认过渡政府与保卫民主全国委员会——当时是一个武装运动——2003年签署的《全面停火协定》加强了这一精神。

source: In view of the small number of nominations received to date, I also intend to extend the period of eligibility for the award of the Medal to 1 January 2007, which marks the beginning of my tenure as Secretary-General.
standard: 鉴于迄今收到的提名很少，我还打算将资格期限放宽到2007年1月1日，即我就职担任秘书长之日。
answer: 鉴于迄今收到的提名数目不多,我还打算将授予勋章的资格期限延长至2007年1月1日,这标志着我开始担任秘书长。

source: In parallel, the Secretariat has conducted consultations with interested Member States, as a result of which I propose to amend two aspects of my original submission: the date of the award ceremony and the period of eligibility for the first award.
standard: 同时，秘书处与有关会员国进行了协商，根据协商结果，我提议对我原先的提案作出两方面修正：授勋仪式的日期；首次授勋的资格期限。
answer: 同时,秘书处与有关会员国进行了协商,结果我提议修改我最初提交的两个方面:颁奖仪式的日期和获得第一个奖项的资格期限。

source: In principle, human choices can be infinite and change over time.

source: This basic option, identified in 1996, was subject to a preliminary pilot project, which was updated in 2007 in the light of newly acquired geological and geotechnical data, and was then evaluated within the framework of an overall evaluation of the project.
standard: 这个基本选项，是在1996年确定的，需接受一个初步试点项目的考验，曾经参照新近得到的地质和岩土数据于2007年加以修订，并在项目全面评价的框架内进行评价。
answer: 1996年确定的这一基本选择方案须经过一个初步试点项目,2007年根据新获得的地质和地质技术数据更新,然后在项目总体评价框架内进行评估。

source: 14. The mission of the International Data Centre is to support the verification responsibilities of States by providing products and services necessary for effective global monitoring.

source: The data collected by the International Monitoring System stations are transmitted via the Global Communications Infrastructure to the International Data Centre and are made available to national data centres.

source: The Forum recommends that the United Nations Development Programme, the United Nations Population Fund and the Advisory Board of the United Nations Office for Partnerships and other relevant United Nations agencies take necessary measures for addressing the special situation of indigenous peoples in developed countries.
standard: 论坛建议联合国开发计划署、联合国人口基金和联合国伙伴关系办公室咨询委员会以及联合国其他相关机构采取必要措施，解决发达国家土著人民的特殊情况。
answer: 论坛建议联合国开发计划署、联合国人口基金、联合国伙伴关系办公室咨询委员会和联合国其他有关机构采取必要措施,解决发达国家土著民族的特殊情况。

source: Each State has a prime responsibility and duty to protect, promote and implement all human rights, consistent with the Charter of the United Nations and international human rights law; furthermore, all forms of discrimination must be avoided.
standard: 各国在按照《联合国宪章》和国际人权法保护、促进和落实所有人权方面负有首要责任和义务，而且必须避免一切形式的歧视。
answer: 每个国家都有首要责任和义务,根据《联合国宪章》和国际人权法,保护、促进和落实所有人权;此外,必须避免一切形式的歧视。

source: Stressing the need to further improve the efficient and effective delivery of humanitarian assistance, including through enhanced coordination among the United Nations agencies, funds and programmes under the authority of the Special Representative of the Secretary-General and between the United Nations and other donors, especially where it is most needed, welcoming the establishment of the United Nations Common Humanitarian Fund, and supporting the Afghan Government's essential role in the coordination of humanitarian assistance to its citizens,
standard: 强调需要更加有效和高效地送交人道主义援助，包括通过加强秘书长特别代表领导下的联合国各机构、基金和方案之间的协调以及联合国与其他捐助方之间的协调，特别是在最需要的地方这样做，欢迎设立联合国共同人道主义基金，支持阿富汗政府在协调向其公民提供的人道主义援助方面发挥不可或缺的作用，
answer: 强调需要进一步改进人道主义援助的高效和有效交付,包括通过在秘书长特别代表领导下加强联合国各机构、基金和方案之间的协调以及联合国与其他捐助者之间的协调,特别是在最需要的地方,欢迎设立联合国共同人道主义基金,并支持阿富汗政府在协调向其公民提供的人道主义援助方面发挥重要作用,

source: Welcoming the ongoing work of the Paris Pact Initiative as one of the most important frameworks in the fight against opiates originating in Afghanistan, taking note of the Vienna Declaration, and emphasizing the aim of the Paris Pact to establish a broad international coalition to combat the traffic of illicit opiates, as part of a comprehensive approach to peace, stability, and development in Afghanistan, the region and beyond,
standard: 欢迎巴黎公约倡议作为打击源于阿富汗的鸦片的最重要框架目前所开展的工作，注意到《维也纳宣言》，强调巴黎公约倡议的目标是建立一个打击非法鸦片贩运的广泛国际联盟，将其作为在阿富汗、该区域和其他地方实现和平、稳定和发展全面办法的一部分，
answer: 欢迎作为打击源自阿富汗的阿片剂的最重要框架之一的《巴黎公约》举措正在进行的工作,注意到《维也纳宣言》,并强调《巴黎公约》的目的是建立一个广泛的国际联盟,打击非法阿片剂贩运,以此作为在阿富汗、该区域内外实现和平、稳定与发展的全面办法的一部分,

source: Taking into consideration the existing staffing resources of the Division and the modest increase in evaluation assignments proposed, the Advisory Committee is of the view that the reassignment of one additional post would be sufficient.

standard: 指出本决议重点关注非法转让、不利于稳定地积累和滥用小武器和轻武器问题，包括涉及安理会规定的武器禁运的问题，
answer: 注意到本决议侧重非法转让、不利于稳定地积累和滥用小武器和轻武器,包括在安理会授权的武器禁运方面,

source: 9. Reaffirms its responsibility to monitor the implementation of Council-mandated arms embargoes and reaffirms its intention to take appropriate measures, when needed, to strengthen arms embargo monitoring mechanisms including inter alia through assigning dedicated staff, monitoring units to relevant United Nations Missions to effectively monitor arms embargoes;
standard: 9. 重申安理会有责任监测它规定的武器禁运的执行情况，并重申它打算在必要时采取适当措施，加强武器禁运监测机制，包括在联合国相关特派团指定专职人员或监测单位，以有效地监测武器禁运；
answer: 9. 重申安理会有责任监测安理会授权的军火禁运的执行情况,重申打算在必要时采取适当措施,加强军火禁运监测机制,包括向联合国相关特派团指派专职工作人员和监测单位,以有效监测军火禁运;

source: Crimea was, is and will remain an integral part of the sovereign territory of Ukraine.
standard: 克里米亚过去是、现在是、将来仍然是乌克兰主权领土不可分割的一部分。
answer: 克里米亚过去、现在和将来都是乌克兰主权领土不可分割的一部分。

source: The Security Council urges all sides to refrain from any further use of military force, any offensive military actions and other uses of violence.
standard: 安全理事会敦促所有各方不再使用军事力量，不发动进攻性军事行动和使用其他形式的暴力。
answer: 安全理事会敦促所有各方避免进一步使用军事力量、任何进攻性军事行动和其他暴力手段。

source: It is also noteworthy that the United Nations and all of its agencies have always had the policy and practice of using the correct name, i.e., Persian Gulf, as the only geographical designation applicable to this body of water.
standard: 同样值得一提的是，联合国及其所有机构始终遵循以波斯湾这一正确名称作为本水域唯一地理称谓的政策和做法。
answer: 还值得注意的是,联合国及其所有机构一直奉行正确的名称,即波斯湾,作为适用于这一水体的唯一地理名称的政策和做法。

source: The United States also is a signatory to the relevant Protocols to the South Pacific Nuclear Free Zone Treaty, the African Nuclear-Weapon-Free Zone Treaty, and the Treaty on a Nuclear-Weapon-Free Zone in Central Asia, and has submitted these Protocols to the United States Senate for its advice and consent to ratification.
standard: 美国也是《南太平洋无核区条约》、《非洲无核武器区条约》》和《中亚无核武器区条约》相关《议定书》的签字国，并已将这些《议定书》提交美国参议院，供提供咨询意见并同意批准。
answer: 美国还签署了《南太平洋无核区条约》、《非洲无核武器区条约》和《中亚无核武器区条约》的相关议定书,并将这些议定书提交美国参议院征求意见和同意批准。

source: We look forward to the results of the global study on children deprived of their liberty in this regard;

source: 11. As we continue our efforts to achieve the objectives set forth in this Declaration, to enhance international cooperation, to uphold the rule of law and to ensure that our crime prevention and criminal justice systems are effective, fair, humane and accountable, we reaffirm the importance of adequate, long-term, sustainable and effective technical assistance and capacity-building policies and programmes.
standard: 11. 我们继续努力实现本宣言所提出的目标，增进国际合作，维护法治以及确保我们的预防犯罪和刑事司法系统是有效、公正、人道和问责的，与此同时，我们重申适当、长期、可持续和有效技术援助及能力建设政策与方案的重要性。
answer: 11. 在我们继续努力实现本宣言提出的目标、加强国际合作、维护法治以及确保我们的预防犯罪和刑事司法系统有效、公平、人道和负责之际,我们重申充分、长期、可持续和有效的技术援助和能力建设政策与方案的重要性。

source: Whereas, on the matter specifically of article 7 (1) of chapter I on the constitutional principles for the Constitution of the post-transition period, the Bureau of the Committee notes that no agreement was obtained on the mode of election of the President, as the system of politically alternating presidents was considered unworkable, democratically unsustainable or even a source of instability;

answer: 具体到关于过渡后时期《宪法》宪法原则的第一章第7条第1款,委员会主席团注意到,没有就总统选举方式达成协议,因为政治交替总统制度被认为是行不通的,民主不可持续,甚至是一个不稳定的根源;

source: 108. Since 2015 coincides with the African Union's Year for Women's Empowerment and Development towards Agenda 2063, the twentieth anniversary of the Beijing Declaration and the midpoint of the African Women's Decade, the United Nations system should further strengthen its coordination and enhance its support towards accelerating the implementation of all commitments relating to gender equality and women's empowerment made in these frameworks.
standard: 108. 2015年适逢非洲联盟为实现2063年议程增强妇女权能和谋求发展年，也是《北京宣言》二十周年和非洲妇女十年中点，因此，联合国系统应进一步加强协调，进一步支持加快履行在这些框架内所作的有关性别平等和增强妇女权能的各项承诺。
answer: 108. 2015年恰逢非洲联盟赋予妇女权力和发展年迈向2063年议程、《北京宣言》二十周年和非洲妇女十年中期,联合国系统应进一步加强协调,加大支持力度,加快履行在这些框架中作出的有关两性平等和妇女赋权的所有承诺。

source: Following the adoption of Agenda 2063 by the African Union at the twenty-fourth ordinary session of its Assembly, in January 2015, the United Nations has been working to refocus its partnership with the African Union and strengthen the Regional Coordination Mechanism in order to support the Strategic Plan 2014-2017 of the African Union Commission and the 10-Year Implementation Plan for Agenda 2063.
standard: 2015年1月的非洲联盟大会第二十四届常会通过2063年议程后，联合国一直在作出努力，重新聚焦其与非洲联盟的伙伴关系并加强区域协调机制，以支持非洲联盟委员会2014-2017年战略计划和2063年议程的十年执行计划。
answer: 2015年1月,非洲联盟大会第二十四届常会通过了《2063年议程》,此后,联合国一直努力调整与非洲联盟的伙伴关系,加强区域协调机制,以支持非洲联盟委员会2014-2017年战略计划和《2063年议程十年执行计划》。

source: 11. It is acknowledged that there is a difference in the ratio of girls and boys in terms of types of special secondary and vocational training institutions attended and in their enrolment in higher learning, baccalaureate programmes and master's programmes (paras. 189 and 192).
standard: 11. 报告承认，男女生在不同类型的中专和职业培训机构中的比率，以及在高等教育、学士学位课程和硕士课程的入学率方面存在差异(第189和第192段)。
answer: 11. 公认的是,男女生在接受特殊中等和职业培训机构类型以及进入高等教育、学士学位方案和硕士课程的人数方面存在差异(第189和192段)。

source: With regard to interventions by indigenous peoples on unresolved land rights, including the Six Nations of the Grand River and others on which the Forum has made specific recommendations in the past, the Forum calls upon States to fairly and equitably redress the long-standing unresolved land rights issues through good-faith negotiations, consistent with the United Nations Declaration and without extinguishing indigenous peoples' land rights.
standard: 关于土著人民就悬而未决的土地权利问题采取的干预措施，包括大河沿岸六国问题及论坛以往提出过具体建议的那些问题，常设论坛呼吁各国遵照《联合国土著人民权利宣言》，在不取消土著人民土地权利的情况下，通过真诚谈判，公平和公正地解决长期悬而未决的土地权利问题。
answer: 关于土著人民就尚未解决的土地权利,包括大河六国和论坛过去曾就此提出具体建议的其他民族发言的问题,论坛呼吁各国按照《联合国宣言》,通过真诚谈判,公平和公正地解决长期悬而未决的土地权利问题,同时不取消土著人民的土地权。

source: 30. Recognizing that the Inter-Agency Support Group on Indigenous Issues will play a central role in coordinating efforts among United Nations agencies to translate the outcome document of the World Conference on Indigenous Peoples into meaningful change, the Permanent Forum requests that the Group ensure that its membership includes all United Nations agencies, funds and programmes, including specialized agencies.
standard: 30. 常设论坛认识到土著问题机构间支助小组将在联合国各机构间发挥核心协调作用，将世界土著人民大会成果文件转化为有意义的革新，因此请支助小组确保所有联合国机构、基金和方案，包括各专门机构都成为它的成员。
answer: 30. 常设论坛认识到,土著问题机构间支助小组将在协调联合国各机构努力将世界土著人民大会成果文件转化为有意义的变革方面发挥核心作用,因此,常设论坛请该小组确保其成员包括所有联合国机构、基金和方案,包括专门机构。

source: Anti-Semitism is a manifestation of racism, xenophobia and religious intolerance.
standard: 反犹太主义是种族主义、仇外心理和宗教不容忍的一种表现。
answer: 反犹太主义是种族主义、仇外心理和宗教不容忍的一种表现。

source: Today, we reaffirm that Holocaust denial is a form of anti-Semitism.
standard: 今天，我们重申，否认大屠杀是一种形式的反犹太主义。
answer: 今天,我们重申否认大屠杀是反犹太主义的一种形式。

source: However, we are convinced that the only absolute guarantee against the use or threatened use of such weapons and the risk that they might be used by terrorists is the prohibition and total elimination of nuclear weapons.
standard: 但是我们相信，应对使用或威胁使用核武器以及应对恐怖分子使用核武器的风险的唯一绝对保证，就是禁止和全面消除这类武器。
answer: 然而,我们相信,禁止和彻底消除核武器是防止使用或威胁使用这种武器以及防止恐怖分子可能使用核武器的唯一绝对保证。

source: He articulates how sexual violence is integrally linked with the objectives, ideology and funding of extremist groups, noting that women's empowerment and sexual violence prevention should therefore be central to the international response.
standard: 他阐述了性暴力如何与极端主义团体的目标、意识形态和供资来源结成一体，并因此指出，应将增强妇女权能和预防性暴力作为国际应对行动的重点。
answer: 他阐述了性暴力如何与极端主义团体的目标、意识形态和资金筹措有机地联系在一起,并指出,因此,赋予妇女权力和预防性暴力应是国际对策的核心。

source: Throughout history, sexual violence has been widespread in armed conflict and continues to have devastating consequences for women, men, boys and girls and their families and communities.
standard: 纵观历史，性暴力在武装冲突中一直广泛存在，并持续给妇女、男子、男童和女童以及他们的家庭和社区带来毁灭性后果。
answer: 在整个历史上,性暴力在武装冲突中十分普遍,并继续对妇女、男子、男童和女童及其家庭和社区产生破坏性后果。

source: The decrease of $164,700 under posts is due to the proposed abolition of one General Service (Other level) post under programme support.

source: Please also explain how the maintenance of legal provisions, according to which a woman's testimony is worth half that of a man before a court, in criminal matters and in some civil matters, can be compatible with the aim of eliminating gender-based discrimination and ensuring equality before the law.
standard: 请同时解释维护关于在刑事和部分民事中妇女在法庭上的证词只具有男子证词一半效力的法律规定如何能够与消除基于性别的歧视和确保法律面前人人平等的宗旨相一致。
answer: 另请解释,根据法律规定,妇女在法庭、刑事案件和一些民事案件中的证词,其价值一半是男子的,如何维持这些法律规定,符合消除性别歧视和确保法律面前人人平等的目标。

source: This terrorist crime is fresh evidence of the great hostility of what some like to call the "moderate armed opposition" to knowledge, culture and education, and of those groups' obscurantist zeal to spread their ideas, which are rooted in ignorance, takfirism and extremism.

source: The most recent and unacceptable example of this is the initiation by the Republic of Argentina of legal action against persons and companies involved in the development of the Falkland Islands' hydrocarbon industry under Law No 26.659, as amended in 2013 by Law No 26915, which purports to criminalize those involved in the Falkland Islands' hydrocarbon industry.
standard: 最近的一个令人无法接受的例子是，经2013年第26915号法律修订的第26.659号法律声称对参与福克兰群岛油气工业的那些人进行刑事定罪，阿根廷共和国根据该法对参与发展福克兰群岛油气工业的人员和公司采取法律行动。
answer: 阿根廷共和国根据2013年经第26915号法律修订的第26659号法律,对参与福克兰群岛碳氢工业发展的个人和公司提起法律诉讼,第26659号法律旨在将参与福克兰群岛碳氢工业的人绳之以法,这是最近令人无法接受的例子。

source: 15 April: Regime warplanes delivered 60 air strikes against Sahen, Jedraia, Samlin, Bara, Felon, Senjar, Bazabor, Mastuma, Nerab, Benech, Arbaen mount, Idlib and Abo al-Dohor military airport, while regime helicopters dropped 63 barrel bombs on Ein al-Soda, Saraqib, Iblin, Ehsim, Kobin, Hebet, Basamis, Abdin, Nabi Ayoub, Kafar Najd, Taoum, Taftanaz, Khan Shekhon and Mertin.
standard: 4月15日：政权政府军的战机空袭了萨赫恩、杰德拉亚、萨穆林、巴拉、菲隆、森佳尔、巴扎博尔、马斯土玛、内拉布、贝内奇、阿尔巴颜山、伊德利卜和阿伯多霍尔军用机场，而政府军的直升机则对艾恩索达、萨拉齐布、伊布林、艾希姆、科宾、赫贝特、巴萨米斯、阿布丁、纳比阿尤布、卡法尔纳吉德、塔乌姆、塔夫塔纳兹、谢克宏汗和迈尔廷投掷了63枚桶装炸弹。

source: 4.6 The State party further submits that the communication should be declared inadmissible ratione materiae and ratione loci under article 4 (2) of the Optional Protocol, given that it considers that Denmark is not responsible under the Convention for the acts of gender-based violence suffered by the author, which means that returning the author to China cannot engage the responsibility of the State party.
standard: 4.6 缔约国又指出，应依据《任择议定书》第4条第2款属事和属地管辖原则宣布来文不予受理，因为根据《公约》规定，丹麦对提交人遭到的性别暴力不负责任，也就是说缔约国不对将提交人遣送回中国承担任何责任。
answer: 4.6 缔约国还提出,根据《任择议定书》第4条第2款,应宣布来文基于属事理由和属地理由不可受理,因为缔约国认为,根据《公约》,丹麦对提交人遭受的基于性别的暴力行为不负有责任,这意味着将提交人送回中国不能引起缔约国的责任。

source: 5.1 On 22 July 2013, the author provided new information about additional violations of the Convention by the State party and commented on the State party's observations on admissibility.

source: Nuclear weapons underpin an unjust and discriminatory international order that fosters instability and insecurity and also hinders social and economic development globally.

source: It defined and penalized the production, processing, supplying and use of nuclear material without necessary authorization or for other purposes than those allowed by law (article 20), as well as the export and import of nuclear material without due official license (article 25).

answer: 它界定了未经必要授权或为法律允许的其他目的生产、加工、供应和使用核材料(第20条),以及未经正式许可进出口核材料(第25条)。

source: We call for the realization of a just, comprehensive and lasting peace settlement in the Middle East based on the relevant Security Council resolutions and the establishment of a sovereign, viable and contiguous Palestinian State on the territories occupied since 4 June 1967, with East Jerusalem as its capital, and living in peace and security with all its neighbours, in accordance with the positions and initiatives taken by the European Union and the League of Arab States.

answer: 我们呼吁根据安全理事会有关决议,在中东实现公正、全面和持久的和平解决,在1967年6月4日以来占领的领土上建立一个主权、有生存能力和毗连的巴勒斯坦国,以东耶路撒冷为首都,并根据欧洲联盟和阿拉伯国家联盟采取的立场和倡议,与所有邻国和平、安全地共处。

source: A third representative said that the anniversary was an opportunity to reflect on the record of the United Nations and assess the challenges ahead.
standard: 第三位代表表示，周年纪念是反思联合国过去工作和评价今后挑战的机会。
answer: 第三位代表说,周年纪念是一个反思联合国记录和评估今后挑战的机会。

source: Multilingualism was also vital in an effective multilateral system and the extraordinary language diversity of United Nations staff could be an asset in fulfilling the Department's mandate effectively.
standard: 使用多种语言对建立有效的多边体系也非常重要，联合国工作人员超凡的语言多样性是新闻部有效履行任务的一项资产。
answer: 在一个有效的多边系统中,使用多种语文也至关重要,联合国工作人员的语言非常多样化可以成为有效完成该部任务的一个资产。

source: 53. In the Government-controlled western neighbourhoods of Deir ez-Zor city, some 228,000 people are besieged by ISIL.

source: It is crucial that the pledges made be urgently disbursed to humanitarian organizations working on the ground so that the basic aid upon which millions of Syrians inside their country and those who have sought refuge outside the country depend can be delivered without interruption.

answer: 至关重要的是,向在当地工作的人道主义组织紧急支付认捐,以便能够不间断地提供其国内数百万叙利亚人和在国外寻求避难的人赖以生存的基本援助。

source: In addition, the small intersessional working group suggested that, in the format for national reporting, reference be made to the relevant provisions of the Convention and decisions of the Conferences of the Parties in the form of footnotes or equivalent so as to provide information on the legal basis underpinning each item, whether question or table, of the questionnaire.
standard: 此外，小型闭会期间工作组建议，在国家报告的格式中，应以脚注或其他同等形式，标注《公约》的相关条款和缔约方大会的决定，从而提供调查问卷每个项目，包括问题和表格所依据的法律信息。
answer: 此外,小型闭会期间工作组建议,在国家报告格式中,应以脚注或同等形式提及《公约》的有关规定和缔约方会议的决定,以便提供调查表每个项目(无论是问题还是表格)所依据的法律依据信息。

source: Functional commissions have held expert thematic discussions that have addressed gender dimensions, including those affecting marginalized groups of women and girls such as indigenous women or women with disabilities.
standard: 各职司委员会举行了关于性别平等层面的专家专题讨论，包括探讨影响土著妇女或残疾妇女等妇女和女童边缘群体的问题。
answer: 各职司委员会举行了专家专题讨论,讨论性别层面,包括影响土著妇女或残疾妇女等边缘化妇女和女童群体的性别层面。

source: 5. Speakers recognized the importance of gender mainstreaming in the future implementation of the post-2015 development agenda and supported in this regard the proposal for a stand-alone goal on achieving gender equality and empowering all women and girls as well as for integrating gender-sensitive targets in other goals.
standard: 5. 发言者认识到今后执行2015年后发展议程时必须将性别平等观念纳入主流，并在这方面支持设立一个单独目标的提议，认为该目标应述及实现性别平等和增强所有妇女和女童权能以及将对性别问题有敏感认识的指标纳入其他目标。
answer: 5. 发言者认识到将性别平等纳入今后实施2015年后发展议程主流的重要性,并在这方面支持关于实现性别平等和增强所有妇女和女孩权能的单独目标的提议,并支持将对性别问题有敏感认识的具体目标纳入其他目标的提议。

source: 50. Despite opportunities and potential roles Asia-Pacific states can have regarding these issues, the importance of various relationships with the P5 and other states would still factor significantly, while pressure from the P5 is to be expected.

source: Please also indicate whether other measures, in particular temporary special measures, are envisaged to increase the very low proportions of women on the National Council (para. 56), serving as mayors (para. 59) and in leadership positions in companies, social partner organizations and other associations and organizations (paras. 67-71).
standard: 还请说明是否打算采取其他措施，尤其是暂行特别措施来改善妇女在国民议会(第56段)、市长职位(第59段)以及公司、社会合作伙伴组织以及其他协会和组织领导职位(第67至71段)中比例极低的情况。

source: The launch of a national satellite is part of the implementation of the foreign policy strategy of Turkmenistan aimed at combining multilateral efforts to address the global issues of our time and initiatives announced at the United Nations by the President of Turkmenistan in such areas as sustainable energy, transport and communications, the environment and disarmament.
standard: 发射国家卫星，是实施土库曼斯坦外交政策战略的一部分；该战略旨在综合我们的多边努力，以解决当代的全球性问题，以及执行土库曼斯坦总统在联合国宣布的，在可持续能源、交通和通讯、环境和裁军领域的各项倡议。
answer: 发射一颗国家卫星是实施土库曼斯坦外交政策战略的一部分,该战略旨在将解决我们时代全球问题的多边努力与土库曼斯坦总统在联合国宣布的可持续能源、运输和通信、环境和裁军等领域的倡议结合起来。

source: Assad's ambition to terrorize civilians is shared by the Islamic State in Iraq and the Levant (ISIL).

answer: 阿萨德恐吓平民的野心与伊拉克和黎凡特伊斯兰国(伊黎伊斯兰国)相同。

source: It is imperative that the Security Council employ all measures capable of stopping the killing in Syria.

answer: 安全理事会必须采取一切能够制止叙利亚杀戮的措施。

source: Moreover, they noted that the above-mentioned international legal frameworks and the criminal justice standards and norms provided a common platform for Member States to counter serious forms of criminal activity, irrespective of differences in legal systems and traditions and that they allowed for flexibility in the development and implementation of crime prevention and criminal justice policies and strategies.
standard: 而且，他们注意到，上述国际法律框架及刑事司法标准和规范为会员国打击各种形式的严重犯罪活动提供了一个共同的平台，而不论其法律制度和传统有何区别；并因而得以能够灵活拟订并执行预防犯罪和刑事司法政策与战略。
answer: 此外,他们还指出,上述国际法律框架以及刑事司法标准和规范为会员国提供了一个共同平台,以打击严重的犯罪活动形式,而不论法律制度和传统的不同,它们允许在制定和实施预防犯罪和刑事司法政策和战略方面具有灵活性。

source: In accordance with paragraph 26 of Security Council resolution 2164 (2014), I have the honour to transmit herewith a report on the actions undertaken by French forces in support of the United Nations Multidimensional Integrated Stabilization Mission in Mali (MINUSMA) from 3 December 2014 to 23 February 2015 (see annex).
standard: 我谨根据安全理事会第2164(2014)号决议第26段，随信转递关于2014年12月3日至2015年2月23日期间支援联合国马里多层面综合稳定团(马里稳定团)的法国部队所开展的行动的报告(见附件)。

source: The Conference takes note of the concerns of small island developing States and other coastal States with regard to the transportation of radioactive materials by sea and, in this regard, welcomes continuing efforts to improve communication between shipping and coastal States for the purpose of addressing concerns regarding transport safety, security and emergency preparedness.

answer: 重申对利比亚主权、独立、领土完整和国家统一的坚定承诺,

source: Recognizing that addressing the threat posed by foreign terrorist fighters requires comprehensively addressing underlying factors, including by preventing radicalization to terrorism, stemming recruitment, inhibiting foreign terrorist fighter travel, disrupting financial support to foreign terrorist fighters, countering violent extremism, which can be conducive to terrorism, countering incitement to terrorist acts motivated by extremism or intolerance, promoting political and religious tolerance, economic development and social cohesion and inclusiveness, ending and resolving armed conflicts, and facilitating reintegration and rehabilitation,
standard: 认识到要应对外国恐怖主义参战人员带来的威胁，就要全面消除造成威胁的基本因素，包括防止从激进到皈依恐怖主义，制止招募活动，禁止外国恐怖主义参战人员旅行，切断对外国恐怖主义参战人员的资助，反对助长恐怖主义的暴力极端主义，反对出于极端主义或不容忍而煽动恐怖主义行为，促进政治和宗教容忍，促进经济发展和社会和谐与包容，停止和解决武装冲突，协助重返社会和恢复正常生活，
answer: 认识到要应对外国恐怖主义战斗人员构成的威胁,就必须全面解决各种根本因素,包括防止激进化加入恐怖主义、阻止招募、阻止外国恐怖主义战斗人员旅行、打乱对外国恐怖主义战斗人员的财政支持、打击可能助长恐怖主义的暴力极端主义、打击煽动基于极端主义或不容忍的恐怖行为、促进政治和宗教容忍、经济发展、社会融合和包容性、结束和解决武装冲突以及促进重返社会和恢复正常生活,

source: Agenda items 13, 19 and 115

1. Based on resolution 2140 (2014), the Government of Japan announced that it would take the following necessary measures with regard to paragraphs 11 and 15 of resolution 2140 (2014) and paragraph 3 of resolution 2216 (2015).
standard: 1. 根据第2140(2014)号决议，日本政府宣布，它将针对第2140(2014)号决议第11段和第15段以及2216(2015)号决议第3段采取以下必要措施。
answer: 1. 日本政府根据第2140(2014)号决议,宣布将就第2140(2014)号决议第11和15段以及第2216(2015)号决议第3段采取下列必要措施。

answer: 本组织目标:确保采购工作效率高、成本效益高、具有成本效益、透明、及时和优质

answer: 23. 条约不结盟缔约国集团对召集人未能如期于2012年召开会议深表失望。

source: In response to a question regarding specific areas that should be accorded priority in the development of scientific expertise by developing countries, Mr. Barbière noted that, although there was no set hierarchy, some key areas and methodologies had been identified where the development of scientific knowledge was most cost-effective.
standard: 关于发展中国家应优先在哪些具体领域发展科学专门知识的问题，Barbière先生答复称，尽管没有预定的优先等级，但在某些关键领域采用某些方法研究科学知识最有成本效益。
answer: 巴尔比埃先生在回答关于发展中国家在发展科学专门知识方面应当优先考虑的具体领域问题时指出,虽然没有固定的等级,但已经确定了一些发展科学知识最具成本效益的关键领域和方法。

source: VII. Conclusion and action required of the General Assembly
standard: 七. 结论和有待大会采取的行动
answer: 七. 结论和需要大会采取的行动

source: 4. It has been confirmed that the Ad Hoc Open-ended Informal Working Group to study issues relating to the conservation and sustainable use of marine biological diversity beyond areas of national jurisdiction will not be re-mandated starting from 2016.
standard: 4. 现已确认，研究国家管辖范围以外区域海洋生物多样性的养护和可持续利用问题不限成员名额非正式特设工作组的任务规定从2016年起将不再延续。
answer: 4. 现已确认,研究国家管辖范围以外区域海洋生物多样性的养护和可持续利用相关问题的不限成员名额非正式特设工作组从2016年起将不再重新授权。

source: The research entities generate original findings; libraries organize and disseminate information; and learning and training entities share knowledge and help to build the capacity of key actors.
standard: 研究机构提出初步调查结果；图书馆整理和传播信息；而学习和培训实体分享知识和协助主要行为者进行能力建设。
answer: 研究实体产生原始发现;图书馆组织并传播信息;学习和培训实体分享知识和帮助关键行为者建设能力。

source: Welcoming the overall progress towards restoring security, peace and stability in Côte d'Ivoire, commending the President and Government of Côte d'Ivoire's continued efforts to stabilize the security situation and promote economic recovery in Côte d'Ivoire and strengthen international and regional cooperation, and notably continued cooperation with the governments of Ghana and Liberia, and calling upon all national stakeholders to work together to consolidate the significant progress made so far and to address the underlying causes of tension and conflict,
standard: 欢迎科特迪瓦在恢复安全、和平与稳定方面取得全面进展，赞扬科特迪瓦总统和政府继续努力在科特迪瓦稳定安全局势和促进恢复经济，加强国际和区域合作，特别是继续与加纳和利比里亚政府合作，促请全国所有利益攸关方共同努力，巩固迄今取得的重大进展，消除紧张局势和冲突的基本根源，
answer: 欢迎在恢复科特迪瓦安全、和平与稳定方面取得的总体进展,赞扬科特迪瓦总统和政府继续努力稳定科特迪瓦安全局势,促进科特迪瓦经济复苏,加强国际和区域合作,特别是与加纳和利比里亚政府继续合作,并呼吁所有国家利益攸关方共同努力,巩固迄今取得的重大进展,消除紧张和冲突的根本原因,

source: Just hours after the attacks in Sarmin, Syrian regime forces launched scud missile attacks in Kafr Takharim, resulting in seven deaths.
standard: 在Sarmin遭受攻击后几小时，叙利亚政权部队在Kafr Takharim发动了飞毛腿导弹攻击，造成7人死亡。
answer: 攻击萨尔明仅仅几小时后,叙利亚政权部队在Kafr Takharim发动飞毛腿导弹袭击,造成七人死亡。

source: The United States should fundamentally change its viewpoint on the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in order to stem the current trend of vicious cycle of confrontation and tension.
standard: 美国应从根本上改变对朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的看法，遏制当前对抗和紧张的恶性循环趋势。
answer: 美国应当从根本上改变其对朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的看法,以遏制目前对抗和紧张恶性循环的趋势。

source: Kerry went the length of pulling up the supreme headquarters of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in a bid to tarnish the image of the country and to justify the bankrupt "human rights" racket against it.
standard: 为了玷污朝鲜形象，给已经被戳穿的对朝"人权"骗局正名，克里不遗余力地责难朝鲜最高总部。
answer: Kerry为了玷污朝鲜的形象, 也为了为破产的“人权”阴谋辩护。

source: Nevertheless, the lack of funding for protection, reintegration and development programmes in LRA-affected areas, including for LRA child returnees, remains a serious challenge.
standard: 然而，由于受上帝军影响的地区缺乏用于保护、重返社会和发展方案的资金，包括用于安置上帝抵抗军的回返儿童兵的资金，这方面仍然面临着严峻的挑战。
answer: 然而,在受上帝军影响地区,包括上帝军儿童回返者的保护、重返社会和发展方案缺乏资金,这仍然是一个严重挑战。

source: He also undertook a number of country-specific activities.
standard: 他还开展了一些针对具体国家的活动。
answer: 他还开展了一些针对具体国家的活动。

source: The Republic of Azerbaijan once again underlines that it shall never reconcile with the seizure of its territories.
standard: 阿塞拜疆共和国再次强调绝不容忍吞并其领土。
answer: 阿塞拜疆共和国再次强调,它决不同意没收其领土。

source: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation has taken note of a press release issued by the Rwandan Ministry of Foreign Affairs dated 4 May 2015 regarding concerns expressed by the Government of Rwanda in response to what it terms the "deterioration in the situation in Burundi".
standard: 外交与国际合作部注意到卢旺达外交部2015年5月4日就卢旺达政府对所谓"布隆迪局势恶化"的关切而发表的新闻稿。
answer: 外交和国际合作部注意到卢旺达外交部于2015年5月4日发布的新闻稿,其中涉及卢旺达政府针对它所说的“布隆迪局势的恶化”所表示的关切。

source: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation wishes to inform the nation and the international community that peace and security prevail throughout the country, with the exception of a few districts in the capital, Bujumbura, which since 26 April 2015 have been rocked by illegal, violent demonstrations by certain opposition political elements and civil society activists.
standard: 外交与国际合作部通告国内和国际舆论，除首都布琼布拉有几个街区自2015年4月26日以来受扰于一些政治反对派和民间社会活动分子发动的非法和暴力示威活动之外，全国各地保持一片和平与安全的气氛。
answer: 外交和国际合作部谨通知全国和国际社会,除首都布琼布拉的几个区外,全国各地普遍实现和平与安全,自2015年4月26日以来,首都布琼布拉一直受到某些反对派政治分子和民间社会积极分子非法暴力示威的震撼。

source: We believe that this was done to provide a cover for refusal of Israel to attend said conference.
standard: 我们认为，此举旨在掩盖以色列拒绝参加该次会议的行为。
answer: 我们认为,这样做是为了掩护以色列拒绝参加上述会议。

source: 1. Reiterates its support for the status of permanent neutrality declared by Turkmenistan;
standard: 1. 重申支持土库曼斯坦宣布的永久中立地位；
answer: 1. 重申支持土库曼斯坦宣布的永久中立地位;

source: Even so, if this will enable us to better understand historical issues with their legal aspects and to transform resentment into friendship again, it is natural to approach different discourses with empathy and tolerance and expect a similar attitude from all sides.
standard: 即便如此，如果这将使我们能够更好地了解历史问题及其法律内涵，再次把不满化为友谊，那么，用同情和宽容看待各种讨论，并期待各方抱有同样的态度，也是理所当然的。
answer: 即便如此,如果我们能够更好地了解历史问题及其法律方面,并再次将怨恨转化为友谊,那么,以同情和容忍的态度对待不同的话语是自然的,并期望各方采取类似的态度。

source: The spirit of the age necessitates dialogue despite differences, understanding by heeding others, evaluating means for compromise, denouncing hatred and praising respect and tolerance.
standard: 时代精神要求我们克服分歧，开展对话，通过倾听理解别人，权衡达成妥协的手段，谴责仇恨，赞美尊重和宽容。
answer: 时代精神需要对话,尽管存在差异,但需要对话,需要理解,需要听取他人的意见,需要评价妥协手段,需要谴责仇恨,需要提倡尊重和容忍。

source: 1. Takes note of the status of contributions to the United Nations Integrated Mission in Timor-Leste as at 30 April 2015, including the contributions outstanding in the amount of 2 million United States dollars, representing some 0.2 per cent of the total assessed contributions, notes with concern that only 152 Member States have paid their assessed contributions in full, and urges all other Member States, in particular those in arrears, to ensure payment of their outstanding assessed contributions;
standard: 1. 表示注意到截至2015年4月30日联合国东帝汶综合特派团摊款的缴纳情况，包括未缴摊款200万美元，约占摊款总额的0.2%，关切地注意到只有152个会员国已足额缴纳摊款，并促请所有其他会员国，尤其是拖欠国，确保缴纳未缴摊款；
answer: 1. 表示注意到截至2015年4月30日联合国东帝汶综合特派团摊款的缴纳情况,包括未缴摊款200万美元,约占摊款总额的0.2%,关切地注意到只有152个会员国已足额缴纳摊款,并促请所有其他会员国,尤其是拖欠国,确保缴纳未缴摊款;

source: The adoption of the concept of access to justice served as a platform for the development of a set of rights-based and socially inclusive goals and targets.
standard: 采用诉诸司法的概念，有助于制定一套以权利为基础和具有社会包容性的目标和指标。
answer: 司法救助概念的通过,是制定一套基于权利的、具有社会包容性的目标和指标的平台。

source: 29C.37 The Strategic Planning and Staffing Division is expected to achieve its objectives and expected accomplishments on the assumption that stakeholders will be supportive of the efforts of, and will extend full cooperation to, the Division.
standard: 29C.37 战略规划和人员配置司预计能实现其目标和预期成绩，前提是利益攸关方支持该司的工作并与其充分合作。
answer: 29C.37 战略规划和人员配置司预计能实现目标和预期成绩,前提是利益攸关方支持该司的努力,并与该司充分合作。
