source: Many representatives expressed the view that the meeting could contribute to, and allow for greater understanding of, the post-2015 development agenda process and several suggested that the present summary could be brought to the attention of the co-facilitators of the intergovernmental negotiations on the post-2015 development agenda.
standard: 许多代表认为，这次会议可为2015年后发展议程方面的工作作出贡献，并有助于更好地理解这项工作，有几位代表建议，可提请2015年后发展议程政府间谈判共同主持人注意本摘要。
answer: 许多代表认为,这次会议可以对2015年后发展议程进程作出贡献,并使人们更好地了解这一进程。 几位代表建议,可以提请2015年后发展议程政府间谈判共同召集人注意本摘要。

source: In particular, questions were posed regarding the possible role of technology, such as cellular phones, how to increase the participation of women in fisheries to increase productivity and how to tackle the impacts on the livelihoods of local communities when conservation and management measures were put in place.
standard: 具体而言，大家提出的问题包括手机等技术可发挥什么作用、如何推动妇女更多地参与渔业以提高生产率、如何应对养护和管理措施到位后地方社区生计受到的影响。
answer: 特别是,有人问及移动电话等技术可能发挥的作用,如何增加妇女参与渔业以提高生产率,以及在实施养护和管理措施时如何处理对当地社区生计的影响。

source: 6. Additional conference-servicing requirements of $670,000 for the biennium 2016-2017 under section 2, General Assembly and Economic and Social Council affairs and conference management, would be required under the proposed programme budget for the biennium 2016-2017 to implement the additional workload.
standard: 6. 在2016-2017两年期拟议方案预算中，必须在第2款(大会和经济及社会理事会事务和会议管理)下提供670 000美元的额外会议事务经费，用于完成额外工作量。
answer: 6. 2016-2017两年期第2款(大会和经济及社会理事会事务和会议管理)下需追加会议服务所需资源670 000美元,在2016-2017两年期拟议方案预算下落实新增工作量。

source: To address the shortcomings of the former research and training coordination committee, the new committee will operate under the guidance of the Secretary-General and will focus on concrete initiatives for enhanced results through collaboration between the members.
standard: 为改进前研究和训练协调委员会的不足之处，新的委员会将在秘书长指导下运作，并将侧重于通过成员之间的合作加强成果的具体举措。
answer: 为解决前研究和培训协调委员会的缺点,新委员会将在秘书长的指导下开展工作,并将侧重于通过成员之间的合作加强成果的具体举措。

source: To respond to new and emerging issues, the United Nations urgently needs to scale up its capacity to provide training at all levels, in the form of learning opportunities for nationals of Member States, including government officials, and for nongovernmental organizations and private sector entities, as well as training opportunities for United Nations staff members in all locations.
standard: 为应对新的和正在出现的问题，联合国迫切需要加强其能力，以各级学习机会的形式为会员国包括政府官员在内的国民、非政府组织和私营部门实体提供培训，并为联合国所有地点的工作人员提供培训机会。
answer: 为应对新的和正在出现的问题,联合国迫切需要扩大能力,在各级提供培训,包括向包括政府官员在内的会员国国民、非政府组织和私营部门实体提供学习机会,并为所有地点的联合国工作人员提供培训机会。

Asks the Group of Experts to assess the effectiveness of these border measures and control in the region, encourages all neighbouring States to be aware of Ivorian efforts in that regard and encourages UNOCI, within its mandate, to continue its assistance to Ivorian authorities in the re-establishment of normal customs and border control operation;
standard: 34. 请专家组评估该区域的这些边境措施和管制办法的效力，鼓励所有邻国注意到科特迪瓦在这方面作出的努力，鼓励联科行动在任务规定范围内，继续协助科特迪瓦当局恢复海关和边境管制的正常运作；
answer: 34. 请专家组评估这些边界措施和管制在该区域的效力,鼓励所有邻国了解科特迪瓦在这方面作出的努力,鼓励联科行动在其任务范围内继续协助科特迪瓦当局重建正常海关和边境管制行动;

source: They should no longer dare pull up the Democratic People's Republic of Korea over all its measures to bolster up its military muscle for self-defence, terming them "provocation" and "threat".
standard: 他们再也不敢因为朝鲜民主主义人民共和国为增强军事自卫力量所采取的任何措施而斥责朝鲜，将这说成"挑衅"和"威胁"。
answer: 他们再也不能敢于拉动朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的所有措施,加强其自卫军事实力,称其为“挑衅”和“威胁”。

source: This is because the Security Council has been reduced to an entity that yields to the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the United States, forgetful of its mission to ensure global peace and security and its duty as prescribed in the Charter of the United Nations, and one which has itself abandoned the principles of respect for sovereignty of other countries and non-interference in their internal affairs after dropping the principle of impartiality.
standard: 这是因为安全理事会已经沦为臣服于美国高压手段和武断做法的实体，忘记了自己确保全球和平与安全的使命，忘记了《联合国宪章》为其规定的义务，在抛弃公正原则之后，又背弃了尊重他国主权和不干涉他国内政的原则。
answer: 这是因为安全理事会已经沦为一个屈服于美国高压和专横做法的实体,忘记了《联合国宪章》为其规定的确保全球和平与安全的使命和义务,在放弃公正原则之后,安理会本身放弃了尊重其他国家主权和不干涉他国内政的原则。

source: On the basis of its consultations with various stakeholders, the outcome of the discussions with UNOCA staff members and informed by its own observations and risk assessment, the review team adopted a series of recommendations.
standard: 根据其与各利益攸关方的协商，与中部非洲区域办工作人员讨论的结果、并参照其自身的观察和风险评估，审查工作队通过了一系列建议。
answer: 根据其与各利益攸关方的协商、与中部非洲区域办工作人员的讨论结果,并根据自身的意见和风险评估,审查小组通过了一系列建议。

source: The resolution of the conflict is possible only on the basis of the sovereignty and territorial integrity of Azerbaijan within its internationally recognized borders.

answer: 只有在阿塞拜疆在其国际公认疆界内的主权和领土完整的基础上,才能解决冲突。

source: Since then, Iran has called for timely implementation of the plan of action which included, inter alia, an agreement to convene a regional conference in 2012 on the establishment of a Middle East zone free of nuclear weapons and all other weapons of mass destruction.

answer: 自那时以来,伊朗一直呼吁及时执行行动计划,其中包括商定在2012年召开一次关于建立中东无核武器和所有其他大规模毁灭性武器区的区域会议。

source: Underlining the importance of the economic and geo-economic aspects of the neutrality of Turkmenistan for regional interconnectivity, which is conducive to regional development, and, in this regard, welcoming the initiatives of Turkmenistan on the stable transit of energy and the development of reliable transport and transit corridors,

answer: 强调土库曼斯坦中立的经济和地理经济方面对区域互联的重要性,这有助于区域发展,并在这方面欢迎土库曼斯坦关于能源稳定过境和发展可靠的运输和过境走廊的倡议,

source: Turkey sincerely shares the suffering of the Armenians in that tragic episode of history.

answer: 土耳其真诚地分担亚美尼亚人在这一悲惨历史事件中的痛苦。

source: The Co-Chairs outlined three priorities in that regard: first, to facilitate early dialogue and timely consultation on United Nations security sector reform strategies in country contexts; second, to support cooperation and security sector reform partnerships on the ground; and third, to lead intergovernmental dialogue and consensus-building on key security sector reform principles, as well as on different thematic areas of security sector reform.
standard: 第一，促进根据有关国家的背景情况尽早和及时就联合国安全部门改革战略开展协商对话；第二，支助实地的合作和安全部门改革伙伴关系；第三，率先就安全部门改革原则以及安全部门改革的不同主题领域开展政府间对话和建立共识。
answer: 共同主席概述了这方面的三个优先事项:第一,促进尽早就国家背景下的联合国安全部门改革战略进行对话和及时协商;第二,支持实地合作和安全部门改革伙伴关系;第三,领导关于安全部门改革关键原则以及安全部门改革不同专题领域的政府间对话和建立共识。

source: The atrocities and blatant violations that have been perpetrated over the course of four years against the Syrian people by a regime that is supposed to be that people's primary protector demonstrates the utter failure of the manner in which the international community has dealt with the officials involved in those crimes.

answer: 22. 3月4日,约200名示威者封锁了洛法州佐尔佐尔的一条主要公路,抗议洛马族一名妇女死亡,据称她是被曼丁戈族一名嫌疑人杀害的。

source: At the outset, regarding the claims of so-called "infringements of international air traffic regulations" and "violations of the national airspace of the Republic of Cyprus by Turkey", I wish, once again, to reiterate that flights within the sovereign airspace of the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus take place with the full knowledge and consent of the relevant authorities of the State, over which the Greek Cypriot administration in South Cyprus has no jurisdiction or right of say whatsoever.
standard: 首先，对于声称的所谓"土耳其违反国际空中交通管制条例"和"侵犯塞浦路斯共和国领空"，我要再次申明，在北塞浦路斯土耳其共和国主权空域内的飞行为本国有关当局充分知悉并获得同意，南塞浦路斯希族塞人当局对此没有任何管辖权和发言权。

source: 10. Between October 2013 and June 2014 the facilitator together with the conveners of the Conference and with the participation of States of the region held five informal meetings in Glion and Geneva, Switzerland, in order to facilitate agreement among the States of the region on the arrangements for the Conference to be held in Helsinki.
standard: 2013年10月至2014年6月，大会主持人和召集方在该区域各国参与下，在瑞士格里昂和日内瓦举行了五次非正式会议，以促使区域各国对赫尔辛基会议的安排达成共识。
answer: 10. 2013年10月至2014年6月期间,协调人与会议召集人一道,在该区域各国的参与下,在瑞士格利昂和瑞士日内瓦举行了五次非正式会议,以推动该区域各国就将在赫尔辛基举行的会议的安排达成协议。

source: Participants contributed actively to the dialogue and presented proposals.
standard: 与会者积极参与对话并提出建议。
answer: 与会者对对话作出了积极贡献,并提出了建议。

source: Recognizing the call made in the Monterrey Consensus of the International Conference on Financing for Development for the strengthening of international tax cooperation through enhanced dialogue among national tax authorities and greater coordination of the work of the multilateral bodies and relevant regional organizations concerned, giving special attention to the needs of developing countries and countries with economies in transition,
standard: 确认《发展筹资问题国际会议蒙特雷共识》呼吁通过促进各国税务当局之间的对话和增进有关多边机构和相关区域组织的工作协调加强国际税务合作，同时特别关注发展中国家和经济转型国家的需要，
answer: 确认《发展筹资问题国际会议蒙特雷共识》 的呼吁,即通过促进各国税务当局之间的对话和加强多边机构和有关区域组织的工作协调加强国际税务合作,特别注意发展中国家和经济转型国家的需要,

source: In Quebec, the homologating court only examines the legality of the act and as a general rule it cannot rule on its advisability or merits (sec. 527 and 528 N.C.p.c.).
standard: 在魁北克，给予批准的法院只是审查该法的合法性，作为一般规则，该法院不能就其可取性或是非曲直作出裁定（《民事诉讼程序新法典》第527条和第528条）。
answer: 在魁北克,同质法院只审查该行为的合法性,作为一般规则,它不能就行为的可取性或长处作出裁定(第527节和第528节,N.C.p.c)。

source: In addition, it should deal with a matter on which settlement can be reached in accordance with Ecuadorian law.
standard: 此外，和解协议涉及的事项应当是能够根据厄瓜多尔法律达成和解的事项。
answer: 此外,它还应处理一个可以根据厄瓜多尔法律解决的事项。

source: The main benefits of harmonized indicators include having a platform for unifying various reports, providing guidance for Governments, the United Nations system, civil society organizations and other stakeholders, contributing to increasing efficiency and effectiveness of Governments, contributing to inter-agency coordination and collaboration, assisting in the coordination between the national and local levels, guiding policymakers in budgeting and in viewing international obligations in conjunction with national priorities.
standard: 指标协调一致的主要好处包括：为统一各种报告提供平台、向政府、联合国系统、民间社会组织和其他利益攸关者提供指导、有助于提高政府的效率和效用、促进机构间的协调与合作、协助国家和地方两级的协调、指导政策制定者编制预算和审视国际义务时不脱离国家优先事项。
answer: 统一指标的主要好处包括:建立一个统一各种报告的平台,为各国政府、联合国系统、民间社会组织和其他利益攸关方提供指导,为提高各国政府的效率和效力作出贡献,促进机构间协调和协作,协助国家和地方各级之间的协调,指导决策者编制预算,结合国家优先事项考虑国际义务。

source: Currently little is known about tiny debris and micrometeoroids in outer space, although having such information is essential for impact risk assessment, for spacecraft survivability analysis, and for designing cost-effective protection for spacecraft.
standard: 关于外层空间的细小碎片和微流星，目前知之甚少，尽管此类信息对碰撞风险评估、对航天器生存力分析和为航天器设计成本效益高的保护是不可或缺的。
answer: 目前对外层空间微小碎片和微流星体所知甚少,尽管拥有这类信息对于影响评估、航天器生存能力分析和设计具有成本效益的航天器保护至关重要。

source: In Japan, activities relating to space debris are mainly conducted by the Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA).
standard: 日本与空间碎片相关的活动主要由日本宇宙航空研究开发机构（宇宙航空机构）进行。
answer: 在日本,与空间碎片有关的活动主要由日本宇宙航空研究开发机构(JAXA)进行。

source: In addition, evaluation resources will be used to conduct eight evaluations of the Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs: four evaluations of field response emergencies and four evaluations of key thematic issues on topics to be determined by the senior management team.
standard: 此外，评价资源还将用于进行人道主义事务协调厅的八项评价：对外地应急行动和关键专题分别进行四项评价，专题由高级管理小组确定。
answer: 此外,评价资源将用于对人道主义事务协调厅进行8项评价:4项外地应急应急评价,4项关于高级管理小组确定的专题的主要专题问题评价。

source: All the planned consultations with the stakeholders have already been completed and the first draft of the post-2015 framework for disaster risk reduction has been developed.
standard: 现已按计划完成所有与利益攸关方的协商，并拟定了2015年后减少灾害风险框架第一稿。
answer: 计划与利益攸关方进行的所有协商已经完成,2015年后减少灾害风险框架第一稿已经拟定。

source: 21. Flexibility and innovation should drive the design of inclusive and effective institutional strategies for effective service delivery.
standard: 21. 灵活性和创新应能推动制定具有包容性和有效的机构战略，以有效提供服务。
answer: 21. 灵活性和创新应推动设计包容和有效的机构战略,以有效提供服务。

source: It is intended as a tool for integrating all three dimensions of sustainable development into policymaking, taking into account long-term effects for future generations as well as spillover effects on other countries outside the Union.
standard: 这一办法旨在将可持续发展的三个层面全部纳入政策制定之中，同时考虑到对千世万代的长期影响以及对欧盟以外的其他国家的影响。
answer: 其目的是作为一个工具,将可持续发展的所有三个层面纳入决策,同时考虑到对后代的长期影响以及对欧盟以外其他国家的外溢效应。

source: The workshop fact sheets describe these in detail, including for 10 main markets and at least 30 subsectors.
standard: 研讨会概况介绍对此做了详细描述，包括10个主要市场和至少30个分部门。
answer: 研讨会概况介绍详细描述了这些情况,包括10个主要市场和至少30个分部门的情况。

source: Encouraging the parties to continue in their respective efforts to enhance the promotion and protection of human rights in Western Sahara and the Tindouf refugee camps, including the freedoms of expression and association,
standard: 鼓励双方继续各自做出努力，在西撒哈拉和廷杜夫难民营进一步促进和保护人权，包括表达自由和结社自由，
answer: 鼓励各方继续各自努力,在西撒哈拉和廷杜夫难民营进一步促进和保护人权,包括言论和结社自由,

source: Affirming full support for the Secretary-General's Personal Envoy for Western Sahara Ambassador Christopher Ross and his work in facilitating negotiations between the parties, and, welcoming to that effect his recent initiatives and ongoing consultations with the parties and neighbouring states,
standard: 申明全力支持秘书长西撒哈拉问题个人特使克里斯托弗·罗斯大使，支持他为协助双方谈判而开展的工作，为此欢迎他最近采取举措并正在与双方和邻国进行磋商，
answer: 申明完全支持秘书长西撒哈拉问题个人特使克里斯托弗·罗斯大使及其为促进双方谈判所做的工作,并为此欢迎他最近提出的倡议和与双方及邻国不断进行的协商,

source: For recommendation (c), the scope and authorities between the Transport and Movement Integrated Control Centre and Strategic Air Operations Centre have been agreed and endorsed by the Regional Service Centre Steering Committee (the governing body of the Transport and Movement Integrated Control Centre).
standard: 对于建议(c)，区域全球服务中心指导委员会(运输和调度综合控制中心理事机构)已商定并核准运输和调度综合控制中心以及战略空中业务中心之间的工作范围和授权。
answer: 关于建议(c),运输和调度综合控制中心与战略空中业务中心的范围和权限已经商定,并得到区域服务中心指导委员会(运输和调度综合控制中心的理事机构)的认可。

source: It is estimated that with the services provided by the four additional temporary staff, the project would be completed within a two-year timeframe.
standard: 据估计，在增加4个临时工作人员后，该项目可能在两年内完成。
answer: 估计在增设4名临时工作人员提供服务后,该项目将在两年时限内完成。

source: The Bribery Act provides that relevant offences may be subject to imprisonment for up to seven years and up to ten years for corruption (section 70).
standard: 《贿赂法》规定，相关犯罪可处以最多七年监禁、腐败罪行可处以最多十年监禁（第70条）。
answer: 《贿赂法》规定,相关犯罪因腐败可被判处最高7年、最高10年的监禁(第70节)。

source: Specialized authorities and inter-agency coordination (arts. 36, 38 and 39)
standard: 专职机关和机构间协调（第三十六、三十八和三十九条）
answer: 专职机关和机构间协调(第三十六、三十八和三十九条)

source: Provisional agenda for the 7444th meeting of the Security Council
standard: 安全理事会第7444次会议临时议程
answer: 安全理事会第7444次会议临时议程

source: Efforts will continue to be made to make human resources management a shared responsibility of programme managers and to strengthen the partnership between individual staff members and supervisors as well as the assistance provided in continued competency development.
standard: 将继续作出努力，使人力资源管理成为方案管理人员的共同责任，加强工作人员个人同主管之间的伙伴关系，并为持续培养能力提供更多协助。
answer: 将继续努力使人力资源管理成为方案管理人员的共同责任,加强个别工作人员和主管之间的伙伴关系,并为持续能力发展提供协助。

source: The net decrease of $352,800 relates primarily to the proposed freezing of recruitment against established posts ($406,800).
standard: 净减352 800美元的主要原因是拟议冻结常设员额的征聘工作(406 800美元)。
answer: 净减352 800美元,主要是由于拟议冻结常设员额的征聘(406 800美元)。

source: Violence and terrorist acts continued during the reporting period, causing loss of life and great suffering and fear among many innocent Lebanese from all communities nationwide.
standard: 本报告所述期间，暴力和恐怖行动持续不断，已导致多人丧生，并给全国各地各族裔许多无辜黎巴嫩人带来深重的苦难和恐惧。
answer: 在本报告所述期间,暴力和恐怖行为继续发生,给来自全国各社区的众多无辜黎巴嫩人造成生命损失和巨大痛苦和恐惧。

source: Furthermore, the first paragraph of the preamble of the NPT itself stresses that this is based on the need to avoid the devastations that a nuclear war would visit on all mankind.
standard: 此外，《不扩散核武器条约》前言第一段中也强调，《条约》是建立在消除核战争可能给全人类造成的破坏的需求之上的。
answer: 此外,《不扩散条约》序言第一段本身强调,这是因为需要避免核战争对全人类造成的破坏。

source: Similar measures would be very important for strengthening nuclear non-proliferation.
standard: 对于加强核不扩散来说，同样的措施也十分重要。
answer: 类似的措施对于加强核不扩散非常重要。

source: The lack of accommodation and food, failure to adapt to new climatic conditions and the rapid spread of diseases had a heavy demographic impact during the first years of exile.
standard: 缺乏住宿和食物，未能适应新的气候条件，以及迅速蔓延的疾病，在流放的头几年里对人口产生了重大影响。
answer: 缺乏住宿和食物,不能适应新的气候条件,疾病迅速蔓延,在流亡的最初几年对人口产生了严重影响。

source: In this regard, it intends to resolutely promote the Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights.
standard: 为此，拟坚决推广《工商业与人权指导原则》。
answer: 在这方面,它打算坚决促进《工商业与人权指导原则》。

source: In this regard, it intends to convene a high-level meeting in 2016 to commemorate the tenth anniversary of the establishment of the Council.
standard: 为此，拟在2016年组织一次高级别会议，纪念该机构成立十周年。
answer: 在这方面,它打算在2016年召开一次高级别会议,纪念理事会成立十周年。

source: For example, it is estimated that rebuilding overfished stocks could increase fishery production by 16.5 million tons and annual revenue by $32 billion, which would certainly increase the contribution of marine fisheries to the food security, economies and well-being of coastal communities.25
standard: 例如，据估计，通过恢复被过度捕捞的鱼种，可以增加1 650万吨的渔业产量，增加320亿美元的年收入，这必将增加海洋渔业对粮食安全、经济和沿海社区福祉的贡献。
answer: 例如,据估计,重建过度捕捞种群可使渔业产量增加1 650万吨,年收入增加320亿美元,这肯定会增加海洋渔业对沿海社区粮食安全、经济和福祉的贡献。 25

source: These capacity-building requirements are particularly high for small island developing States.
standard: 小岛屿发展中国家对这些能力建设的需求尤其强烈。
answer: 小岛屿发展中国家的能力建设要求特别高。

source: 7. As shown in the table under paragraph 11 of the Secretary-General's statement, the total requirements for 2015 are currently estimated at $101,600, of which $4,000 has been identified for absorption within the approved appropriation for section 28, Public information, of the programme budget for the biennium 2014-2015 (see subpara. (b) below).
standard: 7. 如秘书长的说明第11段中的表所示，2015年所需经费总额目前估计为101 600美元，其中4 000美元已确定在2014-2015两年期方案预算第28款(新闻)核定批款范围内匀支(见下文(b)分段)。
answer: 7. 如秘书长的说明第11段下表所示,2015年所需资源总额目前估计为101 600美元,其中4 000美元已确定在2014-2015两年期方案预算第28款(新闻)核定批款范围内匀支(见下文(b)分段)。

source: Upon instructions from my Government, I would like to draw your attention to the provocative and aggressive statement made by the Israeli Defence Minister, Moshe Yaalon, on 5 May 2015, at the Shurat HaDin Law of War Conference in Jerusalem, in which he threatened to use nuclear bombs against Iran and to continue killing civilians, including women and children, in Gaza and Lebanon.
standard: 奉我国政府指示，谨提请你注意以色列国防部长摩西·亚阿隆2015年5月5日在耶路撒冷Shurat HaDin战争法会议上所作的挑衅和侵略性发言，其中威胁要对伊朗使用核弹，并继续在加沙和黎巴嫩杀害包括妇女和儿童在内的平民。
answer: 奉我国政府指示,谨提请你注意以色列国防部长穆罕默德·亚隆2015年5月5日在耶路撒冷舒拉特·哈丁战争法会议上发表的挑衅和侵略性声明,其中他威胁对伊朗使用核炸弹,并继续杀害加沙和黎巴嫩的平民,包括妇女和儿童。

source: Moreover, the occupying forces continue to fire at civilian demonstrators, including, most recently, during demonstrations marking World Press Freedom Day, during which at least 13 Palestinians, including two children and five journalists, were injured.
standard: 此外，占领军继续朝平民示威者开枪，包括最近在纪念世界新闻自由日示威期间，至少13名巴勒斯坦人，包括2名儿童受伤和5名记者受伤。
answer: 此外,占领军继续向平民示威者开火,包括最近在纪念世界新闻自由日的示威活动中,至少有13名巴勒斯坦人受伤,其中包括两名儿童和五名记者。

answer: 2.10 上诉法院于2010年12月7日审议了提交人的上诉,并于2010年12月22日驳回。

source: Immediately thereafter, her brother-in-law ordered her to vacate the house where she was living, and she was told that under Sukuma customary law she could not inherit her husband's estate.
standard: 去世后不久，E.S.的小叔命令她搬出位于现在的居所，并告诉她，依照苏库马习惯法，她无权继承其丈夫的遗产。
answer: 紧接着,她的姐夫命令她搬出所住的房子,她被告知,根据Sukuma习惯法,她不能继承丈夫的遗产。

answer: 22. 联合王国政府的政策仍然符合《战略防卫和安全审查》的规定。

source: a. To reaffirm the 1995 Resolution on the establishment in the Middle East of a zone free of nuclear weapons and all other weapons of mass destruction, which, being the basis upon which the treaty was indefinitely extended without a vote, remains valid until it is fully implemented;
standard: 重申关于建立中东无核武器及所有其他大规模毁灭性武器区的1995年决议仍然有效直到得到完全执行，该决议是未经表决无限期延长《条约》的基本依据；
answer: a. 重申1995年关于建立中东无核武器和所有其他大规模毁灭性武器区的决议,该决议作为不经表决无限期延长条约的基础,在充分执行之前仍然有效;

source: Affirm that the Arab States are concerned primarily with achieving security for their peoples, that the 2012 Conference represents a fork in the road in respect of their nuclear policies, and that the failure of the conference would require them to review their nuclear policies and to adopt alternatives to ensure their security.
standard: 申明阿拉伯国家主要关切实现其人民的安全，2012年会议是其核政策方面的交叉路口，如果会议失败，它们需要重新考虑其核政策，并采取替代办法以确保其安全。
answer: 申明阿拉伯国家主要关心为其人民实现安全,2012年大会是其核政策道路上的叉子,如果会议失败,将需要阿拉伯国家审查其核政策,并采取其他办法确保其安全。

source: Sections 6 and 21 POCA principally cover the confiscation of proceeds and instrumentalities of crime, subject to a "serious offences" threshold, in respect of persons convicted of the offence.
standard: 《犯罪所得法》第6和21条原则上规定，须依照"严重犯罪"的门槛没收与被定罪个人相关的犯罪所得和工具。
answer: 《犯罪所得法》第6节和第21节主要涉及没收犯罪收益和工具,但对于被判有罪的人,必须达到“严重犯罪”门槛。

source: Over the past few days, the visual, audio and print media have carried statements made by some Yemeni officials and some fabricated reports alleging that the Houthis are receiving support from Iran via Eritrea.
standard: 过去几天中，一些也门官员在电视、广播和平面媒体上散布言论，还有一些媒体报编造谎言称，胡塞通过厄立特里亚获得了伊朗的支持。
answer: 近几天来,视频、音频和印刷媒体刊登了一些也门官员的言论和一些捏造的报道,称胡塞人正通过厄立特里亚从伊朗获得支持。

source: The President of the International Committee of the Red Cross, Peter Maurer, in his address in Geneva on 18 February 2015 stated: "We know now more than ever before that the risks are too high, the dangers too real.

source: Those accusations were endorsed by an official of the United Nations Office in Burundi (BNUB), who sent a confidential cable to the United Nations accusing the Government of distributing weapons to civilians, whereas, on the contrary, operations to recover weapons kept illegally by civilians are proving remarkably successful.
standard: 联合国布隆迪办事处(联布办事处)的一名官员认可了上述指控，并向联合国发送一份密电，谎称政府向平民发放武器，随后又收回了平民非法持有的武器，且回收行动极为成功。
answer: 这些指控得到了联合国布隆迪办事处(联布办事处)一名官员的认可,他向联合国发送了一条保密电报,指控政府向平民分发武器,而收回平民非法持有武器的行动却证明非常成功。

source: The latest statistics, which were confirmed by the Burundian and Rwandan sides on a recent visit of the Burundian authorities to Rwanda, indicate that fewer than 2,000 people are involved, and that refugees are returning voluntarily to their hills of origin in Burundi.
standard: 布隆迪当局最近访问卢旺达期间，双方证实了最新统计数据，确认实际人数不足2 000人，而且一些难民已自愿回返布隆迪山区的家园。
answer: 布隆迪和卢旺达双方在最近布隆迪当局访问卢旺达时证实了最新统计数字。 最新统计数字表明,参与人数不到2 000人,难民自愿返回布隆迪的山丘。

source: Evidence of sexual violence is not always readily apparent or easily traced, hence the need for timely, independent and transparent investigations, linked to services and survivor care.

answer: 性暴力的证据并不总是显而易见或容易找到,因此需要及时、独立和透明的调查,并与服务和幸存者护理挂钩。

source: 2. We call for the establishment of an independent Global Youth Council that would consist of outstanding young people, with a view to discussing problems and challenges which are endemic to their communities and are to be taken into consideration when designing appropriate crime prevention and criminal justice responses, and collaborating to find solutions through project development.
standard: 2. 我们号召建立由杰出的年轻人组成的一个独立的全球青年理事会，以讨论其所在社区所独有的并在设计适当的预防犯罪和刑事司法对策时所应考虑的问题和挑战，并且通过项目拟订而合作寻找解决办法。
answer: 2. 我们呼吁建立一个独立的全球青年理事会,由杰出的青年组成,以讨论其社区特有的问题和挑战,在制定适当的预防犯罪和刑事司法对策时应考虑到这些问题和挑战,并通过项目开发合作寻找解决办法。

source: We recognize the need to take or strengthen measures, to alleviate the factors that make persons vulnerable to trafficking, violence, drug abuse, poverty, underdevelopment and lack of equal opportunity.
standard: 我们承认，需要采取或加强相关措施，以减少使得人们易受贩运、暴力、吸毒、贫困、欠发展和缺少平等机会影响的诸因素。
answer: 我们认识到,需要采取或加强措施,以缓解使人易受贩运、暴力、药物滥用、贫穷、不发达和缺乏平等机会之害的各种因素。

source: 10. These conditions present political, economic and security concerns.

answer: 10. 这些情况引起了政治、经济和安全方面的关切。

answer: 有必要制定一个时间表,至少对已经商定的措施规定现实的时间限制。

source: In addition, any interested State may be granted observer status in the Union.
standard: 此外，任何感兴趣的国家都可获得在联盟的观察员地位。
answer: 此外,任何有关国家均可获得联盟观察员地位。

source: Under article 1 of the Treaty on the Eurasian Economic Union, the Union is an international organization for regional economic integration and has international legal personality.
standard: 根据《欧亚经济联盟条约》第1条，联盟是一个具有国际法律人格的国际区域经济一体化组织。
answer: 根据《欧亚经济联盟条约》第一条,联盟是一个促进区域经济一体化的国际组织,具有国际法律人格。

source: In that regard, the Secretary-General noted that a broader geographic diversity among the staff is a priority concern for the entire Secretariat and accordingly that targets for recruitment of unrepresented and underrepresented nationalities are applied to the Secretariat as a whole and are included in the senior manager compacts with the Secretary-General.
standard: 在这方面，秘书长指出，扩大工作人员地域多样性是整个秘书处首要关切的问题之一，因此，征聘无人任职和任职人数不足的国家公民的目标适用于整个秘书处，而且列在高级管理人员与秘书长的契约中。
answer: 在这方面,秘书长指出,扩大工作人员地域多样性是整个秘书处的一个优先关切,因此,征聘无人任职和任职人数偏低的国籍的目标适用于整个秘书处,并列入高级管理人员与秘书长的契约。

source: Switzerland welcomes the fact that the members of the Conference have considered such proposals and are implementing some of the recommendations made with regard to its working methods, but it is also of the view that members of the Conference should now urgently reassess the Conference's working methods in depth.
standard: 瑞士欢迎裁军谈判会议成员审议了此类提议，并正在落实就其工作方法提出的一些建议，但瑞士还认为，此刻裁军谈判会议成员应紧急深入评估裁军谈判会议的工作方法。
answer: 瑞士欢迎裁谈会成员审议了这些提案,并正在执行就其工作方法提出的一些建议,但瑞士还认为,裁谈会成员现在应当紧急深入重新评估裁谈会的工作方法。

source: Switzerland strongly believes that obligations and commitments in all the three pillars are inextricably linked, which is why unfulfilled commitments in any of the three pillars have a negative impact on the other pillars, and thus on the Treaty as a whole.
standard: 瑞士坚信，所有三大支柱的义务和承诺都密切相关，因此，不履行其中任何一个支柱的承诺都会给其他支柱带来不利影响，并进而影响到整个条约。
answer: 瑞士坚信,所有三大支柱的义务和承诺是不可分割地联系在一起的,这就是为什么三大支柱中任何一个支柱的未兑现承诺对其他支柱,进而对整个《条约》产生消极影响的原因。

source: The Government of Yemen requests the Security Council to demand that the Government of the Islamic Republic of Iran stop its continued intervention in Yemeni affairs, as such an irresponsible action represents a flagrant attack on the unity, integrity and sovereignty of Yemen and an attempt to undermine its legitimate Government.
standard: 也门政府请安全理事会要求伊朗伊斯兰共和国政府停止继续介入也门事务，因为这种不负责任的行动是对也门统一、完整和主权的公然侵犯，是企图破坏合法政府。
answer: 也门政府请安全理事会要求伊朗伊斯兰共和国政府停止继续干预也门事务,因为这种不负责任的行动是对也门统一、完整和主权的公然攻击,企图破坏也门的合法政府。

source: At least 30 people, many of them children and women, received medical treatment for symptoms consistent with chlorine gas attacks, including nausea and difficulty in breathing.
standard: 至少有30人接受了治疗，其中许多是儿童和妇女，其症状包括恶心和呼吸困难，与遭氯气攻击出现的症状一致。
answer: 至少有30人,其中许多是儿童和妇女,因与氯气袭击相符的症状,包括恶心和呼吸困难接受了治疗。

source: If the Council cannot act because of the irresponsible use of the veto, concerned Member States must set up an alternative mechanism, such as an ad hoc tribunal.

answer: 如果安理会由于不负责任地使用否决权而无法采取行动,有关会员国必须建立一个替代机制,如特设法庭。

answer: 21. 儿童基金会许多方案国家,包括孟加拉国、中国、肯尼亚、马尔代夫、缅甸和阿拉伯叙利亚共和国,最初努力在教育系统中影响女孩的中等教育议程,它们利用生活技能教育作为切入点。

answer: 据伊朗伊斯兰共和国外交部称,这种行动只会使解决该地区问题复杂化。

answer: 还将向执行局提交审计咨询委员会的报告和有关管理部门的回应。

source: The parties to the conflict are called upon to end the violence in order to create space for development, including by increasing expenditure on basic social services.

source: 3. Recognizes the increasing workload and complexity of issues considered by the Advisory Committee, and therefore considers that the current operational arrangements of the Committee, including the conditions of service of its members, should be improved;
standard: 3. 认识到行预咨委会工作量不断增加，审议的议题日益复杂，因此认为应改进行预咨委会当前的业务安排，包括其成员的服务条件；
answer: 3. 认识到咨询委员会审议的问题工作量和复杂性日益增加,因此认为委员会目前的业务安排,包括成员的服务条件,应予改进;

source: 9. Further recalls paragraphs 31, 39 and 40 of the report of the Advisory Committee,4 and requests the Secretary-General to better assess the potential costs and benefits of a preventive maintenance programme, as compared with the existing reactive approach, including through a more in-depth analysis of the life-cycle replacement methodology, as well as a comparison with the application of similar strategies in other public entities, and to report thereon in the next progress report;
standard: 9. 还回顾行预咨委会报告 第31、39和40段，并请秘书长对照现有的被动方式，更好地评估预防性维修保养计划的潜在成本和效益，包括通过更深入地分析使用寿命期间的更换方法以及比较其他公共实体运用同类策略的情况，并在下一次的进展报告中就此作出说明；
answer: 9. 还回顾咨询委员会报告4 第31、39和40段,请秘书长更好地评估预防性维持方案与现行被动办法相比的潜在成本和效益,包括更深入分析生命周期替代方法,与其他公共实体应用类似战略进行比较,并在下一次进度报告中报告有关情况;

source: 34. Upon enquiry, the Advisory Committee was informed that the existing two Security Officer positions (P-3) were located in the regional offices of Makamba and Gitega and that, owing to the distance involved, would not be able to assume these functions also in Bujumbura.

answer: 34. 行预咨委会询问后获悉,现有的2个安保干事职位(P-3)设在马坎巴和基特加区域办事处,由于距离遥远,无法在布琼布拉也承担这些职能。

source: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs coordinates the implementation of international sanctions in the Republic of Lithuania and provides natural and legal persons with information about the issues pertaining to the implementation of the international sanctions.
standard: 外交部负责协调国际制裁在立陶宛共和国境内的执行并就与执行国际制裁有关的问题向自然人和法人提供信息。
answer: 外交部协调在立陶宛共和国执行国际制裁的工作,并向自然人和法人提供有关执行国际制裁问题的信息。

source: The Permanent Mission of the Republic of Lithuania to the United Nations presents its compliments to the Security Council Committee established pursuant to Security Council resolution 2206 (2015) concerning South Sudan and has the honour to refer to Security Council resolution 2206 (2015).
standard: 立陶宛共和国常驻联合国代表团向安全理事会关于南苏丹的第2206(2015)号决议所设委员会致意，并谨提及安理会第2206(2015)号决议。
answer: 立陶宛共和国常驻联合国代表团向安全理事会关于南苏丹的第2206(2015)号决议所设委员会致意,并谨提及安全理事会第2206(2015)号决议。

source: Therefore, the total elimination of nuclear weapons is the only absolute guarantee against their use or threat of use.
standard: 因此，彻底消除核武器是防止使用或威胁使用核武器的唯一绝对保障。
answer: 因此,彻底消除核武器是防止使用或威胁使用核武器的唯一绝对保证。

source: 8. As the International Court of Justice, in its advisory opinion of 8 July 1996 on the legality of the threat or use of nuclear weapons, decided, "there is in neither customary nor conventional international law any specific authorization of the threat or use of nuclear weapons", and "the threat or use of nuclear weapons would generally be contrary to the rules of international law applicable in armed conflict, and in particular the principles and rules of humanitarian law".
standard: 8. 国际法院在1996年7月8日关于以核武器进行威胁或使用核武器的合法性问题的咨询意见中称："习惯国际法或协定国际法中没有任何明确规定允许以核武器相威胁或使用核武器"，而且"以核武器相威胁或使用核武器一般都违反武装冲突中适用的国际法规则，特别是人道主义法的原则和规则"。
answer: 8. 国际法院在1996年7月8日关于以核武器进行威胁或使用核武器的合法性的咨询意见中裁定,“习惯国际法和常规国际法都没有具体授权以核武器进行威胁或使用核武器”,“以核武器进行威胁或使用核武器一般违背适用于武装冲突的国际法规则,特别是人道主义法原则和规则”。

source: Founded in 1988, the East-West Management Institute is a non-profit organization that works to strengthen democratic societies by bringing together Government, civil society and the private sector to build effective institutions.
standard: 东-西管理学院成立于1988年，是一个非盈利组织，致力于通过聚集政府、民间社会和私营部门共同构建有效机构，从而加强民主社会。
answer: 东西管理研究所成立于1988年,是一个非营利组织,致力于通过汇集政府、民间社会和私营部门建立有效的机构来加强民主社会。

source: In accordance with paragraph 17 of the terms of reference and paragraph 13 of the guidelines, within three weeks of officially being informed, a State party under review should appoint a focal point, and should inform the secretariat accordingly, to coordinate its participation in the review.
standard: 9. 根据职权范围第17段和准则第13段，受审议缔约国在正式获知后三个星期内应当指定一个负责协调其参加审议事宜的联络点，并相应通知秘书处。
answer: 根据职权范围第17段和准则第13段,受审议缔约国应在接到正式通知后三周内指定一个联络点,并相应通知秘书处,以协调其参与审议。

source: In our own traditional culture, war ethics strictly prevent harming children and women in war.
standard: 我们自己的传统文化认为，战争道德严禁战争伤害儿童和妇女。
answer: 在我们自己的传统文化中,战争伦理严格防止在战争中伤害儿童和妇女。

source: Approximately 1 million men were circumcised in 2013 and a cumulative total of nearly 6 million men had been reached for voluntary medical male circumcision within 14 priority countries by the end of 2013 [2].
standard: 截至2013年年底，14个重点国家累计共有近600万人已自愿接受医疗包皮环切手术[2]。
answer: 2013年约有100万男子接受了环切手术,截至2013年底,共有近600万男子在14个优先国家自愿接受男性环切手术。 [2]

source: Thailand, Ukraine and Viet Nam have reported the most significant declines in new HIV infections among people who inject drugs during that time, while in certain countries in Asia and the Pacific, Central Asia and Eastern Europe, slow progress has given way to an apparent rise in HIV prevalence among the members of this group, of between 18 per cent and 31 per cent [1].
standard: 在此期间，泰国、乌克兰、越南报告的注射毒品使用者新增感染艾滋病毒人数减幅最大，但在亚太、中亚、东欧某些国家，该群体的艾滋病毒感染率原有的缓慢进展变为明显上升，升幅在18%至31%之间[1]。
answer: 在此期间,泰国、乌克兰和越南报告注射吸毒者中新增艾滋病毒感染人数下降幅度最大,而在亚洲和太平洋、中亚和东欧的某些国家,进展缓慢,原因是该组成员艾滋病毒感染率明显上升,在18%至31%之间[1]。

source: I count on your leadership in taking forward this important issue, in particular through the early dispatch to Ukraine of a preliminary assessment mission as requested by President Poroshenko, so as to bring, as soon as possible, lasting peace and stability to the affected areas of the Luhansk and Donetsk regions of Ukraine in accordance with the Minsk agreements.
standard: 我期待你领导推动对这个重要问题的处理，尤其是应波罗申科总统的请求，及早向乌克兰派遣一个初步评估团，以尽快按照明斯克协议，在乌克兰卢甘斯克和顿涅茨克地区的受影响区域实现持久和平与稳定。
answer: 我指望你发挥领导作用,推动解决这一重要问题,特别是按照波罗申科总统的要求,尽早向乌克兰派遣一个初步评估团,以便根据明斯克协议,尽快在乌克兰卢甘斯克和顿涅茨克地区受影响地区实现持久和平与稳定。

source: One S-356 Turkish submarine violated the territorial waters of the Republic of Cyprus and illegally used the closed port of Kerynia while participating in naval exercises of the occupation forces.
standard: 一艘S-356型土耳其潜艇在参加占领军的海上演习时侵犯了塞浦路斯共和国领水，并非法使用了非开放的凯里尼亚港。
answer: 一艘土耳其S-356潜艇在参加占领军的海上演习时侵犯塞浦路斯共和国领水,并非法使用Kerynia非开放港口。

source: 30. The African Climate Policy Centre is providing critical technical backstopping support to the African group of negotiators to ensure that key research findings are fed into negotiation strategies and reflect essential pivots for a common African position.
standard: 30. 非洲气候政策中心正在向非洲谈判小组提供关键技术援助，确保重大研究结果纳入谈判策略并反映出非洲共同立场的主要要点。
answer: 30. 非洲气候政策中心正在向非洲谈判者小组提供关键的技术支持,以确保关键的研究成果被纳入谈判战略,并反映非洲共同立场的基本要点。

source: 42. At the time of writing, the seventy-first session of ESCAP was to be held from 25 to 29 May 2015 under the theme "Balancing the three dimensions of sustainable development: from integration to implementation".
standard: 42. 在编写本报告时，亚太经社会第七十一届会议计划于2015年5月25日至29 日举行，主题是"平衡可持续发展的三个层面：从整合到实施"。
answer: 42. 在编写本报告时,亚太经社会第七十一届会议将于2015年5月25日至29日举行,主题为"平衡可持续发展的三个层面:从一体化到执行"。

source: The Director General will incur expenditures from the MCIF to implement major capital investments in compliance with the Financial Regulations and Rules of UNIDO.
standard: 29. 总干事将动用主要资本投资基金的经费，按照工发组织财务条例和细则进行重大资本投资。
answer: 总干事将从多边投资综合基金中支取支出,以便按照工发组织《财务条例和细则》进行重大资本投资。

source: 1. Decides to establish an open-ended intergovernmental expert working group comprising experts nominated by States and supported by the United Nations Office for Disaster Risk Reduction, with the involvement of relevant stakeholders, for the development of a set of possible indicators to measure global progress in the implementation of the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction 2015-2030, coherent with the work of the Inter-Agency and Expert Group on Sustainable Development Goal Indicators;
standard: 1. 决定设立一个由会员国提名专家组成的不限成员名额政府间专家工作组，由联合国减少灾害风险办公室提供支助，并在各利益攸关方的参与下，负责与可持续发展目标各指标机构间专家组的工作协调一致，为计量《2015-2030年仙台减少灾害风险框架》执行工作全球进展情况制订一套可用指标；
answer: 1. 决定设立一个不限成员名额政府间专家工作组,由各国提名并得到联合国减少灾害风险办公室支持的专家组成,由相关利益攸关方参与,制定一套可能的指标,以衡量2015-2030年仙台减少灾害风险框架全球执行进展情况,与可持续发展目标各项指标机构间专家组的工作保持一致;

source: Please provide details on the number of cases of discrimination against women that have been reported and processed by such mechanisms, if they exist, and indicate whether women have simple and secure access to them and can benefit from legal aid.

answer: 请提供详细资料,说明此类机制举报和处理的歧视妇女案件数量,如果有,请说明妇女能否简便而安全地利用这些案例,能否从法律援助中受益。

source: We believe this to be an important and necessary step towards holding the perpetrators of crimes against children responsible for their actions, contributing to the efforts to end impunity and protecting children in all situations of armed conflict, without exception.

answer: 我们认为,这是一个重要和必要的步骤,有助于追究犯下侵害儿童罪行者对其行动的责任,促进在所有武装冲突局势中无一例外地结束有罪不罚现象和保护儿童的努力。

source: Switzerland welcomes the fact that some reports by the nuclear-weapon States on their undertakings to implement actions 5 (e) and 5 (f) of the action plan included information about the operational status of nuclear weapons but regrets that no new elements regarding operational readiness were contained in those reports.
standard: 瑞士欢迎核武器国家提出一些它们执行行动计划中的行动5(e)和5(f)的报告，其中包括提供了核武器备战状态的信息，但感到遗憾的是，这些报告没有提供有关备战状况的新材料。
answer: 瑞士欢迎核武器国家关于其承诺执行行动计划行动5(e)和5(f)的一些报告载有关于核武器战备状态的信息,但遗憾的是,这些报告没有包含关于战备状态的新内容。

source: Switzerland urges the nuclear-weapon States to fully implement their obligations under article VI of the Treaty and to engage in good-faith negotiations on further nuclear disarmament steps.
standard: 瑞士敦促核武器国家充分履行它们根据《不扩散条约》第六条承担的义务，就核裁军的进一步步骤真诚开展谈判。
answer: 瑞士敦促核武器国家充分履行《条约》第六条规定的义务,并就进一步的核裁军步骤进行真诚谈判。

source: My Special Envoy and UNHCR continue to work together to seek durable solutions for the residents through consular and humanitarian channels.

source: I expect that crimes will be duly investigated so that their perpetrators can be held accountable and justice established.

source: 23. source: 38. source: 25. The Conference reaffirms the unequivocal undertaking by the nuclear-weapon States to accomplish the total elimination of their nuclear arsenals leading to nuclear disarmament, to which all States parties are committed under Article VI, and affirms the importance of achieving and maintaining a world without nuclear weapons.
standard: 25. 审议大会还重申，核武器国家明确承诺彻底消除其核武库，从而最终实现所有缔约国按照《条约》第六条承诺的核裁军，并申明必须建立和维持一个无核武器的世界。
answer: 25. 审议大会重申核武器国家明确承诺彻底消除其核武库,最终实现所有缔约国根据第六条承诺的核裁军,并申明实现和维持一个无核武器世界的重要性。

source: 20. The Conference recognizes and welcomes the steps taken to implement the Treaty between the Russian Federation and the United States of America on Measures for the Further Reduction and Limitation of Strategic Offensive Arms, and the significant reductions in deployed and non-deployed nuclear weapons, including their declaration of dismantling nuclear weapon delivery vehicles.

answer: 20. 审议大会确认并欢迎为执行《俄罗斯联邦和美利坚合众国关于进一步削减和限制进攻性战略武器措施条约》而采取的步骤,以及已部署和未部署的核武器的大幅减少,包括宣布拆除核武器运载工具。

source: In this regard, spending containment measures should take into account the need to protect investment and avoid vicious circles whereby fiscal overadjustments strangle growth and tax revenues, ultimately widening the deficit and increasing the public debt burden.

source: It has also stated that it supports any genuine international effort aimed at countering the scourge of terrorism in all its forms and manifestations, provided that, in doing so, every effort is made to safeguard civilian lives, respect national sovereignty and adhere to international instruments.
standard: 叙利亚还指出，其支持通过任何国际努力打击一切形式和表现的恐怖主义，前提是在此过程中要尽一切努力保卫平民生命、尊重国家主权、遵守国际文书。
answer: 它还指出,它支持旨在打击一切形式和表现的恐怖主义祸害的任何真正的国际努力,条件是,在这样做时,必须尽一切努力保护平民生命,尊重国家主权和遵守国际文书。

source: Currently, efforts are being made to expand institutional coordination in the AIMS region through discussions between the Indian Ocean Commission (IOC) and UNDP, inter alia.
standard: 目前正在努力通过印度洋委员会和开发署等机构之间的讨论来扩大AIMS区域之间的体制协调。
answer: 目前,正在作出努力,通过印度洋委员会(印度洋委员会)与开发计划署之间的讨论,扩大大西洋、印度洋、地中海和南海区域的机构协调。

source: 6. The Arab States affirm the importance of the right of each State to make choices and decisions on the peaceful use of nuclear energy without prejudice to its policies or the agreements and arrangements which it concludes in the scope of international cooperation programmes concerning the peaceful uses of nuclear energy and without prejudice to its nuclear fuel cycle policy.
standard: 6. 阿拉伯国家申明每一个国家有权就和平利用核能问题做出自己的选择和决定的重要性，而不妨碍其政策或它在和平利用核能国际合作方案范围内签订的协定和安排，也不妨碍其核燃料循环政策。
answer: 6. 阿拉伯国家申明,每个国家有权作出和平利用核能的选择和决定,但不影响其在和平利用核能国际合作方案范围内所缔结的各项政策或协定和安排,也不妨碍其核燃料循环政策。

source: The decline in the prices of oil and other commodities contributed to that process, leading to lower deficits in several large commodity importers and smaller surpluses or even deficits in major commodity exporters, notably Saudi Arabia and other Gulf Cooperation Council countries.
standard: 石油和其他商品价格的下跌助长了这一过程，从而导致几个主要商品进口国的逆差减少，主要商品出口国、特别是沙特阿拉伯和海湾合作委员会其他国家的顺差缩小，甚至出现逆差。
answer: 石油和其他商品价格下跌促成了这一进程,导致几个大型商品进口国的赤字减少,主要商品出口国,特别是沙特阿拉伯和其他海湾合作委员会国家的盈余或甚至赤字减少。

source: However, weak growth in wages and labour income will fail to make up for the higher price level, and private consumption is expected to further recede slightly in 2015 before resuming growth in 2016.
standard: 然而，工资和劳动收入的疲软增长将无法弥补价格水平的上涨，私人消费预期在2015年进一步小幅减退，之后在2016年恢复增长。
answer: 然而,工资和劳动收入增长疲软将无法弥补较高的物价水平,预计私人消费在2016年恢复增长之前,将在2015年进一步略有下降。

source: In this vein, Brazil has actively supported proposals of several of the presidencies of the Conference on possible programmes of work.

answer: 本着这一精神,巴西积极支持裁谈会几位主席关于可能的工作方案的建议。

source: Despite the continued efficiency of the Governing Board, the Republika Srpska members remained opposed to regular adjustments of indirect tax revenue allocation coefficients as well as to the indirect tax revenue settlements for the second half of 2012 and the first half of 2014, for which the Republika Srpska owes the Federation approximately Euro21 million.
standard: 尽管理事会继续有效发挥作用，塞族共和国成员仍然反对定期调整间接税收分配系数以及对2012年下半年和2014年上半年的间接税收入作出清算。
answer: 尽管管理委员会的效率继续提高,塞族共和国成员仍然反对定期调整间接税收分配系数,反对2012年下半年和2014年上半年间接税收结算,塞族共和国欠联邦约2 100万欧元。

source: 6. standard: 6. 常设论坛呼吁联合国会员国遵照《联合国土著人民权利宣言》的规定，在其法律中承认存在的土著人民，以便收集相关统计数据，特别是关于为传统用途划拨土地和其他自然资源的数据。
answer: 6. 常设论坛吁请联合国会员国根据《联合国土著人民权利宣言》的规定,在其立法中承认现有的土著人民,以便收集这方面的统计数据,特别是在分配土地和其他自然资源用于传统用途方面。

source: 1. standard: 1. 在制定指标时，应将重点放在土著人民的愿景和世界观，并以集体权利为依据，包括对身份、土地、领地、传统知识的权利；自由、事先和知情同意的权利以及妇女参与地方、国家和国际决策进程的权利。
answer: 1. 在制定指标时,重点应放在土著人民的愿景和世界观,其基础是集体权利,如身份、土地、领土、传统知识、自由、事先和知情同意以及妇女参与地方、国家和国际决策进程。

source: I would like to thank the transitional authorities of the Central African Republic for their warm welcome, Mr. Gaye, Special Representative of the Secretary-General, and his Office for all their assistance and continued support, as well as the Peacebuilding Support Office for its timely and substantive advice and support.

answer: 17. 项目厅通过在线学习方案 " 提高廉正意识倡议 " 提供在线道德操守培训,培训对象是各级人员,重点是工作场所应遵守的核心价值观和廉正标准。

source: After this workplan, an overall summary report, bringing together all the results of the technical and economic studies, will be prepared.
standard: 在这一工作计划后，将编写一份总体情况摘要报告，汇集技术和经济研究的所有成果。
answer: 工作计划结束后,将编写一份汇总技术和经济研究所有成果的汇总报告。

source: 6. At the current stage of exploration, there are still uncertainties about both the geometry of the palaeochannels and the geomechanical properties of their formation.
standard: 6. 在目前的勘探阶段，古河道的几何形状及其地层的地质力学性能仍然不明确。
answer: 6. 在目前勘探阶段,古礁通道的几何特征及其形成的地质力学特性仍存在不确定性。

source: Through their expertise, experience and political standing, the group is tasked with supporting and complementing efforts to promote the Treaty's entry into force as well as reinvigorating international endeavours to achieve this goal.
standard: 该小组凭借其专业知识、经验和政治地位，负责协助和补充完善为促进《条约》生效而做的努力，并重振国际努力，以实现这一目标。
answer: 通过其专长、经验和政治地位,该小组的任务是支持和补充促进《条约》生效的努力,并重振实现这一目标的国际努力。

source: 36. Appreciates the work of the Paris Pact initiative and its "Paris-Moscow" process in countering the production, trafficking and consumption of opium and heroin from Afghanistan and the elimination of poppy crops, drug laboratories and stores as well as the interception of drug convoys, underlines the importance of border management cooperation, and welcomes the intensified cooperation of the relevant United Nations institutions with the OSCE and the CSTO in this regard;
standard: 36. 赞赏巴黎公约倡议及其"巴黎-莫斯科"进程在打击源于阿富汗的鸦片和海洛因生产、贩运和消费，铲除罂粟作物、毒品实验室和商店以及拦截毒品运送队方面开展的工作，着重指出边界管理合作的重要性，欢迎联合国有关机构加强与欧安组织和集体安全条约组织在这方面的合作；
answer: 36. 赞赏《巴黎公约》倡议及其“巴黎-莫斯科”进程在打击来自阿富汗的鸦片和海洛因生产、贩运和消费、铲除罂粟作物、毒品实验室和商店以及拦截毒品车队方面的工作,强调边界管理合作的重要性,并欢迎联合国有关机构在这方面加强与欧安组织和集体安全条约组织的合作;

source: 100. The Secretary-General's report indicates that the Field Operations and Technical Cooperation Division of the Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights provides support to the peacekeeping operations mainly through its Peace Mission Support Section and the three geographical branches (the Africa Branch, the Asia-Pacific and Middle East and North Africa Branch and the Americas, Europe and Central Asia Branch).
standard: 100. 秘书长的报告指出，联合国人权事务高级专员办事处外勤业务和技术合作司主要通过其维持和平特派团支助科和三个地域分支机构(非洲处、亚洲-太平洋及中东和北非处以及美洲、欧洲和中亚处)，为维持和平行动提供支助。
answer: 100. 秘书长的报告指出,联合国人权事务高级专员办事处外勤业务和技术合作司主要通过其和平特派团支助科和三个地域处(非洲处、亚太和中东和北非处以及美洲、欧洲和中亚处)向维持和平行动提供支助。

source: The Committee was also informed that, depending on the outcome of the classification, the existing level of a post could be confirmed or changed upward or downward.
standard: 行预咨委会还获悉，根据叙级结果，某一员额的现有职等可能维持不变，也可能上升或下降。
answer: 行预咨委会还获悉,视叙级结果而定,现有员额的职等可以确认,也可以上调或下调。

source: Under the highly successful 1993 U.S.-Russia HEU Purchase Agreement, 500 metric tons of Russian weapons-origin HEU, which is equivalent to roughly 20,000 nuclear warheads, has been down-blended into LEU for use in U.S. nuclear power plants.
standard: 根据高度成功的《1993年美国-俄罗斯高浓缩铀购买协议》，有500公吨俄罗斯武器用高浓缩铀(相当于近20 000枚核弹头)被稀释成低浓缩铀供美国核电站使用。
answer: 根据1993年美国-俄罗斯非常成功的高浓缩铀采购协定,500公吨俄罗斯武器产高浓缩铀,相当于大约20 000枚核弹头,被稀释为低浓缩铀,用于美国核电厂。

source: Our report to the 2015 RevCon shows the stockpile has now been reduced to 4,717 warheads with an additional 87 warheads removed from the stockpile since our report to the 2014 NPT Preparatory Committee meeting.
standard: 我们给2015年审议大会的报告指出，现在核储备已经削减到4 717枚弹头，从我们对不扩散核武器条约筹备委员会2014年会议提交报告以来，已另行移除了储备中的87枚弹头。
answer: 我们向2015年审议大会提交的报告显示,自我们向2014年不扩散条约筹备委员会会议报告以来,储存已经减少到4 717枚弹头,从储存中又清除了87枚弹头。

source: It found that Equatorial Guinea continued to heavily rely on the hydrocarbon sector and had a significant imbalance between the high level of per capita income and the low level of its human assets index.
standard: 委员会认定，赤道几内亚仍继续严重依赖油气部门，并且存在人均收入高而人力资产指数低的严重不平衡问题。
answer: 它认为,赤道几内亚继续严重依赖碳氢化合物部门,人均收入高与人力资产指数低之间严重失衡。

source: Concurrently, the generation of non-oil revenues remains at lower levels than foreseen in the current budget, while the rising cost of the ongoing conflict continued to skew Government expenditure towards security, at the expense of funding for other sectors.
standard: 同时，产生的非石油收入低于目前预算预计的水平，而持续冲突的费用不断增加继续迫使政府以其他部门的资金为代价把资金用于安全方面。
answer: 同时,产生非石油收入的水平仍然低于本期预算的预期水平,同时,持续冲突成本的上升继续扭曲政府用于安全的支出,牺牲了其他部门的资金。

source: The IAEA Statute contains the objective of accelerating and enlarging "the contribution of atomic energy to peace, health, and prosperity throughout the world."
standard: 《原子能机构规约》所载的一项目标是加速和扩大"原子能对全世界和平、健康及繁荣的贡献"。
answer: 原子能机构《规约》载有加速和扩大“原子能对世界和平、健康和繁荣的贡献”的目标。

source: The United States has fully supported each of these measures, and will continue to consider additional multilateral measures to ensure reliable access to nuclear fuel, an objective of Action 58 in the 2010 NPT Action Plan.
standard: 美国全力支持这些措施中的每一项，而且我们将继续考虑补充多边措施，以确保以可靠方式获得核燃料，这是《不扩散条约2010年行动计划》行动58的一个目标。
answer: 美国完全支持其中每一项措施,并将继续考虑采取其他多边措施,确保可靠地获得核燃料,这是2010年《不扩散条约行动计划》行动58的目标。

source: 2. Reaffirm the mutually reinforcing relationship between nuclear disarmament and nuclear non-proliferation, both vertical and horizontal, confirming that progress on nuclear non-proliferation remains unsustainable without parallel progress in nuclear disarmament.
standard: 重申核裁军与核不扩散之间在横向和纵向上都具有互连互补关系，确认没有核裁军方面的平行进展，核不扩散方面取得的进展仍然是不可持续的。
answer: 2. 重申核裁军与纵向和横向核不扩散之间相辅相成的关系,确认在核不扩散方面取得的进展如果核裁军没有平行进展,仍然是不可持续的。

source: 3. The resolution on the Middle East and the decision entitled "Principles and objectives of nuclear non-proliferation and disarmament", adopted at the 1995 Review and Extension Conference as part of the indefinite extension package, highlighted the essential foundation that the goals of universality and nuclear disarmament represent for the indefinitely extended Treaty, its effectiveness and credibility.
standard: 1995年审议和延期大会通过的关于中东问题的决议和题为"核不扩散与核裁军的原则和目标"的决定，是无限期延长一揽子方案的组成部分，该决议和决定突出强调普遍加入和核裁军目标对于无限期延期该条约、其实效和公信力而言起到根基作用。
answer: 3. 1995年审议和延期大会通过的中东问题决议和题为"核不扩散与核裁军的原则和目标"的决定,作为无限期延长一揽子计划的一部分,突出了普遍性和核裁军目标代表无限期延长的《条约》、其效力和信誉的重要基础。

source: On behalf of the people of Syria and the National Coalition of Syrian Revolutionary and Opposition Forces, it is with great alarm that I draw your attention to the humanitarian disaster currently unfolding in the Yarmouk refugee camp.
standard: 我谨代表叙利亚人民和叙利亚反对派和革命力量全国联盟，提请你注意亚尔穆克难民营目前正在发生的、十分令人震惊的人道主义灾难。
answer: 我非常震惊地代表叙利亚人民和叙利亚革命和反对派力量全国联盟提请你注意目前在耶尔穆克难民营发生的人道主义灾难。

source: In that same decision, the Conference of the Parties also decided to evaluate the effectiveness of the implementation of the memorandum of understanding between the Conference of the Parties and the Council of the Global Environment Facility at the eighth meeting of the Conference of the Parties and every two years thereafter.
standard: 在同一项决定中，缔约方大会还决定在缔约方大会第八次会议上、并于此后每两年对缔约方大会与全球环境基金理事会之间谅解备忘录执行工作的成效进行评价。
answer: 在同一决定中,缔约方大会还决定在缔约方大会第八届会议上评价缔约方大会与全球环境基金理事会之间谅解备忘录执行工作的成效,并在其后每两年评估一次。

source: Further condemning harassment and targeting of civil society, humanitarian personnel and journalists, and emphasizing that those responsible for violations of international humanitarian law and violations and abuses of human rights must be held accountable and that the Government of South Sudan bears the primary responsibility to protect civilians within its territory and subject to its jurisdiction, including from potential crimes against humanity and war crimes,
standard: 还谴责骚扰人道主义人员和记者和针对其采取行动的行为，强调必须追究应对违反国际人道主义法和侵犯践踏人权行为负责的人的责任，并强调南苏丹政府负有保护其领土内受其管辖的平民、包括不让他们受危害人类罪和战争罪侵害的首要责任，
answer: 进一步谴责骚扰和针对民间社会、人道主义人员和记者的行为,强调必须追究应对违反国际人道主义法以及侵犯和践踏人权行为负责者的责任,并强调南苏丹政府负有保护其领土内和受其管辖的平民的首要责任,包括防止可能犯下危害人类罪和战争罪的首要责任,

source: Underscoring its grave alarm and concern regarding the worsening political, security, and humanitarian crisis in South Sudan resulting from the internal Sudan People's Liberation Movement (SPLM) political dispute and subsequent violence caused by the country's political and military leaders,
standard: 特别指出安理会严重忧虑和关切南苏丹的政治、安全和人道主义危机因苏丹人民解放运动(苏人解)的内部政治纷争和该国政治和军事领导人其后引发的暴力而恶化，
answer: 强调安理会严重震惊和关切苏丹人民解放运动(人运)内部政治争端和该国政治和军事领导人随后引起的暴力导致南苏丹政治、安全和人道主义危机不断恶化,

source: The daily grind of the urgent, he noted, tended to leave little time for those matters that in the long run could be even more important to the long-term credibility of the institution.
standard: 安理会每天处理紧急议题，少有时间关注一些长时间内对安理会长期信誉更为重要的事务。
answer: 他指出,当务之急的日常磨难往往没有多少时间来处理从长远来看对机构的长期信誉可能更为重要的那些事项。

source: Upon instructions from my Government, I have the honour to bring to your attention the joint military exercises of the United States and south Korea, entitled "Key Resolve" and "Foal Eagle", which have been conducted against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK) during the months of March and April 2015.
standard: 奉我国政府指示，谨提请你注意美国和南朝鲜于2015年3月和4月对朝鲜民主主义人民共和国(朝鲜)进行的代号分别为"关键决断"和"鹞鹰"的联合军事演习。
answer: 奉我国政府指示,谨提请你注意美国和南朝鲜在2015年3月和4月期间对朝鲜民主主义人民共和国(朝鲜)进行的题为“关键决断”和“福鹰”的联合军事演习。

source: 19. I ask the men and women working in the media, especially the foreign media, to focus on that aspect of the issue and to portray Burundi in a positive light, as the country is larger than just the four districts I have mentioned.
standard: 19. 我请从事媒体工作的男女，特别是外国媒体，重视问题的这个方面，积极描绘布隆迪的形象，因为布隆迪远比我提到的四个地区大。
answer: 19. 我请从事媒体工作的男女,特别是外国媒体集中关注这一问题的这个方面,正面描绘布隆迪,因为布隆迪比我刚才提到的四个地区要大。

source: They included a short-term planning and funding cycle, the lack of development-related staff skills, structures and competencies and limited solutions-focused partnerships and partner agreements, including joint programming with the United Nations country team.

source: UN-Women is like other organizations in this regard and has worked consciously and consistently since its foundation to maximize the potential of its mandate and staff members and to build synergies across its programmes.

answer: 妇女署在这方面与其他组织一样,自其成立以来自始至终自始自始自终自始自始自终自始至终自始至终自始至终自始至终自始至终自始至终努力最大限度地发挥其任务和工作人员的潜力,并在其各项方案中建立协同效应。

source: The Committee of Experts endorsed the terms of reference of the Expert Group, including its programme of work and areas of focus, and took note of the suggestions from Member States regarding the need to consider big data, the 2020 round of censuses and other information as means of integration, while avoiding duplication of efforts.

source: The supplies are changed every five months before they are outdated.

source: If the Jordanian regime truly wished to maintain Syria's stability, safeguard the lives of Syrian civilians and eradicate the blight of terrorism, it would not have established training camps for terrorists in its territory, set up logistical operations centres to support and guide terrorist groups, or helped thousands of terrorists cross its borders on a daily basis to infiltrate Syria.

answer: 如果约旦政权真正希望维护叙利亚的稳定,保护叙利亚平民的生命,消除恐怖主义的灾祸,那么它就不会在其领土上为恐怖分子建立训练营,建立后勤业务中心以支持和指导恐怖集团,或每天帮助数以千计的恐怖分子越过边界进入叙利亚。

source: It also provides guidance and support for both central and decentralized evaluation, drawing on good practices within UN-Women and elsewhere and the United Nations Evaluation Group guidelines.

source: Given the paramount importance of the issue of Palestinian political prisoners, the Committee also promoted an in-depth analysis of the status of these prisoners in accordance with international law, examining the issue in the context of the peace process, and identified practical steps to promote a solution.
standard: 鉴于巴勒斯坦政治犯问题极为重要，委员会还推动依照国际法对这些囚犯的状况进行深入分析，结合和平进程研究这个问题，并确定为促进这个问题的解决应采取的实际步骤。
answer: 鉴于巴勒斯坦政治犯问题至关重要,委员会还推动根据国际法深入分析这些囚犯的地位,在和平进程中审查这一问题,并确定了促进解决办法的实际步骤。

answer: 26. 科索沃特派团还继续促进科索沃当局与国际刑事警察组织(国际刑警组织)及其成员国之间的沟通。

source: In that connection, the Board notes that the financial statements for the year ended 30 June 2014, submitted to the Board on 30 September 2014, contained significant errors that were detected during the course of the Board's audit.

answer: 在这方面,审计委员会注意到,2014年9月30日提交给审计委员会的2014年6月30日终了年度财务报表载有审计委员会审计过程中发现的重大错误。

source: 2. Reiterates that the illicit transfer, destabilizing accumulation and misuse of small arms and light weapons fuel conflict and have devastating impact on the protection of civilians, reiterates its demand that all parties to armed conflict comply strictly with the obligations applicable to them under international humanitarian law, international human rights law and international refugee law, and stresses the need for parties to take all required measures to avoid civilian casualties, respect and protect the civilian population;
standard: 2. 重申非法转让、不利于稳定地积累和滥用小武器和轻武器助长冲突，严重影响对平民的保护，再次要求武装冲突各方严格遵守国际人道主义法、国际人权法和国际难民法规定的对其适用的义务，强调各方必须采取一切必要措施，避免平民伤亡，尊重和保护平民；
answer: 2. 重申非法转让、不利于稳定地积累和滥用小武器和轻武器助长冲突,对保护平民产生破坏性影响,再次要求武装冲突各方严格遵守国际人道主义法、国际人权法和国际难民法对其适用的各项义务,并强调各方必须采取一切必要措施,避免平民伤亡,尊重和保护平民;

source: 20. Recognizes the importance of preventing the illicit transfers and sales of weapons and ammunition, including small arms and light weapons, to armed groups and criminal networks that target civilians and civilian objects and underlines that such transfers could exacerbate conflict or facilitate the commitment of serious violations of international humanitarian law and serious violations and abuses of human rights;
standard: 20. 确认防止向攻击平民的武装团体和犯罪组织非法转让和销售包括小武器和轻武器在内的武器和弹药至关重要，着重指出这种转让可加剧冲突，或帮助实施严重违反国际人道主义法和严重侵犯践踏人权的行为；
answer: 20. 确认必须防止向以平民和民用物体为目标的武装团体和犯罪网络非法转让和出售武器和弹药,包括小武器和轻武器,并强调此类转让可能加剧冲突,或助长严重违反国际人道主义法和严重侵犯人权的行为;

source: Knowingly and with impunity, Russia continues violating human rights in the occupied territory, terrorizing those who disagree, especially Ukrainians and Crimean Tatars, conducting detentions and searches, chasing and detaining civic activists and waging a whole war against independent media and journalists.
standard: 俄罗斯继续在被占领土蓄意和肆无忌惮地侵犯人权，恐吓持不同意见者，特别是持不同意见的乌克兰人和克里米亚鞑靼人，进行拘留和搜查，追捕和扣押民权活动者，并对独立媒体和记者进行全面打压。
answer: 俄罗斯明知故犯,却在被占领土上继续侵犯人权,恐吓持不同意见的人,特别是乌克兰人和克里米亚鞑靼人,进行拘留和搜查,追赶和拘留公民活动家,对独立媒体和记者发动全面战争,而对此却不受惩罚。

source: The Security Council stresses that all parties should take concrete steps to agree and implement a consensus-based political solution to Yemen's crisis in accordance with the Gulf Cooperation Council Initiative and its Implementation Mechanism, the outcomes of the comprehensive National Dialogue conference, and the Peace and National Partnership Agreement and its security annex.
standard: 安全理事会强调，所有各方应采取具体步骤，根据海湾合作委员会倡议及其执行机制、全面的全国对话会议成果，以及和平与全国伙伴关系协议及其安全附件，商定并执行一项基于共识的政治解决也门危机的办法。
answer: 安全理事会强调,所有各方均应采取具体步骤,根据海湾合作委员会倡议及其执行机制、全面全国对话会议的成果、《和平与国家伙伴关系协定》及其安全附件,商定并实施以协商一致为基础的政治解决也门危机的办法。

source: Meanwhile, it is obvious that the territorial integrity as well as the sovereignty of the Islamic Republic of Iran over the said islands are not negotiable.
standard: 当然，伊朗伊斯兰共和国的领土完整和对上述岛屿的主权显然是不容谈判的。
answer: 与此同时,显然,伊朗伊斯兰共和国的领土完整和对上述岛屿的主权是不容谈判的。

source: In safeguards, the United States has held and supported national, regional and international training courses on State Systems of Accounting for and Control of Nuclear Material and the Additional Protocol.
standard: 在保障监督方面，美国举办并支持关于国家核材料衡算和控制系统以及《附加议定书》的国家、地区和国际培训课程。
answer: 在保障监督方面,美国举办并支持了国家核材料衡算和控制制度及附加议定书国家、区域和国际培训班。

source: The United States maintains a rigorous and comprehensive system of export controls for nuclear and nuclear-related dual-use items and technology, consistent with these guidelines control lists, and based in U.S. law and regulations.
standard: 美国根据该准则管制清单并依据美国法律和法规，坚持对核和核相关两用物品和技术实行严格和全面的出口管制制度。
answer: 美国维持一套严格和全面的核物项和与核有关的两用物项和技术出口管制制度,该制度符合这些准则的管制清单,并以美国法律和条例为依据。

source: We recognize our leading role and responsibility at all levels in developing and implementing crime prevention strategies and criminal justice policies at the national and subnational levels.
standard: 我们认识到我们在所有各级制定和实施国家和国家以下各级预防犯罪战略和刑事司法政策方面的牵头作用和责任。
answer: 我们认识到,我们在所有各级在国家和国家以下各级制定和执行预防犯罪战略和刑事司法政策方面发挥主导作用并承担责任。

source: Whereas the proposals put forward were mutually exclusive, as the parties on one side proposed to have the President of the Republic elected by the National Assembly and the Senate, and this proposal was challenged by the proponents of election by direct universal suffrage, which would give the President so elected a strong mandate from the people and broad legitimacy;
standard: 鉴于各方提出的建议相互排斥，一方提议由国民议会和参议院选举共和国总统，但受到提议直接普选总统的另一方质疑，后者认为直接普选的总统将拥有坚实的民众授权和广泛的合法性；
answer: 提出的提案是相互排斥的,因为一方的政党提议由国民议会和参议院选举共和国总统,这一提案受到直接普选选举支持者的质疑,这种选举将使当选总统从人民那里获得强有力的授权和广泛的合法性;

source: Recognizing the important role to be performed by the Peacebuilding Commission towards recovery, reintegration and reconstruction in countries emerging from conflict, particularly in Africa,

source: Attitudes that condone such violence often predate the armed conflicts, yet are reinforced during the conflicts and often persist long after the cessation of hostilities.
standard: 纵容这种暴力的态度往往在武装冲突前就存在，在冲突期间得到助长，在敌对行动停止后往往继续长期存在。
answer: 容忍这种暴力的态度往往发生在武装冲突之前,但在冲突期间得到了加强,而且往往在敌对行动停止很久之后持续存在。

source: The Falkland Islands (Malvinas) has a very low rate of unemployment, which was recorded as less than 1 per cent in 2012, with almost 20 per cent of those employed having more than one job.
standard: 福克兰群岛(马尔维纳斯群岛)失业率非常低，2012年不到1%，就业的人将近20%担任不止一份工作。
answer: 福克兰群岛(马尔维纳斯)的失业率非常低,2012年记录不到1%,几乎20%的就业人口有一份以上的工作。

source: 13. The Committee will request the Executive Directorate, in close cooperation with relevant entities of the Counter-Terrorism Implementation Task Force, to hold periodic briefings for Member States on thematic or regional aspects of the implementation of resolutions 1373 (2001) and 1624 (2005), taking into account the new requirements set out in resolution 2178 (2014).
standard: 13. 主席将在考虑到第2178(2014)号决议的新要求情况下，请执行局与反恐执行工作队相关实体密切合作，为会员国定期举行关于第1373(2001)和第1624(2005)号决议所涉专题和区域问题的简报会。
answer: 13. 委员会将请执行局与反恐执行工作队相关实体密切合作,考虑到第2178(2014)号决议规定的新要求,定期向会员国通报执行第1373(2001)号和第1624(2005)号决议的专题或区域方面。

source: The Committee was informed, however, that there was clear evidence to suggest that, if specific inflationary costs were to be taken into account, the decrease in peacekeeping costs may in fact be higher in real terms than the 17 per cent reported in the current report of the Secretary-General.
standard: 不过，行预咨委会获悉，有明确证据显示，如果考虑了具体通胀费用，维和费用的减少幅度实际上可能大于秘书长本次报告中列报的17%。
answer: 但行预咨委会获悉,有明确证据表明,如果考虑到具体的通货膨胀费用,维持和平费用的实际减少额实际上可能高于秘书长当前报告中报告的17%。

source: This initiative is supported with national teacher re-training across primary and secondary schools.
standard: 与该举措相配套的是中小学国家教师再培训。
answer: 支持这一举措的有全国中小学师资再培训。

source: As the Security Council noted in 2014, the problem of terrorists travelling to foreign conflicts is not new, but the threat has become grave and is continuing, with an unprecedented flow of fighters and facilitation networks fuelling multiple conflicts worldwide, such as in Iraq, the Syrian Arab Republic, the Horn of Africa, Afghanistan, Yemen and Libya.
standard: 正如安全理事会在2014年指出的，恐怖分子前往参加国外冲突的情况并非新问题，但这种威胁近来已趋严重，而且仍在继续：战斗人员前所未有地涌入，还有各种便利网，加剧着世界各地的许多冲突，例如伊拉克、阿拉伯叙利亚共和国、非洲之角、阿富汗、也门和利比亚的冲突。
answer: 安全理事会在2014年指出,恐怖分子前往外国冲突的问题并非新问题,但威胁已经变得非常严重,而且仍在继续,世界各地,如伊拉克、阿拉伯叙利亚共和国、非洲之角、阿富汗、也门和利比亚,战斗人员和调解网络空前流动,助长多重冲突。

source: As for the repeated false allegations regarding the Ercan Airport in the North, it should once again be underlined that the technologically up-to-date Ercan Area Control Centre (ACC) and Airport in North Cyprus have been providing regular, reliable and safe air traffic services since the Greek Cypriot refusal in 1977 to provide air traffic services in the northern part of the island in line with its isolation policy that has been imposed on the Turkish Cypriot people.
standard: 关于就北部埃坎机场一再提出的虚假指控，应当再次强调，1977年，希族塞人依照其对土族塞人实施的孤立政策，拒绝向塞浦路斯岛北部地区提供空中交通服务，此后，北塞浦路斯技术先进的埃坎地区管制中心和机场一直在提供可靠的、安全的空中交通服务。
answer: 关于对北部埃坎机场一再提出的不实指控,应再次强调,自1977年希族塞人拒绝按照强加给土族塞人的孤立政策在塞岛北部提供空中交通服务以来,技术先进的埃坎地区控制中心和北塞浦路斯机场一直提供定期、可靠和安全的空中交通服务。

source: Moreover, in the year 2014, about 25,000 planes used Ercan Airport for arrival and departure and 200,000 planes used Ercan Advisory Airspace.
standard: 此外，在2014年，约25 000架次飞机使用埃坎机场到离港，约200 000架次飞机使用了埃坎咨询空域。
answer: 此外,2014年,约有25 000架飞机使用埃坎机场抵达和出发,200 000架飞机使用埃坎咨询航空空间。

source: The Committee addresses this issue further in its report on cross-cutting issues related to peacekeeping operations.
standard: 行预咨委会在关于维持和平行动共有问题的报告中进一步谈到这一问题。
answer: 行预咨委会在其关于维持和平行动共有问题的报告 中进一步讨论了这个问题。

source: 6. Calls upon Israel to facilitate the return of all refugees and displaced Palestinian women and children to their homes and properties, in compliance with the relevant United Nations resolutions;
standard: 6. 促请以色列遵照联合国相关决议，为所有难民和流离失所巴勒斯坦妇女和儿童重返家园以及向其归还财产提供便利；
answer: 6. 吁请以色列遵守联合国有关决议,为所有难民和流离失所的巴勒斯坦妇女和儿童返回家园和归还其财产提供便利;

source: That commission shall work in close cooperation with the Monitoring Committee of the present Agreement.
standard: 该委员会将与本协定监测委员会密切协作。
answer: 该委员会应与本协定监测委员会密切合作开展工作。

source: Having met in Algiers in the framework of the negotiation process set out in the road map, with a view to reaching an Agreement to bring about a comprehensive and lasting peace that will put a definitive end to the crisis in the northern regions of Mali, referred to by some as the Azawad,
standard: 在路线图所述谈判进程框架内会聚阿尔及尔，期待达成一项实现全面和持久和平的协定，确保最终解决马里北部被某些人称为阿扎瓦德地区的危机，
answer: 在行进图规定的谈判进程框架内在阿尔及尔举行会议,以期达成一项协议,实现全面和持久和平,最终结束马里北部地区的危机,一些人称之为阿扎瓦德,

source: 25-26 March
answer: 3月25日至26日

source: In the same resolution, the Conference requested the Secretariat, subject to the availability of extrabudgetary resources, to continue to perform the functions of an international observatory and, at the request of the Working Group or the Conference, to provide information on lessons learned and the adaptability of good practices, as well as related technical assistance activities, which could be offered to States parties upon request.
standard: 在同一项决议中，缔约国会议请秘书处在可获得预算外资源的情况下，继续履行国际观察站的职能，根据工作组或缔约国会议的请求，介绍所汲取的经验教训和良好做法的变通性，并介绍可根据请求向缔约国提供的相关技术援助活动。
answer: 在同一决议中,缔约国会议请秘书处在可获得预算外资源的情况下,继续履行国际观测站的职能,并应工作组或缔约国会议的请求,提供关于经验教训和良好做法的适应性的信息,以及可根据请求向缔约国提供的相关技术援助活动的信息。

source: Statements were made by the Chair and the Acting High Representative for Disarmament Affairs.

answer: 主席和代理裁军事务高级代表发言。

source: The IAEA already plays a major role in this field and should be further supported.

answer: 原子能机构已经在这一领域发挥了重要作用,应得到进一步支持。

source: The Permanent Mission of the Republic of Lithuania to the United Nations presents its compliments to the Security Council Committee established pursuant to resolution 2140 (2014) and has the honour to submit the report of Lithuania prepared pursuant to paragraph 9 of resolution 2204 (2015) (see annex).
standard: 立陶宛共和国常驻联合国代表团向安全理事会第2140(2014)号决议所设委员会致意，并谨提交根据第2204(2015)号决议编写的立陶宛报告(见附件)。
answer: 立陶宛共和国常驻联合国代表团向安全理事会第2140(2014)号决议所设委员会致意,并谨提交立陶宛根据第2204(2015)号决议第9段编写的报告(见附件)。

source: Those illegal practices are yet another entry in Israel's shameful record, which is replete with such crimes as sowing fear, terrorism, forced displacement, the razing of Syrian villages, the plundering of natural resources and the destruction of historical monuments and the environment.
standard: 这些非法行径是以色列可鄙行为记录中的又一条记载，这项记录上罪行累累，例如散布恐惧、恐怖主义、强迫流离失所、夷平叙利亚乡村、掠夺自然资源、毁坏历史古迹和环境。
answer: 这些非法行径是以色列可耻纪录的又一个进入,以色列充满了播种恐惧、恐怖主义、强迫流离失所、夷平叙利亚村庄、掠夺自然资源和破坏历史遗迹和环境等罪行。

source: The first meeting of the technical working group held on 20 February brought together representatives of MINUSMA, the European Union, ECOWAS, the European Union training mission in Mali and the European Union police training mission.
standard: 2月20日，该技术工作组举行了第一次会议，来自马里稳定团、欧洲联盟、西非经共体、欧洲联盟马里培训团和欧洲联盟警察培训团的代表出席了会议。
answer: 2月20日举行的技术工作组第一次会议汇聚了马里稳定团、欧洲联盟、西非经共体、欧洲联盟马里培训团和欧洲联盟警察培训团的代表。

source: March marked yet another deadly month for the Syrian people.

source: In resolution 1738 (2006), it condemned all attacks against journalists, media professionals and associated personnel in armed conflicts and called upon all parties to put an end to such practices.
standard: 安全理事会第1738(2006)号决议谴责在武装冲突中针对记者、媒体专业人员和有关人员的一切攻击行为，并呼吁所有各方终止这种做法。
answer: 安理会第1738(2006)号决议谴责在武装冲突中针对记者、媒体专业人员和有关人员的所有袭击,并呼吁所有各方停止这种做法。

answer: 唯一具体侧重于这一问题的决议是第1738(2006)号决议。

source: Regarding the airfield lighting contract, the Committee was informed upon enquiry that a commercial supplier had been engaged by UNAMID for the enhancement of airfield lighting at El Fasher, Nyala and El Geneina airports and for the provision and installation of a digital very-high-frequency omnidirectional range and instrument landing system at El Geneina airport.
standard: 关于机场照明合同问题，行预咨委会经询问获悉，达尔富尔混合行动聘用一个商业供应商改进法希尔、尼亚拉和朱奈纳等机场的照明，并为朱奈纳机场提供和安装数字甚高频全向信标和仪表着陆系统。
answer: 关于机场照明合同,行预咨委会询问后获悉,达尔富尔混合行动聘请了一家商业供应商,负责在法希尔、尼亚拉和杰奈纳机场加强机场照明,在杰奈纳机场提供和安装数字甚高频全频场和仪器着陆系统。

source: The Millennium Development Goals and the Goals-based Strategy have played a decisive role in development strategy, serving as a foundation for Government action plans and annual fiscal policy.

answer: 10. 在大马士革农村省Al-Moadamyeh,2014年底生效的停火协议被打破。

source: The recent terrorist attack against a kosher supermarket in Paris in January 2015 is a painful reminder that anti-Semitism remains an urgent problem that must be addressed.

source: Previously, forced labour was the only type of slavery to be viewed as a crime against humanity.

answer: 以往,强迫劳动是唯一可被视为危害人类罪的奴役类型。

source: Accountability of all perpetrators is crucial as a key aspect of deterrence and prevention, and investigations and prosecutions must be centred on survivors and conducted in accordance with international standards;

answer: 追究所有肇事者的责任至关重要,是威慑和预防的一个关键方面,调查和起诉必须以幸存者为中心,并按照国际标准进行;

source: The requirements will provide for discretionary and mandatory self-evaluation of the Office's activities, including the review of data input into the Integrated Monitoring and Documentation Information System (IMDIS), assessments of the quality of its reports and periodic reviews of its operations.
standard: 这笔经费将用于对监督厅活动进行自行酌定和法定的自我评价，包括审查输入综合监测和文件信息系统的数据、评估监督厅报告的质量及定期审查监督厅的业务情况。
answer: 所需经费将用于对监督厅的活动进行自行酌定和强制性自我评价,包括审查输入综合监测和文件信息系统(监文信息系统)的数据,评估其报告的质量,定期审查其业务。

source: 30.1 The overall purpose of the programme is to enhance transparency and accountability and contribute to a high level of efficiency, effectiveness and goal fulfilment in the Organization.
standard: 30.1 本方案的总体目的是加强透明度和问责制，提高本组织效率和实效，促进实现本组织各项目标。
answer: 30.1 本方案的总目标是加强透明度和问责制,帮助本组织实现高水平的效率、实效和目标。

source: They must be prepared to translate global strategies into country-specific programmes.
standard: 他们必须做好准备，把全球战略转变为国别方案。
answer: 这些国家必须做好准备,将全球战略转化为针对具体国家的方案。

source: Note verbale dated 23 March 2015 from the Permanent Mission of Switzerland to the United Nations addressed to the Secretary-General
standard: 2015年3月23日瑞士常驻联合国代表团给秘书长的普通照会
answer: 2015年3月23日瑞士常驻联合国代表团给秘书长的普通照会

source: The Advisory Committee also considers that generators which have exceeded their regular lifespan should be phased out.
standard: 行预咨委会还认为，已超出其正常使用寿命的发电机应逐步淘汰。
answer: 咨询委员会还认为,超过正常使用寿命的发电机应逐步淘汰。

source: The session was opened by the Chair of the Committee, Lyutha Al-Mughairy (Oman).
standard: 委员会主席卢特亚·阿穆贾里(阿曼)宣布会议开幕。
answer: 委员会主席Lyutha Al-Mughairy(阿曼)宣布会议开幕。

source: In order to resume the meetings of the Mechanism in Gali, I urge all participants to work with the United Nations Representative to find a swift solution based on the proposals for the Mechanism of 18 February 2009.
standard: 为恢复加利事件预防和应对联合机制会议，我敦促联合机制的所有参与者与联合国代表合作，以便根据该机制2009年2月18日的各项建议迅速找到解决方案。
answer: 为了恢复该机制在加利的会议,我敦促所有与会者与联合国代表合作,根据2009年2月18日关于该机制的提议,迅速找到解决办法。

source: A new system for internally displaced persons to contact ministry officials, using a low-cost, Internet-based technology for making calls, supported by UNHCR, has been implemented at the Ministry for Internally Displaced Persons from the Occupied Territories, Accommodation and Refugees.
standard: 在难民署支持下，被占领土境内流离失所者、收容和难民部实施了境内流离失所者使用低成本因特网电话技术与该部官员电话联系的新系统。
answer: 在难民署的支持下,被占领土境内流离失所者、住宿和难民部实施了一个新的境内流离失所者联络系统,以便利用低成本的因特网技术与部委官员联系,进行通话。

source: 1. Please provide detailed information on steps taken to ensure that, in practice, international standards take precedence over all internal sources of law, including religious laws.
standard: 1. 请提供为确保在实践中国际标准优先于所有国内法律资源，包括宗教法而采取的措施的详细情况。
answer: 1. 请提供详细资料,说明为确保国际标准在实践中优先于所有国内法来源,包括宗教法而采取的步骤。
