source: 4. The most dramatic incident occurred on Thursday, 7 May 2015, when an ordinary Burundian citizen working for a telecommunications company was burned alive in the urban district of Nyakabiga simply because he was unknown to the demonstrators and treated ipso facto as a member of the Imbonerakure.
standard: 4. 最悲剧的事件发生在2015年5月7日星期四，一家电信公司的一名普通布隆迪工人在尼亚卡比加市区被活活烧死，原因仅仅是他不为示威者所识，被示威者强行视作青年团成员。
answer: 4. 最戏剧性的事件发生在2015年5月7日星期四,当时一名为一家电信公司工作的布隆迪普通公民在Nyakabiga市区被活活烧死,原因仅仅是示威者不认识他,而且当然是Imbonerakure的成员。

source: 21. Continues to welcome the statement by the President of the Security Council of 12 February 2013 in which the Council reiterated its previous call regarding the importance of State cooperation with the International Criminal Court in accordance with the respective obligations of States, and expressed its commitment to effective follow-up of Council decisions in this regard;
standard: 21. 继续欢迎2013年2月12日的安全理事会主席声明， 安理会在其中再次申明先前发出的关于各国必须根据各自义务与国际刑事法院开展合作的呼吁，并表示承诺切实跟踪安理会在这方面的决定；
answer: 21. 继续欢迎2013年2月12日安全理事会主席的声明,其中安理会重申其先前的呼吁,即各国必须根据各自国家的义务,与国际刑事法院合作,并承诺切实贯彻落实安理会在这方面的各项决定;

source: There are efforts under way to increase the allocation of African Union-assessed funding to its peace and security efforts; the January 2015 African Union Summit decided to allocate 25 per cent of the assessed contributions of African Union member States to peace operations.
standard: 非洲联盟正在采取措施增加对和平与安全工作的拨款；2015年1月非洲联盟首脑会议决定，把非洲联盟成员国摊款的25%用于和平行动。
answer: 正在努力增加非洲联盟分摊资金对其和平与安全努力的拨款;2015年1月非洲联盟首脑会议决定将非洲联盟成员国摊款的25%分配给和平行动。

answer: 今后,必须继续共同总结经验教训,确保每个组织将经验教训纳入其指导。

answer: 委员会还可设立会期工作组审议具体议程项目。

source: This move appears to be aimed at restructuring the space programme with more practical and realistic objectives, in particular regarding satellite launches.
standard: 这一举措似乎旨在调整太空计划，以便实现更为实际和现实的目标(尤其是关于卫星发射)。
answer: 这一行动似乎旨在调整空间方案,实现更加实际和现实的目标,特别是在卫星发射方面。

source: 28. Unlike every previous mandate, during the current mandate no transfers of conventional arms and related materiel by the Islamic Republic of Iran were reported to the Committee.
standard: 28. 与以往各次任务不同，在本任务期间，委员会没有接到关于伊朗伊斯兰共和国转让常规武器和相关物资的报告。
answer: 28. 与以往每项任务不同的是,在本任务期间,没有向委员会提交伊朗伊斯兰共和国转让常规武器和相关物资的报告。

source: 16. Concerning telecommunications, according to the administering Power, approximately 75 per cent of households are connected via broadband to the Internet.
standard: 16. 在电信方面，据管理国称，约75%的家庭已接通宽带因特网。
answer: 16. 关于电信,据管理国称,约有75%的家庭通过宽带接入因特网。

source: 15. The Executive Directorate, in close cooperation with the expert groups of the Security Council Committee pursuant to resolutions 1267 (1999) and 1989 (2011) and the Committee established pursuant to resolution 1540 (2004), and in accordance with its mandate, will continue to assist the work of the Committee in paying special attention to Member States for which information on the implementation of relevant resolutions is lacking, and to discuss how best to enhance the Committee's dialogue with those States.
standard: 15. 执行局将与安全理事会第1267(1999)、第1989(2011)号决议以及第1540(2004)号决议所设委员会密切合作，根据其任务规定，继续协助委员会特别关注缺乏相关决议执行情况资料的会员国，并讨论如何最好地加强委员会与这些国家的对话。
answer: 15. 执行局将与安全理事会第1267(1999)号和第1989(2011)号决议所设委员会各专家组以及第1540(2004)号决议所设委员会密切合作,并根据其任务规定,继续协助委员会的工作,对缺乏有关决议执行情况信息的会员国给予特别关注,并讨论如何最好地加强委员会与这些国家的对话。

source: The Committee will further consider information from the Executive Directorate on its engagement and the enhancement of partnerships with international, regional and subregional organizations, development entities, civil society, academia and other entities in conducting research and information-gathering and identifying good practices, in support of the Committee's efforts to promote the implementation of resolutions 1373 (2001) and 1624 (2005), taking into account the new requirements set out in resolution 2178 (2014).
standard: 委员会将进一步考虑执行局提供的关于与国际、区域和次区域组织、发展实体、民间社会、学术界及其他实体接触的资料，并加强与它们的伙伴关系，以便在考虑到第2178(2014)号决议规定的新要求情况下，进行研究、收集资料、确定良好做法，支持委员会努力推动执行第1373(2001)号和第1624(2005)号决议。
answer: 委员会将进一步审议执行局提供的资料,其中说明执行局参与并加强与国际、区域和次区域组织、发展实体、民间社会、学术界和其他实体的伙伴关系,开展研究和收集信息,确定良好做法,以支持委员会努力促进执行第1373(2001)号和第1624(2005)号决议,同时考虑到第2178(2014)号决议规定的新要求。

source: Those terrorist acts also aim to undermine the humanitarian action initiative by the leadership of the coalition in support of legitimacy in Yemen to respond to the needs of the Yemeni people through the implementation of humanitarian pauses for specified periods in order to carry out the initiative and deliver humanitarian aid.
standard: 这些恐怖主义行径的目的还在于破坏联盟领导人为支持也门的合法性而采取的人道主义行动举措，这些举措旨在于特定时间段内实施人道主义暂停，以便执行举措，交付人道主义援助，满足也门人民的各种需求。
answer: 这些恐怖行为还旨在破坏联盟领导人支持也门合法性的人道主义行动倡议,通过执行特定时期的人道主义暂停,满足也门人民的需要,以实施该倡议并提供人道主义援助。

source: He also indicates, however, that hurdles remain in terms of having the alleged fathers tested, judicial proceeding conducted and child support arrangements agreed upon (ibid., para. 27).
standard: 不过，他还指出，在对被指称的生父进行检查、履行司法程序和商定子女抚养安排等方面仍存在障碍(同上，第27段)。
answer: 但是,他还指出,在对被指控的父亲进行测试、进行司法程序和商定子女抚养安排方面仍然存在障碍(同上,第27段)。

source: The Pacific Financial Inclusion Programme (PFIP) worked with the Ministry of Education in Fiji to embed financial education (FinED) into the national syllabi so that financial education is now fully integrated into the core curriculum and the syllabi will undergo a full year of implementation in 2015.
standard: 太平洋普惠金融方案与斐济教育部合作，将金融教育纳入了国家教学大纲，以致金融教育现已被充分纳入核心课程，而教学大纲的执行工作将贯穿2015年全年。
answer: 太平洋金融普惠方案与斐济教育部合作,将金融教育纳入国家教学大纲,以便金融教育现在完全纳入核心课程,2015年将全年实施教学大纲。

source: In September 2014, the Security Council, at a summit at the level of Heads of Government chaired by the President of the United States of America, Barack Obama, adopted resolution 2178 (2014) to respond to the acute and emerging threat posed by foreign terrorist fighters.
standard: 2014年9月，安全理事会在美利坚合众国总统巴拉克·奥巴马主持的政府首脑级会议上，为应对外国恐怖主义战斗人员构成的新的严重威胁，通过了第2178(2014)号决议。
answer: 2014年9月,安全理事会在美利坚合众国总统巴拉克·奥巴马主持的政府首脑级首脑会议上,通过了第2178(2014)号决议,以应对外国恐怖主义战斗人员构成的严峻和新出现的威胁。

source: Turkey's actions are clearly aimed at undermining the sovereignty of the Republic of Cyprus, bolstering the continuing de facto division and upgrading the secessionist entity's status, by claiming a purported airspace over the occupied territory of the Republic.
standard: 土耳其的行动显然是要通过对塞浦路斯共和国被占领土上空提出所谓的空域权利主张，破坏共和国主权，支持事实分裂的持续并提升分离主义实体的地位。

source: Furthermore, I wish to inform you that Turkey and the occupation regime illegally issued a notice to airmen for the dates of 19, 20, 23 and 24 March, relating to exercises of the Turkish Air Force.

source: In the month of April, over 34,000 Syrians were deprived of treatment as a consequence of hindrance or confiscation by regime forces.

answer: 4月份,34 000多名叙利亚人由于政权部队阻挠或没收而被剥夺待遇。

source: Access to medical supplies and equipment continues to be restricted and its timely delivery is severely hindered by regime-imposed limitations.

answer: 获得医疗用品和设备的机会继续受到限制,政府施加的限制严重阻碍了药品和设备的及时运送。

source: 40. In addressing economic disparity and disparity in technological innovation and research capacity among countries, it is crucial to enhance technology transfer, involving a process of enabling and facilitating flows of skill, knowledge, ideas, know-how and technology from developed to developing countries in the implementation of this Framework.
standard: 40. 为克服国家之间的经济差异及其在技术创新和研究能力方面的差距，加强技术转让至关重要，其中涉及在执行本框架过程中促进和协助技能、知识、理念、专门技能和技术从发达国家流入发展中国家的进程。
answer: 40. 在解决各国之间在技术创新和研究能力方面的经济差距和差距时,关键是要加强技术转让,包括推动和便利技能、知识、想法、诀窍和技术从发达国家向发展中国家流动的进程,以执行本框架。

source: 8.6 The Committee further notes that, under international human rights law, the principle of non-refoulement imposes a duty on States to refrain from returning a person to a jurisdiction in which he or she may face serious violations of human rights, notably arbitrary deprivation of life or torture or other cruel, inhuman or degrading treatment or punishment.
standard: 8.6 委员会进一步指出，根据国际人权法，不驱回原则规定各国有义务避免将个人遣返到其人权可能遭受严重侵害，尤其是被任意剥夺自由或遭到酷刑或其他残忍、不人道或有辱人格的待遇或处罚的地方。
answer: 8.6 委员会还注意到,根据国际人权法,不驱回原则规定各国有义务不将某人遣返到他或她可能面临严重侵犯人权行为,特别是任意剥夺生命或酷刑或其他残忍、不人道或有辱人格的待遇或处罚的管辖区。

source: One legal challenge faced by Member States in the effective implementation and use of API concerns the right to be protected by law against unlawful or arbitrary interference with privacy in the context of passenger data collected, retained, transmitted and used (art. 17 of the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights and art. 12 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights).

answer: 约旦哈希姆王国政府在2015年4月2日叙利亚常驻联合国代表团就耶尔穆克巴勒斯坦难民营最近的事态发展给秘书长和安全理事会主席的同文信中,对约旦提出不实指控和不可接受的指控,约旦王国政府完全和部分予以驳斥。

source: Therefore, to be effective, non-proliferation measures, in addition to limiting the geographical scope of nuclear weapons, should reduce the number and destructive power of such weapons and the possibility of their use too.
standard: 因此，要想有效，不扩散措施除了要限制核武器的地理范围外，还应减少此种武器的数量和破坏力以及使用此种武器的可能性。
answer: 因此,不扩散措施要有效,除了限制核武器的地理范围外,还应减少这种武器的数量和破坏力以及使用核武器的可能性。

source: 9. The establishment of nuclear-weapon-free zones in different parts of the world and the creation of a nuclear-weapon-free status by a certain country, which led to the absence of nuclear weapons in the respective territories of that State and those parties to the treaties establishing such zones, are indeed other achievements in preventing the proliferation of nuclear weapons.
standard: 9. 世界各地无核武器区的确立以及某个国家无核武器地位的创建导致该国以及设立无核武器区条约缔约国各自领土上不存在核武器，这的确也是防止核武器扩散方面的成就。
answer: 9. 在世界不同地区建立无核武器区,由某个国家建立无核武器地位,导致该国和建立无核武器区条约缔约国各自领土上没有核武器,确实是在防止核武器扩散方面取得的其他成就。

standard: 7. 根据《外汇和外贸法》，日本政府对《输出贸易管理令》附表1第1项和《外汇令》附表1分别列为"须受管制"物项的武器和相关技术的出口实施管制。

standard: 法官在处以刑罚时会考虑犯罪情节的严重性。
answer: 法官在量刑时考虑到罪行的严重性。

source: Section 9(f) of the Judicature Act establishes jurisdiction over offences committed by Sri Lankan citizens outside the country.
standard: 《司法法》第9(f)条确立了对斯里兰卡公民在国外所犯罪行的管辖权。
answer: 《司法法》第9(f)节确立了对斯里兰卡公民在国外所犯罪行的管辖权。

source: The increase is offset in part by reduced requirements under travel of staff, which take into account the anticipated impact of the approved standards of accommodation for air travel and reduced requirements for contractual services.
standard: 与之部分相抵的是，工作人员差旅所需经费因经核准的飞机舱位标准的预计影响而减少，并且订约承办事务所需资源减少。
answer: 增加额被工作人员旅费项下所需经费减少部分抵销,减少额考虑到核准的空中旅行舱位标准的预期影响和订约承办事务所需经费减少。

source: It also carries out liaison and conducts negotiations with UNEP, UN-Habitat and other offices on all aspects of service arrangements, negotiates under the authority of the Director General of the Office with the host country authorities on all administrative and financial issues relating to the implementation of the headquarters agreement, and formulates and negotiates cost-sharing and charge-back arrangements with other United Nations entities and specialized agencies with respect to services provided to them.
standard: 它还就服务安排的各个方面同环境署、人居署以及其他办事处进行联络和商谈；根据内罗毕办事处主任的授权，就执行总部协定涉及的一切行政和财务事项，同东道国当局进行谈判；制订并与联合国其他实体和专门机构谈判提供服务的费用分摊和收费安排。
answer: 该办公室还就服务安排的所有方面与环境署、人居署和其他办事处进行联络和谈判,在办事处总干事领导下,就与执行总部协定有关的所有行政和财务问题与东道国当局进行谈判,并就向联合国其他实体和专门机构提供的服务制定和谈判费用分摊和收费安排。

source: He also noted the continued impact on Lebanon of the conflict in the Syrian Arab Republic, including in respect of Syrian refugees and the host communities supporting them.
standard: 他还注意到阿拉伯叙利亚共和国的冲突对黎巴嫩的影响仍然存在，包括对叙利亚难民和帮助他们的收容社区的影响。
answer: 他还指出,阿拉伯叙利亚共和国境内的冲突继续对黎巴嫩产生影响,包括叙利亚难民和支持他们的东道社区。

source: In 1944, Crimean Tatars were deported from the Crimean peninsula as a result of a State-organized and forcible action ordered by the then Soviet leader J. Stalin.
standard: 1944年，当时的苏联领导人斯大林下令采取国家组织的强制行动，将克里米亚鞑靼人从克里米亚半岛驱逐出境。
answer: 1944年,克里米亚鞑靼人因当时的苏联领导人斯大林下令采取由国家组织和强制行动而被驱逐出克里米亚半岛。

source: 18. The economic and social advancement of all peoples of the world is one of the main objectives of the United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea.

source: Therefore, identifying the linkages between the sustainable development of oceans and seas and the goals put forth by the Open Working Group could contribute to understanding the role of oceans in the sustainable development agenda and the need for enhanced integration of the environmental, social and economic dimensions in relation to oceans.

source: In addition to settlement expansion, on 4 May, the occupying Power approved plans for the demolition of tents and homes in the village of Khirbet Susiya, near Al-Khalil, in order to advance plans to build a park for settlers in the area.

answer: 5月4日,除了扩大定居点外,占领国还批准了拆除哈利勒附近的Khirbet Susiya村帐篷和住房的计划,以便推进在该地区为定居者建造公园的计划。

source: 3.2 The authors emphasize that millions of other women remain governed by discriminatory customary provisions in the State party and experience the same violations that they have themselves faced.

source: Consequently, the authors were deprived of the right to administer their husbands' estates and excluded from inheriting any property upon the death of their spouses.

answer: 因此,提交人被剥夺了管理丈夫财产的权利,配偶死亡后不得继承任何财产。

source: We have steadily reduced the size of our own nuclear forces by well over 50 per cent since our Cold War peak and since 1998 all of our air-delivered nuclear weapons have been withdrawn and dismantled.

answer: 自冷战高峰以来,自1998年以来,我们已经稳步地将我国核力量的规模减少了50%以上,而且自1998年以来,我国所有空投核武器都已撤回和拆除。

source: Recalling also that in the Political Declaration and Plan of Action on International Cooperation towards an Integrated and Balanced Strategy to Counter the World Drug Problem it is stated that Member States should, working within their legal frameworks and in compliance with applicable international law, consider allowing the full implementation of drug dependence treatment and care options for offenders, in particular, when appropriate, providing treatment as an alternative to incarceration,

source: UNHCR has expanded to South Kivu its Safe Access to Fuel and Energy (SAFE) project, under which sustainable cooking fuels and alternative energy are provided, following a successful pilot in North Kivu where it helped to reduce the risk of sexual violence faced by displaced women collecting firewood and water.
standard: 难民署在北基伍省成功开展可持续的煮饭燃料和替代能源项目("SAFE"项目)试点，降低流离失所妇女在拾柴和取水时面临的性暴力风险，并在此基础上将该项目推广至南基伍省。
answer: 难民专员办事处在北基伍成功进行了试点,帮助减少拾柴和取水的流离失所妇女遭受性暴力的风险。 之后,难民专员办事处将安全获得燃料和能源项目扩大到南基伍,在该项目下提供可持续的烹饪燃料和替代能源。

source: In addition, the Directorate-General for Humanitarian Aid and Civil Protection of the European Commission and the Spanish Agency for International Development Cooperation have funded additional capacities, including an international security officer integrated into the MINURSO security management system, to increase security for humanitarian activities and humanitarian personnel in the camps.

source: The Mission revived dedicated working group discussions with the parties that were initiated in November 2013 to clarify understandings of the agreement, reconcile variations in approach, address the concerns put forward by each party with regard to application of the agreement in the current operational environment and strengthen the MINURSO monitoring regime overall, in particular with regard to access to military facilities and violation definitions.
standard: 特派团恢复了于2013年11月发起的与双方进行的专门工作组讨论，以澄清对协定的理解，调和方法上的差异，解决每一方就在目前的行动环境中应用协定提出的问题，以及整体加强西撒特派团监测制度，特别是关于进入军事设施和定义违规行为方面的工作。
answer: 西撒特派团恢复了2013年11月启动的与各方的专门工作组讨论,以澄清对协定的理解,调和不同做法,解决各方就在当前行动环境中适用协定提出的关切,加强西撒特派团总体监测制度,特别是在获取军事设施和违规定义方面。

source: The parties emphasized the importance of holding, on a regular basis, meetings in the present trilateral format on issues of common interest with regard to regional and international cooperation, and agreed to hold their next meeting in the Republic of Turkey.

answer: 双方强调必须定期举行现有三边会议,讨论在区域和国际合作方面共同关心的问题,并同意在土耳其共和国举行下一次会议。

source: The purpose of the fact sheets is to summarize factual technical information in a neutral manner, providing a description of the market sector and sub-sectors, information on low-GWP alternatives to HFCs and a discussion of key issues, including commercial availability, cost, safety and standards, energy efficiency, technical training and others.

answer: 概况介绍的目的是以中立方式总结事实技术信息,介绍市场部门和分部门,介绍低全球升温潜能值氢氟碳化合物替代品,并讨论关键问题,包括商业可得性、成本、安全和标准、能源效率、技术培训和其他。

source: At the 2010 Review Conference, all parties to the Treaty expressed their "deep concern at the catastrophic humanitarian consequences of any use of nuclear weapons".
standard: 在2010年审议大会上，所有缔约国都表示它们"深为关切核武器的任何使用会导致灾难性人道主义后果"。
answer: 在2010年审议大会上,《条约》所有缔约国都表示“深为关切使用核武器造成的灾难性人道主义后果”。

source: With the Netherlands and South Africa, Switzerland has introduced draft decisions maintaining the issue of revitalization on the agenda of the General Assembly, and Switzerland calls upon the international community to continue to explore, consider and consolidate options, proposals and elements for a revitalization of the United Nations disarmament machinery as a whole, including the Conference on Disarmament.
standard: 瑞士与荷兰和南非一道，已经提出将振兴裁军谈判会议的问题保留在大会议程的决定草案，并且瑞士呼吁国际社会继续探讨、考虑和巩固振兴包括裁军谈判会议在内的联合国整体裁军机制的选项、提案和要素。
answer: 瑞士与荷兰和南非一道,提出了将振兴问题保留在大会议程上的决定草案,瑞士呼吁国际社会继续探索、审议和巩固振兴整个联合国裁军机制,包括裁军谈判会议的各种选择、建议和要素。

source: On Monday, 30 March 2015, at approximately 1.30 a.m., Syrian regime helicopters dropped four barrel bombs containing a noxious chemical substance on the Syrian city of Idlib.
standard: 2015年3月30日星期一凌晨约1时30分，叙利亚政权直升机向叙利亚伊德利布市投下4枚含有有毒化学物质的桶式炸弹。
answer: 2015年3月30日星期一上午1时30分左右,叙利亚政权直升机在叙利亚伊德利卜市投掷了四枚装有有毒化学物质的桶装炸弹。

source: 26. AIDS is the second leading cause of death among adolescents globally, and the leading cause of adolescent deaths in Africa.
standard: 26. 艾滋病是全球青少年的第二大死因，是非洲青少年的第一大死因。
answer: 26. 艾滋病是全球青少年死亡的第二大原因,也是非洲青少年死亡的主要原因。

source: 47. Gender socialization and evidence strengthening have also been part of the organization's work in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
standard: 47. 性别平等社会化和证据强化也是本组织在刚果民主共和国工作的一部分。
answer: 47. 性别社会化和加强性别证据也是本组织在刚果民主共和国工作的一部分。

source: Ukraine also expressed its support for the peaceful settlement of the Nagorno-Karabakh conflict on the basis of respect for the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the Republic of Azerbaijan within its internationally recognized borders.
standard: 乌克兰还表示，支持以尊重阿塞拜疆共和国在其国际公认边界内主权和领土完整为基础，和平解决纳戈尔诺-卡拉巴赫冲突。
answer: 乌克兰还表示支持在尊重阿塞拜疆共和国在国际公认边界内的主权和领土完整的基础上和平解决纳戈尔诺-卡拉巴赫冲突。

source: Recalling all its previous resolutions and statements of its President on the situation in Somalia,

answer: 回顾其以往关于索马里局势的所有决议和主席声明,

source: Reaffirming its respect for the sovereignty, political independence, territorial integrity and unity of Somalia,
standard: 重申尊重索马里的主权、政治独立、领土完整和统一，
answer: 重申尊重索马里的主权、政治独立、领土完整和统一,

source: Cuba has contributed to the achievement of the Committee's objectives by participating actively and on a continuous basis in that forum; it is currently serving as its ViceChair.
standard: 古巴一直促进实现委员会的目标，为此积极并持续参与委员会的工作，目前担任委员会副主席。
answer: 古巴一直积极参与论坛,为委员会目标的实现作出了贡献;古巴目前担任副主席。

source: By adopting flexible and innovative approaches to the challenging environment, aid agencies were able to reach 3.6 million people with life-saving assistance.
standard: 通过采取灵活的新方法来应对挑战环境，援助机构得以为360万人提供救生援助。
answer: 援助机构通过对具有挑战性的环境采取灵活和创新的办法,得以向360万人提供拯救生命的援助。

standard: 五. 前景和建议
answer: 五. 前景和建议

source: There are significant geographic disparities in income distribution, however, as the South Province accounts for 85 per cent of total household income, the North Province for 11.1 per cent and the Loyalty Islands Province for only 3.9 per cent.
standard: 不过，收入分配方面存在重大的地域差异：家庭总收入大约有85%在南方省，11.1%在北方省，只有3.9%是在洛亚蒂群岛省。
answer: 然而,在收入分配方面存在巨大的地理差异,因为南方省占家庭总收入的85%,北方省占11.1%,洛亚尔提群岛省仅占3.9%。

source: Some 20,000 New Zealand soldiers were stationed in New Caledonia during the Second World War.
standard: 第二次世界大战期间，大约两万名新西兰士兵驻扎在新喀里多尼亚。
answer: 第二次世界大战期间,约有20 000名新西兰士兵驻扎在新喀里多尼亚。

answer: 2. 认可行政和预算问题咨询委员会报告2 所载的结论和建议;

source: Upon enquiry, the Committee was informed that a total of 36 non-training consultancies were requested, including consultancy services requiring expertise in such areas as human rights, rule of law, advice on political systems, national dialogue or constitutional issues.
standard: 行预咨委会经了解获悉，共提出了36项非培训咨询服务请求，包括需要人权、法治、政治制度见解、民族对话或宪法事项等领域知识专长的咨询服务。
answer: 行预咨委会询问后获悉,共请求提供36项非培训咨询,包括需要人权、法治、政治制度咨询、全国对话或宪法问题等领域专门知识的咨询服务。

source: Mindful of the urgent need to find a solution to the problems related to forced displacement in Georgia,
standard: 念及必须紧急寻求格鲁吉亚境内强迫流离失所问题的解决办法，
answer: 念及迫切需要找到格鲁吉亚境内被迫流离失所问题的解决办法,

source: With the exception of Europe, where the total population is projected to decrease slightly, all other major regions are projected to grow by at least 10 per cent over the next 15 years.
standard: 今后15年中，除欧洲预测总人口将略有减少外，其他所有区域的预测人口至少增加10%。
answer: 在欧洲,预计总人口将略有下降,但欧洲除外,所有其他主要区域预计在今后15年内至少增长10%。

source: For instance, according to the Nuclear Posture Review, the possibility to "use or threaten to use nuclear weapons against non-nuclear-weapons States that are party to the NonProliferation Treaty" has been envisaged.
standard: 例如，《核态势评估报告》显示，"对《不扩散条约》的无核武器缔约国使用或威胁使用核武器"的可能性其实早有预见。
answer: 例如,根据《核态势评估报告》,设想了“对《不扩散条约》的无核武器缔约国使用或威胁使用核武器”的可能性。

source: 6. It is argued by nuclear-weapon States that negative security assurances should be granted only in the context of the nuclear-weapon-free zones, which of course is rejected by Iran and many other countries.
standard: 6. 核武器国家辩称，消极安全保证应该只针对无核武器区提供，毫无疑问，这一观点遭到伊朗和其他许多国家的反对。
answer: 6. 核武器国家认为,只有在无核武器区方面才能提供消极安全保证,伊朗和许多其他国家当然反对无核武器区。

source: The organization has participated in the sessions of the Commission on the Status of Women for the last four years, as well as the General Assembly sessions in 2012 and 2013.
standard: 本组织过去4年参加了妇女地位委员会的历届会议，并于2012年和2013年参加了联大届会。
answer: 本组织参加了妇女地位委员会过去四年的各届会议,以及2012年和2013年的大会届会。

source: This was often the case for States under review in the fourth year that had recently become parties to the Convention.
standard: 最近加入《公约》的第四年受审议国往往是这种情况。
answer: 在最近成为《公约》缔约国的第四年接受审议的国家往往属于这种情况。

source: In our own situation, there are also other factors.
standard: 就我们国家的自身情况而言，还有其他因素。
answer: 在我们自己的情况下,还有其他因素。

source: Unequal access to education, including comprehensive sexuality and HIV education, difficulties securing regular income and employment, and lack of economic security, as well as violence and fear thereof are also increasing women's vulnerability to HIV transmission.
standard: 使妇女更容易感染艾滋病毒的原因还包括受教育机会不平等，其中包括全面的性教育和艾滋病毒防治教育，很难获得固定收入和就业，缺乏经济安全，以及暴力和恐惧。
answer: 获得教育的机会不平等,包括全面的性教育和艾滋病毒教育,难以获得正常收入和就业,缺乏经济保障,以及暴力和恐惧,也使妇女更容易感染艾滋病毒。

source: A total of 103 out of 109 countries have identified the elimination of stigma and discrimination as a national priority and 61 per cent of countries have reported the existence of anti-discrimination laws that protect people living with HIV [25].
standard: 在109个国家中，共有103个已确定将消除污名化与歧视作为国家优先事项，61%的国家已报告有保护艾滋病毒感染者的反歧视法律[25]。
answer: 109个国家中共有103个国家将消除污名化和歧视确定为国家优先事项,有61%的国家报告说制定了保护艾滋病毒感染者的反歧视法律[25]。

source: One C-151 Turkish landing ship violates the territorial waters of the Republic of Cyprus and illegally uses the closed port of Ammochostos.
standard: 一艘C-151型土耳其登陆舰侵犯塞浦路斯共和国领水，并非法使用非开放的阿莫霍斯托斯港。
answer: 一艘土耳其C-151登陆艇侵犯塞浦路斯共和国领水,非法使用Ammochostos非开放港口。

source: The outcome took the form of a Chair's summary, in which the Chair identified key priorities of the region while proposing several specific recommendations, such as renewed efforts to mobilize national sources of financing to address social disparities and income inequalities, including those between the genders.
standard: 其成果是一份主席摘要，其中，主席确定了该区域的关键优先事项，同时提出了一些具体建议，如继续努力调动国内筹资来源，用以应对社会差距和收入不平等，包括性别间差距和不平等问题。
answer: 成果采取主席总结的形式,主席在总结中确定了该区域的主要优先事项,同时提出了几项具体建议,例如重新努力调动国家供资来源,以解决社会差距和收入不平等,包括两性差距和收入不平等。

source: Collection of past-biennium arrears will be reported to Member States through issuance of an information note, listing each share, as soon as the amounts become available for distribution.
standard: 49. 一旦确定了可分配的数额，将通过印发情况说明，列出各自所占份额，向成员国报告收取上一两年期欠款的情况。
answer: 上两年期拖欠款的收缴情况一经确定可以分发的数额,将通过印发一份情况说明向会员国报告,其中列出每一份额。

answer: 与会者一致认为,有必要制定一个独立的性别平等目标,扩大千年发展目标所涉领域的覆盖面。

source: 1. Declare our absolute support for the legitimate authorities pursuant to the constitution, namely, President Abdrabuh Mansour Hadi Mansour, and pledge to strive by every means to reverse the coup and all its consequences and ensure that the legitimate State institutions are once more able to exercise all functions and powers.
standard: 1. 宣布我们绝对支持符合宪法的合法当局，即阿卜杜拉布·曼苏尔·哈迪总统，承诺采用一切手段挫败政变及其所有后果，确保合法的国家机构能再次行使所有职能和权力。
answer: 1. 宣布我们绝对支持合法当局,即阿布杜拉布·曼苏尔·哈迪·曼苏尔总统,并承诺竭尽全力扭转政变及其所有后果,确保合法国家机构再次能够行使所有职能和权力。

source: The States of the zone have adopted a plan of action for strengthening nuclear security, preventing the proliferation of nuclear materials and combating nuclear terrorism in Central Asia.
standard: 该区域各国制定了行动计划，以加强核安保、防止核材料扩散并打击中亚核恐怖主义。
answer: 合作区各国通过了一项行动计划,以加强核安全,防止核材料扩散,打击中亚的核恐怖主义。

source: The States parties to the Treaty unequivocally undertook not to allow the production, acquisition, stationing, storage or use of any nuclear weapon or other nuclear explosive device in their respective territories.
standard: 《条约》缔约国坚定承诺不允许在其各自领土生产、获取、部署、储存和使用任何核武器和其他核爆炸装置。
answer: 条约缔约国明确承诺不允许在各自领土上生产、获取、部署、储存或使用任何核武器或其他核爆炸装置。
